摘要: 间充质干细胞（MSCs）的命运受生物学，物理和化学信号调节。生物技术和材料科学的发展促进了生物活性物质的出现，这些物质可以为MSC提供调节其命运的物理和化学信号。为了设计和合成能够精确调节MSC命运的材料，需要阐明材料特性与间充质干细胞的命运之间的关系，其中间充质干细胞的命运的检测起着重要的作用。。在过去的30年中，已经开发出了一系列检测技术来检测受生物活性物质调控的MSC的命运，其中高通量技术由于能够一次检测大量数据而显示出巨大的优势。在这篇综述中，从传统技术到高通量技术，系统地回顾了检测由骨生物活性材料（BBMs）调节的MSC的命运的最新研究进展。此外，展望了由BBMs调控的MSC命运检测技术的当前问题和未来的发展方向。这篇综述的目的是为研究人员提供一种检测技术框架，以建立BMMs特性与MSC命运之间的关系，以帮助研究人员更好地设计和合成BBM，从而精确地调节MSC的命运。

Pubmed_ID: 33004899

Identification of putative master regulators in rheumatoid arthritis synovial fibroblasts using gene expression data and network inference

利用基因表达数据和网络推论鉴定类风湿关节炎滑膜成纤维细胞中假定的主调节剂

DOI: 10.1038/s41598-020-73147-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33004899/

Journal: Scientific reports {'ISSN': '2045-2322', 'Name': 'scientific reports', '2015': '5.228', '2016': '4.259', '2017': '4.122', '2018': '4.011', '2019': '3.998'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Rheumatoid arthritis (RA) is a systemic autoimmune disease that affects the synovial joints of the body. Rheumatoid arthritis fibroblast-like synoviocytes (RA FLS) are central players in the disease pathogenesis, as they are involved in the secretion of cytokines and proteolytic enzymes, exhibit invasive traits, high rate of self-proliferation and an apoptosis-resistant phenotype. We aim at characterizing transcription factors (TFs) that are master regulators in RA FLS and could potentially explain phenotypic traits. We make use of differentially expressed genes in synovial tissue from patients suffering from RA and osteoarthritis (OA) to infer a TF co-regulatory network, using dedicated software. The co-regulatory network serves as a reference to analyze microarray and single-cell RNA-seq data from isolated RA FLS. We identified five master regulators specific to RA FLS, namely BATF, POU2AF1, STAT1, LEF1 and IRF4. TF activity of the identified master regulators was also estimated with the use of two additional, independent software. The identified TFs contribute to the regulation of inflammation, proliferation and apoptosis, as indicated by the comparison of their differentially expressed target genes with hallmark molecular signatures derived from the Molecular Signatures Database (MSigDB). Our results show that TFs influence could be used to identify putative master regulators of phenotypic traits and suggest novel, druggable targets for experimental validation.

摘要: 类风湿关节炎（RA）是一种全身性自身免疫性疾病，会影响人体的滑膜关节。类风湿关节炎成纤维样滑膜细胞（RAFLS）是疾病发病机理的主要参与者，因为它们参与细胞因子和蛋白水解酶的分泌，表现出侵袭性特征，高自我增殖率和抗凋亡表型。我们旨在表征转录因子（TFs），它是RAFLS中的主要调控因子，并可能解释表型性状。我们使用专用软件，利用RA和骨关节炎（OA）患者滑膜组织中差异表达的基因，推断出TF协同调节网络。共同调控网络可作为分析来自分离的RAFLS的微阵列和单细胞RNA-seq数据的参考。我们确定了五个特定于RAFLS的主调节器，即BATF，POU2AF1，STAT1，LEF1和IRF4。还通过使用两个附加的独立软件来估计已确定的主调节器的TF活动。鉴定出的TF有助于调节炎症，增殖和凋亡，这是通过将它们的差异表达靶基因与衍生自分子特征数据库（MSigDB）的标志性分子特征进行比较来表明的。我们的结果表明，TF的影响可用于识别表型性状的假定主调节剂，并为实验验证提供新颖，可药物化的靶标。

Pubmed_ID: 33004820

Highly efficient oxygen evolution reaction via facile bubble transport realized by three-dimensionally stack-printed catalysts

通过三维堆叠印刷的催化剂，通过便捷的气泡传输实现高效的氧气释放反应

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18686-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33004820/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Despite highly promising characteristics of three-dimensionally (3D) nanostructured catalysts for the oxygen evolution reaction (OER) in polymer electrolyte membrane water electrolyzers (PEMWEs), universal design rules for maximizing their performance have not been explored. Here we show that woodpile (WP)-structured Ir, consisting of 3D-printed, highly-ordered Ir nanowire building blocks, improve OER mass activity markedly. The WP structure secures the electrochemically active surface area (ECSA) through enhanced utilization efficiency of the extended surface area of 3D WP catalysts. Moreover, systematic control of the 3D geometry combined with theoretical calculations and various electrochemical analyses reveals that facile transport of evolved O2 gas bubbles is an important contributor to the improved ECSA-specific activity. The 3D nanostructuring-based improvement of ECSA and ECSA-specific activity enables our well-controlled geometry to afford a 30-fold higher mass activity of the OER catalyst when used in a single-cell PEMWE than conventional nanoparticle-based catalysts.

摘要: 尽管在聚合物电解质膜水电解槽（PEMWE）中用于氧释放反应（OER）的三维（3D）纳米结构催化剂具有极富希望的特征，但尚未探索出最大化其性能的通用设计规则。在这里，我们显示由3D打印的，高度有序的Ir纳米线构建块组成的木桩（WP）结构的Ir显着提高了OER的质量活性。WP结构通过提高3DWP催化剂扩展表面积的利用效率来确保电化学活性表面积（ECSA）。此外，对3D几何形状的系统控制，理论计算和各种电化学分析相结合，揭示了析出的O2气泡的便捷输送是ECSA比活性提高的重要因素。基于3D纳米结构的ECSA和ECSA特定活性的改进使我们良好控制的几何形状在单细胞PEMWE中使用时，可提供比传统纳米颗粒催化剂高30倍的OER催化剂质量活性。

Pubmed_ID: 33004689

Single hepatocytes show persistence and transcriptional inactivity of hepatitis B

单肝细胞显示出乙型肝炎的持久性和转录失活

DOI: 10.1172/jci.insight.140584

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33004689/

Journal: JCI insight {'ISSN': '2379-3708', 'Name': 'jci insight', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '6.014', '2019': '6.205'}

Date: 10/02/2020

Abstract: There is no cure for the more than 270 million people chronically infected with HBV. Nucleos(t)ide analogs (NUCs), the mainstay of anti-HBV treatment, block HBV reverse transcription. NUCs do not eliminate the intranuclear covalently closed circular DNA (cccDNA), from which viral RNAs, including pregenomic RNA (pgRNA), are transcribed. A key gap in designing a cure is understanding how NUCs affect HBV replication and transcription because serum markers yield an incomplete view of intrahepatic HBV. We applied single-cell laser capture microdissection and droplet digital PCR to paired liver biopsies collected from 5 HBV/HIV-coinfected persons who took NUCs over 2-4 years. From biopsy 1 to 2, proportions of HBV-infected hepatocytes declined with adherence to NUC treatment (P < 0.05); we extrapolated that eradication of HBV will take over 10 decades with NUCs in these participants. In individual hepatocytes, pgRNA levels diminished 28- to 73-fold during NUC treatment, corresponding with decreased tissue HBV core antigen staining (P < 0.01). In 4 out of 5 participants, hepatocytes with cccDNA but undetectable pgRNA (transcriptionally inactive) were present, and these were enriched in 3 participants during NUC treatment. Further work to unravel mechanisms of cccDNA transcriptional inactivation may lead to therapies that can achieve this in all hepatocytes, resulting in a functional cure.

摘要: 超过2.7亿慢性感染HBV的人无法治愈。抗-HBV治疗的主要手段-核苷类似物（NUCs）阻止HBV逆转录。NUC没有消除核内共价封闭的环状DNA（cccDNA），从中转录出病毒RNA，包括前基因组RNA（pgRNA）。设计治疗方法的关键差距在于了解NUC如何影响HBV复制和转录，因为血清标志物不能完全反映肝内HBV。我们将单细胞激光捕获显微切割技术和液滴数字PCR技术应用于从5名HBV/HIV合并感染者中收集的成对肝活检样本，这些人在2-4年内服用了NUC。从活检1至2，坚持NUC治疗后，感染HBV的肝细胞比例下降（P<0.05）。我们推断，在这些参与者中，使用NUC消灭HBV将需要10多年。在单个肝细胞中，在NUC治疗期间pgRNA水平降低了28到73倍，与组织HBV核心抗原染色减少相对应（P<0.01）。在五分之四的参与者中，存在具有cccDNA但未检测到pgRNA（转录失活）的肝细胞，并且在NUC治疗过程中有三名参与者富集了这些肝细胞。进一步阐明cccDNA转录失活机制的工作可能导致可以在所有肝细胞中实现这一目标的疗法，从而实现功能性治愈。

Pubmed_ID: 33004487

A latent lineage potential in resident neural stem cells enables spinal cord repair

驻留神经干细胞中潜在的谱系潜力可实现脊髓修复

DOI: 10.1126/science.abb8795

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33004487/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 10/02/2020

Abstract: Injuries to the central nervous system (CNS) are inefficiently repaired. Resident neural stem cells manifest a limited contribution to cell replacement. We have uncovered a latent potential in neural stem cells to replace large numbers of lost oligodendrocytes in the injured mouse spinal cord. Integrating multimodal single-cell analysis, we found that neural stem cells are in a permissive chromatin state that enables the unfolding of a normally latent gene expression program for oligodendrogenesis after injury. Ectopic expression of the transcription factor OLIG2 unveiled abundant stem cell-derived oligodendrogenesis, which followed the natural progression of oligodendrocyte differentiation, contributed to axon remyelination, and stimulated functional recovery of axon conduction. Recruitment of resident stem cells may thus serve as an alternative to cell transplantation after CNS injury.

摘要: 对中枢神经系统（CNS）的伤害修复不力。驻留的神经干细胞对细胞置换的贡献有限。我们发现了神经干细胞潜在的潜力，以替换受损的小鼠脊髓中大量丢失的少突胶质细胞。整合多模式单细胞分析，我们发现神经干细胞处于允许的染色质状态，能够使损伤后的少突胶质形成正常潜伏的基因表达程序展开。转录因子OLIG2的异位表达揭示了丰富的干细胞来源的少突胶质生成，其跟随少突胶质细胞分化的自然进程，促进了轴突的再髓鞘形成，并刺激了轴突传导的功能恢复。因此，常驻干细胞的募集可以作为中枢神经系统损伤后细胞移植的替代方法。

Pubmed_ID: 33004416

EBF1 and Pax5 safeguard leukemic transformation by limiting IL-7 signaling, Myc expression, and folate metabolism

EBF1和Pax5通过限制IL-7信号传导，Myc表达和叶酸代谢来保护白血病转化

DOI: 10.1101/gad.340216.120

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33004416/

Journal: Genes & development {'ISSN': '0890-9369', 'Name': 'genes & development', '2015': '10.042', '2016': '9.413', '2017': '9.462', '2018': '8.99', '2019': '9.527'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: EBF1 and PAX5 mutations are associated with the development of B progenitor acute lymphoblastic leukemia (B-ALL) in humans. To understand the molecular networks driving leukemia in the Ebf1+/-Pax5+/- (dHet) mouse model for B-ALL, we interrogated the transcriptional profiles and chromatin status of leukemic cells, preleukemic dHet pro-B, and wild-type pro-B cells with the corresponding EBF1 and Pax5 cistromes. In dHet B-ALL cells, many EBF1 and Pax5 target genes encoding pre-BCR signaling components and transcription factors were down-regulated, whereas Myc and genes downstream from IL-7 signaling or associated with the folate pathway were up-regulated. We show that blockade of IL-7 signaling in vivo and methotrexate treatment of leukemic cells in vitro attenuate the expansion of leukemic cells. Single-cell RNA-sequencing revealed heterogeneity of leukemic cells and identified a subset of wild-type pro-B cells with reduced Ebf1 and enhanced Myc expression that show hallmarks of dHet B-ALL cells. Thus, EBF1 and Pax5 may safeguard early stage B cells from transformation to B-ALL by limiting IL-7 signaling, folate metabolism and Myc expression.

摘要: EBF1和PAX5突变与人类B祖细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病（B-ALL）的发展有关。为了了解在Bb-ALL的Ebf1+/-Pax5+/-（dHet）小鼠模型中驱动白血病的分子网络，我们询问了白血病细胞，白血病前dHetpro-B和野生型pro-B的转录谱和染色质状态具有相应EBF1和Pax5密码子的细胞。在dHetB-ALL细胞中，编码前BCR信号成分和转录因子的许多EBF1和Pax5目标基因被下调，而Myc和IL-7信号下游或与叶酸途径相关的基因被上调。我们显示，IL-7信号传导的体内阻断和甲氨蝶呤对白血病细胞的体外治疗可减弱白血病细胞的扩增。单细胞RNA测序揭示了白血病细胞的异质性，并鉴定了具有dHetB-ALL细胞特征的Ebf1降低和Myc表达增强的野生型pro-B细胞子集。因此，EBF1和Pax5可以通过限制IL-7信号传导，叶酸代谢和Myc表达来保护早期B细胞免于转化为B-ALL。

Pubmed_ID: 33003326

Differential Regulation of Telomeric Complex by BCR-ABL1 Kinase in Human Cellular Models of Chronic Myeloid Leukemia-From Single Cell Analysis to Next-Generation Sequencing

慢性粒细胞白血病人细胞模型中BCR-ABL1激酶对端粒复合物的差异调节-从单细胞分析到下一代测序

DOI: 10.3390/genes11101145

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33003326/

Journal: Genes None

Date: 09/29/2020

Abstract: Telomeres are specialized nucleoprotein complexes, localized at the physical ends of chromosomes, that contribute to the maintenance of genome stability. One of the features of chronic myeloid leukemia (CML) cells is a reduction in telomere length which may result in increased genomic instability and progression of the disease. Aberrant telomere maintenance in CML is not fully understood and other mechanisms such as the alternative lengthening of telomeres (ALT) are involved. In this work, we employed five BCR-ABL1-positive cell lines, namely K562, KU-812, LAMA-84, MEG-A2, and MOLM-1, commonly used in the laboratories to study the link between mutation, copy number, and expression of telomere maintenance genes with the expression, copy number, and activity of BCR-ABL1. Our results demonstrated that the copy number and expression of BCR-ABL1 are crucial for telomere lengthening. We observed a correlation between BCR-ABL1 expression and telomere length as well as shelterins upregulation. Next-generation sequencing revealed pathogenic variants and copy number alterations in major tumor suppressors, such as TP53 and CDKN2A, but not in telomere-associated genes. Taken together, we showed that BCR-ABL1 kinase expression and activity play a crucial role in the maintenance of telomeres in CML cell lines. Our results may help to validate and properly interpret results obtained by many laboratories employing these in vitro models of CML.

摘要: 端粒是专门的核蛋白复合物，位于染色体的物理末端，有助于维持基因组的稳定性。慢性粒细胞白血病（CML）细胞的特征之一是端粒长度减少，这可能导致基因组不稳定和疾病进展。尚不完全了解CML中端粒的异常维持，还涉及其他机制，例如端粒的选择性延长（ALT）。在这项工作中，我们使用了五个BCR-ABL1阳性细胞系，即K562，KU-812，LAMA-84，MEG-A2和MOLM-1，这些细胞系通常用于实验室研究突变，拷贝数，端粒维持基因的表达和表达，以及BCR-ABL1的表达，拷贝数和活性。我们的结果表明，BCR-ABL1的拷贝数和表达对于端粒延长至关重要。我们观察到BCR-ABL1表达与端粒长度以及庇护素上调之间的相关性。下一代测序揭示了主要的肿瘤抑制因子（如TP53和CDKN2A）中的致病性变异和拷贝数变化，而端粒相关基因则没有。综上所述，我们表明BCR-ABL1激酶的表达和活性在CML细胞系中端粒的维持中起着至关重要的作用。我们的结果可能有助于验证和正确解释许多使用这些CML体外模型的实验室所获得的结果。

Pubmed_ID: 33003206

A spectral clustering with self-weighted multiple kernel learning method for single-cell RNA-seq data

具有自加权多核学习方法的单细胞RNA-seq数据的光谱聚类

DOI: 10.1093/bib/bbaa216

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33003206/

Journal: Briefings in bioinformatics {'ISSN': '1467-5463', 'Name': 'briefings in bioinformatics', '2015': '8.399', '2016': '5.134', '2017': '6.302', '2018': '9.101', '2019': '8.99'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) data widely exist in bioinformatics. It is crucial to devise a distance metric for scRNA-seq data. Almost all existing clustering methods based on spectral clustering algorithms work in three separate steps: similarity graph construction; continuous labels learning; discretization of the learned labels by k-means clustering. However, this common practice has potential flaws that may lead to severe information loss and degradation of performance. Furthermore, the performance of a kernel method is largely determined by the selected kernel; a self-weighted multiple kernel learning model can help choose the most suitable kernel for scRNA-seq data. To this end, we propose to automatically learn similarity information from data. We present a new clustering method in the form of a multiple kernel combination that can directly discover groupings in scRNA-seq data. The main proposition is that automatically learned similarity information from scRNA-seq data is used to transform the candidate solution into a new solution that better approximates the discrete one. The proposed model can be efficiently solved by the standard support vector machine (SVM) solvers. Experiments on benchmark scRNA-Seq data validate the superior performance of the proposed model. Spectral clustering with multiple kernels is implemented in Matlab, licensed under Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) and freely available from the Github website, https://github.com/Cuteu/SMSC/.

摘要: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）数据广泛存在于生物信息学中。设计用于scRNA-seq数据的距离度量至关重要。几乎所有基于频谱聚类算法的现有聚类方法都在三个单独的步骤中工作：相似度图构建；持续的标签学习；通过k均值聚类对学习标签进行离散化。但是，这种常规做法具有潜在的缺陷，可能导致严重的信息丢失和性能下降。此外，内核方法的性能在很大程度上取决于所选内核。自加权多核学习模型可以帮助为scRNA-seq数据选择最合适的核。为此，我们建议从数据中自动学习相似性信息。我们以多核组合的形式提出了一种新的聚类方法，可以直接发现scRNA-seq数据中的分组。主要主张是，从scRNA-seq数据中自动学习的相似性信息用于将候选解转换为更好地近似离散解的新解。所提出的模型可以通过标准支持向量机（SVM）求解器进行有效求解。在基准scRNA-Seq数据上进行的实验验证了所提出模型的优越性能。在Matlab中实现了具有多个内核的光谱聚类，并获得了麻省理工学院（MIT）的许可，并且可以从Github网站https://github.com/Cuteu/SMSC/免费获得。

Pubmed_ID: 33003202

A review of computational strategies for denoising and imputation of single-cell transcriptomic data

单细胞转录组数据去噪和插补的计算策略综述

DOI: 10.1093/bib/bbaa222

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33003202/

Journal: Briefings in bioinformatics {'ISSN': '1467-5463', 'Name': 'briefings in bioinformatics', '2015': '8.399', '2016': '5.134', '2017': '6.302', '2018': '9.101', '2019': '8.99'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Motivation: The advancements of single-cell sequencing methods have paved the way for the characterization of cellular states at unprecedented resolution, revolutionizing the investigation on complex biological systems. Yet, single-cell sequencing experiments are hindered by several technical issues, which cause output data to be noisy, impacting the reliability of downstream analyses. Therefore, a growing number of data science methods has been proposed to recover lost or corrupted information from single-cell sequencing data. To date, however, no quantitative benchmarks have been proposed to evaluate such methods. Results: We present a comprehensive analysis of the state-of-the-art computational approaches for denoising and imputation of single-cell transcriptomic data, comparing their performance in different experimental scenarios. In detail, we compared 19 denoising and imputation methods, on both simulated and real-world datasets, with respect to several performance metrics related to imputation of dropout events, recovery of true expression profiles, characterization of cell similarity, identification of differentially expressed genes and computation time. The effectiveness and scalability of all methods were assessed with regard to distinct sequencing protocols, sample size and different levels of biological variability and technical noise. As a result, we identify a subset of versatile approaches exhibiting solid performances on most tests and show that certain algorithmic families prove effective on specific tasks but inefficient on others. Finally, most methods appear to benefit from the introduction of appropriate assumptions on noise distribution of biological processes.

摘要: 动机：单细胞测序方法的进步为以前所未有的分辨率表征细胞状态铺平了道路，彻底改变了对复杂生物系统的研究。然而，单细胞测序实验受到一些技术问题的阻碍，这些技术问题导致输出数据嘈杂，影响下游分析的可靠性。因此，提出了越来越多的数据科学方法来从单细胞测序数据中恢复丢失或损坏的信息。但是，迄今为止，尚未提出用于评估此类方法的定量基准。结果：我们对用于单细胞转录组数据的去噪和归算的最新计算方法进行了全面分析，比较了它们在不同实验场景下的性能。详细地，我们比较了模拟和现实数据集上的19种去噪和插补方法，这些方法涉及到与辍学事件的插补，真实表达谱的恢复，细胞​​相似性的表征，差异表达基因的鉴定和鉴定有关的几种性能指标。计算时间。评估了所有方法的有效性和可扩展性，涉及的是不同的测序方案，样品大小以及不同水平的生物变异性和技术噪声。结果，我们确定了在大多数测试中表现出出色性能的通用方法的子集，并表明某些算法家族证明对特定任务有效，而对其他任务无效。最后，大多数方法似乎都受益于对生物过程噪声分布的适当假设的引入。

Pubmed_ID: 33002664

Small Bowel Resection Increases Paracellular Gut Barrier Permeability via Alterations of Tight Junction Complexes Mediated by Intestinal TLR4

小肠切除术通过肠TLR4介导的紧密连接复合物的改变增加了细胞旁肠屏障的通透性。

DOI: 10.1016/j.jss.2020.08.049

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33002664/

Journal: The Journal of surgical research ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/28/2020

Abstract: Background: Short bowel syndrome resulting from small bowel resection (SBR) is associated with significant morbidity and mortality. Many adverse sequelae including steatohepatitis and bacterial overgrowth are thought to be related to increased bacterial translocation, suggesting alterations in gut permeability. We hypothesized that after intestinal resection, the intestinal barrier is altered via toll-like receptor 4 (TLR4) signaling at the intestinal level. Methods: B6 and intestinal-specific TLR4 knockout (iTLR4 KO) mice underwent 50% SBR or sham operation. Transcellular permeability was evaluated by measuring goblet cell associated antigen passages via two-photon microscopy. Fluorimetry and electron microscopy evaluation of tight junctions (TJ) were used to assess paracellular permeability. In parallel experiments, single-cell RNA sequencing measured expression of intestinal integral TJ proteins. Western blot and immunohistochemistry confirmed the results of the single-cell RNA sequencing. Results: There were similar number of goblet cell associated antigen passages after both SBR and sham operation (4.5 versus 5.0, P > 0.05). Fluorescein isothiocyanate-dextran uptake into the serum after massive SBR was significantly increased compared with sham mice (2.13 ± 0.39 ng/μL versus 1.62 ± 0.23 ng/μL, P < 0.001). SBR mice demonstrated obscured TJ complexes on electron microscopy. Single-cell RNA sequencing revealed a decrease in TJ protein occludin (21%) after SBR (P < 0.05), confirmed with immunostaining and western blot analysis. The KO of iTLR4 mitigated the alterations in permeability after SBR. Conclusions: Permeability after SBR is increased via changes at the paracellular level. However, these alterations were prevented in iTLR4 mice. These findings suggest potential protein targets for restoring the intestinal barrier and obviating the adverse sequelae of short bowel syndrome.

摘要: 背景：小肠切除术（SBR）导致的短肠综合征与明显的发病率和死亡率有关。许多不良后遗症，包括脂肪性肝炎和细菌过度生长，被认为与细菌易位增加有关，提示肠道通透性改变。我们假设在肠切除后，肠屏障通过在肠水平上的toll样受体4（TLR4）信号改变。方法：对B6和肠特异性TLR4基因敲除（iTLR4KO）小鼠进行50％SBR或假手术。通过通过双光子显微镜测量杯状细胞相关抗原的传代来评估跨细胞的通透性。紧密连接（TJ）的荧光分析和电子显微镜评估用于评估细胞旁通透性。在平行实验中，单细胞RNA测序测量了肠道整体TJ蛋白的表达。Western印迹和免疫组织化学证实了单细胞RNA测序的结果。结果：SBR和假手术后，杯状细胞相关抗原的传代次数相近（4.5比5.0，P>0.05）。与假手术小鼠相比，大量SBR后荧光素异硫氰酸酯-右旋糖酐摄入血清的比例显着增加（2.13±0.39ng/μL对比1.62±0.23ng/μL，P<0.001）。SBR小鼠在电子显微镜下显示出模糊的TJ复合物。单细胞RNA测序显示SBR后TJ蛋白occludin减少（21％）（P<0.05），已通过免疫染色和Westernblot分析证实。iTLR4的KO减轻了SBR后渗透率的变化。结论：SBR后的通透性通过细胞旁水平的变化而增加。但是，在iTLR4小鼠中可以防止这些改变。这些发现表明，潜在的蛋白质靶标可用于恢复肠屏障和消除短肠综合征的不良后遗症。

Pubmed_ID: 33002572

Quantitative metabolome and transcriptome analysis reveals complex regulatory pathway underlying photoinduced fiber color formation in cotton

定量代谢组和转录组分析揭示了棉花光诱导纤维颜色形成的复杂调控途径

DOI: 10.1016/j.gene.2020.145180

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33002572/

Journal: Gene None

Date: 09/28/2020

Abstract: As an important plant single cell model and textile application materials, poorly known about fiber color formation in cotton, which is sensitively regulated by environmental signals. Our studies underline the importance of photo signal on sensitive fiber color formation and characterize fiber color early initiation (15 DPA) and late accumulated metabolites (45 DPA) in different lighting condition. The results revealed 236 differential metabolites between control and shading, of which phenylpropanoids metabolites accounted for 20%, including uncharacterized novel metabolites and pathways. Furthermore, the early initiation specific genes respond to the absence of light are highly correlated with phenylpropanoid metabolites related to pigmentation. The current study reveals the complex pathways involving early initiation regulation and late metabolic pathways. In addition, the collection composed of uncharacterized photoinduced metabolites and early initiation signaling/regulatory genes were identified, which are important resources for understanding fiber color formation. This report provides new insight into molecular regulatory and biochemical basis underlying photoinduced fiber color formation in cotton.

摘要: 作为重要的植物单细胞模型和纺织品应用材料，人们对棉花中纤维颜色的形成知之甚少，棉花的颜色受环境信号敏感地调节。我们的研究强调了光信号对敏感的纤维颜色形成的重要性，并表征了在不同光照条件下纤维颜色的早期引发（15DPA）和晚期累积代谢产物（45DPA）。结果显示，在对照和遮光之间有236种差异代谢产物，其中苯丙烷类代谢产物占20％，其中包括未表征的新型代谢产物和途径。此外，对光的缺乏作出反应的早期起始特异性基因与与色素沉着有关的苯丙烷代谢产物高度相关。当前的研究揭示了涉及早期启动调节和晚期代谢途径的复杂途径。此外，鉴定了由未表征的光诱导代谢物和早期启动信号/调控基因组成的集合，这是了解纤维颜色形成的重要资源。该报告提供了对棉花光诱导纤维颜色形成基础的分子调控和生化基础的新见解。

Pubmed_ID: 33002502

The HDAC Inhibitor Domatinostat Promotes Cell Cycle Arrest, Induces Apoptosis and Increases Immunogenicity of Merkel Cell Carcinoma Cells

HDAC抑制剂Domatinostat促进细胞周期阻滞，诱导凋亡并增加默克尔细胞癌细胞的免疫原性。

DOI: 10.1016/j.jid.2020.08.023

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33002502/

Journal: The Journal of investigative dermatology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/28/2020

Abstract: Merkel cell carcinoma (MCC) is a rare, highly aggressive skin cancer for which immune modulation by immune checkpoint inhibitors show remarkable response rates. However, primary or secondary resistance to immunotherapy prevents benefits in a significant proportion of patients. For MCC, one immune escape mechanism is insufficient recognition by T cells due to downregulation of major histocompatibility complex (MHC) class I surface expression. Histone deacetylase (HDAC) inhibitors have been demonstrated to epigenetically reverse low MHC class I expression caused by downregulation of the antigen processing machinery (APM). Domatinostat, an orally available small molecule inhibitor targeting HDAC class I, is currently in clinical evaluation to overcome resistance to immunotherapy. Here, we present preclinical data on its efficacy and mode of action in MCC. Single-cell RNA-sequencing revealed a distinct gene expression signature of antigen processing and presentation, cell cycle arrest and execution phase of apoptosis upon treatment. Accordingly, functional assays showed that it induced G2M arrest and apoptosis. In surviving cells, APM component gene transcription and translation were up-regulated, consequently resulting in increased MHC class I surface expression. Altogether, domatinostat not only exerts direct anti-tumoral effects, but also restores HLA class I surface expression on MCC cells. Therefore, restoring surviving MCC cells' susceptibility to recognition and elimination by cognate cytotoxic T cells.

摘要: 默克尔细胞癌（MCC）是一种罕见的高度侵袭性皮肤癌，其免疫检查点抑制剂对免疫的调节显示出显着的应答率。但是，对免疫疗法的原发性或继发性抗药性会在很大一部分患者中使患者受益。对于MCC，由于主要组织相容性复合体（MHC）I类表面表达下调，一种免疫逃逸机制不足以被T细胞识别。已证明组蛋白脱乙酰基酶（HDAC）抑制剂可表观遗传地逆转由抗原加工机器（APM）的下调引起的低MHCI类表达。Domatinostat是一种针对HDACI类的口服小分子抑制剂，目前正在临床评估中，以克服对免疫疗法的抵抗力。在这里，我们介绍了其在MCC中的疗效和作用方式的临床前数据。单细胞RNA测序揭示了抗原处理和呈递，细胞周期停滞以及治疗后凋亡执行阶段的独特基因表达特征。因此，功能测定表明它诱导了G2M停滞和凋亡。在存活的细胞中，APM成分基因的转录和翻译被上调，因此导致MHCI类表面表达增加。总之，多米诺司他不仅发挥直接的抗肿瘤作用，而且还恢复了MCC细胞上HLAI类表面表达。因此，恢复存活的MCC细胞对同源细胞毒性T细胞识别和清除的敏感性。

Pubmed_ID: 33002412

In Situ Maturation and Tissue Adaptation of Type 2 Innate Lymphoid Cell Progenitors

2型先天淋巴样细胞祖细胞的原位成熟和组织适应。

DOI: 10.1016/j.immuni.2020.09.002

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33002412/

Journal: Immunity {'ISSN': '1074-7613', 'Name': 'immunity', '2015': '24.082', '2016': '22.845', '2017': '19.734', '2018': '21.522', '2019': '22.553'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Innate lymphoid cells (ILCs) are generated early during ontogeny and persist predominantly as tissue-resident cells. Here, we examined how ILCs are maintained and renewed within tissues. We generated a single cell atlas of lung ILC2s and found that Il18r1+ ILCs comprise circulating and tissue-resident ILC progenitors (ILCP) and effector-cells with heterogeneous expression of the transcription factors Tcf7 and Zbtb16, and CD103. Our analyses revealed a continuous differentiation trajectory from Il18r1+ ST2- ILCPs to Il18r- ST2+ ILC2s, which was experimentally validated. Upon helminth infection, recruited and BM-derived cells generated the entire spectrum of ILC2s in parabiotic and shield chimeric mice, consistent with their potential role in the renewal of tissue ILC2s. Our findings identify local ILCPs and reveal ILCP in situ differentiation and tissue adaptation as a mechanism of ILC maintenance and phenotypic diversification. Local niches, rather than progenitor origin, or the developmental window during ontogeny, may dominantly imprint ILC phenotypes in adult tissues.

摘要: 先天性淋巴样细胞（ILC）在个体发育的早期产生，并主要作为组织驻留细胞而持续存在。在这里，我们研究了如何在组织内维持和更新ILC。我们生成了肺ILC2s单细胞图谱，发现Il18r1+ILCs包括循环的和组织驻留的ILC祖细胞（ILCP）以及效应细胞，其中转录因子Tcf7和Zbtb16和CD103的表达不均一。我们的分析揭示了从Il18r1+ST2-ILCPs到Il18r-ST2+ILC2s的连续分化轨迹，这一点已通过实验验证。蠕虫感染后，募集的和BM衍生的细胞在共生和屏蔽嵌合小鼠中产生了ILC2的整个谱图，与其在组织ILC2s更新中的潜在作用相一致。我们的发现确定了局部ILCP，并揭示了ILCP的原位分化和组织适应性是ILC维持和表型多样化的机制。局部壁ni而不是祖细胞起源或个体发育过程中的发育窗口可能会在成人组织中显着地印记ILC表型。

Pubmed_ID: 33002136

Imputing single-cell RNA-seq data by considering cell heterogeneity and prior expression of dropouts

通过考虑细胞异质性和缺失的先前表达来估算单细胞RNA-seq数据

DOI: 10.1093/jmcb/mjaa052

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33002136/

Journal: Journal of molecular cell biology {'ISSN': '1674-2788', 'Name': 'journal of molecular cell biology', '2015': '6.459', '2016': '5.988', '2017': '5.595', '2018': '4.671', '2019': '4'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) provides a powerful tool to determine expression patterns of thousands of individual cells. However, the analysis of scRNA-seq data remains a computational challenge due to the high technical noise such as the presence of dropout events that lead to a large proportion of zeros for expressed genes. Taking into account the cell heterogeneity and the relationship between dropout rate and expected expression level, we present a cell sub-population based bounded low-rank (PBLR) method to impute the dropouts of scRNA-seq data. Through application to both simulated and real scRNA-seq datasets, PBLR is shown to be effective in recovering dropout events, and it can dramatically improve the low-dimensional representation and the recovery of gene‒gene relationships masked by dropout events compared to several state-of-the-art methods. Moreover, PBLR also detects accurate and robust cell sub-populations automatically, shedding light on its flexibility and generality for scRNA-seq data analysis.

摘要: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）提供了一种功能强大的工具，可确定数千个单个细胞的表达模式。但是，由于高技术噪音（例如存在导致大量表达的基因零值的缺失事件），对scRNA-seq数据的分析仍然是计算难题。考虑到细胞异质性以及辍学率和预期表达水平之间的关系，我们提出了一种基于细胞亚群的有界低秩（PBLR）方法来估算scRNA-seq数据的辍学。通过应用于模拟和实际scRNA-seq数据集，PBLR被证明在恢复缺失事件方面是有效的，并且与几种状态检测方法相比，它可以显着改善低维表示和被缺失事件掩盖的基因与基因关系的恢复。最先进的方法。此外，PBLR还可以自动检测准确而强大的细胞亚群，从而揭示了其灵活性和通用性，可用于scRNA-seq数据分析。

Pubmed_ID: 33001973

PhyDOSE: Design of follow-up single-cell sequencing experiments of tumors

PhyDOSE：肿瘤的后续单细胞测序实验设计

DOI: 10.1371/journal.pcbi.1008240

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33001973/

Journal: PLoS computational biology {'ISSN': '1553-734x', 'Name': 'plos computational biology', '2015': '4.587', '2016': '4.542', '2017': '3.955', '2018': '4.428', '2019': '4.7'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: The combination of bulk and single-cell DNA sequencing data of the same tumor enables the inference of high-fidelity phylogenies that form the input to many important downstream analyses in cancer genomics. While many studies simultaneously perform bulk and single-cell sequencing, some studies have analyzed initial bulk data to identify which mutations to target in a follow-up single-cell sequencing experiment, thereby decreasing cost. Bulk data provide an additional untapped source of valuable information, composed of candidate phylogenies and associated clonal prevalence. Here, we introduce PhyDOSE, a method that uses this information to strategically optimize the design of follow-up single cell experiments. Underpinning our method is the observation that only a small number of clones uniquely distinguish one candidate tree from all other trees. We incorporate distinguishing features into a probabilistic model that infers the number of cells to sequence so as to confidently reconstruct the phylogeny of the tumor. We validate PhyDOSE using simulations and a retrospective analysis of a leukemia patient, concluding that PhyDOSE's computed number of cells resolves tree ambiguity even in the presence of typical single-cell sequencing errors. We also conduct a retrospective analysis on an acute myeloid leukemia cohort, demonstrating the potential to achieve similar results with a significant reduction in the number of cells sequenced. In a prospective analysis, we demonstrate the advantage of selecting cells to sequence across multiple biopsies and that only a small number of cells suffice to disambiguate the solution space of trees in a recent lung cancer cohort. In summary, PhyDOSE proposes cost-efficient single-cell sequencing experiments that yield high-fidelity phylogenies, which will improve downstream analyses aimed at deepening our understanding of cancer biology.

摘要: 同一肿瘤的大量和单细胞DNA测序数据的结合，可以推断出高保真系统发育，这是癌症基因组学中许多重要下游分析的输入。尽管许多研究同时执行批量和单细胞测序，但一些研究已经分析了初始批量数据，以识别后续单细胞测序实验中靶向哪些突变，从而降低了成本。大量数据提供了其他尚未开发的有价值信息来源，包括候选系统发育和相关的克隆流行率。在这里，我们介绍PhyDOSE，一种使用此信息从战略上优化后续单细胞实验设计的方法。我们的方法的基础是观察到只有少数克隆将一棵候选树与所有其他树唯一区分开。我们将不同的特征整合到一个概率模型中，该模型可以推断要测序的细胞数量，从而有把握地重建肿瘤的系统发育。我们通过对白血病患者的模拟和回顾性分析验证了PhyDOSE，认为即使存在典型的单细胞测序错误，PhyDOSE的计算细胞数也可以消除树的歧义。我们还对急性髓细胞性白血病队列进行了回顾性分析，证明了在测序细胞数量显着减少的情况下实现相似结果的潜力。在一项前瞻性分析中，我们证明了选择细胞在多个活检样本之间进行测序的优势，并且在近期的肺癌研究中，只有少量的细胞足以消除树木的溶液空间。总而言之，PhyDOSE提出了具有成本效益的单细胞测序实验，该实验可产生高保真系统发育，这将改善下游分析，从而加深我们对癌症生物学的了解。

Pubmed_ID: 33001587

Spatiotemporal strategies to identify aggressive biology in precancerous breast biopsies

时空策略，以识别癌前乳腺活检中的侵袭性生物学

DOI: 10.1002/wsbm.1506

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33001587/

Journal: Wiley interdisciplinary reviews. Systems biology and medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Over 90% of breast cancer is cured; yet there remain highly aggressive breast cancers that develop rapidly and are extremely difficult to treat, much less prevent. Breast cancers that rapidly develop between breast image screening are called "interval cancers." The efforts of our team focus on identifying multiscale integrated strategies to identify biologically aggressive precancerous breast lesions. Our goal is to identify spatiotemporal changes that occur prior to development of interval breast cancers. To accomplish this requires integration of new technology. Our team has the ability to perform single cell in situ transcriptional profiling, noncontrast biological imaging, mathematical analysis, and nanoscale evaluation of receptor organization and signaling. These technological innovations allow us to start to identify multidimensional spatial and temporal relationships that drive the transition from biologically aggressive precancer to biologically aggressive interval breast cancer. This article is categorized under: Cancer > Computational Models Cancer > Molecular and Cellular Physiology Cancer > Genetics/Genomics/Epigenetics.

摘要: 超过90％的乳腺癌可以治愈；但是仍然存在高度侵袭性的乳腺癌，它们迅速发展并且极难治疗，更不用说预防了。在乳房图像筛选之间快速发展的乳腺癌称为“间隔癌”。我们团队的工作重点是确定多尺度综合策略，以识别具有生物学侵略性的癌前乳腺病变。我们的目标是确定在间隔性乳腺癌发生之前发生的时空变化。为此，需要集成新技术。我们的团队有能力执行单细胞原位转录谱分析，非对比生物学成像，数学分析以及受体组织和信号传导的纳米级评估。这些技术创新使我们能够开始确定多维空间和时间关系，以推动从生物学侵袭性癌前病变向生物学侵袭性间隔期乳腺癌的转变。本文归类于：癌症>计算模型癌症>分子和细胞生理癌症>遗传学/基因组学/表观遗传学。

Pubmed_ID: 33000797

Ascorbic acid-mediated reductive disassembly of Fe 3+-tannic acid shells in degradable single-cell nanoencapsulation

抗坏血酸介导的可降解单细胞纳米胶囊中Fe 3 +-单宁酸壳的还原性分解

DOI: 10.1039/d0cc05856d

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33000797/

Journal: Chemical communications (Cambridge, England) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Rapid degradation of Fe3+-tannic acid films is achieved under mild conditions via ascorbic acid-mediated Fe3+ reduction, which overcomes the problems in the disassembly of a metal-organic complex including slow reaction rates and reaction incompatibility with living cells. The strategy of reductive disassembly is applied to degradable single-cell nanoencapsulation, providing an advanced tool for tightly controlling and manipulating the cell-material interface.

摘要: 通过抗坏血酸介导的Fe3+还原，可在温和条件下实现Fe3+-鞣酸膜的快速降解，从而克服了金属-有机配合物的分解问题，包括反应速度慢以及与活细胞的反应不相容。还原拆卸策略被应用于可降解的单细胞纳米封装，为紧密控制和操纵细胞-材料界面提供了先进的工具。

Pubmed_ID: 33000528

NanoSIMS sample preparation decreases isotope enrichment: magnitude, variability and implications for single-cell rates of microbial activity

NanoSIMS样品制备可减少同位素富集：幅度，变异性及其对单细胞微生物活性速率的影响

DOI: 10.1111/1462-2920.15264

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33000528/

Journal: Environmental microbiology {'ISSN': '1462-2912', 'Name': 'environmental microbiology', '2015': '5.932', '2016': '5.395', '2017': '4.974', '2018': '5.147', '2019': '4.933'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: The activity of individual microorganisms can be measured within environmental samples by detecting uptake of isotope-labeled substrates using nano-scale secondary ion mass spectrometry (nanoSIMS). Recent studies have demonstrated that sample preparation can decrease 13 C and 15 N enrichment in bacterial cells, resulting in underestimates of activity. Here, we explore this effect with a variety of preparation types, microbial lineages, and isotope labels to determine its consistency and therefore potential for correction. Specifically, we investigated the impact of different protocols for fixation, nucleic acid staining, and catalyzed reporter deposition fluorescence in situ hybridization (CARD-FISH) on >14,500 archaeal and bacterial cells (Methanosarcina acetivorans, Sulfolobus acidocaldarius, and Pseudomonas putida) enriched in 13 C, 15 N, 18 O, 2 H, and/or 34 S. We found these methods decrease isotope enrichments by up to 80% - much more than previously reported - and that the effect varies by taxa, growth phase, isotope label, and applied protocol. We make recommendations for how to account for this effect experimentally and analytically. We also re-evaluate published nanoSIMS datasets, and revise estimated microbial turnover times in the marine subsurface and nitrogen fixation rates in pelagic unicellular cyanobacteria. When sample preparation is accounted for, cell-specific rates increase and are more consistent with modeled and bulk rates. This article is protected by copyright. All rights reserved.

摘要: 通过使用纳米级二次离子质谱（nanoSIMS）检测同位素标记的底物的摄取，可以测量环境样品中各个微生物的活性。最近的研究表明，样品制备可以减少细菌细胞中13C和15N的富集，导致活性低估。在这里，我们用多种制备类型，微生物谱系和同位素标记物探索这种效应，以确定其一致性，从而确定其校正的可能性。具体来说，我们研究了固定，核酸染色和催化的报告分子沉积荧光原位杂交（CARD-FISH）对超过14,500的古细菌和细菌细胞（乙酰甲烷单胞菌，嗜酸小球菌和恶臭假单胞菌）的影响，该协议富含13种C，15N，18O，2H和/或34S。我们发现这些方法最多可降低80％的同位素富集-比以前报道的要多得多-并且其影响因类群，生长期，同位素标记，和应用的协议。我们就如何通过实验和分析方法解决这种影响提出了建议。我们还重新评估了已发布的nanoSIMS数据集，并修改了海洋单层蓝细菌在海洋地下的微生物周转时间和固氮率。当考虑到样品制备时，细胞特异性速率增加，并且与建模速率和批量速率更一致。本文受版权保护。版权所有。

Pubmed_ID: 33000004

Miniaturization of Smart-seq2 for Single-Cell and Single-Nucleus RNA Sequencing

用于单细胞和单核RNA测序的Smart-seq2的小型化

DOI: 10.1016/j.xpro.2020.100081

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33000004/

Journal: STAR protocols ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: This protocol presents a plate-based workflow to perform RNA sequencing analysis of single cells/nuclei using Smart-seq2. We describe (1) the dissociation procedures for cell/nucleus isolation from the mouse brain and human organoids, (2) the flow sorting of single cells/nuclei into 384-well plates, and (3) the preparation of libraries following miniaturization of the Smart-seq2 protocol using a liquid-handling robot. This pipeline allows for the reliable, high-throughput, and cost-effective preparation of mouse and human samples for full-length deep single-cell/nucleus RNA sequencing. For complete details on the use and execution of this protocol, please refer to Bowers et al. (2020).

摘要: 该协议提出了一个基于板的工作流程，以使用Smart-seq2对单个细胞/细胞核进行RNA测序分析。我们描述（1）从小鼠大脑和人类类器官分离细胞/核的分离程序，（2）将单个细胞/核的流分选到384孔板中，以及（3）将细胞微型化后的文库制备使用液体处理机器人的Smart-seq2协议。该管道可为全长深单细胞/核RNA测序提供可靠，高通量和经济高效的小鼠和人类样品制备方法。有关此协议的使用和执行的完整详细信息，请参阅Bowers等。（2020）。

Pubmed_ID: 33000003

Protocol for Isolation of Cardiac Interstitial Cells from Adult Murine Hearts for Unbiased Single Cell Profiling

从成年鼠心脏中分离心脏间质细胞的无偏见单细胞分析协议。

DOI: 10.1016/j.xpro.2020.100077

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33000003/

Journal: STAR protocols ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Interstitial cells have a crucial role in cardiac fibrosis and repair of the mammalian heart. Single-cell profiling using droplet-based technology has revolutionized the investigation of cell states and identities. Here, we present a protocol for the efficient isolation of high-quality live nucleated non-cardiomyocytes from adult murine heart, for unbiased single-cell RNA sequencing using 10× Chromium technology. This protocol has been applied to homeostatic and injured hearts from different mouse strains. For complete details on the use and execution of this protocol, please refer to Forte et al. (2020).

摘要: 间质细胞在心脏纤维化和哺乳动物心脏的修复中起关键作用。使用基于液滴的技术进行单细胞分析已彻底改变了细胞状态和身份的研究。在这里，我们提出了一种协议，用于从成年鼠心脏中高效分离高质量的活核非心肌细胞，以使用10x铬技术进行无偏的单细胞RNA测序。该协议已应用于来自不同小鼠品系的心脏稳态和受伤心脏。有关此协议的使用和执行的完整详细信息，请参阅Forte等。（2020）。

Pubmed_ID: 33000001

AbSeq Protocol Using the Nano-Well Cartridge-Based Rhapsody Platform to Generate Protein and Transcript Expression Data on the Single-Cell Level

AbSeq协议使用基于纳米盒的狂想曲平台在单细胞水平上生成蛋白质和转录本表达数据

DOI: 10.1016/j.xpro.2020.100092

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33000001/

Journal: STAR protocols ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: By including oligonucleotide-labeled antibodies into high-throughput single-cell RNA-sequencing protocols, combined transcript and protein expression data can be acquired on the single-cell level. Here, we describe a protocol for the combined analysis of over 40 proteins and 400 genes on over 104 cells using the nano-well based Rhapsody platform. We also include a workflow for sample multiplexing, which uniquely identifies the initial source of cells (such as tissue type or donor) in the downstream analysis after upstream pooling. For complete information on the use and execution of this protocol, please refer to Mair et al. (2020).

摘要: 通过将寡核苷酸标记的抗体包含在高通量单细胞RNA测序方案中，可以在单细胞水平上获取转录本和蛋白质表达的组合数据。在这里，我们描述了一种使用基于纳米孔的Rhapsody平台对104多个细胞上的40多种蛋白质和400个基因进行组合分析的协议。我们还包括用于样品多路复用的工作流，该工作流在上游合并后的下游分析中唯一地标识细胞的初始来源（例如组织类型或供体）。有关此协议的使用和执行的完整信息，请参阅Mair等。（2020）。

Pubmed_ID: 32999036

Single-cell RNA sequencing reveals the diversity of the immunological landscape following CNS infection by a murine coronavirus

单细胞RNA测序揭示了鼠冠状病毒感染中枢神经系统后免疫学格局的多样性

DOI: 10.1128/JVI.01295-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32999036/

Journal: Journal of virology {'ISSN': '0022-538x', 'Name': 'journal of virology', '2015': '4.606', '2016': '4.663', '2017': '4.368', '2018': '4.324', '2019': '4.501'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Intracranial (i.c.) infection of susceptible C57BL/6 mice with the neurotropic JHM strain of mouse hepatitis virus (JHMV) (a member of the Coronaviridae family) results in acute encephalomyelitis and viral persistence associated with an immune-mediated demyelinating disease. The present study was undertaken to better understand the molecular pathways evoked during innate and adaptive immune responses as well as the chronic demyelinating stage of disease in response to JHMV infection of the central nervous system (CNS). Using single cell RNA sequencing analysis (scRNAseq) on flow-sorted CD45-positive cells (CD45+) enriched from brains and spinal cords of experimental mice, we demonstrate the heterogeneity of the immune response as determined by unique molecular signatures and pathways involved in effective anti-viral host defense. Furthermore, we identify potential genes involved in contributing to demyelination as well as remyelination being expressed by both microglia and macrophages. Collectively, these findings emphasize the diversity of the immune response and molecular networks at defined stages following viral infection of the CNS.IMPORTANCE Understanding the immunological mechanisms contributing to both host defense and disease following viral infection of the CNS is of critical importance given the increasing number of viruses that are capable of infecting and replicating within the nervous system. With this in mind, the present study was undertaken to evaluate the molecular signatures of immune cells within the CNS at defined times following infection with a neuroadapted murine coronavirus using scRNAseq. This approach has revealed that the immunological landscape is diverse with numerous immune cell subsets expressing distinct mRNA expression profiles that is, in part, dictated by the stage of infection. In addition, these findings reveal new insight into cellular pathways contributing to control of viral replication as well as to neurologic disease.

摘要: 用小鼠肝炎病毒（JHMV）的神经性JHM株（冠状病毒科的成员）对易感C57BL/6小鼠进行颅内（i.c.）感染会导致急性脑脊髓炎和与免疫介导的脱髓鞘疾病相关的病毒持久性。进行本研究的目的是更好地了解先天性和适应性免疫反应以及对中枢神经系统（CNS）的JHMV感染引起的疾病的慢性脱髓鞘阶段的分子途径。使用单细胞RNA测序分析（scRNAseq）对从实验小鼠的大脑和脊髓富集的流分类的CD45阳性细胞（CD45+），我们证明了免疫应答的异质性，这是由参与有效抗血清的独特分子特征和途径确定的-病毒宿主防御。此外，我们确定潜在的基因参与小胶质细胞和巨噬细胞表达的脱髓鞘以及髓鞘再生。总的来说，这些发现强调了中枢神经系统病毒感染后特定阶段免疫应答和分子网络的多样性。重要的是，鉴于中枢神经系统病毒感染后，了解有助于宿主防御和疾病的免疫机制至关重要能够在神经系统内感染和复制的病毒。考虑到这一点，进行本研究以评估在使用scRNAseq用神经适应性鼠冠状病毒感染后的指定时间，CNS内免疫细胞的分子标记。该方法已经揭示了免疫学的情况是多样的，许多免疫细胞亚群表达不同的mRNA表达谱，这部分是由感染阶段决定的。此外，这些发现揭示了对控制病毒复制以及神经系统疾病的细胞途径的新见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32998998

Transient activation of the Hedgehog-Gli pathway rescues radiotherapy-induced dry mouth via recovering salivary gland resident macrophages

Hedgehog-Gli途径的短暂激活通过恢复唾液腺驻留的巨噬细胞来拯救放射治疗引起的口干

DOI: 10.1158/0008-5472.CAN-20-0503

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32998998/

Journal: Cancer research {'ISSN': '0008-5472', 'Name': 'cancer research', '2015': '8.556', '2016': '9.122', '2017': '9.13', '2018': '8.378', '2019': '9.727'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Irreversible hypofunction of salivary glands is a common side effect of radiotherapy for head-and-neck cancer and is difficult to remedy. Recent studies indicate that transient activation of Hedgehog signaling rescues irradiation-impaired salivary function in animal models, but the underlying mechanisms are largely unclear. Here we show in mice that activation of canonical Gli-dependent Hedgehog signaling by Gli1 gene transfer is sufficient to recover salivary function impaired by irradiation. Salivary gland cells responsive to Hedgehog/Gli signaling comprised small subsets of macrophages, epithelial cells and endothelial cells, and their progeny remained relatively rare long after irradiation and transient Hedgehog activation. Quantities and activities of salivary gland resident macrophages were substantially and rapidly impaired by irradiation and restored by Hedgehog activation. Conversely, depletion of salivary gland macrophages by clodronate liposomes compromised the restoration of irradiation-impaired salivary function by transient Hedgehog activation. Single cell RNA sequencing and qRT-PCR of sorted cells indicated that Hedgehog activation greatly enhances paracrine interactions between salivary gland resident macrophages, epithelial progenitors, and endothelial cells through Csf1, Hgf, and C1q signaling pathways. Consistently, expression of these paracrine factors and their receptors in salivary glands decreased following irradiation but were restored by transient Hedgehog activation. These findings reveal that resident macrophages and their pro-repair paracrine factors are essential for the rescue of irradiation-impaired salivary function by transient Hedgehog activation and are promising therapeutic targets of radiotherapy-induced irreversible dry mouth.

摘要: 唾液腺的不可逆功能减退是头颈癌放疗的常见副作用，难以补救。最近的研究表明，刺猬信号的瞬时激活可以拯救动物模型中辐射受损的唾液功能，但是其潜在机制尚不清楚。在这里，我们在小鼠中显示出通过Gli1基因转移激活规范的Gli依赖性刺猬信号足以恢复受辐射损害的唾液功能。响应刺猬/Gli信号的唾液腺细胞包含小部分巨噬细胞，上皮细胞和内皮细胞，在辐射和短暂的刺猬激活后很长一段时间，它们的后代仍然相对稀少。唾液腺常驻巨噬细胞的数量和活性受到辐射的影响而迅速而迅速地被刺猬激活而恢复。相反，氯膦酸盐脂质体消耗唾液腺巨噬细胞会损害刺猬激活引起的辐射受损唾液功能的恢复。单细胞RNA测序和分选细胞的qRT-PCR表明，刺猬激活极大地增强了唾液腺驻留巨噬细胞，上皮祖细胞和内皮细胞之间通过Csf1，Hgf和C1q信号通路的旁分泌相互作用。一致地，这些旁分泌因子及其受体在唾液腺中的表达在辐射后降低，但通过瞬时的刺猬激活而得以恢复。这些发现表明，驻留的巨噬细胞及其修复前旁分泌因子对于通过短暂的刺猬激活来挽救辐射受损的唾液功能是必不可少的，并且有望成为放射疗法引起的不可逆口干的治疗目标。

Pubmed_ID: 32998907

Cells expressing PAX8 are the main source of homeostatic regeneration of adult endometrial epithelium and give rise to serous endometrial carcinoma

表达PAX8的细胞是成人子宫内膜上皮细胞稳态再生的主要来源，并引起浆液性子宫内膜癌

DOI: 10.1242/dmm.047035

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32998907/

Journal: Disease models & mechanisms {'ISSN': '1754-8403', 'Name': 'disease models & mechanisms', '2015': '4.316', '2016': '4.691', '2017': '4.398', '2018': '4.028', '2019': '4.651'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Humans and mice have cyclical regeneration of the endometrial epithelium. It is expected that such regeneration is ensured by tissue stem cells. However, their location and hierarchy remain debatable. A number of recent studies have suggested the presence of stem cells in the mouse endometrial epithelium. At the same time, it has been reported this tissue can be regenerated by stem cells of stromal/mesenchymal or bone marrow cell origin. Here we describe a single-cell transcriptomic atlas of the main cell types of the mouse uterus and epithelial subset transcriptome, and evaluate contribution of epithelial cells expressing transcription factor PAX8 to the homeostatic regeneration and malignant transformation of adult endometrial epithelium. According to lineage tracing, PAX8 positive (PAX8+) epithelial cells are responsible for long-term maintenance of both luminal and glandular epithelium. Furthermore, multicolor tracing shows that individual glands and contiguous areas of luminal epithelium are formed by clonal cell expansion. Inactivation of tumor suppressor genes Trp53 and Rb1 in PAX8+ cells but not FOXJ1+ cells leads to formation of neoplasms with features of serous endometrial carcinoma, one of the most aggressive type of human endometrial malignancy. Taken together, our results show that a progeny of single PAX8+ cells represent the main regeneration source of the adult endometrial epithelium. They also provide direct experimental genetic evidence for the key roles of the P53 and RB pathways in the pathogenesis of serous endometrial carcinoma, and suggest that PAX8+ cells represent the cell-of-origin of this neoplasm.

摘要: 人和小鼠具有子宫内膜上皮的周期性再生。期望通过组织干细胞确保这种再生。但是，它们的位置和等级仍然值得商bat。最近的许多研究表明，小鼠子宫内膜上皮中存在干细胞。同时，据报道该组织可被基质/间充质或骨髓细胞来源的干细胞再生。在这里，我们描述了小鼠子宫和上皮亚组转录组的主要细胞类型的单细胞转录组图谱，并评估了表达转录因子PAX8的上皮细胞对成人子宫内膜上皮的稳态再生和恶性转化的贡献。根据谱系追踪，PAX8阳性（PAX8+）上皮细胞负责管腔和腺上皮的长期维持。此外，多色示踪表明，管腔上皮的单个腺体和连续区域是通过克隆细胞扩增形成的。PAX8+细胞而不是FOXJ1+细胞中肿瘤抑制基因Trp53和Rb1的失活导致形成具有浆液性子宫内膜癌特征的肿瘤，浆膜性子宫内膜癌是人类子宫内膜恶性肿瘤中最具攻击性的一种。综上所述，我们的结果表明单个PAX8+细胞的后代代表了成人子宫内膜上皮细胞的主要再生来源。他们还为浆液性子宫内膜癌的发病机理中P53和RB途径的关键作用提供了直接的实验遗传证据，并表明PAX8+细胞代表了这种肿瘤的起源细胞。

Pubmed_ID: 32998889

Probing single-cell metabolism reveals prognostic value of highly metabolically active circulating stromal cells in prostate cancer

探测单细胞代谢揭示高代谢活性循环基质细胞对前列腺癌的预后价值

DOI: 10.1126/sciadv.aaz3849

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32998889/

Journal: Science advances {'ISSN': '2375-2548', 'Name': 'science advances', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '11.511', '2018': '12.804', '2019': '13.116'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Despite their important role in metastatic disease, no general method to detect circulating stromal cells (CStCs) exists. Here, we present the Metabolic Assay-Chip (MA-Chip) as a label-free, droplet-based microfluidic approach allowing single-cell extracellular pH measurement for the detection and isolation of highly metabolically active cells (hm-cells) from the tumor microenvironment. Single-cell mRNA-sequencing analysis of the hm-cells from metastatic prostate cancer patients revealed that approximately 10% were canonical EpCAM+ hm-CTCs, 3% were EpCAM- hm-CTCs with up-regulation of prostate-related genes, and 87% were hm-CStCs with profiles characteristic for cancer-associated fibroblasts, mesenchymal stem cells, and endothelial cells. Kaplan-Meier analysis shows that metastatic prostate cancer patients with more than five hm-cells have a significantly poorer survival probability than those with zero to five hm-cells. Thus, prevalence of hm-cells is a prognosticator of poor outcome in prostate cancer, and a potentially predictive and therapy response biomarker for agents cotargeting stromal components and preventing epithelial-to-mesenchymal transition.

摘要: 尽管它们在转移性疾病中具有重要作用，但尚不存在检测循环基质细胞（CStC）的通用方法。在这里，我们介绍了作为无标记，基于液滴的微流控方法的代谢检测芯片（MA-Chip），该方法允许单细胞细胞外pH测量，以检测和分离肿瘤中具有高代谢活性的细胞（hm细胞）微环境。对转移性前列腺癌患者的hm细胞进行单细胞mRNA测序分析表明，约10％的经典EpCAM+hm-CTCs，3％的具有前列腺相关基因上调的EpCAM-hm-CTCs和87％是具有与癌症相关的成纤维细胞，间充质干细胞和内皮细胞特征的hm-CStC。Kaplan-Meier分析显示，具有超过5个hm细胞的转移性前列腺癌患者的生存率显着低于具有0到5个hm细胞的患者。因此，hm细胞的流行是前列腺癌预后不良的预后因素，并且是共同靶向基质成分并防止上皮向间充质转化的药物的潜在预测和治疗反应生物标志物。

Pubmed_ID: 32998686

Network-based method for regions with statistically frequent interchromosomal interactions at single-cell resolution

基于网络的方法在单细胞分辨率下具有统计上频繁的染色体间相互作用的区域

DOI: 10.1186/s12859-020-03689-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32998686/

Journal: BMC bioinformatics {'ISSN': '1471-2105', 'Name': 'bmc bioinformatics', '2015': '2.435', '2016': '2.448', '2017': '2.213', '2018': '2.511', '2019': '3.242'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Background: Chromosome conformation capture-based methods, especially Hi-C, enable scientists to detect genome-wide chromatin interactions and study the spatial organization of chromatin, which plays important roles in gene expression regulation, DNA replication and repair etc. Thus, developing computational methods to unravel patterns behind the data becomes critical. Existing computational methods focus on intrachromosomal interactions and ignore interchromosomal interactions partly because there is no prior knowledge for interchromosomal interactions and the frequency of interchromosomal interactions is much lower while the search space is much larger. With the development of single-cell technologies, the advent of single-cell Hi-C makes interrogating the spatial structure of chromatin at single-cell resolution possible. It also brings a new type of frequency information, the number of single cells with chromatin interactions between two disjoint chromosome regions. Results: Considering the lack of computational methods on interchromosomal interactions and the unsurprisingly frequent intrachromosomal interactions along the diagonal of a chromatin contact map, we propose a computational method dedicated to analyzing interchromosomal interactions of single-cell Hi-C with this new frequency information. To the best of our knowledge, our proposed tool is the first to identify regions with statistically frequent interchromosomal interactions at single-cell resolution. We demonstrate that the tool utilizing networks and binomial statistical tests can identify interesting structural regions through visualization, comparison and enrichment analysis and it also supports different configurations to provide users with flexibility. Conclusions: It will be a useful tool for analyzing single-cell Hi-C interchromosomal interactions.

摘要: 背景：基于染色体构象捕获的方法，特别是Hi-C，使科学家能够检测全基因组的染色质相互作用并研究染色质的空间组织，这在基因表达调控，DNA复制和修复等方面起着重要作用。解开数据背后的模式的方法变得至关重要。现有的计算方法集中于染色体内相互作用，而忽略了染色体间相互作用，部分原因是没有关于染色体间相互作用的先验知识，并且染色体间相互作用的频率要低得多，而搜索空间要大得多。随着单细胞技术的发展，单细胞Hi-C的问世使得以单细胞分辨率质疑染色质的空间结构成为可能。它还带来了一种新型的频率信息，即两个不相交的染色体区域之间具有染色质相互作用的单个细胞的数量。结果：考虑到缺乏染色体间相互作用的计算方法以及沿染色质接触图对角线不常见的染色体内相互作用，我们提出了一种利用这种新的频率信息分析单细胞Hi-C染色体间相互作用的计算方法。据我们所知，我们提出的工具是第一个以单细胞分辨率鉴定具有统计学上频繁的染色体间相互作用的区域的工具。我们证明了利用网络和二项式统计测试的工具可以通过可视化，比较和富集分析来识别有趣的结构区域，并且它还支持不同的配置，从而为用户提供了灵活性。结论：它将是分析单细胞Hi-C染色体间相互作用的有用工具。

Pubmed_ID: 32998409

Electrochemical Immuno- and Aptamer-Based Assays for Bacteria: Pros and Cons over Traditional Detection Schemes

基于电化学，免疫和适体的细菌测定：传统检测方案的利弊。

DOI: 10.3390/s20195561

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32998409/

Journal: Sensors (Basel, Switzerland) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/28/2020

Abstract: Microbiological safety of the human environment and health needs advanced monitoring tools both for the specific detection of bacteria in complex biological matrices, often in the presence of excessive amounts of other bacterial species, and for bacteria quantification at a single cell level. Here, we discuss the existing electrochemical approaches for bacterial analysis that are based on the biospecific recognition of whole bacterial cells. Perspectives of such assays applications as emergency-use biosensors for quick analysis of trace levels of bacteria by minimally trained personnel are argued.

摘要: 人类环境和健康的微生物安全性需要先进的监视工具，用于特定情况下（通常在其他细菌种类过多的情况下）复杂生物基质中细菌的检测以及细菌在单个细胞水平上的定量。在这里，我们讨论基于整个细菌细胞的生物特异性识别的现有的细菌分析电化学方法。有人提出了这样的分析方法的观点，如紧急使用的生物传感器，用于由受过最少培训的人员快速分析痕量细菌。

Pubmed_ID: 32997994

Single-Nucleus RNA-Seq Is Not Suitable for Detection of Microglial Activation Genes in Humans

单核糖RNA-Seq不适合检测人类的小胶质细胞激活基因

DOI: 10.1016/j.celrep.2020.108189

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32997994/

Journal: Cell reports {'ISSN': '2211-1247', 'Name': 'cell reports', '2015': '7.87', '2016': '8.282', '2017': '8.032', '2018': '7.815', '2019': '8.109'}

Date: 09/29/2020

Abstract: Single-nucleus RNA sequencing (snRNA-seq) is used as an alternative to single-cell RNA-seq, as it allows transcriptomic profiling of frozen tissue. However, it is unclear whether snRNA-seq is able to detect cellular state in human tissue. Indeed, snRNA-seq analyses of human brain samples have failed to detect a consistent microglial activation signature in Alzheimer's disease. Our comparison of microglia from single cells and single nuclei of four human subjects reveals that, although most genes show similar relative abundances in cells and nuclei, a small population of genes (∼1%) is depleted in nuclei compared to whole cells. This population is enriched for genes previously implicated in microglial activation, including APOE, CST3, SPP1, and CD74, comprising 18% of previously identified microglial-disease-associated genes. Given the low sensitivity of snRNA-seq to detect many activation genes, we conclude that snRNA-seq is not suited for detecting cellular activation in microglia in human disease.

摘要: 单核RNA测序（snRNA-seq）可用作单细胞RNA-seq的替代方法，因为它可以对冷冻组织进行转录组分析。但是，尚不清楚snRNA-seq是否能够检测人体组织中的细胞状态。确实，对人脑样品的snRNA-seq分析未能检测到阿尔茨海默氏病中一致的小胶质细胞激活特征。我们对来自四个人类受试者的单细胞和单个细胞核的小胶质细胞的比较发现，尽管大多数基因在细胞和细胞核中显示出相似的相对丰度，但是与全细胞相比，细胞核中的一小部分基因（〜1％）被消耗掉了。该种群富含先前与小胶质细胞活化有关的基因，包括APOE，CST3，SPP1和CD74，其中包含18％的先前鉴定的与小胶质细胞疾病相关的基因。鉴于snRNA-seq对检测许多激活基因的敏感性较低，我们得出的结论是snRNA-seq不适合在人类疾病的小胶质细胞中检测细胞激活。

Pubmed_ID: 32997960

MYC Promotes Bone Marrow Stem Cell Dysfunction in Fanconi Anemia

MYC促进范可尼贫血中的骨髓干细胞功能障碍

DOI: 10.1016/j.stem.2020.09.004

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32997960/

Journal: Cell stem cell {'ISSN': '1934-5909', 'Name': 'cell stem cell', '2015': '22.387', '2016': '23.394', '2017': '23.29', '2018': '21.464', '2019': '20.86'}

Date: 09/24/2020

Abstract: Bone marrow failure (BMF) in Fanconi anemia (FA) patients results from dysfunctional hematopoietic stem and progenitor cells (HSPCs). To identify determinants of BMF, we performed single-cell transcriptome profiling of primary HSPCs from FA patients. In addition to overexpression of p53 and TGF-β pathway genes, we identified high levels of MYC expression. We correspondingly observed coexistence of distinct HSPC subpopulations expressing high levels of TP53 or MYC in FA bone marrow (BM). Inhibiting MYC expression with the BET bromodomain inhibitor (+)-JQ1 reduced the clonogenic potential of FA patient HSPCs but rescued physiological and genotoxic stress in HSPCs from FA mice, showing that MYC promotes proliferation while increasing DNA damage. MYC-high HSPCs showed significant downregulation of cell adhesion genes, consistent with enhanced egress of FA HSPCs from bone marrow to peripheral blood. We speculate that MYC overexpression impairs HSPC function in FA patients and contributes to exhaustion in FA bone marrow.

摘要: 范可尼贫血（FA）患者的骨髓衰竭（BMF）是由造血干细胞和祖细胞（HSPCs）功能失调导致的。为了确定BMF的决定因素，我们对FA患者的原发性HSPC进行了单细胞转录组分析。除了p53和TGF-β通路基因的过表达外，我们还发现了MYC高水平表达。我们相应地观察到FA骨髓（BM）中表达高水平TP53或MYC的不同HSPC亚群的共存。用BET溴结构域抑制剂（+）-JQ1抑制MYC表达降低了FA患者HSPC的克隆潜力，但挽救了FA小鼠HSPC的生理和遗传毒性应激，表明MYC促进了增殖，同时增加了DNA损伤。高MYC的HSPC显示出细胞粘附基因的显着下调，这与FAHSPC从骨髓向外周血的排出增强有关。我们推测MYC过度表达会损害FA患者的HSPC功能，并导致FA骨髓衰竭。

Pubmed_ID: 32997747

A new bioinformatics tool to recover missing gene expression in single-cell RNA sequencing data

一种新的生物信息学工具，用于恢复单细胞RNA测序数据中缺失的基因表达

DOI: 10.1093/jmcb/mjaa053

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32997747/

Journal: Journal of molecular cell biology {'ISSN': '1674-2788', 'Name': 'journal of molecular cell biology', '2015': '6.459', '2016': '5.988', '2017': '5.595', '2018': '4.671', '2019': '4'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) is a burgeoning field where experimental techniques and computational methods have been under rapid evolution in the past six years. These technological advances have allowed biomedical researchers to identify new cell types, delineate cell sub-populations, and infer cell differentiation trajectories in various tissue samples. Among the important features extractable from scRNA-seq data, the predominant ones are individual genes' expression levels in single cells. Most analyses require a preprocessing step that converts a scRNA-seq dataset into a count matrix, where rows correspond to cells (or genes), columns correspond to genes (or cells), and entries are counts, i.e. a count is the number of sequenced reads or uniquely mapped identifiers (UMIs) mapped to a gene in a cell. Single-cell count matrices are highly sparse; for example, a typical matrix constructed from a droplet-based dataset may have >90% of counts as zeros.

摘要: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）是一个新兴领域，在过去的六年中，实验技术和计算方法得到了快速发展。这些技术进步使生物医学研究人员能够识别新的细胞类型，描绘细胞亚群以及推断各种组织样品中的细胞分化轨迹。可从scRNA-seq数据提取的重要特征中，主要特征是单个基因在单个细胞中的表达水平。大多数分析需要一个预处理步骤，该步骤将scRNA-seq数据集转换为计数矩阵，其中行对应于细胞（或基因），列对应于基因（或细胞），条目是计数，即计数是序列化的数目读取或映射到细胞中基因的唯一映射的标识符（UMI）。单细胞计数矩阵非常稀疏；例如，从基于液滴的数据集构造的典型矩阵可能具有大于90％的计数为零。

Pubmed_ID: 32997196

Combination efficacy of pertuzumab and trastuzumab for trastuzumab emtansine-resistant cells exhibiting attenuated lysosomal trafficking or efflux pumps upregulation

帕妥珠单抗和曲妥珠单抗对曲妥珠单抗耐药性细胞的溶酶体运输减弱或外排泵上调的联合功效

DOI: 10.1007/s00280-020-04138-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32997196/

Journal: Cancer chemotherapy and pharmacology {'ISSN': '0344-5704', 'Name': 'cancer chemotherapy and pharmacology', '2015': '2.824', '2016': '2.737', '2017': '2.808', '2018': '3.008', '2019': '2.967'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Purpose: Trastuzumab emtansine (T-DM1) is the standard treatment in the current second-line therapy of human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2)-positive metastatic breast cancer. However, a useful therapy after T-DM1 resistance has not been established. In this study, we established two different HER2-positive T-DM1-resistant cancer cells and evaluated the antitumor effect of trastuzumab in combination with pertuzumab (TRAS + PER). Methods: Single-cell-cloned OE19 and BT-474 cells were cultured with increasing concentrations of T-DM1 to generate T-DM1-resistant OE19bTDR and BT-474bTDR cells, respectively. HER2 expression was assessed by immunohistochemistry. Multidrug resistance proteins (MDR1 and MRP1) were evaluated by real-time polymerase chain reaction and western blotting. Intracellular trafficking of T-DM1 was examined by flow cytometry and immunofluorescence staining. Efficacy of TRAS + PER was evaluated by cell proliferation assay, HER3 and AKT phosphorylation, caspase 3/7 activity, and antitumor activity. Results: HER2 expression of both resistant cells was equivalent to that of the parent cells. Overexpression of MDR1 and MRP1 was observed and affected the T-DM1 sensitivity in the OE19bTDR cells. Abnormal localization of T-DM1 into the lysosomes was observed in the BT-474bTDR cells. In BT-474bTDR cells, TRAS + PER inhibited the phosphorylation of AKT involved in HER2-HER3 signaling, and apoptosis induction and cell proliferation inhibition were significantly higher with TRAS + PER than with the individual drugs. TRAS + PER significantly suppressed tumor growth in the OE19bTDR xenograft model compared with each single agent. Conclusions: The results suggest that the TRAS + PER combination may be effective in T-DM1-resistant cancer cells where HER2 overexpression is maintained.

摘要: 目的：曲妥珠单抗（T-DM1）是当前人类表皮生长因子受体2（HER2）阳性转移性乳腺癌的二线治疗的标准治疗方法。然而，尚未建立对T-DM1抗性的有用疗法。在这项研究中，我们建立了两种不同的HER2阳性T-DM1耐药癌细胞，并评估了曲妥珠单抗与帕妥珠单抗联合使用的抗肿瘤作用（TRAS+PER）。方法：将单细胞克隆的OE19和BT-474细胞与浓度递增的T-DM1培养，分别产生抗T-DM1的OE19bTDR和BT-474bTDR细胞。通过免疫组织化学评估HER2表达。通过实时聚合酶链反应和蛋白质印迹评估了多药耐药蛋白（MDR1和MRP1）。通过流式细胞术和免疫荧光染色检查了T-DM1的细胞内运输。通过细胞增殖测定，HER3和AKT磷酸化，胱天蛋白酶3/7活性和抗肿瘤活性来评估TRAS+PER的功效。结果：两种抗性细胞的HER2表达均与亲本细胞相同。观察到MDR1和MRP1的过表达，并影响了OE19bTDR细胞中T-DM1的敏感性。在BT-474bTDR细胞中观察到T-DM1在溶酶体中的异常定位。在BT-474bTDR细胞中，TRAS+PER抑制了参与HER2-HER3信号传导的AKT的磷酸化，并且TRAS+PER的凋亡诱导和细胞增殖抑制作用显着高于单个药物。与每种单一药物相比，在OE19bTDR异种移植模型中，TRAS+PER显着抑制了肿瘤的生长。结论：结果表明，TRAS+PER组合可能在维持HER2过表达的T-DM1耐药癌细胞中有效。

Pubmed_ID: 32997144

Rewiring of growth-dependent transcription regulation by a point mutation in region 1.1 of the housekeeping σ factor

通过管家σ因子1.1区中的点突变来重新排列生长依赖性转录调控

DOI: 10.1093/nar/gkaa798

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32997144/

Journal: Nucleic acids research {'ISSN': '0305-1048', 'Name': 'nucleic acids research', '2015': '9.202', '2016': '10.162', '2017': '11.561', '2018': '11.147', '2019': '11.501'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: In bacteria, rapid adaptation to changing environmental conditions depends on the interplay between housekeeping and alternative σ factors, responsible for transcription of specific regulons by RNA polymerase (RNAP). In comparison with alternative σ factors, primary σs contain poorly conserved region 1.1, whose functions in transcription are only partially understood. We found that a single mutation in region 1.1 in Escherichia coli σ70 rewires transcription regulation during cell growth resulting in profound phenotypic changes. Despite its destabilizing effect on promoter complexes, this mutation increases the activity of rRNA promoters and also decreases RNAP sensitivity to the major regulator of stringent response DksA. Using total RNA sequencing combined with single-cell analysis of gene expression we showed that changes in region 1.1 disrupt the balance between the "greed" and "fear" strategies thus making the cells more susceptible to environmental threats and antibiotics. Our results reveal an unexpected role of σ region 1.1 in growth-dependent transcription regulation and suggest that changes in this region may facilitate rapid switching of RNAP properties in evolving bacterial populations.

摘要: 在细菌中，快速适应不断变化的环境条件取决于管家和其他σ因子之间的相互作用，后者负责通过RNA聚合酶（RNAP）转录特定的调控因子。与其他σ因子相比，初级σ包含保守性差的区域1.1，其转录功能仅部分被理解。我们发现，大肠杆菌σ70区域1.1中的单个突变会在细胞生长过程中改变转录调控，从而导致深刻的表型变化。尽管它对启动子复合物具有不稳定作用，但该突变增加了rRNA启动子的活性，并且还降低了对严格反应DksA的主要调节剂的RNAP敏感性。使用总RNA测序与基因表达的单细胞分析相结合，我们发现1.1区的变化破坏了“贪婪”和“恐惧”策略之间的平衡，从而使细胞更容易受到环境威胁和抗生素的侵害。我们的研究结果揭示了σ区域1.1在依赖生长的转录调控中的出乎意料的作用，并表明该区域的变化可能促进了不断发展的细菌种群中RNAP特性的快速转换。

Pubmed_ID: 32996785

The Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis Cell Atlas

特发性肺纤维化细胞图集

DOI: 10.1152/ajplung.00451.2020

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32996785/

Journal: American journal of physiology. Lung cellular and molecular physiology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32995887

A novel two-layer-integrated microfluidic device for high-throughput yeast proteomic dynamics analysis at the single-cell level

一种新型的两层集成微流控装置，可在单细胞水平上进行高通量酵母蛋白质组动力学分析

DOI: 10.1093/intbio/zyaa018

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32995887/

Journal: Integrative biology : quantitative biosciences from nano to macro ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/29/2020

Abstract: Current microfluidic methods for studying multicell strains (e.g., m-types) with multienvironments (e.g., n-types) require large numbers of inlets/outlets (m*n), a complicated procedure or expensive machinery. Here, we developed a novel two-layer-integrated method to combine different PDMS microchannel layers with different functions into one chip by a PDMS through-hole array, which improved the design of a PDMS-based microfluidic system. Using this method, we succeeded in converting 2 × m × n inlets/outlets into m + n inlets/outlets and reduced the time cost of loading processing (from m × n to m) of the device for studying multicell strains (e.g., m-types) in varied multitemporal environments (i.e., n-types). Using this device, the dynamic behavior of the cell-stress-response proteins was studied when the glucose concentration decreased from 2% to a series of lower concentrations. Our device could also be widely used in high-throughput studies of various stress responses, and the new concept of a multilayer-integrated fabrication method could greatly improve the design of PDMS-based microfluidic systems.

摘要: 当前用于研究具有多环境（例如，n型）的多细胞菌株（例如，m型）的微流体方法需要大量的入口/出口（m*n），复杂的过程或昂贵的机器。在这里，我们开发了一种新颖的两层集成方法，通过PDMS通孔阵列将具有不同功能的不同PDMS微通道层组合到一个芯片中，从而改进了基于PDMS的微流体系统的设计。使用这种方法，我们成功地将2×m×n的进样口/出口转换为m+n的进样口/出口，并降低了用于研究多细胞株（例如m）的设备的加载处理（从m×n到m）的时间成本。类型的多时态环境（即n型）。使用该装置，研究了当葡萄糖浓度从2％降至一系列较低浓度时细胞应激反应蛋白的动态行为。我们的设备还可以广泛用于各种应力响应的高通量研究，而多层集成制造方法的新概念可以极大地改善基于PDMS的微流体系统的设计。

Pubmed_ID: 32995793

Fixed single-cell RNA sequencing for understanding virus infection and host response

固定单细胞RNA测序可了解病毒感染和宿主反应

DOI: 10.1101/2020.09.17.302232

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32995793/

Journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing studies requiring intracellular protein staining, rare-cell sorting, or pathogen inactivation are severely limited because current high-throughput methods are incompatible with paraformaldehyde treatment, a very common and simple tissue/cell fixation and preservation technique. Here we present FD-seq, a high-throughput method for droplet-based RNA sequencing of paraformaldehyde-fixed, stained and sorted single-cells. We used FD-seq to address two important questions in virology. First, by analyzing a rare population of cells supporting lytic reactivation of the human tumor virus KSHV, we identified TMEM119 as a host factor that mediates reactivation. Second, we studied the transcriptome of lung cells infected with the coronavirus OC43, which causes the common cold and also serves as a safer model pathogen for SARS-CoV-2. We found that pro-inflammatory pathways are primarily upregulated in abortively-infected or uninfected bystander cells, which are exposed to the virus but fail to express high level of viral genes. FD-seq is suitable for characterizing rare cell populations of interest, for studying high-containment biological samples after inactivation, and for integrating intracellular phenotypic with transcriptomic information.

摘要: 由于目前的高通量方法与低聚甲醛处理（一种非常普遍且简单的组织/细胞固定和保存技术）不兼容，因此需要细胞内蛋白质染色，稀有细胞分选或病原体灭活的单细胞RNA测序研究受到严格限制。在这里，我们介绍FD-seq，这是一种高通量的多聚甲醛固定，染色和分选单细胞基于液滴的RNA测序方法。我们使用FD-seq解决了病毒学中的两个重要问题。首先，通过分析支持人类肿瘤病毒KSHV裂解再激活的稀有细胞群，我们确定了TMEM119是介导再激活的宿主因子。其次，我们研究了被冠状病毒OC43感染的肺细胞的转录组，该冠状病毒可引起普通感冒，并且可以作为SARS-CoV-2的更安全模型病原体。我们发现促炎途径主要在流产感染或未感染的旁观者细胞中上调，后者暴露于病毒但无法表达高水平的病毒基因。FD-seq适用于表征感兴趣的稀有细胞群体，灭活后研究高含量生物样品以及将细胞内表型与转录组信息整合在一起。

Pubmed_ID: 32995660

Single cell sequencing unraveling genetic basis of shared immunologic switch between Severe COVID19 and Obesity

单细胞测序揭示严重COVID19与肥胖症之间共享免疫切换的遗传基础

DOI: 10.1016/j.obmed.2020.100303

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32995660/

Journal: Obesity medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/24/2020

Abstract: COVID-19 has shown a substantial variation in the rate and severity by which it impacts different demographic groups. Specifically, it has shown a predilection towards obese patients as well as as well as other vulnerable groups including predilection of males over females, old age over young age and black races over Caucasian ones.. Single cell sequencing studies have highlighted the role of cell polarity and the co-expression of proteases, such as Furin, along with ACE2 in the genesis of coronavirus disease rather than exclusively link tissue involvement with ACE2 levels thought previously. It has also forged a connection between the genetic and immune cellular mechanisms underlying COVID infection and the inflammatory state of obese patients, offering a more accurate explanation as to why obese patients are at increased risk of poor COVID outcomes. These commonalities encompass macrophage phenotype switching, genetic expression switching, and overexpression of the pro-inflammatory cytokines, depletion of the regulatory cytokines, in situ T cell proliferation, and T cell exhaustion. These findings demonstrate the necessity of single cell sequencing as a rapid means to identify and treat those who are most likely to need hospital admission and intensive care, in the hopes of precision medicine. Furthermore, this study underlines the use of immune modulators such as Leptin sensitizers, rather than immune suppressors as anti-inflammation therapies to switch the inflammatory response from a drastic immunological type 1 response to a beneficial type 2 effective one.

摘要: COVID-19已显示出影响不同人口群体的速度和严重程度的巨大差异。具体来说，它显示了对肥胖患者以及其他易受伤害群体的偏爱，包括男性高于女性，老年高于年轻以及黑人高于白种人。.单细胞测序研究突出了细胞极性的作用以及蛋白酶（例如弗林蛋白酶）与ACE2在冠状病毒疾病的发生中共表达，而不是将组织参与程度与先前认为的ACE2水平专门联系起来。它还建立了COVID感染的遗传和免疫细胞机制与肥胖患者的炎症状态之间的联系，从而为肥胖患者为何COVID不良预后增加的风险提供了更准确的解释。这些共性包括巨噬细胞表型转换，遗传表达转换和促炎性细胞因子的过表达，调节性细胞因子的耗竭，原位T细胞增殖和T细胞衰竭。这些发现表明，单细胞测序作为鉴定和治疗最有可能需要住院和重症监护的人的快速手段的必要性，以期希望使用精确医学。此外，这项研究强调了使用免疫调节剂（例如瘦素敏化剂），而不是使用免疫抑制剂作为抗炎疗法，以将炎症反应从剧烈的免疫1型反应转变为有益的2型有效反应。

Pubmed_ID: 32994891

A promising iPS-based single-cell cloning strategy revealing signatures of somatic mutations in heterogeneous normal cells

一种有前途的基于iPS的单细胞克隆策略，揭示异质正常细胞中体细胞突变的特征

DOI: 10.1016/j.csbj.2020.08.026

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32994891/

Journal: Computational and structural biotechnology journal {'ISSN': '2001-0370', 'Name': 'computational and structural biotechnology journal', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '4.148', '2018': '4.72', '2019': '6.018'}

Date: 09/03/2020

Abstract: Single-cell genomics has advanced rapidly as trace-DNA amplification technologies evolved. However, current technologies are subject to a variety of pitfalls such as contamination, uneven genomic coverage, and amplification errors. Even for the "golden" strategy of single stem cell-derived clonal formation, high-fidelity amplification is applicable merely to single stem cells. It's still challenging to accurately define somatic mutations of a single cell in various cell types. Herein, we provided evidence, for the first time, to prove that induced pluripotent stem cells (iPS cells or iPSC), being a single somatic cell-derived clone, are recording almost identical (>90%) mutational profile of the initial cell progenitor. This finding demonstrates iPS technique, applicable to any cell type, can be utilized as a cell cloning strategy favorable for single-cell genomic amplification. This novel strategy is not limited by cell-type constraints or amplification artifacts, and thus enables our detailed investigation on the characteristics of somatic mutations in heterogeneous normal cells.

摘要: 随着跟踪DNA扩增技术的发展，单细胞基因组学发展迅速。但是，当前的技术容易受到各种陷阱的影响，例如污染，基因组覆盖率不均匀以及扩增错误。即使对于单干细胞衍生克隆形成的“黄金”策略，高保真扩增也仅适用于单干细胞。准确定义各种细胞类型中单个细胞的体细胞突变仍然具有挑战性。在此，我们首次提供了证据来证明诱导的多能干细胞（iPS细胞或iPSC）是单个体细胞来源的克隆，其记录的初始细胞祖先的突变谱几乎相同（>90％）。这一发现表明，适用于任何细胞类型的iPS技术都可以用作有利于单细胞基因组扩增的细胞克隆策略。这种新颖的策略不受细胞类型限制或扩增伪像的限制，因此使我们能够对异质正常细胞中体细胞突变的特征进行详细研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32994474

Precision multidimensional neural population code recovered from single intracellular recordings

从单个细胞内记录中恢复的精确多维神经种群代码

DOI: 10.1038/s41598-020-72936-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32994474/

Journal: Scientific reports {'ISSN': '2045-2322', 'Name': 'scientific reports', '2015': '5.228', '2016': '4.259', '2017': '4.122', '2018': '4.011', '2019': '3.998'}

Date: 09/29/2020

Abstract: Neurons in sensory cortices are more naturally and deeply integrated than any current neural population recording tools (e.g. electrode arrays, fluorescence imaging). Two concepts facilitate efforts to observe population neural code with single-cell recordings. First, even the highest quality single-cell recording studies find a fraction of the stimulus information in high-dimensional population recordings. Finding any of this missing information provides proof of principle. Second, neurons and neural populations are understood as coupled nonlinear differential equations. Therefore, fitted ordinary differential equations provide a basis for single-trial single-cell stimulus decoding. We obtained intracellular recordings of fluctuating transmembrane current and potential in mouse visual cortex during stimulation with drifting gratings. We use mean deflection from baseline when comparing to prior single-cell studies because action potentials are too sparse and the deflection response to drifting grating stimuli (e.g. tuning curves) are well studied. Equation-based decoders allowed more precise single-trial stimulus discrimination than tuning-curve-base decoders. Performance varied across recorded signal types in a manner consistent with population recording studies and both classification bases evinced distinct stimulus-evoked phases of population dynamics, providing further corroboration. Naturally and deeply integrated observations of population dynamics would be invaluable. We offer proof of principle and a versatile framework.

摘要: 感觉皮层中的神经元比任何当前的神经种群记录工具（例如电极阵列，荧光成像）更自然和更深入地整合。有两个概念有助于通过单细胞记录来观察种群神经代码。首先，即使是最高质量的单细胞记录研究也发现了高维人口记录中刺激信息的一小部分。查找任何缺少的信息可提供原理证明。其次，神经元和神经种群被理解为耦合的非线性微分方程。因此，拟合的常微分方程为单次试验单细胞刺激解码提供了基础。我们获得了用漂移光栅刺激期间小鼠视觉皮层中波动的跨膜电流和电位的细胞内记录。与以前的单细胞研究相比，我们使用相对于基线的平均挠度，因为动作电位太稀疏并且对漂移光栅刺激（例如调谐曲线）的挠度响应进行了很好的研究。与基于调谐曲线的解码器相比，基于公式的解码器允许更精确的单次刺激识别。在各种记录的信号类型上，性能均以与人口记录研究一致的方式变化，并且两个分类基础都表明了人口动态的不同刺激诱发阶段，从而提供了进一步的佐证。对人口动态进行自然而深入的综合观察将是无价的。我们提供原理证明和通用框架。

Pubmed_ID: 32994417

Satellite glial cells promote regenerative growth in sensory neurons

卫星神经胶质细胞促进感觉神经元的再生生长

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18642-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32994417/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/29/2020

Abstract: Peripheral sensory neurons regenerate their axon after nerve injury to enable functional recovery. Intrinsic mechanisms operating in sensory neurons are known to regulate nerve repair, but whether satellite glial cells (SGC), which completely envelop the neuronal soma, contribute to nerve regeneration remains unexplored. Using a single cell RNAseq approach, we reveal that SGC are distinct from Schwann cells and share similarities with astrocytes. Nerve injury elicits changes in the expression of genes related to fatty acid synthesis and peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor (PPARα) signaling. Conditional deletion of fatty acid synthase (Fasn) in SGC impairs axon regeneration. The PPARα agonist fenofibrate rescues the impaired axon regeneration in mice lacking Fasn in SGC. These results indicate that PPARα activity downstream of FASN in SGC contributes to promote axon regeneration in adult peripheral nerves and highlight that the sensory neuron and its surrounding glial coat form a functional unit that orchestrates nerve repair.

摘要: 周围感觉神经元在神经损伤后再生其轴突以使功能恢复。已知在感觉神经元中起作用的内在机制可调节神经修复，但尚未完全包围神经元躯体的卫星神经胶质细胞（SGC）有助于神经再生。使用单细胞RNAseq方法，我们发现SGC与雪旺氏细胞不同，并且与星形胶质细胞共享相似之处。神经损伤引起与脂肪酸合成和过氧化物酶体增殖物激活受体（PPARα）信号相关的基因表达的变化。SGC中脂肪酸合酶（Fasn）的有条件删除会损害轴突再生。PPARα激动剂非诺贝特可挽救SGC中缺乏Fasn的小鼠轴突再生受损。这些结果表明，SGC中FASN下游的PPARα活性有助于促进成年周围神经的轴突再生，并突出表明感觉神经元及其周围的神经胶质外套形成了协调神经修复的功能单元。

Pubmed_ID: 32994410

Myelin replacement triggered by single-cell demyelination in mouse cortex

小鼠皮质中单细胞脱髓鞘触发髓鞘置换

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18632-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32994410/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/29/2020

Abstract: Myelin, rather than being a static insulator of axons, is emerging as an active participant in circuit plasticity. This requires precise regulation of oligodendrocyte numbers and myelination patterns. Here, by devising a laser ablation approach of single oligodendrocytes, followed by in vivo imaging and correlated ultrastructural reconstructions, we report that in mouse cortex demyelination as subtle as the loss of a single oligodendrocyte can trigger robust cell replacement and remyelination timed by myelin breakdown. This results in reliable reestablishment of the original myelin pattern along continuously myelinated axons, while in parallel, patchy isolated internodes emerge on previously unmyelinated axons. Therefore, in mammalian cortex, internodes along partially myelinated cortical axons are typically not reestablished, suggesting that the cues that guide patchy myelination are not preserved through cycles of de- and remyelination. In contrast, myelin sheaths forming continuous patterns show remarkable homeostatic resilience and remyelinate with single axon precision.

摘要: 髓磷脂，而不是轴突的静态绝缘体，正在积极参与电路可塑性。这需要精确调节少突胶质细胞数量和髓鞘形成模式。在这里，通过设计一种激光消融单个少突胶质细胞的方法，然后进行体内成像和相关的超微结构重建，我们报道了在小鼠皮质皮层脱髓鞘非常微妙，因为单个少突胶质细胞的丢失可以触发稳定的细胞置换和髓鞘降解引起的髓鞘再生。这导致沿着连续有髓鞘的轴突可靠地重建原始的髓鞘模式，而与此同时，斑块状的孤立节间出现在先前未有髓鞘的轴突上。因此，在哺乳动物皮层中，通常不重建沿部分有髓鞘的皮质轴突的节间，这提示通过斑脱髓鞘和再髓鞘化的循环不能保留指导斑块状髓鞘形成的提示。相反，形成连续图案的髓鞘显示出显着的稳态弹性，并以单轴突精确度再髓鞘化。

Pubmed_ID: 32993257

[Strategic thinking to improve the basic research in liver transplantation in the new era]

新时期改善肝移植基础研究的战略思考

DOI: 10.3760/cma.j.cn112139-20200529-00421

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32993257/

Journal: Zhonghua wai ke za zhi [Chinese journal of surgery] ||| Not finding IF

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Liver transplantation(LT) is the "crown" of surgery and is also an important manifestation of national medical standards. In the past half century, China has made remarkable progress in LT. Currently, China is the second largest country of LT world widely and presents an international advanced level in the efficacy of LT.
