The framework incorporates the MCBFS algorithm, network recognition ensemble algorithm and feature selection wrapper. McbfsNW has been applied to the lung adenocarcinoma (LUAD) data sets. The preliminary results demonstrated that higher prediction results can be attained by identified biomarkers on the independent LUAD data set, and we also structured a drug-target network which may be good for LUAD therapy. Conclusions: The proposed novel feature selection method is robust and effective for gene selection, classification, and visualization. The framework McbfsNW is practical and helpful for the identification of biomarkers and targets on genomic data. It is believed that the same methods and principles are extensible and applicable to other different kinds of data sets.

摘要: 背景：样本数量少和维数诅咒妨碍了深度学习技术在疾病分类中的更好应用。另外，由于基于聚类的特征选择算法在使用无监督学习方法方面的局限性，因此其性能仍远远不能令人满意。为了增强可解释性并克服此问题，我们开发了一种新颖的特征选择算法。同时，复杂的基因组数据给生物标志物和治疗靶标的识别带来了巨大挑战。当前一些特征选择方法在该领域存在灵敏度和特异性低的问题。结果：在本文中，我们设计了一种基于多尺度聚类的特征选择算法MCBFS，该算法同时执行特征选择和模型学习以进行基因组数据分析。实验结果表明，通过将MCBFS与8个数据集上的7个基准测试和6个最新的监督方法进行比较，它是强大而有效的。可视化结果和统计测试表明，MCBFS可以捕获信息基因，并提高肿瘤基因表达和单细胞测序数据的可解释性和可视化。此外，我们使用基因表达数据和蛋白质相互作用数据开发了一个名为McbfsNW的通用框架，以鉴定用于诊断和治疗疾病的强大生物标志物和治疗靶标。该框架结合了MCBFS算法，网络识别集成算法和特征选择包装器。McbfsNW已应用于肺腺癌（LUAD）数据集。初步结果表明，通过在独立的LUAD数据集上识别生物标志物可以获得更高的预测结果，并且我们还构建了可能对LUAD治疗有益的药物靶向网络。结论：提出的新颖的特征选择方法对于基因选择，分类和可视化是鲁棒且有效的。McbfsNW框架非常实用，有助于识别基因组数据上的生物标志物和靶标。相信相同的方法和原理是可扩展的，并适用于其他不同种类的数据集。

Pubmed_ID: 32962412

Single-Cell Genomics Reveals a Novel Cell State During Smooth Muscle Cell Phenotypic Switching and Potential Therapeutic Targets for Atherosclerosis in Mouse and Human

单细胞基因组学揭示了平滑肌细胞表型转换和小鼠和人类动脉粥样硬化的潜在治疗靶点的新细胞状态。

DOI: 10.1161/CIRCULATIONAHA.120.048378

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32962412/

Journal: Circulation {'ISSN': '0009-7322', 'Name': 'circulation', '2015': '17.047', '2016': '19.309', '2017': '18.88', '2018': '23.054', '2019': '23.603'}

Date: 09/23/2020

Abstract: Background: Smooth muscle cells (SMC) play significant roles in atherosclerosis via phenotypic switching, a pathological process in which SMC dedifferentiation, migration and transdifferentiation into other cell types. Yet, how SMC contribute to pathophysiology of atherosclerosis remains elusive. Methods: To reveal the trajectories of SMC transdifferentiation during atherosclerosis and to identify molecular targets for disease therapy, we combined SMC fate mapping and single-cell RNA sequencing of both mouse and human atherosclerotic plaques. We also performed cell biology experiments on isolated SMC-derived cells, conducted integrative human genomics, and employed pharmacological studies targeting SMC-derived cells both in vivo and in vitro. Results: We found that SMC transitioned to an intermediate cell state during atherosclerosis, which was also found in human atherosclerotic plaques of carotid and coronary arteries. SMC-derived intermediate cells, termed "SEM" cells, were multipotent and could differentiate into macrophage-like and fibrochondrocyte-like cells, as well as return towards SMC phenotype. Retinoic acid (RA) signaling was identified as a regulator of SMC to SEM cell transition and RA signaling was dysregulated in symptomatic human atherosclerosis. Human genomics revealed enrichment of genome wide association study (GWAS) signals for coronary artery disease (CAD) in RA signaling target gene loci and correlation between CAD risk alleles and repressed expression of these genes. Activation of RA signaling by all-trans retinoic acid (ATRA), an anti-cancer drug for acute promyelocytic leukemia, blocked SMC transition to SEM cells, reduced atherosclerotic burden and promoted fibrous cap stability. Conclusions: Integration of cell-specific fate mapping, single-cell genomics and human genetics adds novel insights into the complexity of SMC biology and reveals regulatory pathways for therapeutic targeting of SMC transitions in atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease.

摘要: 背景：平滑肌细胞（SMC）通过表型转换在动脉粥样硬化中起重要作用，这是SMC去分化，迁移和转分化为其他细胞类型的病理过程。然而，SMC如何促进动脉粥样硬化的病理生理仍然是未知的。方法：为了揭示动脉粥样硬化过程中SMC转分化的轨迹并确定疾病治疗的分子靶标，我们将SMC命运图谱和小鼠和人类动脉粥样硬化斑块的单细胞RNA测序相结合。我们还对分离的SMC衍生细胞进行了细胞生物学实验，进行了整合的人类基因组学研究，并在体内和体外针对SMC衍生细胞进行了药理研究。结果：我们发现在动脉粥样硬化期间，SMC转变为中间细胞状态，这也在人的颈动脉和冠状动脉粥样硬化斑块中发现。SMC衍生的中间细胞，称为“SEM”细胞，具有多能潜能，可以分化为巨噬细胞样和纤维软骨细胞样细胞，并返回SMC表型。在有症状的人动脉粥样硬化中，视黄酸（RA）信号被确定为SMC到SEM细胞过渡的调节剂，RA信号被失调。人类基因组学揭示了RA信号传导靶基因位点中冠状动脉疾病（CAD）的全基因组关联研究（GWAS）信号的丰富性以及CAD风险等位基因与这些基因表达受阻之间的相关性。全反式维甲酸（一种抗急性早幼粒细胞白血病的抗癌药）激活RA信号传导，阻断了SMC向SEM细胞的转移，减少了动脉粥样硬化的负担并促进了纤维帽的稳定性。结论：细胞特异性命运图谱，单细胞基因组学和人类遗传学的整合为SMC生物学的复杂性增添了新见解，并揭示了以动脉粥样硬化性心血管疾病的SMC转化为治疗靶点的调控途径。

Pubmed_ID: 32961356

Oxidized Low-Density Lipoprotein drives dysfunction of the liver lymphatic system

氧化的低密度脂蛋白驱动肝淋巴系统功能障碍

DOI: 10.1016/j.jcmgh.2020.09.007

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32961356/

Journal: Cellular and molecular gastroenterology and hepatology {'ISSN': '2352-345x', 'Name': 'cellular and molecular gastroenterology and hepatology', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '', '': '', '2019': '7.076'}

Date: 09/19/2020

Abstract: Background and aims: As the incidence of nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) continues to rise, understanding how normal liver functions are affected during disease is required before developing novel therapeutics which could reduce morbidity and mortality. However, very little is understood about how the transport of proteins and cells from the liver by the lymphatic vasculature is affected by inflammatory mediators or during disease. Methods: To answer these questions, we utilized a well-validated mouse model of NASH and exposure to highly oxidized low density lipoprotein (oxLDL). In addition to single cell sequencing, multiplexed immunofluorescence and metabolomic analysis of liver lymphatic endothelial cells (LEC)s we evaluated lymphatic permeability and transport both in vitro and in vivo. Results: Confirming similarities between human and mouse lymphatic vasculature in NASH, we found that the lymphatic vasculature expands as disease progresses and results in the downregulation of genes important to lymphatic identity and function. We also demonstrate, in mice with NASH, that FITC dextran does not accumulate in the liver draining lymph node upon intrahepatic injection, a defect that was rescued with therapeutic administration of the lymphatic growth factor, rVEGFC. Similarly, exposure to oxLDL also reduced the amount of FITC dextran in the portal draining lymph node and through an LEC monolayer. We provide evidence that the mechanism by which oxLDL impacts lymphatic permeability is via a reduction in Prox1 expression which decreases lymphatic specific gene expression, impedes LEC metabolism and the highly permeable lymphatic cell-cell junctions characteristic of lymphatic capillaries. Conclusions: We identify oxLDL as a major contributor to decreased lymphatic permeability in the liver, a change which is consistent with decreased protein homeostasis and increased inflammation during chronic liver disease.

摘要: 背景与目的：随着非酒精性脂肪性肝炎（NASH）的发病率持续上升，在开发可以降低发病率和死亡率的新疗法之前，需要了解在疾病期间正常肝功能如何受到影响。但是，对于炎症介质或疾病期间如何通过淋巴管系统从肝脏运输蛋白质和细胞，人们知之甚少。方法：为了回答这些问题，我们利用了一种经过充分验证的NASH小鼠模型，并将其暴露于高度氧化的低密度脂蛋白（oxLDL）中。除了单细胞测序，肝淋巴内皮细胞（LEC）的多重免疫荧光和代谢组学分析，我们还评估了淋巴通透性和体内外转运。结果：证实了NASH中人和小鼠淋巴管系统的相似性，我们发现淋巴管系统随着疾病的进展而扩展，并导致下调对淋巴系统特性和功能重要的基因。我们还证明，在患有NASH的小鼠中，肝内注射后FITC右旋糖酐不会积聚在肝脏引流的淋巴结中，这种缺陷通过淋巴生长因子rVEGFC的治疗性给药得以挽救。同样，暴露于oxLDL也会减少门静脉引流淋巴结中和通过LEC单层的FITC右旋糖酐的量。我们提供的证据表明，oxLDL影响淋巴通透性的机制是通过减少Prox1表达，从而降低淋巴特异基因表达，阻碍LEC代谢和淋巴毛细血管的高通透性淋巴细胞-细胞连接。结论：我们确定oxLDL是导致肝脏淋巴通透性降低的主要因素，这一变化与慢性肝病期间蛋白质稳态下降和炎症增加相一致。

Pubmed_ID: 32961143

Deconstructing Stepwise Fate Conversion of Human Fibroblasts to Neurons by MicroRNAs

通过MicroRNA解构人类成纤维细胞逐步转化为神经元的命运

DOI: 10.1016/j.stem.2020.08.015

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32961143/

Journal: Cell stem cell {'ISSN': '1934-5909', 'Name': 'cell stem cell', '2015': '22.387', '2016': '23.394', '2017': '23.29', '2018': '21.464', '2019': '20.86'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Cell-fate conversion generally requires reprogramming effectors to both introduce fate programs of the target cell type and erase the identity of starting cell population. Here, we reveal insights into the activity of microRNAs miR-9/9∗ and miR-124 (miR-9/9∗-124) as reprogramming agents that orchestrate direct conversion of human fibroblasts into motor neurons by first eradicating fibroblast identity and promoting uniform transition to a neuronal state in sequence. We identify KLF-family transcription factors as direct target genes for miR-9/9∗-124 and show their repression is critical for erasing fibroblast fate. Subsequent gain of neuronal identity requires upregulation of a small nuclear RNA, RN7SK, which induces accessibilities of chromatin regions and neuronal gene activation to push cells to a neuronal state. Our study defines deterministic components in the microRNA-mediated reprogramming cascade.

摘要: 细胞命运转换通常需要重新编程效应子，以引入靶细胞类型的命运程序并消除起始细胞群的身份。在这里，我们揭示了对microRNAmiR-9/9∗和miR-124（miR-9/9∗-124）作为重编程剂的活性的见解，它们通过首先消除成纤维细胞的身份并促进其协调人类成纤维细胞直接转化为运动神经元均匀过渡到神经元状态。我们将KLF家族转录因子鉴定为miR-9/9*-124的直接靶基因，并表明其抑制作用对于消除成纤维细胞的命运至关重要。随后获得神经元身份需要上调小核RNARN7SK，从而诱导染色质区域的可访问性和神经元基因激活，从而将细胞推向神经元状态。我们的研究定义了microRNA介导的重编程级联反应中的确定性成分。

Pubmed_ID: 32961131

Single-Cell Analyses Identify Brain Mural Cells Expressing CD19 as Potential Off-Tumor Targets for CAR-T Immunotherapies

单细胞分析鉴定表达CD19作为CAR-T免疫疗法的潜在非肿瘤靶标的脑壁细胞

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.08.022

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32961131/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: CD19-directed immunotherapies are clinically effective for treating B cell malignancies but also cause a high incidence of neurotoxicity. A subset of patients treated with chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cells or bispecific T cell engager (BiTE) antibodies display severe neurotoxicity, including fatal cerebral edema associated with T cell infiltration into the brain. Here, we report that mural cells, which surround the endothelium and are critical for blood-brain-barrier integrity, express CD19. We identify CD19 expression in brain mural cells using single-cell RNA sequencing data and confirm perivascular staining at the protein level. CD19 expression in the brain begins early in development alongside the emergence of mural cell lineages and persists throughout adulthood across brain regions. Mouse mural cells demonstrate lower levels of Cd19 expression, suggesting limitations in preclinical animal models of neurotoxicity. These data suggest an on-target mechanism for neurotoxicity in CD19-directed therapies and highlight the utility of human single-cell atlases for designing immunotherapies.

摘要: CD19定向免疫疗法在临床上可有效治疗B细胞恶性肿瘤，但也引起神经毒性的高发。接受嵌合抗原受体（CAR）T细胞或双特异性T细胞接合剂（BiTE）抗体治疗的患者子集显示出严重的神经毒性，包括与T细胞浸入大脑相关的致命性脑水肿。在这里，我们报告说，围绕内皮细胞并且对血脑屏障完整性至关重要的壁细胞表达CD19。我们使用单细胞RNA测序数据鉴定脑壁细胞中的CD19表达，并在蛋白水平确认血管周围染色。大脑中CD19的表达与壁细胞谱系的出现一起在发育的早期开始，并在整个成年期贯穿大脑区域持续存在。小鼠壁细胞显示出较低水平的Cd19表达，提示在临床前动物模型中存在神经毒性。这些数据提示了CD19定向疗法中神经毒性的靶向机制，并突出了人单细胞图谱在设计免疫疗法中的实用性。

Pubmed_ID: 32960815

ROS producing immature neutrophils in Giant Cell Arteritis are linked to vascular pathologies

ROS在巨细胞动脉炎中产生不成熟的中性粒细胞与血管病变有关

DOI: 10.1172/jci.insight.139163

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32960815/

Journal: JCI insight {'ISSN': '2379-3708', 'Name': 'jci insight', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '6.014', '2019': '6.205'}

Date: 09/22/2020

Abstract: Giant cell arteritis (GCA) is a common form of primary systemic vasculitis in adults with no reliable indicators of prognosis or treatment responses. We used single cell technologies to comprehensively map immune cell populations in the blood of patients with GCA and identified the CD66b+CD15+CD10lo/-CD64- band neutrophils and CD66bhiCD15+CD10lo/-CD64+/bright myelocytes/metamyelocytes to be unequivocally associated with both the clinical phenotype and response to treatment. Immature neutrophils were resistant to apoptosis, remained in the vasculature for a prolonged time, interacted with platelets, and extravasated into the tissue surrounding the temporal arteries of patients with GCA. We discovered that immature neutrophils generated high levels of extracellular reactive oxygen species, leading to enhanced protein oxidation and permeability of endothelial barrier in an in vitro co-culture system. The same populations were also detected in other systemic vasculitides. These findings link functions of immature neutrophils to disease pathogenesis, establishing a new clinical cellular signature of GCA and suggesting new therapeutic approaches in systemic vascular inflammation.

摘要: 巨细胞动脉炎（GCA）是成人原发性系统性血管炎的常见形式，尚无可靠的预后或治疗反应指标。我们使用单细胞技术对GCA患者血液中的免疫细胞群体进行了全面定位，并确定CD66b+CD15+CD10lo/-CD64-带中性粒细胞和CD66bhiCD15+CD10lo/-CD64+/明亮的骨髓细胞/间质细胞与两者均毫无关联临床表型和对治疗的反应。未成熟的中性粒细胞对细胞凋亡具有抗性，可以长时间保留在脉管系统中，与血小板相互作用，并渗入GCA患者颞动脉周围的组织中。我们发现，未成熟的中性粒细胞在体外共培养系统中产生高水平的细胞外活性氧，导致蛋白质氧化和内皮屏障通透性增强。在其他全身性血管炎中也检测到相同的种群。这些发现将不成熟的中性粒细胞的功能与疾病的发病机制联系起来，建立了GCA的新临床细胞特征，并提示了系统性血管炎症的新治疗方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32960767

scLRTD : A novel low rank tensor decomposition method for imputing missing values in single-cell multi-omics sequencing data

scLRTD：一种新颖的低秩张量分解方法，用于估算单细胞多组学测序数据中的缺失值

DOI: 10.1109/TCBB.2020.3025804

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32960767/

Journal: IEEE/ACM transactions on computational biology and bioinformatics ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/22/2020

Abstract: With the successful application of single-cell sequencing technology, a large number of single-cell multi-omics sequencing (scMO-seq) data have been generated, which enables researchers to study heterogeneity between individual cells. One prominent problem in single-cell data analysis is the prevalence of dropouts, caused by failures in amplication during the experiments. It is necessary to develop effective approaches for imputing the missing values. Different with general methods imputing single type of single-cell data, we propose a imputation method called scLRTD, using low-rank tensor decomposition method based on nuclear norm to impute scMO-seq data and single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) data with different stages, tissues or conditions. Furthermore, three sets of simulated and two sets of real scRNA-seq data from mouse embryonic stem cells and hepatocellular carcinoma, respectively, are used to carry out numerical experiments and compared with other six published methods. Error accuracy and clustering results demonstrate the effectiveness of proposed method. Moreover, we clearly identify two cell subpopulations after imputing the real scMO-seq data from hepatocellular carcinoma. Further, Gene Ontology identifies 7 genes in Bile secretion pathway, which is related to metabolism in hepatocellular carcinoma. The survival analysis using the database TCGA also show that two cell subpopulations after imputing have distinguished survival rates.

摘要: 随着单细胞测序技术的成功应用，已经生成了大量的单细胞多组学测序（scMO-seq）数据，这使研究人员能够研究单个细胞之间的异质性。单细胞数据分析中的一个突出问题是实验期间扩增失败导致的辍学率。有必要开发有效的方法来估算缺失值。与一般的推断单一类型单细胞数据的方法不同，我们提出了一种称为scLRTD的推断方法，该方法采用基于核范数的低秩张量分解方法推断scMO-seq数据和单一细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）具有不同阶段，组织或状况的数据。此外，分别使用来自小鼠胚胎干细胞和肝细胞癌的三组模拟和两组真实的scRNA-seq数据进行了数值实验，并与其他六种已发表的方法进行了比较。误差准确性和聚类结果证明了该方法的有效性。而且，在估算来自肝细胞癌的真实scMO-seq数据后，我们清楚地确定了两个细胞亚群。此外，基因本体论鉴定胆汁分泌途径中的7个基因，其与肝细胞癌中的代谢有关。使用数据库TCGA进行的生存分析还显示，估算后的两个细胞亚群具有明显的生存率。

Pubmed_ID: 32960188

Unveil early-stage nanocytotoxicity by a label-free single cell pH nanoprobe

通过无标记单细胞pH纳米探针揭示早期纳米细胞毒性

DOI: 10.1039/d0an01437k

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32960188/

Journal: The Analyst ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/22/2020

Abstract: Single-cell analysis is an emerging research area that aims to reveal delicate cellular status and underlying mechanisms by conquering the intercellular heterogeneity. Current single-cell research methods, however, are highly dependent on cell-destructive protocols and cannot sequentially display the progress of cellular events. A recently developed pH nanoprobe in our lab conceptually showed its ability to detect intracellular pH (pHi) without cell labeling or disruption. In the present study, we took the cytotoxicity of nanoparticles (NPs) as a typical example of cell heterogeneity, to testify the practicality of the pH nanoprobe in interpreting cell status. Three types of NPs (CeO2, TiO2, and SiO2) were employed to generate varied toxic effects. Results showed that the traditional assays - including cell viability, intracellular ROS generation, and mitochondrial inner membrane depolarization - not only failed to report the nanotoxicity accurately and timely, but also drew confusing or misleading conclusions. The pH nanoprobe revealed explicit pHi changes induced by the NPs, which corresponded well with the cell damages found by the transmission electron microscopic (TEM) imaging. Besides, our results unveiled an unexpectedly devastating effect of SiO2 NPs on cells during the early stage NP-cell interaction. The developed novel pH nanoprobe demonstrated a rapid sensing capability at single-cell resolution with minimum invasiveness. Therefore, it may become a promising alternative for a wide range of applications in areas such as single-cell research and precision medicine.

摘要: 单细胞分析是一个新兴的研究领域，旨在通过征服细胞间异质性来揭示微妙的细胞状态和潜在机制。但是，当前的单细胞研究方法高度依赖于细胞破坏性协议，无法顺序显示细胞事件的进展。我们实验室中最近开发的pH纳米探针从概念上显示了其检测细胞内pH（pHi）的能力，而无需细胞标记或破坏。在本研究中，我们以纳米颗粒（NPs）的细胞毒性作为细胞异质性的典型例子，以证明pH纳米探针在解释细胞状态方面的实用性。三种类型的NP（CeO2，TiO2和SiO2）被用来产生各种毒性作用。结果表明，包括细胞活力，细胞内ROS生成和线粒体内膜去极化在内的传统检测方法不仅无法准确，及时地报告纳米毒性，而且得出令人困惑或误导性的结论。pH纳米探针揭示了由NP引起的显着pHi变化，这与透射电子显微镜（TEM）成像发现的细胞损伤非常吻合。此外，我们的研究结果揭示了SiO2NP在早期NP-细胞相互作用过程中对细胞的破坏性作用。已开发的新型pH纳米探针在单细胞分辨率下具有最小的侵入性，显示出快速的感应能力。因此，它可能成为单细胞研究和精密医学等领域广泛应用的有希望的替代方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32959238

Use of Chlamydial Elementary Bodies as Probes to Isolate Pathogen-Specific Human Monoclonal Antibodies

衣原体基本抗体用作分离病原体特异性人类单克隆抗体的探针的用途

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0795-4_3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32959238/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: Chlamydia trachomatis is one of the most prevalent sexually transmitted infectious agents in the world and the leading cause of infectious blindness. The role of antibodies in the prevention and clearance of infection is still not fully understood, but the analysis of the immunoglobulin response to novel vaccine candidates is an important part of many of these studies. In this chapter, we describe a novel method to identify and isolate Chlamydia-specific memory B cells by fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS) using fluorescently labeled whole bacteria from cryopreserved human PBMC samples. This method allows for live single cells to be sorted for cell culture, in vitro assays, single-cell RNA sequencing, and cloning of paired heavy and light chains for recombinant monoclonal antibody production.

摘要: 沙眼衣原体是世界上最普遍的性传播传染病媒介之一，也是导致传染性失明的主要原因。抗体在预防和清除感染中的作用尚不完全清楚，但是对这些新型疫苗候选者的免疫球蛋白反应的分析是许多此类研究的重要组成部分。在本章中，我们描述了一种新方法，该方法通过使用荧光标记的完整细菌从低温保存的人PBMC样本中通过荧光激活细胞分选（FACS）来鉴定和分离衣原体特异性记忆B细胞。这种方法可以对活的单细胞进行分类，以进行细胞培养，体外测定，单细胞RNA测序以及克隆成对的重链和轻链，以生产重组单克隆抗体。

Pubmed_ID: 32958874

Cell fate specification and differentiation in the adult mammalian intestine

成年哺乳动物肠道中的细胞命运规范和分化

DOI: 10.1038/s41580-020-0278-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958874/

Journal: Nature reviews. Molecular cell biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Intestinal stem cells at the bottom of crypts fuel the rapid renewal of the different cell types that constitute a multitasking tissue. The intestinal epithelium facilitates selective uptake of nutrients while acting as a barrier for hostile luminal contents. Recent discoveries have revealed that the lineage plasticity of committed cells - combined with redundant sources of niche signals - enables the epithelium to efficiently repair tissue damage. New approaches such as single-cell transcriptomics and the use of organoid models have led to the identification of the signals that guide fate specification of stem cell progeny into the six intestinal cell lineages. These cell types display context-dependent functionality and can adapt to different requirements over their lifetime, as dictated by their microenvironment. These new insights into stem cell regulation and fate specification could aid the development of therapies that exploit the regenerative capacity and functionality of the gut.

摘要: 隐窝底部的肠道干细胞促进了组成多任务组织的不同细胞类型的快速更新。肠上皮有助于选择性吸收养分，同时充当有害的内腔内容物的屏障。最近的发现表明，定型细胞的谱系可塑性-与多余的利基信号源相结合-使上皮细胞有效修复组织损伤。单细胞转录组学和类器官模型的使用等新方法已导致鉴定出信号，这些信号可指导干细胞后代的命运特征进入六个肠道细胞谱系。这些细胞类型显示出与上下文相关的功能，并且在其生命周期内可以适应不同的要求，这取决于它们的微环境。这些对干细胞调节和命运规范的新见解可以帮助开发利用肠道的再生能力和功能的疗法。

Pubmed_ID: 32958743

Single-cell sequencing reveals clonal expansions of pro-inflammatory synovial CD8 T cells expressing tissue-homing receptors in psoriatic arthritis

单细胞测序揭示了在银屑病关节炎中表达组织归巢受体的促炎性滑膜CD8 T细胞的克隆扩增

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18513-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958743/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Psoriatic arthritis (PsA) is a debilitating immune-mediated inflammatory arthritis of unknown pathogenesis commonly affecting patients with skin psoriasis. Here we use complementary single-cell approaches to study leukocytes from PsA joints. Mass cytometry demonstrates a 3-fold expansion of memory CD8 T cells in the joints of PsA patients compared to peripheral blood. Meanwhile, droplet-based and plate-based single-cell RNA sequencing of paired T cell receptor alpha and beta chain sequences show pronounced CD8 T cell clonal expansions within the joints. Transcriptome analyses find these expanded synovial CD8 T cells to express cycling, activation, tissue-homing and tissue residency markers. T cell receptor sequence comparison between patients identifies clonal convergence. Finally, chemokine receptor CXCR3 is upregulated in the expanded synovial CD8 T cells, while two CXCR3 ligands, CXCL9 and CXCL10, are elevated in PsA synovial fluid. Our data thus provide a quantitative molecular insight into the cellular immune landscape of psoriatic arthritis.

摘要: 银屑病关节炎（PsA）是一种致病性弱的免疫介导的炎性关节炎，其发病机制未知，通常会影响皮肤牛皮癣患者。在这里，我们使用互补的单细胞方法来研究PsA关节中的白细胞。大量细胞计数显示，与外周血相比，PsA患者关节中记忆CD8T细胞的3倍扩增。同时，配对的T细胞受体α和β链序列的基于液滴和基于板的单细胞RNA测序显示关节内CD8T细胞克隆明显扩增。转录组分析发现这些扩增的滑膜CD8T细胞表达循环，激活，组织归巢和组织驻留标记。患者之间的T细胞受体序列比较可确定克隆收敛。最后，趋化因子受体CXCR3在扩张的滑膜CD8T细胞中上调，而两个CXCR3配体CXCL9和CXCL10在PsA滑液中升高。因此，我们的数据提供了对银屑病关节炎细胞免疫状况的定量分子洞察力。

Pubmed_ID: 32958684

Malignant cell-specific CXCL14 promotes tumor lymphocyte infiltration in oral cavity squamous cell carcinoma

恶性细胞特异性CXCL14促进口腔鳞状细胞癌中肿瘤淋巴细胞浸润

DOI: 10.1136/jitc-2020-001048

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958684/

Journal: Journal for immunotherapy of cancer {'ISSN': '2051-1426', 'Name': 'journal for immunotherapy of cancer', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '8.374', '2018': '8.676', '2019': '9.913'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Objectives: To explore lymphocyte infiltration as a potential mechanism behind CXCL14-mediated tumor growth suppression in oral cavity squamous cell carcinoma (OSCC). Methods: We analyzed single cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) data from OSCC to identify expression changes among malignant cells in lymph nodes (LN) versus primary tumors. CXCL14 expression in murine OSCC cell lines was quantified using qRT-PCR. Short hairpin RNA knockdown of CXCL14 was performed in mouse oral cavity (MOC)1 cells, and CXCL14 overexpression was performed in MOC2 cells. Cells in each condition were injected into C57BL/6 mice with and without T cell depletion, and tumor volume was measured. At 30 days, tumors were dissociated and analyzed by flow cytometry for CD45+CD3+ T cells. CXCL14 expression was correlated with gene expression signatures of tumor infiltrating lymphocytes (TIL) in scRNA-seq data, as well as TCGA tumors. Results: scRNA-seq revealed CXCL14 as the most significantly downregulated gene among malignant cells in LNs relative to primary tumor, supporting a role in preventing invasion and/or metastasis. In a murine immunocompetent model, CXCL14 expression was higher in indolent MOC1 cells than in more aggressive MOC2 cells. Tumor growth in vivo was significantly increased by CXCL14 knockdown in MOC1 cells relative to control, with a corresponding decrease in TIL. In MOC2 cells, tumor growth was significantly reduced by CXCL14 overexpression relative to control and TIL were increased. Both effects were lost with T cell depletion. In a human tumor scRNA-seq cohort, we found that only malignant cell CXCL14, but not non-malignant cell or fibroblast CXCL14, was associated with TIL. Bulk CXCL14 from the TCGA cohort had no association with TIL. Conclusions: Higher CXCL14 expression by tumor cells is associated with reduced tumor growth and increased TIL, supporting immune-mediated suppression of tumor growth in OSCC. Given that CXCL14 is downregulated in LN metastases compared with primary tumors, our data raise the possibility that CXCL14-mediated immune infiltration may discourage invasion and metastasis. In human scRNA-seq data, only malignant cell-specific CXCL14 was associated with TIL, suggesting a critical context-dependent effect of CXCL14 expression.

摘要: 目的：探讨淋巴细胞浸润作为口腔鳞状细胞癌（OSCC）CXCL14介导的肿瘤生长抑制背后的潜在机制。方法：我们分析了来自OSCC的单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）数据，以鉴定淋巴结（LN）与原发性肿瘤中恶性细胞之间的表达变化。使用qRT-PCR定量在鼠OSCC细胞系中的CXCL14表达。CXCL14的短发夹RNA敲低是在小鼠口腔（MOC）1细胞中进行的，而CXCL14的过表达是在MOC2细胞中进行的。将每种情况下的细胞注射到有和没有T细胞消耗的C57BL/6小鼠中，并测量肿瘤体积。在第30天，将肿瘤解离并通过流式细胞术分析CD45+CD3+T细胞。CXCL14表达与scRNA-seq数据中的肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞（TIL）以及TCGA肿瘤的基因表达特征相关。结果：scRNA-seq显示CXCL14是LNs中相对于原发肿瘤最显着下调的基因，支持预防侵袭和/或转移。在鼠类免疫能力强的模型中，在惰性MOC1细胞中CXCL14的表达高于在更具侵略性的MOC2细胞中的表达。相对于对照，MOC1细胞中CXCL14的敲低显着提高了体内肿瘤的生长，TIL相应降低。在MOC2细胞中，相对于对照，肿瘤生长因CXCL14过表达而明显降低，而TIL则升高。T细胞耗竭丧失了这两种作用。在人类肿瘤scRNA-seq队列中，我们发现只有恶性细胞CXCL14与非恶性细胞或成纤维细胞CXCL14才与TIL相关。TCGA队列中的批量CXCL14与TIL没有关联。结论：肿瘤细胞中较高的CXCL14表达与肿瘤生长减少和TIL增加有关，支持OSCC中免疫介导的肿瘤生长抑制。鉴于与原发性肿瘤相比，CXCL14在LN转移中被下调，我们的数据提出了CXCL14介导的免疫浸润可能会阻止侵袭和转移的可能性。在人类scRNA-seq数据中，只有恶性细胞特异性CXCL14与TIL相关，提示CXCL14表达具有关键的背景依赖性作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32958675

Convergent molecular, cellular, and cortical neuroimaging signatures of major depressive disorder

严重抑郁症的分子，细胞和皮质神经影像融合特征

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2008004117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958675/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 10/06/2020

Abstract: Major depressive disorder emerges from the complex interactions of biological systems that span genes and molecules through cells, networks, and behavior. Establishing how neurobiological processes coalesce to contribute to depression requires a multiscale approach, encompassing measures of brain structure and function as well as genetic and cell-specific transcriptional data. Here, we examine anatomical (cortical thickness) and functional (functional variability, global brain connectivity) correlates of depression and negative affect across three population-imaging datasets: UK Biobank, Brain Genomics Superstruct Project, and Enhancing NeuroImaging through Meta Analysis (ENIGMA; combined n ≥ 23,723). Integrative analyses incorporate measures of cortical gene expression, postmortem patient transcriptional data, depression genome-wide association study (GWAS), and single-cell gene transcription. Neuroimaging correlates of depression and negative affect were consistent across three independent datasets. Linking ex vivo gene down-regulation with in vivo neuroimaging, we find that transcriptional correlates of depression imaging phenotypes track gene down-regulation in postmortem cortical samples of patients with depression. Integrated analysis of single-cell and Allen Human Brain Atlas expression data reveal somatostatin interneurons and astrocytes to be consistent cell associates of depression, through both in vivo imaging and ex vivo cortical gene dysregulation. Providing converging evidence for these observations, GWAS-derived polygenic risk for depression was enriched for genes expressed in interneurons, but not glia. Underscoring the translational potential of multiscale approaches, the transcriptional correlates of depression-linked brain function and structure were enriched for disorder-relevant molecular pathways. These findings bridge levels to connect specific genes, cell classes, and biological pathways to in vivo imaging correlates of depression.

摘要: 严重的抑郁症源于通过细胞，网络和行为跨越基因和分子的生物系统的复杂相互作用。要确定神经生物学过程如何联合导致抑郁症，就需要采取多尺度方法，其中包括对大脑结构和功能以及遗传和细胞特异性转录数据的测量。在这里，我们研究了三种人群成像数据集：英国生物库，脑基因组学上级计划项目和通过元分析来增强神经成像（ENIGMA）的解剖学（皮层厚度）和功能性（功能变异性，全球大脑连通性）的相关性与抑郁和负面影响的关系。n≥23723）。整合分析结合了皮质基因表达，死后患者转录数据，抑郁症全基因组关联研究（GWAS）和单细胞基因转录的测量。在三个独立的数据集中，抑郁症和负面影响的神经影像相关性是一致的。将离体基因下调与体内神经影像联系起来，我们发现抑郁症成像表型的转录相关性追踪了抑郁症患者的死后皮质样品中的基因下调。通过体内成像和离体皮层基因失调，对单细胞和艾伦人脑图谱表达数据的综合分析显示生长抑素中间神经元和星形胶质细胞是抑郁症的一致细胞联想。为这些发现提供了越来越多的证据，GWAS衍生的多基因抑郁风险增加了中间神经元而非神经胶质细胞中表达的基因。强调多尺度方法的翻译潜力，与抑郁症相关的分子途径丰富了与抑郁相关的脑功能和结构的转录相关性。这些发现弥合了将特定基因，细胞类型和生物学途径与抑郁症的体内成像联系起来的水平。

Pubmed_ID: 32958645

Circulating testican-2 is a podocyte-derived marker of kidney health

循环testican-2是足细胞来源的肾脏健康标志物

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2009606117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958645/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 10/06/2020

Abstract: In addition to their fundamental role in clearance, the kidneys release select molecules into the circulation, but whether any of these anabolic functions provides insight on kidney health is unknown. Using aptamer-based proteomics, we characterized arterial (A)-to-renal venous (V) gradients for >1,300 proteins in 22 individuals who underwent invasive sampling. Although most of the proteins that changed significantly decreased from A to V, consistent with renal clearance, several were found to increase, the most significant of which was testican-2. To assess the clinical implications of these physiologic findings, we examined proteomic data in the Jackson Heart Study (JHS), an African-American cohort (n = 1,928), with replication in the Framingham Heart Study (FHS), a White cohort (n = 1,621). In both populations, testican-2 had a strong, positive correlation with estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR). In addition, higher baseline testican-2 levels were associated with a lower rate of eGFR decline in models adjusted for age, gender, hypertension, type 2 diabetes, body mass index, baseline eGFR, and albuminuria. Glomerular expression of testican-2 in human kidneys was demonstrated by immunohistochemistry, immunofluorescence, and electron microscopy, while single-cell RNA sequencing of human kidneys showed expression of the cognate gene, SPOCK2, exclusively in podocytes. In vitro, testican-2 increased glomerular endothelial tube formation and motility, raising the possibility that its secretion has a functional role within the glomerulus. Taken together, our findings identify testican-2 as a podocyte-derived biomarker of kidney health and prognosis.

摘要: 除了它们在清除中的基本作用外，肾脏还向循环中释放特定分子，但是这些合成代谢功能是否能提供对肾脏健康的了解尚不清楚。使用基于适体的蛋白质组学，我们表征了22位接受侵入性采样的个体中>1,300种蛋白质的动脉（A）-肾静脉（V）梯度。尽管大多数改变的蛋白质从A到V显着降低，与肾脏清除率一致，但发现有几种增加，其中最显着的是testican-2。为了评估这些生理发现的临床意义，我们在非裔美国人队列（n=1,928）的杰克逊心脏研究（JHS）中检查了蛋白质组学数据，在白人队列（n=1,621）。在这两个人群中，testican-2与估计的肾小球滤过率（eGFR）均呈强正相关。此外，在针对年龄，性别，高血压，2型糖尿病，体重指数，基线eGFR和蛋白尿调整的模型中，较高的基线testican-2水平与较低的eGFR下降率相关。免疫组化，免疫荧光和电子显微镜证实了睾丸素2在肾中的肾小球表达，而对人肾的单细胞RNA测序表明同源基因SPOCK2仅在足细胞中表达。在体外，testican-2增加了肾小球内皮管的形成和运动，增加了其分泌在肾小球内发挥功能作用的可能性。综上所述，我们的研究结果确定testican-2是足细胞来源的肾脏健康和预后的生物标志物。

Pubmed_ID: 32958603

Predicting gene regulatory networks from cell atlases

从细胞图谱预测基因调控网络

DOI: 10.26508/lsa.202000658

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958603/

Journal: Life science alliance {'ISSN': '2575-1077', 'Name': 'life science alliance', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '', '': '', '2019': ''}

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Recent single-cell RNA-sequencing atlases have surveyed and identified major cell types across different mouse tissues. Here, we computationally reconstruct gene regulatory networks from three major mouse cell atlases to capture functional regulators critical for cell identity, while accounting for a variety of technical differences, including sampled tissues, sequencing depth, and author assigned cell type labels. Extracting the regulatory crosstalk from mouse atlases, we identify and distinguish global regulons active in multiple cell types from specialised cell type-specific regulons. We demonstrate that regulon activities accurately distinguish individual cell types, despite differences between individual atlases. We generate an integrated network that further uncovers regulon modules with coordinated activities critical for cell types, and validate modules using available experimental data. Inferring regulatory networks during myeloid differentiation from wild-type and Irf8 KO cells, we uncover functional contribution of Irf8 regulon activity and composition towards monocyte lineage. Our analysis provides an avenue to further extract and integrate the regulatory crosstalk from single-cell expression data.

摘要: 最近的单细胞RNA测序图谱已调查并确定了不同小鼠组织中的主要细胞类型。在这里，我们从三个主要的小鼠细胞图集计算重建基因调控网络，以捕获对细胞身份至关重要的功能调控因子，同时考虑到各种技术差异，包括采样组织，测序深度和作者指定的细胞类型标签。从小鼠图谱中提取调控串扰，我们从特定的细胞类型特异性调控因子中识别并区分了在多种细胞类型中活跃的全局调控因子。我们证明，尽管个别图谱之间存在差异，但调节子活性可以准确地区分单个细胞类型。我们生成了一个集成网络，该网络可以进一步发现具有针对细胞类型至关重要的协调活动的regulon模块，并使用可用的实验数据来验证模块。从野生型和Irf8KO细胞的骨髓分化过程中推断调控网络，我们发现Irf8调节子活性和组成对单核细胞谱系的功能性贡献。我们的分析为进一步提取和整合单细胞表达数据的调控串扰提供了途径。

Pubmed_ID: 32958251

Phenotype-based single cell sequencing identifies diverse genetic subclones in CD133 positive cancer stem cells

基于表型的单细胞测序可鉴定CD133阳性癌症干细胞中的多种遗传亚克隆

DOI: 10.1016/j.bbrc.2020.09.005

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958251/

Journal: Biochemical and biophysical research communications {'ISSN': '0006-291x', 'Name': 'biochemical and biophysical research communications', '2015': '2.371', '2016': '2.466', '2017': '2.559', '2018': '2.705', '2019': '2.985'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Tumor heterogeneity is one of the ongoing huddles in the field of colon cancer therapy. It is evident that there are countless clones which exhibit different phenotypes and therefore, single cell analysis is inevitable. Cancer stem cells (CSCs) are rare cell population within tumor which is known to function in cancer metastasis and recurrence. Although there have been trials to prove intra-tumoral heterogeneity using single cell sequencing, that of CSCs has not been clearly elucidated. Here, we articulate the presence of heterogeneous subclones within CD133 positive cancer stem cells through single cell sequencing. As a proof of principle, we performed phenotype-based high-throughput laser isolation and single cell sequencing (PHLI-seq) of CD133 positive cells in a frozen tumor tissue obtained from a patient with colorectal cancer. The result proved that CD133 positive cells were shown to be heterogeneous both in copy number and mutational profiles. Single cancer stem cell specific mutations such as RNF144A, PAK2, PARP4, ADAM21, HYDIN, KRT38 and CELSR1 could be also detected in liver metastatic tumor of the same patient. Collectively, these data suggest that single cell analysis used to spot subclones with genetic variation within rare population, will lead to new strategies to tackle colon cancer metastasis.

摘要: 肿瘤异质性是结肠癌治疗领域中正在进行的缩影之一。显然有无数的克隆表现出不同的表型，因此单细胞分析是不可避免的。癌症干细胞（CSC）是肿瘤中的稀有细胞群，已知在癌症转移和复发中起作用。尽管已经有试验使用单细胞测序来证明肿瘤内异质性，但尚未明确阐明CSC的异质性。在这里，我们通过单细胞测序阐明了CD133阳性癌症干细胞中异质亚克隆的存在。作为原理上的证明，我们对来自结直肠癌患者的冷冻肿瘤组织中的CD133阳性细胞进行了基于表型的高通量激光分离和CD133阳性细胞的单细胞测序（PHLI-seq）。结果证明，CD133阳性细胞在拷贝数和突变谱上均表现出异质性。在同一患者的肝转移性肿瘤中也可以检测到单个癌症干细胞特异性突变，如RNF144A，PAK2，PARP4，ADAM21，HYDIN，KRT38和CELSR1。总体而言，这些数据表明，用于发现稀有种群中具有遗传变异的亚克隆的单细胞分析将导致解决结肠癌转移的新策略。

Pubmed_ID: 32958110

One by One - Insights into Complex Immune Responses through Functional Single-cell Analysis

一对一-通过功能性单细胞分析深入了解复杂的免疫反应

DOI: 10.2533/chimia.2020.716

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958110/

Journal: Chimia {'ISSN': '0009-4293', 'Name': 'chimia', '2015': '1', '2016': '0.948', '2017': '1.245', '2018': '1.096', '2019': '1.478'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Immune responses are highly dynamic and complex. The successful completion thereof involves and needs many different cells from the immune system, and requires their specific interactions and functions. Individual cells are the functional units within any immune response, and their varying frequencies and degrees of activity shape and define the response. The state, activation and ultimately functionality of immune cells displays high dynamic heterogeneity. Hence, there is a need for quantitative high-throughput systems that allow for a dynamic and functional single-cell phenotyping, linking function to the individual cells. In this regard, my research group focuses on developing and applying technologies and analytical strategies that allow us to measure, describe and exploit functionality within the immune system, resolved down to the individual, primary cell, to study novel and unique research questions. While doing ex vivo measurements, we are aiming to understand the functionalities of the extracted cells in vivo , within the context of our applied disturbance - vaccination, infection or malignant transformation.

摘要: 免疫反应是高度动态和复杂的。其成功完成涉及并且需要来自免疫系统的许多不同细胞，并且需要它们的特定相互作用和功能。单个细胞是任何免疫应答中的功能单元，它们的变化频率和活动程度决定并定义了应答。免疫细胞的状态，激活和最终功能表现出高度的动态异质性。因此，需要定量的高通量系统，其允许动态和功能性单细胞表型化，将功能链接至单个细胞。在这方面，我的研究小组专注于开发和应用技术和分析策略，这些技术和分析策略使我们能够测量，描述和利用免疫系统中的功能，分解为单个的原代细胞，以研究新颖而独特的研究问题。在进行离体测量时，我们的目标是在我们施加的干扰（疫苗接种，感染或恶性转化）的背景下，了解提取的细胞在体内的功能。

Pubmed_ID: 32958108

Single-molecule and Single-cell Approaches in Molecular Bioengineering

分子生物工程学中的单分子和单细胞方法

DOI: 10.2533/chimia.2020.704

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958108/

Journal: Chimia {'ISSN': '0009-4293', 'Name': 'chimia', '2015': '1', '2016': '0.948', '2017': '1.245', '2018': '1.096', '2019': '1.478'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Protein sequences inhabit a discrete set in macromolecular space with incredible capacity to treat human disease. Despite our ability to program and manipulate protein sequences, the vast majority of protein development efforts are still done heuristically without a unified set of guiding principles. This article highlights work in understanding biophysical stability and function of proteins, developing new biophysical measurement tools and building high-throughput screening platforms to explore functional protein sequences. We highlight two primary areas. First, molecular biomechanics is a subfield concerned with the response of proteins to mechanical forces, and how we can leverage mechanical force to control protein function. The second subfield investigates the use of polymers and hydrogels in protein engineering and directed evolution in pursuit of new molecular systems with therapeutic applications. These two subdisciplines complement each other by shedding light onto sequence and structural features that can be used to impart stability into therapeutic proteins.

摘要: 蛋白质序列居住在大分子空间中的离散集合中，具有难以置信的治疗人类疾病的能力。尽管我们具有编程和操纵蛋白质序列的能力，但绝大多数蛋白质开发工作仍然是在没有统一指导原则的情况下进行的。本文重点介绍了在理解蛋白质的生物物理稳定性和功能，开发新的生物物理测量工具以及建立高通量筛选平台以探索功能性蛋白质序列方面的工作。我们重点介绍两个主要领域。首先，分子生物力学是一个涉及蛋白质对机械力响应的子领域，也是我们如何利用机械力控制蛋白质功能的一个子领域。第二个子领域研究聚合物和水凝胶在蛋白质工程中的应用以及定向进化，以寻求具有治疗用途的新分子系统。这两个子学科通过将光线照射到可用于赋予治疗性蛋白质以稳定性的序列和结构特征上而相互补充。

Pubmed_ID: 32958049

Low-dose DNA demethylating therapy induces reprogramming of diverse cancer-related pathways at the single-cell level

低剂量DNA去甲基化疗法可在单细胞水平上诱导多种癌症相关途径的重编程

DOI: 10.1186/s13148-020-00937-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32958049/

Journal: Clinical epigenetics {'ISSN': '1868-7075', 'Name': 'clinical epigenetics', '2015': '4.327', '2016': '4.987', '2017': '6.091', '2018': '5.496', '2019': '5.028'}

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Background: Epigenetic reprogramming using DNA demethylating drugs is a promising approach for cancer therapy, but its efficacy is highly dependent on the dosing regimen. Low-dose treatment for a prolonged period shows a remarkable therapeutic efficacy, despite its small demethylating effect. Here, we aimed to explore the mechanisms of how such low-dose treatment shows this remarkable efficacy by focusing on epigenetic reprograming at the single-cell level. Methods: Expression profiles in HCT116 cells treated with decitabine (DAC) were analyzed by single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq). Functional consequences and DNA demethylation at the single-cell level were analyzed using cloned HCT116 cells after DAC treatment. Results: scRNA-seq revealed that DAC-treated cells had highly diverse expression profiles at the single-cell level, and tumor-suppressor genes, endogenous retroviruses, and interferon-stimulated genes were upregulated in random fractions of cells. DNA methylation analysis of cloned HCT116 cells revealed that, while only partial reduction of DNA methylation levels was observed in bulk cells, complete demethylation of specific cancer-related genes, such as cell cycle regulation, WNT pathway, p53 pathway, and TGF-β pathway, was observed, depending upon clones. Functionally, a clone with complete demethylation of CDKN2A (p16) had a larger fraction of cells with tetraploid than parental cells, indicating induction of cellular senescence due to normalization of cell cycle regulation. Conclusions: Epigenetic reprogramming of specific cancer-related pathways at the single-cell level is likely to underlie the remarkable efficacy of low-dose DNA demethylating therapy.

摘要: 背景：使用DNA去甲基化药物进行表观遗传重编程是一种有前途的癌症治疗方法，但其疗效高度依赖于给药方案。尽管其低甲基化作用较小，但长期低剂量治疗仍显示出显着的疗效。在这里，我们旨在通过在单细胞水平上专注于表观遗传重编程来探索这种低剂量治疗如何显示出这种非凡功效的机制。方法：通过单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）分析地西他滨（DAC）处理的HCT116细胞中的表达谱。在DAC处理后，使用克隆的HCT116细胞分析了单细胞水平的功能后果和DNA脱甲基。结果：scRNA-seq显示，经DAC处理的细胞在单细胞水平上具有高度多样化的表达谱，并且肿瘤抑制基因，内源性逆转录病毒和干扰素刺激的基因在细胞的随机部分中上调。克隆的HCT116细胞的DNA甲基化分析表明，虽然在散装细胞中仅观察到DNA甲基化水平的部分降低，但特定的癌症相关基因（例如细胞周期调控，WNT途径，p53途径和TGF-β途径）已完全脱甲基。观察到，取决于克隆。在功能上，具有CDKN2A（p16）完全去甲基化作用的克隆比亲代细胞具有更大的四倍体细胞比例，这表明归因于细胞周期调控的正常化而诱导细胞衰老。结论：在单细胞水平上特定癌症相关途径的表观遗传重编程可能是低剂量DNA去甲基化疗法显着疗效的基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32957652

FUCCI Real-Time Cell-Cycle Imaging as a Guide for Designing Improved Cancer Therapy: A Review of Innovative Strategies to Target Quiescent Chemo-Resistant Cancer Cells

FUCCI实时细胞周期成像作为设计改进的癌症治疗方法的指南：靶向静态抗药性癌细胞的创新策略的综述

DOI: 10.3390/cancers12092655

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32957652/

Journal: Cancers {'ISSN': '2072-6694', 'Name': 'cancers', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '5.326', '2018': '6.162', '2019': '6.126'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Progress in chemotherapy of solid cancer has been tragically slow due, in large part, to the chemoresistance of quiescent cancer cells in tumors. The fluorescence ubiquitination cell-cycle indicator (FUCCI) was developed in 2008 by Miyawaki et al., which color-codes the phases of the cell cycle in real-time. FUCCI utilizes genes linked to different color fluorescent reporters that are only expressed in specific phases of the cell cycle and can, thereby, image the phases of the cell cycle in real-time. Intravital real-time FUCCI imaging within tumors has demonstrated that an established tumor comprises a majority of quiescent cancer cells and a minor population of cycling cancer cells located at the tumor surface or in proximity to tumor blood vessels. In contrast to most cycling cancer cells, quiescent cancer cells are resistant to cytotoxic chemotherapy, most of which target cells in S/G2/M phases. The quiescent cancer cells can re-enter the cell cycle after surviving treatment, which suggests the reason why most cytotoxic chemotherapy is often ineffective for solid cancers. Thus, quiescent cancer cells are a major impediment to effective cancer therapy. FUCCI imaging can be used to effectively target quiescent cancer cells within tumors. For example, we review how FUCCI imaging can help to identify cell-cycle-specific therapeutics that comprise decoy of quiescent cancer cells from G1 phase to cycling phases, trapping the cancer cells in S/G2 phase where cancer cells are mostly sensitive to cytotoxic chemotherapy and eradicating the cancer cells with cytotoxic chemotherapy most active against S/G2 phase cells. FUCCI can readily image cell-cycle dynamics at the single cell level in real-time in vitro and in vivo. Therefore, visualizing cell cycle dynamics within tumors with FUCCI can provide a guide for many strategies to improve cell-cycle targeting therapy for solid cancers.

摘要: 实体癌化学疗法的进展非常缓慢，这在很大程度上是由于肿瘤中静态癌细胞的化学耐药性所致。荧光泛素化细胞周期指示剂（FUCCI）由Miyawaki等人于2008年开发，可实时对细胞周期的各个阶段进行颜色编码。FUCCI利用与不同颜色的荧光报告基因连锁的基因，这些基因仅在细胞周期的特定阶段表达，因此可以实时成像细胞周期的各个阶段。肿瘤内的活体内实时FUCCI成像表明，已建立的肿瘤包括位于肿瘤表面或靠近肿瘤血管的大部分静态癌细胞和少量循环癌细胞。与大多数循环癌细胞不同，静态癌细胞对细胞毒性化学疗法具有抵抗力，其中大多数靶向细胞处于S/G2/M期。存活下来的癌细胞可以在治疗后重新进入细胞周期，这表明大多数细胞毒性化学疗法通常对实体癌无效的原因。因此，静态癌细胞是有效癌症治疗的主要障碍。FUCCI成像可用于有效靶向肿瘤内的静态癌细胞。例如，我们回顾了FUCCI成像如何帮助识别特定于细胞周期的疗法，其中包括从G1期到循环期的静止癌细胞诱饵，将癌细胞困在S/G2期，其中癌细胞对细胞毒性化学疗法最敏感用对S/G2期细胞最有活性的细胞毒性化学疗法消灭癌细胞。FUCCI可以轻松地在体外和体内实时成像单个细胞水平的细胞周期动态。因此，使用FUCCI可视化肿瘤内的细胞周期动态可以为许多策略提供指导，以改善实体癌的细胞周期靶向治疗。

Pubmed_ID: 32957512

Evaluation of a Bacterial Single-Cell Protein in Compound Diets for Rainbow Trout ( Oncorhynchus mykiss) Fry as an Alternative Protein Source

复合饮食中虹鳟（Oncorhynchus mykiss）鱼苗作为替代蛋白质来源的细菌单细胞蛋白质的评估

DOI: 10.3390/ani10091676

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32957512/

Journal: Animals : an open access journal from MDPI ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: A 60-day trial was conducted in rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss) fry (initial weight = 2.5 ± 0.6 g) to evaluate the potential use of a bacterial single-cell protein (SCP) as an alternative protein source. Five experimental diets with different levels of fishmeal replacement (0, 25, 50, 75 and 100%) and no amino acid supplementation were tested. At the end of the trial, we found that fry fed diets, replacing 25 and 50% of fishmeal with bacterial SCP, were 9.1 and 21.8% heavier, respectively, than those fed the control diet (p < 0.05), while Feed Conversion Ratio (FCR) values were also lower in comparison to the reference group. These results were also supported by Protein Efficiency Ratio (PER) and Lipid Efficiency Ratio (LER) values that improved in fish fed diets replacing 50% fishmeal by bacterial SCP. The inclusion of SCP enhanced Feed intake (FI) (p < 0.05), although FI was reduced at higher inclusion levels (>50%), which was associated to feed palatability. High levels of bacterial SCP (>50%) affected the muscular amino acid and fatty acid profiles, imbalances that were associated to their dietary content. The broken-line regression analysis using muscle DHA content and weight gain data showed that the maximum levels of fishmeal replacement by bacterial SCP were 46.9 and 52%, respectively.

摘要: 在虹鳟鱼（Oncorhynchusmykiss）鱼苗（初始体重=2.5±0.6g）中进行了60天的试验，以评估细菌单细胞蛋白（SCP）作为替代蛋白来源的潜在用途。测试了五种具有不同鱼粉替代水平（0％，25％，50％，75％和100％）且未添加氨基酸的实验饮食。在试验结束时，我们发现，用细菌性SCP代替鱼粉喂养的鱼苗日粮比对照鱼饲料分别重9.1和21.8％（p<0.05），而饲料转化率则高9.1和21.8％。（FCR）值也比参考组低。这些结果也得到了蛋白质效率比（PER）和脂质效率比（LER）值的支持，这些值在用鱼类SCP代替50％鱼粉的鱼饲料中得到了改善。SCP的添加增加了饲料摄入量（FI）（p<0.05），尽管FI在较高的添加水平（>50％）时降低了，这与饲料的适口性有关。高水平的细菌SCP（>50％）影响了肌肉氨基酸和脂肪酸谱，这与其饮食含量有关。使用肌肉DHA含量和体重增加数据的折线回归分析显示，细菌SCP替代鱼粉的最大水平分别为46.9％和52％。

Pubmed_ID: 32957229

Macroscopic and microscopic analysis of the mechanical properties and adhesion force of cells using a single cell tensile test and atomic force microscopy: Remarkable differences in cell types

使用单细胞拉伸试验和原子力显微镜对细胞的机械性能和粘附力进行宏观和微观分析：细胞类型的显着差异

DOI: 10.1016/j.jmbbm.2020.103935

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32957229/

Journal: Journal of the mechanical behavior of biomedical materials {'ISSN': '1751-6161', 'Name': 'journal of the mechanical behavior of biomedical materials', '2015': '2.876', '2016': '3.11', '2017': '3.239', '2018': '3.485', '2019': '3.372'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Many experimental techniques have been reported to provide knowledge of the mechanical behavior of cells from biomechanical viewpoints, however, it is unclear how the intercellular structural differences influence macroscopic and microscopic mechanical properties of cells. The aim of our study is to clarify the comprehensive mechanical properties and cell-substrate adhesion strength of cells, and the correlation with intracellular structure in different cell types. We developed an originally designed micro tensile tester, and performed a single cell tensile test to estimate whole cell tensile stiffness and adhesion strength of normal vascular smooth muscle cells (VSMCs) and cervical cancer HeLa cells: one half side of the specimen cell was lifted up by a glass microneedle, then stretched until the cell detached from the substrate, while force was simultaneously measured. The tensile stiffness and adhesion strength were 49 ± 10 nN/% and 870 ± 430 nN, respectively, in VSMCs (mean ± SD, n = 8), and 19 ± 17 nN/% and 320 ± 160 nN, respectively, in HeLa cells (n = 9). The difference was more definite in the surface elastic modulus map obtained by atomic force microscopy, indicating that the internal tension of the actin cytoskeleton was significantly higher in VSMCs than in HeLa cells. Structural analysis with confocal microscopy revealed that VSMCs had a significant alignment of F-actin cytoskeleton with mature focal adhesion, contrary to the randomly oriented F-actin with smaller focal adhesion of HeLa cells, indicating that structural arrangement of the actin cytoskeleton and their mechanical tension generated the differences in cell mechanical properties and adhesion forces. The finding strongly suggests that the mechanical and structural differences in each cell type are deeply involved with their physiological functions.

摘要: 从生物力学的观点来看，已经报道了许多实验技术来提供有关细胞机械行为的知识，但是，尚不清楚细胞间结构差异如何影响细胞的宏观和微观机械性能。我们的研究目的是阐明细胞的综合机械性能和细胞-基底粘附强度，以及与不同细胞类型中细胞内结构的相关性。我们开发了最初设计的微拉伸测试仪，并进行了单细胞拉伸测试，以评估正常血管平滑肌细胞（VSMC）和宫颈癌HeLa细胞的全细胞拉伸刚度和粘附强度：抬起标本细胞的一半通过玻璃微针，然后拉伸直至细胞从基底上分离，同时同时测量力。VSMC中的拉伸刚度和粘附强度分别为49±10nN/％和870±430nN（均值±SD，n=8），在HeLa中分别为19±17nN/％和320±160nN个单元（n=9）。通过原子力显微镜获得的表面弹性模量图上的差异更加确定，表明VSMC中肌动蛋白细胞骨架的内部张力明显高于HeLa细胞。共聚焦显微镜的结构分析显示，VSMC具有成熟的粘着斑的F-肌动蛋白细胞骨架的显着排列，与HeLa细胞的粘着力较小的随机取向的F-肌动蛋白相反，表明肌动蛋白的细胞骨架的结构排列及其机械张力产生了电池机械性能和粘附力的差异。该发现强烈暗示每种细胞类型的机械和结构差异与它们的生理功能密切相关。

Pubmed_ID: 32957084

Glioblastoma cell differentiation trajectory predicts the immunotherapy response and overall survival of patients

胶质母细胞瘤细胞分化轨迹可预测患者的免疫治疗反应和总体存活率

DOI: 10.18632/aging.103695

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32957084/

Journal: Aging None

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Glioblastoma (GBM) is the most common and lethal primary brain tumor. In this study, we aimed to investigate the differentiation states of GBM cells and their clinical relevance. Integrated single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) data and bulk RNA-seq data from GBM samples were used for analysis. Two subsets of GBM cells in distinct differentiation states were characterized, and 498 GBM cell differentiation-related genes (GDRGs) were identified. GDRGs were significantly correlated with immune regulation and metabolic pathways. We classified the GBM patients into two groups based on the expression of GDRGs in tumors and found that the cell differentiation-based classification successfully predicted patient overall survival (OS), immune checkpoint expression and likelihood of immunotherapy response in GBMs. FN1, APOE, RPL7A and GSTM2 were the 4 most significant survival-predicting GDRGs, and patients with different expression levels of each of these genes had distinct survival outcomes. Finally, a nomogram composed of the GDRG signature, age, pharmacotherapy, radiotherapy, IDH mutations and MGMT promoter methylation was generated and validated in two large GBM cohorts to predict GBM prognosis. This study highlights the significant roles of cell differentiation in predicting the clinical outcomes of GBM patients and their potential response to immunotherapy, suggesting promising therapeutic targets for GBM.

摘要: 胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）是最常见和致命的原发性脑肿瘤。在这项研究中，我们旨在调查GBM细胞的分化状态及其临床相关性。来自GBM样品的整合单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）数据和大量RNA-seq数据用于分析。表征了处于不同分化状态的GBM细胞的两个子集，并鉴定了498个GBM细胞分化相关基因（GDRGs）。GDRGs与免疫调节和代谢途径显着相关。我们根据肿瘤中GDRGs的表达将GBM患者分为两组，发现基于细胞分化的分类成功预测了GBMs的患者总体生存率（OS），免疫检查点表达和免疫治疗反应的可能性。FN1，APOE，RPL7A和GSTM2是4个最重要的生存预测GDRG，并且每种基因的表达水平不同的患者具有不同的生存结果。最后，生成了由GDRG签名，年龄，药物治疗，放疗，IDH突变和MGMT启动子甲基化组成的列线图，并在两个大型GBM队列中对其进行了验证，以预测GBM的预后。这项研究强调了细胞分化在预测GBM患者的临床结局及其对免疫治疗的潜在反应中的重要作用，为GBM提出了有希望的治疗靶标。

Pubmed_ID: 32957014

Progress in deciphering trophoblast cell differentiation during human placentation

胎盘破译滋养细胞分化的研究进展

DOI: 10.1016/j.ceb.2020.08.010

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32957014/

Journal: Current opinion in cell biology {'ISSN': '0955-0674', 'Name': 'current opinion in cell biology', '2015': '8.851', '2016': '9.937', '2017': '10.015', '2018': '8.233', '2019': '8.24'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: The maintenance of gestational well-being requires the proper development of both the embryo and the placenta. Placental trophoblast cells are the major building blocks of the developing placenta. Abnormal trophoblast differentiation underpins placental-based pregnancy complications. However, the mechanisms that govern trophoblast differentiation remain largely unclear. Recent studies shed light on several proteins and regulators that are involved in governing trophoblast differentiation. The advancement of new tools and novel technologies, such as the human trophoblast stem cell culture system, 3D placental organoids and single-cell multi-omics, has brought incredible insights to the field. Here we review the current literature, paying particular attention to articles published between 2017 and 2019 that have promoted our understanding of human trophoblast cell differentiation and its roles in pregnancy and its complications. At the same time, we address challenges and questions arising in the field of human placental development and disease.

摘要: 维持妊娠健康需要胚胎和胎盘的适当发育。胎盘滋养细胞是发育中的胎盘的主要组成部分。滋养细胞异常分化是胎盘妊娠的基础。但是，控制滋养细胞分化的机制仍不清楚。最近的研究揭示了与调控滋养细胞分化有关的几种蛋白质和调节剂。人类滋养细胞干细胞培养系统，3D胎盘类器官和单细胞多组学等新工具和新技术的发展为该领域带来了令人难以置信的见解。在这里，我们回顾了当前的文献，特别关注2017年至2019年之间发表的文章，这些文章增进了我们对人类滋养层细胞分化及其在妊娠及其并发症中的作用的了解。同时，我们解决了人类胎盘发育和疾病领域中出现的挑战和问题。

Pubmed_ID: 32956572

Methods for Automated Single Cell Isolation and Sub-Cloning of Human Pluripotent Stem Cells

人多能干细胞自动单细胞分离和亚克隆的方法

DOI: 10.1002/cpsc.123

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32956572/

Journal: Current protocols in stem cell biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Dec

Abstract: Advances in human pluripotent stem cell (hPSC) techniques have led them to become a widely used and powerful tool for a vast array of applications, including disease modeling, developmental studies, drug discovery and testing, and emerging cell-based therapies. hPSC workflows that require clonal expansion from single cells, such as CRISPR/Cas9-mediated genome editing, face major challenges in terms of efficiency, cost, and precision. Classical sub-cloning approaches depend on limiting dilution and manual colony picking, which are both time-consuming and labor-intensive, and lack a real proof of clonality. Here we describe the application of three different automated cell isolation and dispensing devices that can enhance the single-cell cloning process for hPSCs. In combination with optimized cell culture conditions, these devices offer an attractive alternative compared to manual methods. We explore various aspects of each device system and define protocols for their practical application. Following the workflow described here, single cell-derived hPSC sub-clones from each system maintain pluripotency and genetic stability. Furthermore, the workflows can be applied to uncover karyotypic mosaicism prevalent in bulk hPSC cultures. Our robust automated workflow facilitates high-throughput hPSC clonal selection and expansion, urgently needed in the operational pipelines of hPSC applications. © 2020 The Authors. Basic Protocol: Efficient automated hPSC single cell seeding and clonal expansion using the iotaSciences IsoCell platform Alternate Protocol 1: hPSC single cell seeding and clonal expansion using the Cellenion CellenONE single-cell dispenser Alternate Protocol 2: hPSC single cell seeding and clonal expansion using the Cytena single-cell dispenser Support Protocol 1: Coating cell culture plates with Geltrex Support Protocol 2: hPSC maintenance in defined feeder-free conditions Support Protocol 3: hPSC passaging in clumps Support Protocol 4: Laminin 521 coating of IsoCell plates and 96-well/384-well plates Support Protocol 5: Preparation of medium containing anti-apoptotic small molecules Support Protocol 6: 96- and 384-well target plate preparation prior to single cell seeding Support Protocol 7: Single cell dissociation of hPSCs Support Protocol 8: IsoCell-, CellenONE-, and Cytena-derived hPSC clone subculture and expansion.

摘要: 人类多能干细胞（hPSC）技术的进步已使它们成为广泛应用且功能强大的工具，可用于多种应用，包括疾病建模，开发研究，药物发现和测试以及新兴的基于细胞的疗法。要求从单细胞克隆扩增的hPSC工作流程（例如CRISPR/Cas9介导的基因组编辑）在效率，成本和精度方面面临重大挑战。经典的亚克隆方法取决于有限的稀释度和人工菌落的挑选，这既费时又费力，并且缺乏真实的克隆证明。在这里，我们描述了三种不同的自动细胞分离和分配设备的应用，这些设备可以增强hPSC的单细胞克隆过程。结合优化的细胞培养条件，与手动方法相比，这些设备提供了有吸引力的替代方法。我们探索每个设备系统的各个方面，并为它们的实际应用定义协议。按照此处描述的工作流程，来自每个系统的单细胞来源hPSC亚克隆保持多能性和遗传稳定性。此外，该工作流程可用于发现散装hPSC培养物中普遍存在的核型嵌合体。我们强大的自动化工作流程可促进高通量hPSC克隆的选择和扩展，这是hPSC应用程序的运营管道中迫切需要的。©2020作者。基本协议：使用iotaSciencesIsoCell平台进行高效的自动hPSC单细胞接种和克隆扩增备用方案1：使用CellenionCellenONE单细胞分配器进行hPSC单细胞接种和克隆扩增备用方案2：使用Cytena进行hPSC单细胞接种和克隆扩增单细胞分配器支持方案1：用Geltrex包被细胞培养板支持方案2：在无饲养层的条件下维持hPSC支持方案3：hPSC在团块中传代支持方案4：IsoCell板和96孔/384的层粘连蛋白521涂层孔板支持方案5：制备含有抗凋亡小分子的培养基支持方案6：在单细胞接种之前制备96和384孔靶板支持方案7：hPSC的单细胞解离支持方案8：IsoCell-，CellenONE和Cytena衍生的hPSC克隆传代培养和扩增。

Pubmed_ID: 32956566

Dual Intramolecular Electron Transfer for In Situ Coreactant-Embedded Electrochemiluminescence Microimaging of Membrane Protein

分子内电子双转移技术在膜蛋白原位嵌入电化学发光微成像中的应用

DOI: 10.1002/anie.202011176

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32956566/

Journal: Angewandte Chemie (International ed. in English) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: The demand for transporting coreactant to emitter and short lifetime of the radicals in electrochemiluminescence (ECL) emission inhibit greatly its application in cytosensing and microscopic imaging. Herein we designed a dual intramolecular electron transfer strategy and tertiary amine conjugated polymer dots (TEA-Pdots) to develop a coreactant-embedded ECL mechanism and microimaging system. The TEA-Pdots could produce ECL emission at +1.2 V without need of coreactant in test solution. The superstructure and intramolecular electron transfer led to unprecedented ECL strength, which was 132 and 45 times stronger than those from the mixture of Pdots with TEA at equiv alent and 62.5 times higher amounts, respectively. The ECL efficiency was even higher than that of typical [Ru(bpy) 3 ] 2+ system. Therefore, this strategy and coreactant-embedded ECL system could be used for in situ ECL microimaging of membrane protein on single living cells without additional permeable treatment for transporting coreactant. The feasibility and validity were demonstrated by evaluating the specific protein expression on cell surface. This work opens new avenues for ECL applications in single cell analysis and dynamic study of biological events.

摘要: 电化学发光（ECL）发射中将共反应物转运至发射极的需求以及自由基的短寿命极大地抑制了其在细胞传感和显微成像中的应用。在本文中，我们设计了分子内电子转移的双重策略和叔胺共轭聚合物点（TEA-Pdots），以开发嵌入共反应剂的ECL机理和微成像系统。TEA-Pdots可以在+1.2V时产生ECL发射，而无需测试溶液中的共反应物。上层结构和分子内电子转移产生了前所未有的ECL强度，分别比等量和高62.5倍的Pdots与TEA混合物的ECL强度高132和45倍。ECL效率甚至高于典型的[Ru（bpy）3]2+系统。因此，这种策略和包埋有共反应物的ECL系统可用于单活细胞上膜蛋白的原位ECL显微成像，而无需额外的渗透处理来运输共反应物。通过评估细胞表面特异性蛋白表达证明了可行性和有效性。这项工作为单细胞分析和生物事件动态研究中的ECL应用开辟了新途径。

Pubmed_ID: 32956451

Comparative genomics of CXCR4MUT and CXCR4WT single cells in Waldenström's macroglobulinemia

Waldenström巨球蛋白血症中CXCR4MUT和CXCR4WT单细胞的比较基因组学

DOI: 10.1182/bloodadvances.2020001775

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32956451/

Journal: Blood advances {'ISSN': '2473-9529', 'Name': 'blood advances', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '', '': '', '2019': '4.584'}

Date: 09/22/2020

Abstract: Single-cell whole-genome amplification can be used to interrogate the genomic architecture of Waldenström’s macroglobulinemia.The mutational signature of CXCR4MUT cells may be associated with alterations in DNA repairing genes and tumor suppressors.

摘要: 单细胞全基因组扩增可用于询问Waldenström巨球蛋白血症的基因组结构。CXCR4MUT细胞的突变特征可能与DNA修复基因和肿瘤抑制因子的改变有关。

Pubmed_ID: 32956417

Sources of variation in cell-type RNA-Seq profiles

细胞型RNA-Seq谱图变异的来源

DOI: 10.1371/journal.pone.0239495

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32956417/

Journal: PloS one {'ISSN': '1932-6203', 'Name': 'plos one', '2015': '3.057', '2016': '2.806', '2017': '2.766', '2018': '2.776', '2019': '2.74'}

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Cell-type specific gene expression profiles are needed for many computational methods operating on bulk RNA-Seq samples, such as deconvolution of cell-type fractions and digital cytometry. However, the gene expression profile of a cell type can vary substantially due to both technical factors and biological differences in cell state and surroundings, reducing the efficacy of such methods. Here, we investigated which factors contribute most to this variation. We evaluated different normalization methods, quantified the variance explained by different factors, evaluated the effect on deconvolution of cell type fractions, and examined the differences between UMI-based single-cell RNA-Seq and bulk RNA-Seq. We investigated a collection of publicly available bulk and single-cell RNA-Seq datasets containing B and T cells, and found that the technical variation across laboratories is substantial, even for genes specifically selected for deconvolution, and this variation has a confounding effect on deconvolution. Tissue of origin is also a substantial factor, highlighting the challenge of using cell type profiles derived from blood with mixtures from other tissues. We also show that much of the differences between UMI-based single-cell and bulk RNA-Seq methods can be explained by the number of read duplicates per mRNA molecule in the single-cell sample. Our work shows the importance of either matching or correcting for technical factors when creating cell-type specific gene expression profiles that are to be used together with bulk samples.

摘要: 对于批量RNA-Seq样本进行操作的许多计算方法，例如细胞类型级分的反卷积和数字细胞术，都需要细胞类型特异性基因表达谱。但是，由于技术因素以及细胞状态和周围环境的生物学差异，细胞类型的基因表达谱可能会发生很大变化，从而降低了此类方法的功效。在这里，我们调查了哪些因素对这种变化的影响最大。我们评估了不同的归一化方法，量化了由不同因素解释的方差，评估了对细胞类型组分解卷积的影响，并检查了基于UMI的单细胞RNA-Seq和大体积RNA-Seq之间的差异。我们调查了包含B细胞和T细胞的可公开获得的大量和单细胞RNA-Seq数据集，发现即使对于专门为反卷积选择的基因，整个实验室的技术差异也很大，并且这种变异对反卷积具有混淆作用。组织来源也是一个重要因素，突显了将血液来源的细胞类型特征与其他组织的混合物一起使用所面临的挑战。我们还显示，基于UMI的单细胞和大体积RNA-Seq方法之间的许多差异可以通过单细胞样品中每个mRNA分子的重复读物数量来解释。我们的工作表明，在创建要与大量样品一起使用的细胞类型特异性基因表达谱时，匹配或校正技术因素非常重要。

Pubmed_ID: 32955981

Re: Regenerative Potential of Prostate Luminal Cells Revealed by Single-Cell Analysis

回复：单细胞分析显示前列腺发光细胞的再生潜力

DOI: 10.1097/JU.0000000000001285

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32955981/

Journal: The Journal of urology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32955565

SpaGE: Spatial Gene Enhancement using scRNA-seq

SpaGE：使用scRNA-seq进行空间基因增强

DOI: 10.1093/nar/gkaa740

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32955565/

Journal: Nucleic acids research {'ISSN': '0305-1048', 'Name': 'nucleic acids research', '2015': '9.202', '2016': '10.162', '2017': '11.561', '2018': '11.147', '2019': '11.501'}

Date: 10/09/2020

Abstract: Single-cell technologies are emerging fast due to their ability to unravel the heterogeneity of biological systems. While scRNA-seq is a powerful tool that measures whole-transcriptome expression of single cells, it lacks their spatial localization. Novel spatial transcriptomics methods do retain cells spatial information but some methods can only measure tens to hundreds of transcripts. To resolve this discrepancy, we developed SpaGE, a method that integrates spatial and scRNA-seq datasets to predict whole-transcriptome expressions in their spatial configuration. Using five dataset-pairs, SpaGE outperformed previously published methods and showed scalability to large datasets. Moreover, SpaGE predicted new spatial gene patterns that are confirmed independently using in situ hybridization data from the Allen Mouse Brain Atlas.

摘要: 单细胞技术由于能够揭示生物系统的异质性而迅速兴起。尽管scRNA-seq是一种功能强大的工具，可测量单个细胞的整个转录组表达，但它缺乏空间定位。新颖的空间转录组学方法确实保留了细胞的空间信息，但是某些方法只能测量数十到数百个转录本。为了解决这一差异，我们开发了SpaGE，该方法整合了空间和scRNA-seq数据集，以预测其空间配置中的整个转录组表达。SpaGE使用五个数据集对，其性能优于以前发布的方法，并显示了对大型数据集的可伸缩性。此外，SpaGE预测了使用来自AllenMouseBrainAtlas的原位杂交数据独立确认的新空间基因模式。

Pubmed_ID: 32955435

Genetic mapping of etiologic brain cell types for obesity

肥胖病因性脑细胞类型的遗传作图

DOI: 10.7554/eLife.55851

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32955435/

Journal: eLife {'ISSN': '2050-084x', 'Name': 'elife', '2015': '8.303', '2016': '7.725', '2017': '7.616', '2018': '7.551', '2019': '7.08'}

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: The underlying cell types mediating predisposition to obesity remain largely obscure. Here, we integrated recently published single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) data from 727 peripheral and nervous system cell types spanning 17 mouse organs with body mass index (BMI) genome-wide association study (GWAS) data from >457,000 individuals. Developing a novel strategy for integrating scRNA-seq data with GWAS data, we identified 26, exclusively neuronal, cell types from the hypothalamus, subthalamus, midbrain, hippocampus, thalamus, cortex, pons, medulla, pallidum that were significantly enriched for BMI heritability (p<1.6×10-4). Using genes harboring coding mutations associated with obesity, we replicated midbrain cell types from the anterior pretectal nucleus and periaqueductal gray (p<1.2×10-4). Together, our results suggest that brain nuclei regulating integration of sensory stimuli, learning and memory are likely to play a key role in obesity and provide testable hypotheses for mechanistic follow-up studies.

摘要: 介导肥胖易感性的基础细胞类型在很大程度上仍然不清楚。在这里，我们整合了来自727种周围和神经系统细胞类型（跨越17种小鼠器官）的最近发布的单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）数据，并结合了来自>457,000个个体的体重指数（BMI）全基因组关联研究（GWAS）数据。通过开发一种将scRNA-seq数据与GWAS数据整合的新策略，我们从下丘脑，丘脑下层，中脑，海马，丘脑，皮层，脑桥，延髓，苍白球中识别了26种神经元细胞类型（这些显着丰富了BMI的遗传力）p<1.6×10-4）。使用具有与肥胖相关的编码突变的基因，我们从前前棘核和导水管周围的灰色中复制了中脑细胞类型（p<1.2×10-4）。总之，我们的研究结果表明，调节感觉刺激，学习和记忆整合的脑核可能在肥胖症中起关键作用，并为机制的后续研究提供了可验证的假设。

Pubmed_ID: 32954948

An Atlas of Immune Cell Exhaustion in HIV-Infected Individuals Revealed by Single-Cell Transcriptomics

单细胞转录组学揭示的HIV感染个体的免疫细胞衰竭图集。

DOI: 10.1080/22221751.2020.1826361

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32954948/

Journal: Emerging microbes & infections {'ISSN': '2222-1751', 'Name': 'emerging microbes & infections', '2015': '4.012', '2016': '5.605', '2017': '6.032', '2018': '6.212', '2019': '5.776'}

Date: 09/19/2020

Abstract: Chronic infection with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) can cause progressive loss of immune cell function, or exhaustion, which impairs control of virus replication. However, little is known about the development and maintenance, as well as heterogeneity of immune cell exhaustion. Here, we investigated the effects of HIV infection on immune cell exhaustion at the transcriptomic level by analyzing single-cell RNA sequencing of peripheral blood mononuclear cells from four healthy subjects (37,847 cells) and six HIV-infected donors (28,610 cells). We identified nine immune cell clusters and eight T cell subclusters according to their unique gene expression programs; three of these (exhausted CD4+ and CD8+ T cells and interferon-responsive CD8+ T cells) were detected only in samples from HIV-infected donors. An inhibitory receptor KLRG1 was identified in the exhausted T cell populations and further characterized in HIV infected individuals. We identified a HIV-1 specific exhausted CD8+ T cell population expressing KLRG1, TIGIT, and T-betdimEomeshi markers. Ex-vivo antibody blockade of KLRG1 restored the function of HIV-specific exhausted CD8+ T cells demonstrating the contribution of KLRG1+ population to T cell exhaustion and providing an immunotherapy target to treat HIV chronic infection. Analysis of gene signatures also revealed impairment of B cell and NK cell function in HIV-infected donors. These data provide a comprehensive analysis of gene signatures associated with immune cell exhaustion during HIV infection, which could be useful in understanding exhaustion mechanisms and developing new cure therapies.

摘要: 人体免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）的慢性感染可导致免疫细胞功能的逐渐丧失或衰竭，从而削弱了对病毒复制的控制。然而，关于免疫细胞衰竭的发展和维持以及异质性知之甚少。在这里，我们通过分析来自四个健康受试者（37,847个细胞）和六个HIV感染供体（28,610个细胞）的外周血单个核细胞的单细胞RNA测序，在转录组学水平上研究了HIV感染对免疫细胞衰竭的影响。根据它们独特的基因表达程序，我们确定了9个免疫细胞簇和8个T细胞亚簇。仅在来自HIV感染供体的样本中检测到其中的三个（疲惫的CD4+和CD8+T细胞以及干扰素应答性CD8+T细胞）。在疲惫的T细胞群体中发现了抑制性受体KLRG1，并在HIV感染者中进一步表征。我们确定了表达KLRG1，TIGIT和T-betdimEomeshi标记的HIV-1特异性疲惫的CD8+T细胞。KLRG1的离体抗体阻断恢复了HIV特异性消耗的CD8+T细胞的功能，这证明了KLRG1+群体对T细胞衰竭的贡献，并提供了治疗HIV慢性感染的免疫治疗靶标。基因标记分析还显示，HIV感染供体的B细胞和NK细胞功能受损。这些数据提供了与HIV感染期间免疫细胞衰竭相关的基因特征的综合分析，这可能有助于理解疲劳机制和开发新的治疗方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32954419

Contribution of DNA adenine methylation to gene expression heterogeneity in Salmonella enterica

DNA腺嘌呤甲基化对肠沙门氏菌基因表达异质性的贡献

DOI: 10.1093/nar/gkaa730

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32954419/

Journal: Nucleic acids research {'ISSN': '0305-1048', 'Name': 'nucleic acids research', '2015': '9.202', '2016': '10.162', '2017': '11.561', '2018': '11.147', '2019': '11.501'}

Date: 09/21/2020

Abstract: Expression of Salmonella enterica loci harboring undermethylated GATC sites at promoters or regulatory regions was monitored by single cell analysis. Cell-to-cell differences in expression were detected in ten such loci (carA, dgoR, holA, nanA, ssaN, STM1290, STM3276, STM5308, gtr and opvAB), with concomitant formation of ON and OFF subpopulations. The ON and OFF subpopulation sizes varied depending on the growth conditions, suggesting that the population structure can be modulated by environmental control. All the loci under study except STM5308 displayed altered patterns of expression in strains lacking or overproducing Dam methylase, thereby confirming control by Dam methylation. Bioinformatic analysis identified potential binding sites for transcription factors OxyR, CRP and Fur, and analysis of expression in mutant backgrounds confirmed transcriptional control by one or more of such factors. Surveys of gene expression in pairwise combinations of Dam methylation-dependent loci revealed independent switching, thus predicting the formation of a high number of cell variants. This study expands the list of S. enterica loci under transcriptional control by Dam methylation, and underscores the relevance of the DNA adenine methylome as a source of phenotypic heterogeneity.

摘要: 通过单细胞分析监测在启动子或调节区中携带甲基化不足的GATC位点的肠炎沙门氏菌基因座的表达。在十个这样的基因座（carA，dgoR，holA，nanA，ssaN，STM1290，STM3276，STM5308，gtr和opvAB）中检测到细胞间表达差异，并同时形成了ON和OFF亚群。ON和OFF子种群的大小取决于生长条件，这表明可以通过环境控制来调节种群结构。除STM5308外，所有正在研究的基因座均在缺乏或过量产生Dam甲基化酶的菌株中表现出改变的表达模式，从而证实了Dam甲基化的控制。生物信息学分析确定了转录因子OxyR，CRP和Fur的潜在结合位点，突变背景中的表达分析证实了一种或多种此类因子对转录的控制。在Dam甲基化依赖性基因座的成对组合中对基因表达进行的调查显示独立的转换，从而预测了大量细胞变异的形成。这项研究扩大了通过达姆甲基化进行转录控制的肠炎链球菌基因的范围，并强调了DNA腺嘌呤甲基化作为表型异质性来源的相关性。

Pubmed_ID: 32952124

Transcriptome heterogeneity of porcine ear fibroblast and its potential influence on embryo development in nuclear transplantation

猪耳成纤维细胞转录组异质性及其对核移植胚胎发育的潜在影响

DOI: 10.16288/j.yczz.20-190

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32952124/

Journal: Yi chuan = Hereditas ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/20/2020

Abstract: There is heterogeneity among donor cells of the same source. Many studies have shown that donor cell affects the efficiency of somatic cell nuclear transfer (SCNT). However, the potential influence of donor cell heterogeneity on the efficiency of nuclear transplantation were rarely analyzed at the single-cell level. In this study, single-cell transcriptome sequencing was performed on 52 porcine ear fibroblasts randomly selected from the same source to compare their gene expression patterns. The results showed that 48 cells had similar gene expression patterns, whereas 4 cells (D11_1, D12_1, DW61_2, DW99_2) had significantly different gene expression patterns from those of other cells. There were no two cells with identical gene expression patterns. The gene expression patterns of D11_1, D12_1, DW61_2 and DW99_2 were analyzed, using the 48 cells with similar gene expression patterns as controls. Firstly, we used the R language statistics to select the differentially expressed genes in the 4 single cells, and identified the top 50 most significant differentially expressed genes. Then GO enrichment analysis and KEGG pathway analysis were performed on the differentially expressed genes. Enrichment analysis revealed that the main molecular functions of the differentially expressed genes included energy metabolism, protein metabolism and cell response to stimulation. The main pathways from KEGG enrichment were related to cell cycle, cell metabolism, and DNA replication. Finally, based on the above results and in consideration with the SCNT research progress, we discussed the potential effects of differential gene expression patterns of the 4 single cells on the embryonic development efficiency of nuclear transplantation. This study revealed transcriptional heterogeneity of porcine ear tissue fibroblasts and provided an effective method to analyze elite donor cells, thereby providing new ideas on improving the cloning efficiency of SCNT.

摘要: 同一来源的供体细胞之间存在异质性。许多研究表明供体细胞影响体细胞核转移（SCNT）的效率。但是，很少在单细胞水平上分析供体细胞异质性对核移植效率的潜在影响。在这项研究中，对从同一来源随机选择的52头猪耳成纤维细胞进行了单细胞转录组测序，以比较它们的基因表达模式。结果表明，48个细胞具有相似的基因表达模式，而4个细胞（D11_1，D12_1，DW61_2，DW99_2）的基因表达模式则与其他细胞明显不同。没有两个细胞具有相同的基因表达模式。使用具有相似基因表达模式的48个细胞作为对照，分析了D11_1，D12_1，DW61_2和DW99_2的基因表达模式。首先，我们使用R语言统计数据来选择4个单细胞中的差异表达基因，并鉴定出前50个最重要的差异表达基因。然后对差异表达的基因进行GO富集分析和KEGG途径分析。富集分析表明差异表达基因的主要分子功能包括能量代谢，蛋白质代谢和细胞对刺激的反应。KEGG富集的主要途径与细胞周期，细胞代谢和DNA复制有关。最后，基于上述结果并结合SCNT的研究进展，我们讨论了4种单细胞的差异基因表达模式对核移植胚胎发育效率的潜在影响。这项研究揭示了猪耳组织成纤维细胞的转录异质性，并提供了一种分析精英供体细胞的有效方法，从而为提高SCNT的克隆效率提供了新思路。

Pubmed_ID: 32951417

Enzyme-Regulated Peptide-Liquid Metal Hybrid Hydrogels as Cell Amber for Single-Cell Manipulation

酶调节肽-液体金属杂化水凝胶作为细胞琥珀用于单细胞操作。

DOI: 10.1021/acsami.0c13334

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32951417/

Journal: ACS applied materials & interfaces {'ISSN': '1944-8244', 'Name': 'acs applied materials & interfaces', '2015': '7.145', '2016': '7.504', '2017': '8.097', '2018': '8.456', '2019': '8.758'}

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Current strategies to construct cell-based bioartificial tissues largely remain on a multicell level. Taking cell diversity into account, single-cell manipulation is urgently needed for delicate bioartificial tissue construction. Current single-cell isolation and profiling techniques involve invasive processes and thus are not applicable for single-cell manipulation. Here, we managed to fabricate peptide-liquid metal hybrid hydrogels as "cell ambers" which were suitable for single-cell isolation as well as further handling. The successful preparation of uniform liquid metal nanoparticles allowed the fabrication of peptide-liquid metal hydrogel with excellent recovery property upon mechanical destruction. The alkaline phosphatase-instructed supramolecular self-assembly process allowed the formation of microhydrogel post-filling in the PDMS template. The co-culture of the hydrogel precursor and mammalian cells realized the embedding of cells into elastic hydrogels which were the so-called cell ambers. The cell ambers turned out to be biocompatible and capable of supporting cell survival. Aided with the micro-operating system and a laser scanning confocal microscope, we could arrange these as-prepared 3D single-cell ambers into various patterns as desired. Our strategy provided the possibility to manipulate a single cell, which served as a prototype of cell architecture toward cell-based bioartificial tissue construction.

摘要: 当前构建基于细胞的生物人工组织的策略大部分仍处于多细胞水平。考虑到细胞多样性，微细生物人工组织的构建迫切需要单细胞操作。当前的单细胞分离和分析技术涉及侵入性过程，因此不适用于单细胞操作。在这里，我们设法将肽-液体金属杂化水凝胶制造为“细胞琥珀”，适用于单细胞分离以及进一步处理。成功地制备均匀的液态金属纳米颗粒使得能够制备在机械破坏时具有优异的回收性能的肽-液态金属水凝胶。碱性磷酸酶指导的超分子自组装过程允许在PDMS模板中后填充微水凝胶。水凝胶前体与哺乳动物细胞的共培养实现了将细胞嵌入弹性水凝胶中，这些弹性水凝胶即所谓的细胞琥珀。细胞琥珀证明是生物相容性的，能够支持细胞存活。借助微操作系统和激光扫描共聚焦显微镜，我们可以根据需要将这些准备好的3D单细胞琥珀排列成各种图案。我们的策略提供了操纵单个细胞的可能性，该单个细胞是朝着基于细胞的生物人工组织构建的细胞结构原型。

Pubmed_ID: 32951040

Endosialin defines human stem Leydig cells with regenerative potential

Endosialin定义具有再生潜力的人干Leydig细胞

DOI: 10.1093/humrep/deaa174

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32951040/

Journal: Human reproduction (Oxford, England) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 10/01/2020

Abstract: Study question: Is endosialin a specific marker of human stem Leydig cells (SLCs) with the ability to differentiate into testosterone-producing Leydig cells (LCs) in vitro and in vivo? Summary answer: Endosialin is a specific marker of human SLCs which differentiate into testosterone-producing LCs in vitro and in vivo. What is known already: Human SLCs have been identified and isolated using the marker platelet-derived growth factor receptor α (PDGFRα) or nerve growth factor receptor (NGFR). However, the specificity was not high; thus, LCs and germ cells could be mistakenly sorted as SLCs if PDGFRα or NGFR was used as a marker for human SLCs isolation. Study design, size, duration: Firstly, we re-evaluated the specificity of PDGFRα and NGFR for SLCs in adult human testes. Then we analysed the previously published single-cell sequencing data and found that endosialin may identify human SLCs. Subsequently, we sorted endosialin+ cells from four human donors and characterized their self-renewal and multipotent properties. To assess whether endosialin+ cells have the potential to differentiate into functional LCs in vitro, these cells were stimulated by differentiation-inducing medium. We next assessed the in vivo regenerative potential of human endosialin+ cells after xenotransplantation into the testes of immunodeficient mice. Participants/materials, setting, methods: Single-cell sequencing analysis, immunofluorescence and flow cytometry were used to characterize human testis tissues. In vitro colony formation, multipotent differentiation (adipogenic, osteogenic and chondrogenic) and Leydig cell-lineage induction were used to assess stem cell activity. Xenotransplantation into 3-week-old immunodeficient mice was used to determine in vivo regenerative potential. Endpoint measures included testosterone measurements, cell proliferation, immunofluorescence, flow cytometry and quantitative RT-PCR. Main results and the role of chance: The results indicate that endosialin is a specific marker of SLCs compared with PDGFRα and NGFR. Additionally, endosialin+ cells isolated from human testes show extensive proliferation and differentiation potential in vitro: their self-renewal ability was inferred by the formation of spherical clones derived from a single cell. Moreover, these cells could differentiate into functional LCs that secreted testosterone in response to LH in a concentration-dependent manner in vitro. These self-renewal and differentiation properties reinforce the proposal that human testicular endosialin+ cells are SLCs. Furthermore, transplanted human endosialin+ cells appear to colonize the murine host testes, localize to peritubular and perivascular regions, proliferate measurably and differentiate partially into testosterone-producing LCs in vivo. Large scale data: NA. Limitations, reasons for caution: Owing to the difficulty in collecting human testis tissue, the sample size was limited. The functions of endosialin on SLCs need to be elucidated in future studies.
