Wider implications of the findings: A discriminatory marker, endosialin, for human SLCs purification is a prerequisite to advance research in SLCs and logically promote further clinical translation of SLCs-based therapies for male hypogonadism. Study funding/competing interest(s): A.P.X. was supported by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2017YFA0103802 and 2018YFA0107200). C.D. was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81971314) and the Natural Science Foundation of Guangdong Province, China (2018B030311039). The authors declare no conflict of interest.

摘要: 研究问题：内皮唾液酸蛋白是否是人类干睾丸间充质干细胞（SLC）的特异性标记物，能够在体外和体内分化为产生睾丸激素的Leydig细胞（LC）？简要答案：内皮糖苷是人SLC的特异性标记物，在体外和体内均可分化为产生睾丸激素的LC。已经知道：已经使用标记血小板衍生的生长因子受体α（PDGFRα）或神经生长因子受体（NGFR）鉴定并分离了人类SLC。但是，特异性不高。因此，如果将PDGFRα或NGFR用作人类SLC分离的标记物，则LC和生殖细胞可能会被错误地分类为SLC。研究设计，大小，持续时间：首先，我们重新评估了PDGFRα和NGFR对成人睾丸中SLC的特异性。然后，我们分析了先前发表的单细胞测序数据，发现内皮唾液酸蛋白可以鉴定人SLC。随后，我们对来自四个人类供体的内皮唾液酸蛋白+细胞进行了分类，并表征了它们的自我更新和多能性。为了评估内皮唾液酸蛋白+细胞是否具有体外分化为功能性LC的潜能，这些细胞被诱导分化的培养基刺激。接下来，我们评估了异种移植到免疫缺陷小鼠睾丸后人内皮唾液酸蛋白+细胞的体内再生潜力。参与者/材料，环境，方法：单细胞测序分析，免疫荧光和流式细胞仪用于表征人类睾丸组织。体外菌落形成，多能分化（脂肪形成，成骨和软骨形成）和Leydig细胞谱系诱导用于评估干细胞活性。将异种移植到3周龄的免疫缺陷小鼠中，以确定体内的再生潜力。终点测量包括睾丸激素测量，细胞增殖，免疫荧光，流式细胞仪和定量RT-PCR。主要结果和机会的作用：与PDGFRα和NGFR相比，内皮唾液酸蛋白是SLC的特异性标志物。此外，从人体睾丸分离出的内皮唾液酸蛋白+细胞在体外显示出广泛的增殖和分化潜力：它们的自我更新能力是通过形成源自单个细胞的球形克隆来推断的。此外，这些细胞可以在体外以浓度依赖性方式分化为功能性LC，这些功能性LC响应LH分泌睾丸激素。这些自我更新和分化特性加强了人睾丸内皮唾液酸蛋白+细胞是SLC的提议。此外，移植的人内皮唾液酸蛋白+细胞似乎定居在鼠宿主睾丸中，位于肾小管和血管周区域，可测量地增殖，并在体内部分分化为产生睾丸激素的LC。大规模数据：不适用。局限性，需要谨慎的原因：由于难以收集人体睾丸组织，因此样本量受到限制。内皮唾液酸蛋白在SLC上的功能需要在以后的研究中阐明。研究结果的广泛含义：用于人类SLC纯化的区分标记物内皮唾液酸蛋白是推进SLC研究并从逻辑上促进基于SLC的男性性腺功能减退疗法的临床翻译的先决条件。研究资金/竞争兴趣：A.P.X。获得了国家重点研究发展计划（2017YFA0103802和2018YFA0107200）的支持。光盘。由国家自然科学基金（81971314）和中国广东省自然科学基金（2018B030311039）资助。作者宣称没有利益冲突。

Pubmed_ID: 32951019

Quorum sensing controls persistence, resuscitation, and virulence of Legionella subpopulations in biofilms

群体感应控制生物膜中军团菌亚群的持久性，复苏和毒力

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-00774-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32951019/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/19/2020

Abstract: The water-borne bacterium Legionella pneumophila is the causative agent of Legionnaires' disease. In the environment, the opportunistic pathogen colonizes different niches, including free-living protozoa and biofilms. The physiological state(s) of sessile Legionella in biofilms and their functional consequences are not well understood. Using single-cell techniques and fluorescent growth rate probes as well as promoter reporters, we show here that sessile L. pneumophila exhibits phenotypic heterogeneity and adopts growing and nongrowing ("dormant") states in biofilms and microcolonies. Phenotypic heterogeneity is controlled by the Legionella quorum sensing (Lqs) system, the transcription factor LvbR, and the temperature. The Lqs system and LvbR determine the ratio between growing and nongrowing sessile subpopulations, as well as the frequency of growth resumption ("resuscitation") and microcolony formation of individual bacteria. Nongrowing L. pneumophila cells are metabolically active, express virulence genes and show tolerance toward antibiotics. Therefore, these sessile nongrowers are persisters. Taken together, the Lqs system, LvbR and the temperature control the phenotypic heterogeneity of sessile L. pneumophila, and these factors regulate the formation of a distinct subpopulation of nongrowing, antibiotic tolerant, virulent persisters. Hence, the biofilm niche of L. pneumophila has a profound impact on the ecology and virulence of this opportunistic pathogen.

摘要: 水性细菌军团杆菌是军团病的病原体。在环境中，机会病原体会定居于不同的生态位，包括自由生活的原生动物和生物膜。生物膜中无柄军团菌的生理状态及其功能后果尚不十分清楚。使用单细胞技术和荧光生长速率探针以及启动子报告基因，我们在这里显示了无梗的嗜肺乳杆菌表现出表型异质性，并在生物膜和微菌落中采用了生长和不生长（“休眠”）状态。表型异质性受军团菌群体感应（Lqs）系统，转录因子LvbR和温度控制。Lqs系统和LvbR确定生长的和不生长的无柄亚种群之间的比率，以及生长恢复的频率（“复苏”）和单个细菌的小菌落形成。非生长的嗜肺乳杆菌细胞具有代谢活性，表达毒性基因并显示出对抗生素的耐受性。因此，这些无柄的非种植者是坚持者。综上所述，Lqs系统，LvbR和温度控制无柄肺炎支原体的表型异质性，并且这些因素调节了不生长的，耐抗生素的，有毒力的持久性的独特亚群的形成。因此，嗜肺乳杆菌的生物膜生态位对该机会病原体的生态和毒力具有深远的影响。

Pubmed_ID: 32951011

Single-cell genomics to understand disease pathogenesis

单细胞基因组学，了解疾病的发病机理

DOI: 10.1038/s10038-020-00844-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32951011/

Journal: Journal of human genetics {'ISSN': '1434-5161', 'Name': 'journal of human genetics', '2015': '2.487', '2016': '2.471', '2017': '2.942', '2018': '3.545', '2019': '2.831'}

Date: 09/19/2020

Abstract: Cells are minimal functional units in biological phenomena, and therefore single-cell analysis is needed to understand the molecular behavior leading to cellular function in organisms. In addition, omics analysis technology can be used to identify essential molecular mechanisms in an unbiased manner. Recently, single-cell genomics has unveiled hidden molecular systems leading to disease pathogenesis in patients. In this review, I summarize the recent advances in single-cell genomics for the understanding of disease pathogenesis and discuss future perspectives.

摘要: 在生物学现象中，细胞是最小的功能单位，因此需要单细胞分析来了解导致生物体细胞功能的分子行为。此外，组学分析技术可以无偏见地用于识别基本分子机制。最近，单细胞基因组学揭示了导致患者疾病发病机理的隐藏分子系统。在这篇综述中，我总结了单细胞基因组学的最新进展，以了解疾病的发病机理，并讨论了未来的观点。

Pubmed_ID: 32950922

Mechanisms of cell specification and differentiation in vertebrate cranial sensory systems

脊椎动物颅骨感觉系统中细胞分化和分化的机制

DOI: 10.1016/j.ceb.2020.08.006

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32950922/

Journal: Current opinion in cell biology {'ISSN': '0955-0674', 'Name': 'current opinion in cell biology', '2015': '8.851', '2016': '9.937', '2017': '10.015', '2018': '8.233', '2019': '8.24'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Vertebrates sense a large variety of sensory stimuli that ranges from temperature, volatile and nonvolatile chemicals, touch, pain, light, sound and gravity. To achieve this, they use specialized cells present in sensory organs and cranial ganglia. Much of our understanding of the transcription factors and mechanisms responsible for sensory cell specification comes from cell-lineage tracing and genetic experiments in different species, but recent advances in single-cell transcriptomics, high-resolution imaging and systems biology approaches have allowed to study these processes in an unprecedented resolution. Here I will point to the transcription factor programs driving cell diversity in the different sensory organs of vertebrates to then discuss in vivo data of how cell specification is coupled with tissue morphogenesis.

摘要: 脊椎动物会感觉到各种各样的感觉刺激，包括温度，挥发性和非挥发性化学物质，触摸，疼痛，光线，声音和重力。为此，他们使用感觉器官和颅神经节中存在的专门细胞。我们对负责感觉细胞规范的转录因子和机制的大部分理解来自不同物种的细胞谱系追踪和遗传实验，但是单细胞转录组学，高分辨率成像和系统生物学方法的最新进展已允许研究这些以前所未有的分辨率进行处理。在这里，我将指出在脊椎动物的不同感觉器官中驱动细胞多样性的转录因子程序，然后讨论细胞规格与组织形态发生如何结合的体内数据。

Pubmed_ID: 32950921

A single-cell view of spermatogonial stem cells

精原干细胞的单细胞视图

DOI: 10.1016/j.ceb.2020.07.005

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32950921/

Journal: Current opinion in cell biology {'ISSN': '0955-0674', 'Name': 'current opinion in cell biology', '2015': '8.851', '2016': '9.937', '2017': '10.015', '2018': '8.233', '2019': '8.24'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Spermatogonial stem cells (SSCs) are essential for long-term spermatogenesis and are the subject of considerable clinical interest, as 'SSC therapy' has the potential to cure some forms of male infertility. Recently, we have learned more about SSCs and spermatogenesis in general from a plethora of studies that performed single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNAseq) analysis on dissociated cells from human, macaque, and/or mice testes. Here, we discuss what scRNAseq analysis has revealed about SSC precursor cells, the initial generation of SSCs during perinatal development, and their heterogeneity once established. scRNAseq studies have also uncovered unexpected heterogeneity of the larger class of cells that includes SSCs - undifferentiated spermatogonia. This raises the controversial possibility that multiple SSC subsets exist, which has implications for mechanisms underlying spermatogenesis and future SSC therapeutic approaches.

摘要: 精原干细胞（SSCs）对于长期的精子发生必不可少，并且具有相当大的临床意义，因为“SSC治疗”具有治愈某些形式的男性不育症的潜力。最近，我们从大量的研究中获得了更多关于SSC和精子发生的信息，这些研究对人，猕猴和/或小鼠睾丸的离体细胞进行了单细胞RNA测序（scRNAseq）分析。在这里，我们讨论scRNAseq分析揭示了关于SSC前体细胞，围产期发育期间SSC的初始生成以及一旦建立它们的异质性。scRNAseq研究还发现了包括SSC（未分化的精原细胞）在内的较大细胞类别的意外异质性。这引起了存在多个SSC亚组的争议性可能性，这对精子发生和未来SSC治疗方法的潜在机制具有影响。

Pubmed_ID: 32950684

Lipid-mediated innate lymphoid cell recruitment and activation in AERD

脂质介导的先天性淋巴样细胞募集和活化

DOI: 10.1016/j.anai.2020.09.011

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32950684/

Journal: Annals of allergy, asthma & immunology : official publication of the American College of Allergy, Asthma, & Immunology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Objective: To synthesize investigations into the role of lipid-mediated recruitment and activation of ILC2s in AERD. Data sources: A comprehensive literature review of reports pertaining to AERD cellular mechanisms, cytokine and lipid mediators in AERD, and ILC2 activation and recruitment was performed using PubMed and Google Scholar. Study selections: Selections of studies were based on reports of lipid mediators in AERD, cytokine mediators in AERD, type two effector cells in AERD, platelets in AERD, AERD treatment, ILC2s in allergic airway disease, and ILC2 activation, inhibition, and trafficking. Results: The precise mechanisms of AERD pathogenesis are not well understood. Greater levels of proinflammatory lipid mediators and type two cytokines are found in tissues derived from AERD patients relative to controls. Following pathognomonic COX-1 inhibitor reactions, pro-inflammatory mediator concentrations (prostaglandin D2 and cysteinyl leukotrienes) are rapidly increased, as are ILC2 levels in the nasal mucosa. ILC2s, which potently generate type 2 cytokines in response to lipid mediator stimulation, may play a key role in AERD pathogenesis. Conclusion: While the literature suggests that lipid-mediated ILC2 activation may occur in AERD, there is a dearth of definitive evidence. Future investigations leveraging novel next-generation single cell sequencing approaches along with recently developed AERD murine models will better define lipid mediator-induced ILC2 trafficking in patients with AERD.

摘要: 目的：综合研究脂质介导的ILC2s募集和激活在AERD中的作用。数据来源：使用PubMed和GoogleScholar对关于AERD细胞机制，AERD中的细胞因子和脂质介质以及ILC2激活和募集的报告进行了全面的文献综述。研究选择：选择研究的依据是：AERD中的脂质介体，AERD中的细胞因子介体，AERD中的两种效应细胞，AERD中的血小板，AERD治疗，过敏性气道疾病中的ILC2以及ILC2的激活，抑制和贩运。结果：AERD发病机理的确切机制尚不清楚。相对于对照，在源自AERD患者的组织中发现了更高水平的促炎脂质介体和2型细胞因子。继病原性COX-1抑制剂反应后，促炎介质（前列腺素D2和半胱氨酰白三烯）浓度迅速升高，鼻粘膜中的ILC2水平也迅速升高。响应脂质介体刺激而有效产生2型细胞因子的ILC2可能在AERD发病机理中起关键作用。结论：虽然文献表明脂质介导的ILC2活化可能发生在AERD中，但缺乏确凿的证据。利用新颖的下一代单细胞测序方法以及最近开发的AERD鼠模型进行的未来研究将更好地定义AERD患者中脂质介体诱导的ILC2转运。

Pubmed_ID: 32949770

Single-cell analyses of aging, inflammation and senescence

单细胞分析衰老，炎症和衰老

DOI: 10.1016/j.arr.2020.101156

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32949770/

Journal: Ageing research reviews {'ISSN': '1568-1637', 'Name': 'ageing research reviews', '2015': '7.526', '2016': '7.452', '2017': '8.973', '2018': '10.39', '2019': '10.616'}

Date: 09/16/2020

Abstract: Single-cell gene expression (transcriptomics) data are becoming robust and abundant, and are increasingly used to track organisms along their life-course. This allows investigation into how aging affects cellular transcriptomes, and how changes in transcriptomes may underlie aging, including chronic inflammation (inflammaging), immunosenescence and cellular senescence. We compiled and tabulated aging-related single-cell datasets published to date, collected and discussed relevant findings, and inspected some of these datasets ourselves. We specifically note insights that cannot (or not easily) be based on bulk data. For example, in some datasets, the fraction of cells expressing p16 (CDKN2A), one of the most prominent markers of cellular senescence, was reported to increase, in addition to its upregulated mean expression over all cells. Moreover, we found evidence for inflammatory processes in most datasets, some of these driven by specific cells of the immune system. Further, single-cell data are specifically useful to investigate whether transcriptional heterogeneity (also called noise or variability) increases with age, and many (but not all) studies in our review report an increase in such heterogeneity. Finally, we demonstrate some stability of marker gene expression patterns across closely similar studies and suggest that single-cell experiments may hold the key to provide detailed insights whenever interventions (countering aging, inflammation, senescence, disease, etc.) are affecting cells depending on cell type.

摘要: 单细胞基因表达（转录组学）数据正变得越来越强大和丰富，并且越来越多地用于跟踪生物的整个生命过程。这可以研究衰老如何影响细胞转录组，以及转录组的变化如何可能是衰老的基础，包括慢性炎症（发炎），免疫衰老和细胞衰老。我们编译并列出了迄今为止发布的与衰老相关的单细胞数据集，收集并讨论了相关发现，并亲自检查了其中一些数据集。我们特别注意无法（或不容易）基于批量数据的见解。例如，在某些数据集中，据报道表达p16（CDKN2A）（细胞衰老的最重要标志之一）的细胞比例除了在所有细胞上调的平均表达外，还在增加。此外，我们在大多数数据集中发现了炎症过程的证据，其中一些是由免疫系统的特定细胞驱动的。此外，单细胞数据对于研究转录异质性（也称为噪音或变异性）是否随年龄增加而特别有用，并且本综述中的许多（但并非全部）研究报告了这种异质性的增加。最后，我们在紧密相似的研究中证明了标记基因表达模式的稳定性，并建议单细胞实验可能是提供关键见解的关键，只要干预措施（应对衰老，炎症，衰老，疾病等）影响细胞，具体取决于单元格类型。

Pubmed_ID: 32949730

Exploring the early phase of Crohn's disease

探索克罗恩病的早期阶段

DOI: 10.1016/j.cgh.2020.09.023

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32949730/

Journal: Clinical gastroenterology and hepatology : the official clinical practice journal of the American Gastroenterological Association None

Date: 09/16/2020

Abstract: The development of Crohn's disease is characterized by a breakdown of homeostatic immune-bacterial communication, which takes place at the intestinal mucosa when environmental triggers impact genetically predisposed individuals. Converging lines of evidence support the hypothesis that this pathogenetic model develops through sequential, although interrelated, steps that indicate failure of mucosal defense mechanisms at various stages. In this context, immunological phenomena that mediate the initial appearance of inflammatory lesions across the intestinal tissue may substantially differ from those that mediate and perpetuate chronic inflammatory responses. A compromise in the integrity of the epithelial barrier is among the earliest events and leads to accelerated influx of intraluminal antigens and intact microorganisms within the immunologically rich lamina propria. Inadequate clearance of invading microorganisms may also occur due to defects in innate immunity, preventing the timely and complete resolution of acute inflammatory responses. The final step is the development of persistent adaptive responses, which also differ between early and late Crohn's disease. Current progress in our ability to delineate single cell transcriptomics and proteomics has allowed the discovery of cellular and molecular mechanisms that participate in each sequential step of CD development. This will not only advance our understanding of CD pathogenesis but also facilitate the design of targeted therapeutic approaches.

摘要: 克罗恩氏病的发展特征是稳态免疫细菌交流功能的破坏，当环境触发因素影响遗传易感个体时，这种免疫平衡会在肠道粘膜发生。越来越多的证据支持以下假设，即该病原学模型是通过相继但相互关联的步骤发展起来的，这些步骤表明了粘膜防御机制在各个阶段的失败。在这种情况下，介导整个肠组织炎症性损害的最初出现的免疫学现象可能与介导并持久慢性炎症反应的免疫学现象大不相同。上皮屏障完整性的损害是最早的事件之一，并导致腔内抗原和免疫完整的固有层内完整微生物的加速流入。由于先天免疫的缺陷，也可能发生入侵微生物清除不充分的情况，从而阻止了急性炎症反应的及时和完全解决。最后一步是发展持久的适应性反应，早期和晚期克罗恩病之间也有所不同。我们描述单细胞转录组学和蛋白质组学的能力的最新进展允许发现参与CD开发的每个顺序步骤的细胞和分子机制。这不仅将增进我们对CD发病机理的了解，而且将有助于设计靶向治疗方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32949589

A Cellular Potts energy-based approach to analyse the influence of the surface topography on single cell motility

基于Cellts Potts能量的方法，用于分析表面形貌对单细胞运动的影响

DOI: 10.1016/j.jtbi.2020.110487

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32949589/

Journal: Journal of theoretical biology {'ISSN': '0022-5193', 'Name': 'journal of theoretical biology', '2015': '2.049', '2016': '2.113', '2017': '1.833', '2018': '1.875', '2019': '2.327'}

Date: 09/16/2020

Abstract: The surface shape is an important aspect to take into account to ensure the success of an implant. At the cellular scale level, the cell behaviour, especially its migration, is affected by the specificities of the surface of the substrate, such as the stiffness of the surface and its roughness topography. The latter has been shown to have a great impact on various cell mechanisms, such as the cell adhesion, migration, or proliferation. In fact, the mere presence of micro roughness leads to an improvement of those mechanisms, with a better integration of the implants. However, the phenomena behind those improvements are still not clear. In this paper, we propose a three-dimensional (3D) model of a single cell migration using a Cellular Potts (CP) model to study the influence of the surface topography on cell motility. To do so, various configurations were tested, such as: (i) a substrate with a random roughness, (ii) a substrate with a rectangular groove pattern (parallel and perpendicular to the direction of motion), (ii) a substrate with a sinusoidal groove pattern. To evaluate the influence of the surface topography on cell motility, for each configuration, the cell speed and shape as well as the contact surface between the cell and the substrate have been quantified. Our numerical results demonstrate that, in agreement with the experimental observations of the literature, the substrate topography has an influence on the cell efficiency (i.e. cell speed), orientation and shape. Besides, we also show that the increase of the contact surface alone in presence of roughness is not enough to explain the improvement of cell migration on the various rough surfaces. Finally, we highlight the importance of the roughness dimension on cell motility. This could be a critical aspect to consider for further analyses and applications, such as surface treatments for medical applications.

摘要: 表面形状是确保植入成功的重要考虑因素。在细胞规模的水平上，细胞的行为，特别是其迁移，受基底表面的特异性（例如表面的硬度及其粗糙度）影响。已显示后者对各种细胞机制（例如细胞粘附，迁移或增殖）有很大影响。实际上，仅存在微小的粗糙度就可以改善这些机理，并更好地整合植入物。但是，这些改进背后的现象仍不清楚。在本文中，我们提出了使用CellularPotts（CP）模型的单细胞迁移的三维（3D）模型，以研究表面形貌对细胞运动性的影响。为此，测试了各种配置，例如：（i）具有随机粗糙度的基板，（ii）具有矩形凹槽图案（平行于垂直于运动方向）的基板，（ii）具有矩形凹槽图案的基板。正弦形凹槽图案。为了评估表面形貌对细胞运动性的影响，对于每种配置，已经对细胞速度和形状以及细胞与底物之间的接触表面进行了量化。我们的数值结果表明，与文献的实验观察结果一致，衬底的形貌对电池效率（即，电池速度），取向和形状有影响。此外，我们还表明，仅在存在粗糙度的情况下接触表面的增加不足以解释在各种粗糙表面上细胞迁移的改善。最后，我们强调了粗糙度尺寸对细胞运动的重要性。对于进一步的分析和应用（例如医疗应用的表面处理），这可能是要考虑的关键方面。

Pubmed_ID: 32949498

Generation of a p16 Reporter Mouse and Its Use to Characterize and Target p16 high Cells In Vivo

p16记者鼠标的产生及其在体内表征和靶向p16高细胞的用途

DOI: 10.1016/j.cmet.2020.09.006

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32949498/

Journal: Cell metabolism {'ISSN': '1550-4131', 'Name': 'cell metabolism', '2015': '17.303', '2016': '18.164', '2017': '20.565', '2018': '22.415', '2019': '21.567'}

Date: 09/11/2020

Abstract: Cell senescence plays a key role in age-associated organ dysfunction, but the in vivo pathogenesis is largely unclear. Here, we generated a p16-CreERT2-tdTomato mouse model to analyze the in vivo characteristics of p16high cells at a single-cell level. We found tdTomato-positive p16high cells detectable in all organs, which were enriched with age. We also found that these cells failed to proliferate and had half-lives ranging from 2.6 to 4.2 months, depending on the tissue examined. Single-cell transcriptomics in the liver and kidneys revealed that p16high cells were present in various cell types, though most dominant in hepatic endothelium and in renal proximal and distal tubule epithelia, and that these cells exhibited heterogeneous senescence-associated phenotypes. Further, elimination of p16high cells ameliorated nonalcoholic steatohepatitis-related hepatic lipidosis and immune cell infiltration. Our new mouse model and single-cell analysis provide a powerful resource to enable the discovery of previously unidentified senescence functions in vivo.

摘要: 细胞衰老在与年龄有关的器官功能障碍中起着关键作用，但是体内的发病机理在很大程度上尚不清楚。在这里，我们生成了一个p16-CreERT2-tdTomato小鼠模型，以在单细胞水平上分析p16high细胞的体内特征。我们发现在所有器官中都可检测到tdTomato阳性p16high细胞，这些细胞随着年龄的增长而增加。我们还发现，这些细胞无法增殖，半衰期为2.6到4.2个月不等，具体取决于所检查的组织。肝和肾中的单细胞转录组学揭示了p16high细胞存在于各种细胞类型中，尽管在肝内皮以及肾近端和远端小管上皮细胞中占主导地位，并且这些细胞表现出异质的衰老相关表型。此外，消除p16high细胞改善了非酒精性脂肪性肝炎相关的肝脂质增生和免疫细胞浸润。我们的新小鼠模型和单细胞分析提供了强大的资源，可以在体内发现以前未鉴定的衰老功能。

Pubmed_ID: 32949350

Serial single-cell profiling analysis of metastatic TNBC during Nab-paclitaxel and pembrolizumab treatment

Nab-紫杉醇和派姆单抗治疗期间转移性TNBC的系列单细胞分析

DOI: 10.1007/s10549-020-05936-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32949350/

Journal: Breast cancer research and treatment {'ISSN': '0167-6806', 'Name': 'breast cancer research and treatment', '2015': '4.085', '2016': '3.626', '2017': '3.605', '2018': '3.471', '2019': '3.831'}

Date: 09/19/2020

Abstract: Purpose: Immunotherapy has recently been shown to improve outcomes for advanced PD-L1-positive triple-negative breast cancer (TNBC) in the Impassion130 trial, leading to FDA approval of the first immune checkpoint inhibitor in combination with taxane chemotherapy. To further develop predictive biomarkers and improve therapeutic efficacy of the combination, interrogation of the tumor immune microenvironment before therapy as well as during each component of treatment is crucial. Here we use single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) on tumor biopsies to assess immune cell changes from two patients with advanced TNBC treated in a prospective trial at predefined serial time points, before treatment, on taxane chemotherapy and on chemo-immunotherapy. Methods: Both patients (one responder and one progressor) received the trial therapy, in cycle 1 nab-paclitaxel given as single agent, in cycle 2 nab-paclitaxel in combination with pembrolizumab. Tumor core biopsies were obtained at baseline, 3 weeks (after cycle 1, chemotherapy alone) and 6 weeks (after cycle 2, chemo-immunotherapy). Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) of both cancer cells and infiltrating immune cells isolated were performed from fresh tumor core biopsy specimens by 10 × chromium sequencing. Results: ScRNA-seq analysis showed significant baseline heterogeneity of tumor-infiltrating immune cell populations between the two patients as well as modulation of the tumor microenvironment by chemotherapy and immunotherapy. In the responding patient there was a population of PD-1high-expressing T cells which significantly decreased after nab-paclitaxel plus pembrolizumab treatment as well as a presence of tissue-resident memory T cells (TRM). In contrast, tumors from the patient with rapid disease progression showed a prevalent and persistent myeloid compartment. Conclusions: Our study provides a deep cellular analysis of on-treatment changes during chemo-immunotherapy for advanced TNBC, demonstrating not only feasibility of single-cell analyses on serial tumor biopsies but also the heterogeneity of TNBC and differences in on-treatment changes in responder versus progressor.

摘要: 目的：最近在Impassion130试验中显示，免疫疗法可改善晚期PD-L1阳性三阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）的结局，从而导致FDA批准首个免疫检查点抑制剂与紫杉烷类化学疗法联合使用。为了进一步开发预测性生物标志物并提高组合的治疗功效，在治疗之前以及治疗的每个组成部分中询问肿瘤免疫微环境至关重要。在这里，我们对肿瘤活检使用单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq），以评估在前瞻性试验中在治疗前，紫杉烷化学疗法和化学免疫疗法上在前瞻性试验中治疗的两名晚期TNBC患者的免疫细胞变化。方法：两名患者（一名反应者和一名进展者）均接受了试验治疗，第1周期nab-紫杉醇作为单药，第2周期nab-紫杉醇与pembrolizumab联用。在基线，3周（仅在第1轮化疗后）和6周（在第2轮以后，化学免疫疗法）进行肿瘤核心活检。从新鲜的肿瘤核心活检标本中通过10×铬测序对癌细胞和浸润的免疫细胞进行单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）。结果：ScRNA-seq分析显示出两名患者之间肿瘤浸润免疫细胞群的基线异质性显着，以及通过化学疗法和免疫疗法对肿瘤微环境的调节。在有反应的患者中，存在PD-1高表达的T细胞，其在纳布-紫杉醇联合派姆单抗治疗后显着减少，并且存在组织驻留记忆T细胞（TRM）。相反，疾病进展迅速的患者的肿瘤表现出普遍且持续的髓样区室。结论：我们的研究为晚期TNBC的化学免疫治疗过程中的治疗变化提供了深入的细胞分析，不仅证明了对连续肿瘤活检进行单细胞分析的可行性，而且证明了TNBC的异质性和应答者治疗变化的差异与进度器。

Pubmed_ID: 32949099

Defining the dimensions of circulating tumor cells in a large series of breast, prostate, colon, and bladder cancer patients

定义一系列乳腺癌，前列腺癌，结肠癌和膀胱癌患者中循环肿瘤细胞的大小

DOI: 10.1002/1878-0261.12802

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32949099/

Journal: Molecular oncology {'ISSN': '1574-7891', 'Name': 'molecular oncology', '2015': '5.367', '2016': '5.314', '2017': '5.264', '2018': '5.962', '2019': '6.574'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Circulating tumor cells (CTCs) in the blood of cancer patients are of high clinical relevance. Since detection and isolation of CTCs often rely on cell dimensions, knowledge of their size is key. We analyzed the median CTC size in a large cohort of breast (BC), prostate (PC), colorectal (CRC), and bladder (BLC) cancer patients. Images of patient-derived CTCs acquired on cartridges of the FDA-cleared CellSearch® method were retrospectively collected and automatically re-analyzed using the accept software package. The median CTC diameter (μm) was computed per tumor type. The size differences between the different tumor types and references (tumor cell lines and leukocytes) were nonparametrically tested. A total of 1962 CellSearch® cartridges containing 71 612 CTCs were included. In BC, the median computed diameter (CD) of patient-derived CTCs was 12.4 μm vs 18.4 μm for cultured cell line cells. For PC, CDs were 10.3 μm for CTCs vs 20.7 μm for cultured cell line cells. CDs for CTCs of CRC and BLC were 7.5 μm and 8.6 μm, respectively. Finally, leukocytes were 9.4 μm. CTC size differed statistically significantly between the four tumor types and between CTCs and the reference data. CTC size differences between tumor types are striking and CTCs are smaller than cell line tumor cells, whose size is often used as reference when developing CTC analysis methods. Based on our data, we suggest that the size of CTCs matters and should be kept in mind when designing and optimizing size-based isolation methods.

摘要: 癌症患者血液中的循环肿瘤细胞（CTC）具有高度的临床意义。由于CTC的检测和隔离通常取决于细胞大小，因此了解其大小至关重要。我们分析了一大群乳腺癌（BC），前列腺癌（PC），结直肠癌（CRC）和膀胱癌（BLC）患者的CTC大小中位数。回顾性收集通过FDA批准的CellSearch®方法的药盒获取的患者源CTC的图像，并使用accept软件包自动进行重新分析。计算每种肿瘤类型的CTC直径中值（μm）。非参数测试了不同肿瘤类型和参照物（肿瘤细胞系和白细胞）之间的大小差异。总共包括1962个CellSearch®试剂盒，其中包含71612个CTC。在BC省，患者来源的CTC的中值计算直径（CD）为12.4μm，而培养的细胞系细胞为18.4μm。对于PC，CTC的CD为10.3μm，而培养的细胞系细胞为20.7μm。CRC和BLC的CTC的CD分别为7.5μm和8.6μm。最后，白细胞为9.4μm。CTC大小在四种肿瘤类型之间以及CTC和参考数据之间在统计学上有显着差异。肿瘤类型之间的CTC大小差异惊人，CTC小于细胞系肿瘤细胞，在开发CTC分析方法时，其大小通常用作参考。根据我们的数据，我们建议在设计和优化基于大小的隔离方法时应注意CTC的大小。

Pubmed_ID: 32948838

Multi-omics study for interpretation of genome-wide association study

用于解释全基因组关联研究的多组学研究

DOI: 10.1038/s10038-020-00842-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32948838/

Journal: Journal of human genetics {'ISSN': '1434-5161', 'Name': 'journal of human genetics', '2015': '2.487', '2016': '2.471', '2017': '2.942', '2018': '3.545', '2019': '2.831'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Genome-wide association studies (GWASs) have identified thousands of genetic loci associated with complex traits, including a wide variety of diseases. Despite the successful identification of associated loci, interpreting GWAS findings remains challenging and requires other biological resources. Omics, including genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, and epigenomics, are increasingly used in a broad range of research fields. Integrative analyses applying GWAS with these omics data are expected to expand our knowledge of complex traits and provide insight into the pathogenesis of complex diseases and their causative factors. Recently, associations between genetic variants and omics data have been comprehensively evaluated, providing new information on the influence of genetic variants on omics. Furthermore, recent advances in analytic methods, including single-cell technologies, have revealed previously unknown disease mechanisms. To advance our understanding of complex traits, integrative analysis using GWAS with multi-omics data is needed. In this review, I describe successful examples of integrative analyses based on omics and GWAS, discuss the limitations of current multi-omics analyses, and provide a perspective on future integrative studies.

摘要: 全基因组关联研究（GWAS）已鉴定出数千个与复杂性状相关的遗传基因座，其中包括多种疾病。尽管成功地确定了相关基因座，但解释GWAS结果仍然具有挑战性，并且需要其他生物资源。包括基因组学，转录组学，蛋白质组学，代谢组学和表观基因组学在内的组学越来越广泛地用于研究领域。将GWAS与这些组学数据一起应用的综合分析有望扩展我们对复杂性状的了解，并提供对复杂疾病的发病机理及其病因的见解。最近，已经全面评估了遗传变异与组学数据之间的关联，为遗传变异对组学的影响提供了新的信息。此外，包括单细胞技术在内的分析方法的最新进展揭示了以前未知的疾病机制。为了增进我们对复杂特征的理解，需要使用GWAS和多组学数据进行综合分析。在这篇综述中，我描述了基于组学和GWAS的综合分析的成功实例，讨论了当前的多组学分析的局限性，并为未来的综合研究提供了一个视角。

Pubmed_ID: 32948797

Decoding mitochondrial heterogeneity in single muscle fibres by imaging mass cytometry

通过成像细胞计数法解码单条肌纤维中的线粒体异质性

DOI: 10.1038/s41598-020-70885-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32948797/

Journal: Scientific reports {'ISSN': '2045-2322', 'Name': 'scientific reports', '2015': '5.228', '2016': '4.259', '2017': '4.122', '2018': '4.011', '2019': '3.998'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: The study of skeletal muscle continues to support the accurate diagnosis of mitochondrial disease and remains important in delineating molecular disease mechanisms. The heterogeneous expression of oxidative phosphorylation proteins and resulting respiratory deficiency are both characteristic findings in mitochondrial disease, hence the rigorous assessment of these at a single cell level is incredibly powerful. Currently, the number of proteins that can be assessed in individual fibres from a single section by immunohistochemistry is limited but imaging mass cytometry (IMC) enables the quantification of further, discrete proteins in individual cells. We have developed a novel workflow and bespoke analysis for applying IMC in skeletal muscle biopsies from patients with genetically-characterised mitochondrial disease, investigating the distribution of nine mitochondrial proteins in thousands of single muscle fibres. Using a semi-automated analysis pipeline, we demonstrate the accurate quantification of protein levels using IMC, providing an accurate measure of oxidative phosphorylation deficiency for complexes I-V at the single cell level. We demonstrate signatures of oxidative phosphorylation deficiency for common mtDNA variants and nuclear-encoded complex I variants and a compensatory upregulation of unaffected oxidative phosphorylation components. This technique can now be universally applied to evaluate a wide range of skeletal muscle disorders and protein targets.

摘要: 骨骼肌的研究继续支持线粒体疾病的准确诊断，并且在描述分子疾病机制中仍然很重要。氧化磷酸化蛋白的异质表达和导致的呼吸不足都是线粒体疾病的特征性发现，因此在单个细胞水平上对这些蛋白进行严格的评估非常有效。当前，可以通过免疫组织化学从单个切片评估的单个纤维中蛋白质的数量有限，但是成像质量细胞计数法（IMC）可以量化单个细胞中其他离散蛋白质的数量。我们已经开发出一种新颖的工作流程和定制分析，用于将IMC应用于遗传特征性线粒体疾病患者的骨骼肌活检中，研究九种线粒体蛋白在成千上万的单条肌纤维中的分布。使用半自动化的分析流程，我们证明了使用IMC进行蛋白质水平的准确定量，为单个细胞水平上复合物I-V的氧化磷酸化缺乏提供了准确的量度。我们证明了常见的mtDNA变体和核编码的复杂I变体的氧化磷酸化缺乏的标志，以及未受影响的氧化磷酸化成分的补偿性上调。现在，该技术可以普遍用于评估各种骨骼肌疾病和蛋白质靶标。

Pubmed_ID: 32948690

Transcription factor expression defines subclasses of developing projection neurons highly similar to single-cell RNA-seq subtypes

转录因子表达定义了与单细胞RNA-seq亚型高度相似的发育中投影神经元的亚类

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2008013117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32948690/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 10/06/2020

Abstract: We are only just beginning to catalog the vast diversity of cell types in the cerebral cortex. Such categorization is a first step toward understanding how diversification relates to function. All cortical projection neurons arise from a uniform pool of progenitor cells that lines the ventricles of the forebrain. It is still unclear how these progenitor cells generate the more than 50 unique types of mature cortical projection neurons defined by their distinct gene-expression profiles. Moreover, exactly how and when neurons diversify their function during development is unknown. Here we relate gene expression and chromatin accessibility of two subclasses of projection neurons with divergent morphological and functional features as they develop in the mouse brain between embryonic day 13 and postnatal day 5 in order to identify transcriptional networks that diversify neuron cell fate. We compare these gene-expression profiles with published profiles of single cells isolated from similar populations and establish that layer-defined cell classes encompass cell subtypes and developmental trajectories identified using single-cell sequencing. Given the depth of our sequencing, we identify groups of transcription factors with particularly dense subclass-specific regulation and subclass-enriched transcription factor binding motifs. We also describe transcription factor-adjacent long noncoding RNAs that define each subclass and validate the function of Myt1l in balancing the ratio of the two subclasses in vitro. Our multidimensional approach supports an evolving model of progressive restriction of cell fate competence through inherited transcriptional identities.

摘要: 我们才刚刚开始对大脑皮层中多种细胞类型进行分类。这种分类是了解多元化与功能之间关系的第一步。所有皮质投射神经元均来自在前脑室内衬的祖细胞的统一池。尚不清楚这些祖细胞如何产生其独特的基因表达谱所定义的50多种独特类型的成熟皮层投射神经元。此外，尚不清楚神经元在发育过程中如何以及何时使其功能多样化。在这里，我们将投射神经元的两个子类的基因表达和染色质可访问性联系在一起，因为它们在胚胎第13天到出生后第5天之间在小鼠大脑中发育，因此具有不同的形态和功能特征，以便确定使神经元细胞命运多样化的转录网络。我们将这些基因表达谱与从相似种群中分离出的单个细胞的已发表谱进行比较，并确定层定义的细胞类别涵盖了使用单细胞测序鉴定的细胞亚型和发育轨迹。鉴于测序的深度，我们确定了具有特别密集的亚类特异性调节和富含亚类的转录因子结合基序的转录因子组。我们还描述了转录因子相邻的长非编码RNA，它们定义了每个亚类并验证了Myt11在平衡两个亚类的比率时的功能。我们的多维方法支持通过继承的转录身份逐步限制细胞命运能力的进化模型。

Pubmed_ID: 32948676

Biological role of arrestin-1 oligomerization

抑制蛋白1寡聚化的生物学作用

DOI: 10.1523/JNEUROSCI.0749-20.2020

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32948676/

Journal: The Journal of neuroscience : the official journal of the Society for Neuroscience ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Members of the arrestin superfamily have great propensity of self-association, but the physiological significance of this phenomenon is unclear. To determine the biological role of visual arrestin-1 oligomerization in rod photoreceptors, we expressed mutant arrestin-1 with severely impaired self-association in mouse rods and analyzed mice of both sexes. We show that the oligomerization-deficient mutant is capable of quenching rhodopsin signaling normally, as judged by electroretinography and single cell recording. Like wild type, mutant arrestin-1 is largely excluded from the outer segments in the dark, proving that the normal intracellular localization is not due the size exclusion of arrestin-1 oligomers. In contrast to wild type, supra-physiological expression of the mutant causes shortening of the outer segments and photoreceptor death. Thus, oligomerization reduces the cytotoxicity of arrestin-1 monomer, ensuring long-term photoreceptor survival.SIGNIFICANCE STATEMENTVisual arrestin-1 forms dimers and tetramers. The biological role of its oligomerization is unclear. To test the role of arrestin-1 self-association, we expressed oligomerization-deficient mutant in arrestin-1 knockout mice. The mutant quenches light-induced rhodopsin signaling like wild type, demonstrating that in vivo monomeric arrestin-1 is necessary and sufficient for this function. In rods arrestin-1 moves from the inner segments and cell bodies in the dark to the outer segments in the light. Non-oligomerizing mutant undergoes the same translocation, demonstrating that the size of the oligomers is not the reason for arrestin-1 exclusion from the outer segments in the dark. High expression of oligomerization-deficient arrestin-1 resulted in rod death. Thus, oligomerization reduces the cytotoxicity of high levels of arrestin-1 monomer.

摘要: 抑制蛋白超家族成员具有很大的自我交往倾向，但是这种现象的生理学意义尚不清楚。为了确定视觉抑制素-1寡聚化在杆感光细胞中的生物学作用，我们在小鼠杆中表达了突变型抑制素-1，其自缔合严重受损，并分析了两性小鼠。我们显示，寡聚化缺陷型突变体能够正常地淬灭视紫红质信号，如通过视网膜电图和单细胞记录判断。像野生型一样，突变的抑制蛋白1在黑暗中被大部分排除在外层，这证明正常的细胞内定位不是由于抑制蛋白1寡聚体的大小被排除。与野生型相反，突变体的超生理表达导致外部区段的缩短和光感受器死亡。因此，低聚反应降低了抑制蛋白1的细胞毒性，确保了光受体的长期存活。意义声明可视抑制蛋白1形成了二聚体和四聚体。其低聚的生物学作用尚不清楚。为了测试restarin-1自缔合的作用，我们在restarin-1基因敲除小鼠中表达了低聚缺陷突变体。该突变体淬灭了光诱导的视紫红质信号转导，如野生型，表明体内的单体抑制蛋白-1对这种功能是必要和充分的。在棒中，抑制素-1从黑暗中的内部片段和细胞体移动到光照下的外部片段。非寡聚突变体经历了相同的易位，这表明寡聚体的大小并不是阻止其在黑暗中从外部片段中排斥抑制蛋白-1的原因。寡聚化缺陷的抑制蛋白-1的高表达导致杆死亡。因此，低聚反应降低了高水平的抑制蛋白-1单体的细胞毒性。

Pubmed_ID: 32948520

Competence-stimulating peptide-dependent localized cell death and extracellular DNA production in Streptococcus mutans biofilms

变形链球菌生物膜中刺激能力的肽依赖性局部细胞死亡和细胞外DNA产生

DOI: 10.1128/AEM.02080-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32948520/

Journal: Applied and environmental microbiology {'ISSN': '0099-2240', 'Name': 'applied and environmental microbiology', '2015': '3.823', '2016': '3.807', '2017': '3.633', '2018': '4.077', '2019': '4.016'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Extracellular DNA (eDNA) is a biofilm component that contributes to the formation and structural stability of biofilms. Streptococcus mutans, a major cariogenic bacterium, induces eDNA-dependent biofilm formation under specific conditions. Since cell death can result in the release and accumulation of DNA, the dead cells in biofilms are a source of eDNA. However, it remains unknown how eDNA is released from dead cells and is localized within S. mutans biofilms. We focused on cell death induced by the extracellular signaling peptide, competence-stimulating peptide (CSP). We demonstrate that nucleic acid release into the extracellular environment occurs in a subpopulation of dead cells. eDNA production induced by CSP was highly dependent on the lytF gene, which encodes an autolysin. Although lytF expression was induced bimodally by CSP, lytF-expressing cells further divided into surviving cells and eDNA-producing dead cells. Moreover, we found that lytF-expressing cells were abundant near the bottom of the biofilm, even when all cells in the biofilm received the CSP signal. Dead cells and eDNA were also abundantly present near the bottom of the biofilm. The number of lytF-expressing cells in biofilms was significantly higher than that in planktonic cultures, which suggests that adhesion to the substratum surface is important for the induction of lytF expression. The deletion of lytF resulted in reduced adherence to a polystyrene surface. These results suggest that lytF expression and eDNA production induced near the bottom of the biofilm contribute to a firmly attached and structurally stable biofilm.Importance Bacterial communities encased by self-produced extracellular polymeric substances (EPSs), known as biofilms, have a wide influence on human health and environmental problems. The importance of biofilm research has increased as biofilms are the preferred bacterial lifestyle in nature. Furthermore, in recent years, due to the contribution of phenotypic heterogeneity within biofilms to their characteristics, analysis at the single-cell or subpopulation level is required to understand bacterial life strategies. In Streptococcus mutans, a cariogenic bacterium, extracellular DNA (eDNA) contributes to biofilm formation. However, it remains unclear how and where the cells produce eDNA within the biofilm. We focused on LytF, an autolysin that is induced by extracellular peptide signals. We used single-cell level imaging techniques to analyze lytF expression in the biofilm population. Here, we show that S. mutans generates eDNA by inducing lytF expression near the bottom of the biofilm, thereby enhancing biofilm adhesion and structural stability.

摘要: 细胞外DNA（eDNA）是生物膜的组成部分，有助于生物膜的形成和结构稳定性。变形链球菌是一种主要的致癌细菌，在特定条件下可诱导eDNA依赖性生物膜形成。由于细胞死亡会导致DNA的释放和积累，因此生物膜中的死细胞是eDNA的来源。然而，如何从死亡细胞释放eDNA以及如何在变形链球菌生物膜中定位eDNA仍然是未知的。我们专注于由细胞外信号肽，能力刺激肽（CSP）诱导的细胞死亡。我们证明了释放到细胞外环境中的核酸发生在死亡细胞的亚群中。CSP诱导的eDNA产生高度依赖lytF基因，该基因编码自溶素。尽管lytF表达是由CSP双峰诱导的，但表达lytF的细胞进一步分为存活细胞和产生eDNA的死亡细胞。此外，我们发现，即使生物膜中的所有细胞都收到了CSP信号，lytF表达细胞在生物膜底部附近也很丰富。死细胞和eDNA也大量存在于生物膜底部附近。生物膜中表达lytF的细胞数量明显高于浮游培养中的数量，这表明与基底表面的粘附对于诱导lytF表达很重要。lytF的缺失导致对聚苯乙烯表面的粘附性降低。这些结果表明，在生物膜底部附近诱导的lytF表达和eDNA产生有助于牢固地附着和结构稳定的生物膜。重要的细菌群落被称为生物膜的自我产生的细胞外聚合物（EPS）包裹，对生物膜具有广泛的影响。人类健康和环境问题。由于生物膜是自然界中首选的细菌生活方式，因此生物膜研究的重要性已经提高。此外，近年来，由于生物膜内表型异质性对其特性的贡献，需要对单细胞或亚群水平进行分析以了解细菌的生命策略。在致变菌变形链球菌中，细胞外DNA（eDNA）有助于生物膜的形成。但是，尚不清楚细胞如何以及在生物膜内何处产生eDNA。我们专注于LytF，一种由细胞外肽信号诱导的自溶素。我们使用单细胞水平成像技术来分析lytF在生物膜种群中的表达。在这里，我们显示变形链球菌通过诱导lytF在生物膜底部附近的表达来生成eDNA，从而增强生物膜的附着力和结构稳定性。

Pubmed_ID: 32948046

Single-Cell Electroporation with Real-Time Impedance Assessment Using a Constriction Microchannel

使用收缩微通道实时评估单细胞电穿孔

DOI: 10.3390/mi11090856

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32948046/

Journal: Micromachines {'ISSN': '2072-666x', 'Name': 'micromachines', '2015': '1.295', '2016': '1.833', '2017': '2.222', '2018': '2.426', '2019': '2.523'}

Date: 09/16/2020

Abstract: The electroporation system can serve as a tool for the intracellular delivery of foreign cargos. However, this technique is presently limited by the inaccurate electric field applied to the single cells and lack of a real-time electroporation metrics subsystem. Here, we reported a microfluidic system for precise and rapid single-cell electroporation and simultaneous impedance monitoring in a constriction microchannel. When single cells (A549) were continuously passing through the constriction microchannel, a localized high electric field was applied on the cell membrane, which resulted in highly efficient (up to 96.6%) electroporation. During a single cell entering the constriction channel, an abrupt impedance drop was noticed and demonstrated to be correlated with the occurrence of electroporation. Besides, while the cell was moving in the constriction channel, the stabilized impedance showed the capability to quantify the electroporation extent. The correspondence of the impedance variation and electroporation was validated by the intracellular delivery of the fluorescence indicator (propidium iodide). Based on the obtained results, this system is capable of precise control of electroporation and real-time, label-free impedance assessment, providing a potential tool for intracellular delivery and other biomedical applications.

摘要: 电穿孔系统可以用作细胞内递送外来货物的工具。但是，该技术目前受到施加到单个细胞的不准确电场和缺乏实时电穿孔指标子系统的限制。在这里，我们报告了一种微流体系统，用于在收缩微通道中进行精确，快速的单细胞电穿孔和同时阻抗监测。当单细胞（A549）连续通过收缩微通道时，在细胞膜上施加了局部高电场，这导致了高效（高达96.6％）的电穿孔。在单个细胞进入收缩通道的过程中，注意到突然的阻抗下降，并证明与电穿孔的发生有关。此外，当细胞在收缩通道中移动时，稳定的阻抗显示出量化电穿孔程度的能力。阻抗变化和电穿孔的对应关系通过荧光指示剂（碘化丙啶）的细胞内传递得到验证。根据获得的结果，该系统能够精确控制电穿孔和实时，无标记的阻抗评估，为细胞内递送和其他生物医学应用提供了潜在的工具。

Pubmed_ID: 32946982

Detection of chemotherapy-resistant patient-derived acute lymphoblastic leukemia clones in murine xenografts using cellular barcodes

使用细胞条形码检测鼠异种移植物中对化疗耐药的患者来源的急性淋巴细胞白血病克隆

DOI: 10.1016/j.exphem.2020.09.188

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946982/

Journal: Experimental hematology {'ISSN': '0301-472x', 'Name': 'experimental hematology', '2015': '2.303', '2016': '2.82', '2017': '2.436', '2018': '2.462', '2019': '2.82'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Clonal heterogeneity fuels leukemia evolution, therapeutic resistance and relapse. Upfront detection of therapy-resistant leukemia clones at diagnosis may allow adaptation of treatment and prevention of relapse, but this is hampered by a paucity of methods to identify and trace single leukemia-propagating cells and their clonal offspring. Here, we tested methods of cellular barcoding analysis, to trace the in vivo competitive dynamics of hundreds of patient-derived leukemia clones upon chemotherapy-mediated selective pressure. We transplanted Nod/Scid/Il2Rγ-/- (NSG) mice with barcoded patient-derived or SupB15 acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) cells, and assessed clonal responses to dexamethasone, methotrexate and vincristine, longitudinally and across nine anatomical locations. We demonstrate that chemotherapy reduced clonal diversity in a drug-dependent manner. At end-stage disease, methotrexate-treated patient-derived xenografts had significantly fewer clones compared to placebo-treated mice (100±10 versus 160±15 clones, p=0.0005), while clonal complexity in vincristine- and dexamethasone-treated xenografts was unaffected (115±33 and 150±7 clones; p=NS). Using tools developed to assess differential gene expression, we determined whether these clonal patterns resulted from random clonal drift or selection. We identified five clones that were reproducibly enriched in methotrexate-treated patient-derived xenografts, suggestive of pre-existent resistance. Finally, we found that chemotherapy-mediated selection resulted in a more asymmetric distribution of leukemia clones across anatomic sites. Altogether, we demonstrate that cellular barcoding is a powerful method to trace the clonal dynamics of human patient-derived leukemia cells in response to chemotherapy. In future, integration of cellular barcoding with single-cell sequencing technology may allow in-depth characterization of therapy-resistant leukemia clones and identify novel targets to prevent relapse.

摘要: 克隆异质性助长白血病的发展，治疗耐药性和复发。在诊断时预先检测抗治疗性白血病克隆可以适应治疗并预防复发，但是由于缺乏识别和追踪单个白血病增殖细胞及其克隆后代的方法而受到阻碍。在这里，我们测试了细胞条形码分析的方法，以追踪化疗介导的选择性压力下数百个患者来源的白血病克隆的体内竞争动态。我们将Nod/Scid/Il2Rγ-/-（NSG）小鼠移植了条形码患者自发或SupB15急性淋巴细胞白血病（ALL）细胞，并纵向和在9个解剖位置评估了对地塞米松，甲氨蝶呤和长春新碱的克隆反应。我们证明化学疗法以药物依赖性方式减少了克隆多样性。在终末期疾病中，与安慰剂治疗的小鼠相比，甲氨蝶呤治疗的患者来源的异种移植物的克隆明显较少（100±10对160±15个克隆，p=0.0005），而长春新碱和地塞米松治疗的异种移植物的克隆复杂性较高。不受影响的（115±33和150±7个克隆；p=NS）。使用开发的评估差异基因表达的工具，我们确定这些克隆模式是否是随机克隆漂移或选择导致的。我们鉴定了五个克隆，这些克隆在甲氨蝶呤治疗的患者来源的异种移植物中可再现地富集，提示先前存在抗药性。最后，我们发现化疗介导的选择导致白血病克隆在解剖部位的分布更加不对称。总而言之，我们证明了细胞条形码技术是一种追踪化学疗法对人类患者源性白血病细胞克隆动力学的强大追踪方法。将来，将细胞条形码与单细胞测序技术整合在一起可以对耐治疗性白血病克隆进行深入表征，并确定新的靶标以防止复发。

Pubmed_ID: 32946807

A Single-Cell RNA Expression Map of Human Coronavirus Entry Factors

人冠状病毒进入因子的单细胞RNA表达图。

DOI: 10.1016/j.celrep.2020.108175

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946807/

Journal: Cell reports {'ISSN': '2211-1247', 'Name': 'cell reports', '2015': '7.87', '2016': '8.282', '2017': '8.032', '2018': '7.815', '2019': '8.109'}

Date: 09/22/2020

Abstract: To predict the tropism of human coronaviruses, we profile 28 SARS-CoV-2 and coronavirus-associated receptors and factors (SCARFs) using single-cell transcriptomics across various healthy human tissues. SCARFs include cellular factors both facilitating and restricting viral entry. Intestinal goblet cells, enterocytes, and kidney proximal tubule cells appear highly permissive to SARS-CoV-2, consistent with clinical data. Our analysis also predicts non-canonical entry paths for lung and brain infections. Spermatogonial cells and prostate endocrine cells also appear to be permissive to SARS-CoV-2 infection, suggesting male-specific vulnerabilities. Both pro- and anti-viral factors are highly expressed within the nasal epithelium, with potential age-dependent variation, predicting an important battleground for coronavirus infection. Our analysis also suggests that early embryonic and placental development are at moderate risk of infection. Lastly, SCARF expression appears broadly conserved across a subset of primate organs examined. Our study establishes a resource for investigations of coronavirus biology and pathology.

摘要: 为了预测人类冠状病毒的嗜性，我们使用跨健康人类组织的单细胞转录组学，分析了28种SARS-CoV-2和与冠状病毒相关的受体和因子（SCARFs）。SCARFs包括促进和限制病毒进入的细胞因子。肠道杯状细胞，肠上皮细胞和肾脏近端小管细胞对SARS-CoV-2的允许程度很高，与临床数据一致。我们的分析还预测了肺和脑感染的非典型进入途径。精原细胞和前列腺内分泌细胞也似乎允许SARS-CoV-2感染，这表明男性特有的脆弱性。前病毒因子和抗病毒因子在鼻上皮细胞中高度表达，并具有潜在的年龄依赖性变异，预示着冠状病毒感染的重要战场。我们的分析还表明，早期胚胎和胎盘发育处于中等感染风险。最后，SCARF的表达在所检查的灵长类器官的一个子集中似乎是广泛保守的。我们的研究建立了用于研究冠状病毒生物学和病理学的资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32946788

Multi-layered Spatial Transcriptomics Identify Secretory Factors Promoting Human Hematopoietic Stem Cell Development

多层空间转录组学确定促进人类造血干细胞发育的分泌因子。

DOI: 10.1016/j.stem.2020.08.004

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946788/

Journal: Cell stem cell {'ISSN': '1934-5909', 'Name': 'cell stem cell', '2015': '22.387', '2016': '23.394', '2017': '23.29', '2018': '21.464', '2019': '20.86'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) first emerge in the embryonic aorta-gonad-mesonephros (AGM) region. Studies of model organisms defined intersecting signaling pathways that converge to promote HSC emergence predominantly in the ventral domain of the dorsal aorta. Much less is known about mechanisms driving HSC development in humans. Here, to identify secreted signals underlying human HSC development, we combined spatial transcriptomics analysis of dorsoventral polarized signaling in the aorta with gene expression profiling of sorted cell populations and single cells. Our analysis revealed a subset of aortic endothelial cells with a downregulated arterial signature and a predicted lineage relationship with the emerging HSC/progenitor population. Analysis of the ventrally polarized molecular landscape identified endothelin 1 as an important secreted regulator of human HSC development. The obtained gene expression datasets will inform future studies on mechanisms of HSC development in vivo and on generation of clinically relevant HSCs in vitro.

摘要: 造血干细胞（HSC）首先出现在胚胎主动脉-性腺-中肾（AGM）地区。对模型生物的研究定义了相交的信号通路，这些信号通路主要在背主动脉的腹侧区域汇聚以促进HSC的出现。关于驱动人类HSC发展的机制知之甚少。在这里，为了确定人类HSC发育的潜在信号，我们将主动脉背腹极化信号的空间转录组学分析与分类细胞群和单细胞的基因表达谱相结合。我们的分析揭示了主动脉内皮细胞的一个子集，其动脉信号被下调，并且与新兴的HSC/祖细胞群的谱系关系被预测。对腹侧极化分子景观的分析确定了内皮素1是人类HSC发育的重要秘密调节因子。获得的基因表达数据集将为将来体内HSC发生机制和体外临床相关HSC产生的研究提供参考。

Pubmed_ID: 32946783

Cell Types of the Human Retina and Its Organoids at Single-Cell Resolution

人视网膜及其类器官的单细胞分辨率细胞类型

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.08.013

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946783/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Human organoids recapitulating the cell-type diversity and function of their target organ are valuable for basic and translational research. We developed light-sensitive human retinal organoids with multiple nuclear and synaptic layers and functional synapses. We sequenced the RNA of 285,441 single cells from these organoids at seven developmental time points and from the periphery, fovea, pigment epithelium and choroid of light-responsive adult human retinas, and performed histochemistry. Cell types in organoids matured in vitro to a stable "developed" state at a rate similar to human retina development in vivo. Transcriptomes of organoid cell types converged toward the transcriptomes of adult peripheral retinal cell types. Expression of disease-associated genes was cell-type-specific in adult retina, and cell-type specificity was retained in organoids. We implicate unexpected cell types in diseases such as macular degeneration. This resource identifies cellular targets for studying disease mechanisms in organoids and for targeted repair in human retinas.

摘要: 概述其靶器官的细胞类型多样性和功能的人类器官对于基础和翻译研究具有重要意义。我们开发了具有多个核和突触层以及功能性突触的光敏性人类视网膜类器官。我们在七个发育时间点从这些类器官以及从光反应性成年人类视网膜的外围，中央凹，色素上皮和脉络膜中测序了285,441个单细胞的RNA，并进行了组织化学分析。类器官中的细胞类型在体外成熟到稳定的“发育”状态，其速率类似于体内人视网膜的发育。类器官细胞类型的转录组趋向于成年外周视网膜细胞类型的转录组。疾病相关基因的表达在成年视网膜中是细胞类型特异性的，而在类器官中则保留了细胞类型的特异性。我们将意外的细胞类型包含在黄斑变性等疾病中。该资源确定了用于研究类器官的疾病机制和人类视网膜的靶向修复的细胞靶标。

Pubmed_ID: 32946775

Single-Cell Characterization of Malignant Phenotypes and Developmental Trajectories of Adrenal Neuroblastoma

肾上腺神经母细胞瘤的恶性表型和发展轨迹的单细胞表征。

DOI: 10.1016/j.ccell.2020.08.014

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946775/

Journal: Cancer cell {'ISSN': '1535-6108', 'Name': 'cancer cell', '2015': '23.214', '2016': '27.407', '2017': '22.844', '2018': '23.916', '2019': '26.602'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Neuroblastoma (NB), which is a subtype of neural-crest-derived malignancy, is the most common extracranial solid tumor occurring in childhood. Despite extensive research, the underlying developmental origin of NB remains unclear. Using single-cell RNA sequencing, we generate transcriptomes of adrenal NB from 160,910 cells of 16 patients and transcriptomes of putative developmental cells of origin of NB from 12,103 cells of early human embryos and fetal adrenal glands at relatively late development stages. We find that most adrenal NB tumor cells transcriptionally mirror noradrenergic chromaffin cells. Malignant states also recapitulate the proliferation/differentiation status of chromaffin cells in the process of normal development. Our findings provide insight into developmental trajectories and cellular states underlying human initiation and progression of NB.

摘要: 神经母细胞瘤（NB）是神经-衍生的恶性肿瘤的一种亚型，是儿童时期最常见的颅外实体瘤。尽管进行了广泛的研究，NB的潜在发展起源仍不清楚。使用单细胞RNA测序，我们从16位患者的160,910个细胞中生成了肾上腺NB转录组，并在相对较早的发育阶段从早期人类胚胎和胎儿肾上腺的12,103个细胞中生成了NB起源的推定发育细胞的转录组。我们发现大多数肾上腺NB肿瘤细胞转录镜像去甲肾上腺素嗜铬细胞。在正常发育过程中，恶性状态还概括了嗜铬细胞的增殖/分化状态。我们的发现提供了对NB的人类起始和发展的发展轨迹和细胞状态的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32946435

Capturing cell type-specific chromatin compartment patterns by applying topic modeling to single-cell Hi-C data

通过将主题建模应用于单细胞Hi-C数据来捕获特定于细胞类型的染色质区室模式

DOI: 10.1371/journal.pcbi.1008173

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946435/

Journal: PLoS computational biology {'ISSN': '1553-734x', 'Name': 'plos computational biology', '2015': '4.587', '2016': '4.542', '2017': '3.955', '2018': '4.428', '2019': '4.7'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Single-cell Hi-C (scHi-C) interrogates genome-wide chromatin interaction in individual cells, allowing us to gain insights into 3D genome organization. However, the extremely sparse nature of scHi-C data poses a significant barrier to analysis, limiting our ability to tease out hidden biological information. In this work, we approach this problem by applying topic modeling to scHi-C data. Topic modeling is well-suited for discovering latent topics in a collection of discrete data. For our analysis, we generate nine different single-cell combinatorial indexed Hi-C (sci-Hi-C) libraries from five human cell lines (GM12878, H1Esc, HFF, IMR90, and HAP1), consisting over 19,000 cells. We demonstrate that topic modeling is able to successfully capture cell type differences from sci-Hi-C data in the form of "chromatin topics." We further show enrichment of particular compartment structures associated with locus pairs in these topics.

摘要: 单细胞Hi-C（scHi-C）可以查询单个细胞中全基因组的染色质相互作用，从而使我们能够深入了解3D基因组的组织方式。但是，scHi-C数据的极度稀疏性构成了分析的重要障碍，限制了我们挑逗隐藏的生物学信息的能力。在这项工作中，我们通过将主题建模应用于scHi-C数据来解决此问题。主题建模非常适合发现离散数据集合中的潜在主题。对于我们的分析，我们从五个人类细胞系（GM12878，H1Esc，HFF，IMR90和HAP1）中生成了九个不同的单细胞组合索引Hi-C（sci-Hi-C）文库，这些文库包含19,000多个细胞。我们证明主题建模能够以“染色质主题”的形式成功地从sci-Hi-C数据捕获细胞类型差异。在这些主题中，我们进一步显示了与基因座对相关的特定区室结构的富集。

Pubmed_ID: 32946427

Angiogenic factors secreted from human ASC spheroids entrapped in an alginate-based hierarchical structure via combined 3D printing/electrospinning system

通过结合的3D打印/静电纺丝系统，人ASC球状体中的血管生成因子被包裹在基于藻酸盐的分层结构中

DOI: 10.1088/1758-5090/abaf9a

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32946427/

Journal: Biofabrication {'ISSN': '1758-5082', 'Name': 'biofabrication', '2015': '4.702', '2016': '5.24', '2017': '6.838', '2018': '7.236', '2019': '8.213'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Human adipose-derived stem cell spheroids have been widely used in the treatment or regeneration of damaged skin tissues, and their success is believed to be due in part to angiogenic factors released from the spheroids. To achieve the sustained release of bioactive components from implanted spheroids within a defective area, the use of a biocompatible scaffolding biomaterial is required. In this study, we developed an alginate-based scaffolding structure, which was processed using three-dimensional printing and electrospinning for use as a spheroid-entrapping structure. A micro-sized alginate strut and electrospun alginate nanofibers functioned not only to firmly entrap the spheroids, but also to enable the stable release of various angiogenic and wound healing-related factors. We also demonstrated the function of these factors using a tube-forming assay and found that conditioned media from the spheroid-scaffold group improved capillary-like structure formation in human umbilical vein endothelial cells compared to the single cell-scaffold group. Our results suggest that this spheroid-entrapping alginate hybrid structure could represent a new platform for stem cell therapy using spheroid transplantation.

摘要: 人脂肪来源的干细胞球体已被广泛用于治疗或再生受损的皮肤组织，人们认为它们的成功部分归因于从球体释放的血管生成因子。为了实现从缺陷区域内的植入球体中持续释放生物活性成分，需要使用生物相容性支架生物材料。在这项研究中，我们开发了一种基于藻酸盐的脚手架结构，该结构使用三维打印和静电纺丝进行加工，用作球体包裹结构。微型藻酸盐支撑杆和电纺藻酸盐纳米纤维不仅可以牢固地包裹球体，还可以稳定释放各种与血管生成和伤口愈合相关的因子。我们还使用试管形成试验证明了这些因素的功能，并发现与单细胞支架组相比，球形支架组的条件培养基可改善人脐静脉内皮细胞中的毛细管样结构形成。我们的结果表明，这种截留球形的藻酸盐杂化结构可能代表使用球形植入进行干细胞治疗的新平台。

Pubmed_ID: 32945770

Cell-cycle-gated feedback control mediates desensitization to interferon stimulation

细胞周期门控反馈控制介导对干扰素刺激的脱敏

DOI: 10.7554/eLife.58825

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32945770/

Journal: eLife {'ISSN': '2050-084x', 'Name': 'elife', '2015': '8.303', '2016': '7.725', '2017': '7.616', '2018': '7.551', '2019': '7.08'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Cells use molecular circuits to interpret and respond to extracellular cues, such as hormones and cytokines, which are often released in a temporally varying fashion. In this study, we combine microfluidics, time-lapse microscopy, and computational modeling to investigate how the type I interferon (IFN)-responsive regulatory network operates in single human cells to process repetitive IFN stimulation. We found that IFN-α pretreatments lead to opposite effects, priming versus desensitization, depending on input durations. These effects are governed by a regulatory network composed of a fast-acting positive feedback loop and a delayed negative feedback loop, mediated by upregulation of ubiquitin-specific peptidase 18 (USP18). We further revealed that USP18 upregulation can only be initiated at the G1/early S phases of cell cycle upon the treatment onset, resulting in heterogeneous and delayed induction kinetics in single cells. This cell cycle gating provides a temporal compartmentalization of feedback loops, enabling duration-dependent desensitization to repetitive stimulations.

摘要: 细胞利用分子回路来解释和响应通常以时变方式释放的细胞外信号，例如激素和细胞因子。在这项研究中，我们结合微流控技术，延时显微镜和计算模型来研究I型干扰素（IFN）响应的调节网络如何在单个人类细胞中运行以处理重复的IFN刺激。我们发现，IFN-α预处理根据输入持续时间会产生相反的作用，即引发与脱敏。这些作用受一个由快速作用的正反馈回路和延迟的负反馈回路组成的调节网络控制，该调节网络由泛素特异性肽酶18（USP18）的上调介导。我们进一步揭示，USP18上调只能在治疗开始后在细胞周期的G1/早期S期开始，从而导致单细胞异质和延迟的诱导动力学。这种细胞周期门控提供了反馈回路的时间分隔，从而使对重复刺激的持续时间依赖性脱敏成为可能。

Pubmed_ID: 32945366

A comprehensive analysis of RHOA mutation positive and negative angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphomas by targeted deep sequencing, expression profiling and single cell digital image analysis

通过靶向深度测序，表达谱分析和单细胞数字图像分析全面分析RHOA突变阳性和阴性血管免疫母细胞性T细胞淋巴瘤

DOI: 10.3892/ijmm.2020.4686

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32945366/

Journal: International journal of molecular medicine {'ISSN': '1107-3756', 'Name': 'international journal of molecular medicine', '2015': '2.348', '2016': '2.341', '2017': '2.784', '2018': '2.928', '2019': '3.098'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Angioimmunoblastic T‑cell lymphoma (AITL) is a uniquely aggressive mature T‑cell neoplasm. In recent years, recurrent genetic mutations in ras homolog family member A (RHOA), tet methylcytosine dioxygenase 2 (TET2), DNA methyltransferase 3 alpha (DNMT3A) and isocitrate dehydrogenase [NADP(+)] 2 (IDH2) have been identified as associated with AITL. However, a deep molecular study assessing both DNA mutations and RNA expression profile combined with digital image analysis is lacking. The present study aimed to evaluate the significance of molecular and morphologic features by high resolution digital image analysis in several cases of AITL. To do so, a total of 18 separate tissues from 10 patients with AITL were collected and analyzed. The results identified recurrent mutations in RHOA, TET2, DNMT3A, and IDH2, and demonstrated increased DNA mutations in coding, promoter and CCCTC binding factor (CTCF) binding sites in RHOA mutated AITLs vs. RHOA non‑mutated cases, as well as increased overall survival in RHOA mutated patients. In addition, single cell computational digital image analysis morphologically characterized RHOA mutated AITL cells as distinct from cells from RHOA mutation negative patients. Computational analysis of single cell morphological parameters revealed that RHOA mutated cells have decreased eccentricity (more circular) compared with RHOA non‑mutated AITL cells. In conclusion, the results from the present study expand our understanding of AITL and demonstrate that there are specific cell biological and morphological manifestations of RHOA mutations in cases of AITL.

摘要: 血管免疫母细胞性T细胞淋巴瘤（AITL）是一种独特的侵袭性成熟T细胞肿瘤。近年来，已发现ras同源家族A（RHOA），tet甲基胞嘧啶双加氧酶2（TET2），DNA甲基转移酶3alpha（DNMT3A）和异柠檬酸脱氢酶[NADP（+）]2（IDH2）的复发性基因突变与相关。与AITL。然而，缺乏结合DNA突变和RNA表达谱以及数字图像分析的深入分子研究。本研究旨在通过高分辨率数字图像分析在几种AITL病例中评估分子和形态特征的重要性。为此，收集并分析了来自10例AITL患者的18个独立组织。结果确定了RHOA，TET2，DNMT3A和IDH2中的反复突变，并证明了RHOA突变的AITL与非RHOA突变病例相比，编码，启动子和CCCTC结合因子（CTCF）结合位点的DNA突变增加，RHOA突变患者的生存率。此外，单细胞计算数字图像分析在形态上表征了RHOA突变的AITL细胞与RHOA突变阴性患者的细胞不同。对单细胞形态学参数的计算分析表明，与RHOA非突变AITL细胞相比，RHOA突变细胞的偏心率降低（更圆）。总之，本研究的结果扩展了我们对AITL的理解，并证明在AITL的情况下RHOA突变具有特定的细胞生物学和形态学表现。

Pubmed_ID: 32945325

Multiplexed analysis of neural cytokine signaling by a novel neural cell-cell interaction microchip

新型神经细胞间相互作用微芯片对神经细胞因子信号的多重分析

DOI: 10.1039/d0lc00401d

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32945325/

Journal: Lab on a chip {'ISSN': '1473-0197', 'Name': 'lab on a chip', '2015': '5.586', '2016': '6.045', '2017': '5.995', '2018': '6.914', '2019': '6.774'}

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: Multipotent neural stem cells (NSCs) are widely applied in pre-clinical and clinical trials as a cell source to promote tissue regeneration in neurodegenerative diseases. Frequently delivered as dissociated cells, aggregates or self-organized rosettes, it is unknown whether disruption of the NSC rosette morphology or method of formation affect signaling profiles of these cells that may impact uniformity of outcomes in cell therapies. Here we generate a neural cell-cell interaction microchip (NCCIM) as an in vitro platform to simultaneously track an informed panel of cytokines and co-evaluate cell morphology and biomarker expression coupled to a sandwich ELISA platform. We apply multiplex in situ tagging technology (MIST) to evaluate ten cytokines (PDGF-AA, GDNF, BDNF, IGF-1, FGF-2, IL-6, BMP-4, CNTF, β-NGF, NT-3) on microchips for EB-derived rosettes, single cell dissociated rosettes and reformed rosette neurospheres. Of the cytokines evaluated, EB-derived rosettes secrete PDGF-AA, GDNF and FGF-2 prominently, whereas this profile is temporarily lost upon dissociation to single cells and in reformed neurospheres two additional cytokines, BDNF and β-NGF, are also secreted. This study on NSC rosettes demonstrates the development, versatility and utility of the NCCIM as a sensitive multiplex detector of cytokine signaling in a high throughput and controlled microenvironment. The NCCIM is expected to provide important new information to refine cell source choices in therapies as well as to support development of informative 2D or 3D in vitro models including areas of neurodegeneration or neuroplasticity.

摘要: 多能神经干细胞（NSC）作为促进神经退行性疾病中组织再生的细胞来源，在临床前和临床试验中被广泛应用。NSC玫瑰花序形态或形成方法的破坏是否会以离解的细胞，聚集体或自组织的玫瑰花序形式交付，尚不清楚这些细胞的信号传导分布是否会影响细胞疗法结果的一致性。在这里，我们生成神经细胞-细胞相互作用微芯片（NCCIM）作为体外平台，以同时跟踪细胞因子的信息面板，并共同评估与三明治ELISA平台耦合的细胞形态和生物标志物的表达。我们应用多重原位标记技术（MIST）来评估10种细胞因子（PDGF-AA，GDNF，BDNF，IGF-1，FGF-2，IL-6，BMP-4，CNTF，β-NGF，NT-3）用于EB衍生的玫瑰花结，单细胞解离的玫瑰花结和改良的玫瑰花结神经球的微芯片。在评估的细胞因子中，EB衍生的玫瑰花结显着分泌PDGF-AA，GDNF和FGF-2，而这种分布在与单细胞解离后暂时消失，并且在重组的神经球中还分泌了另外两种细胞因子BDNF和β-NGF。对NSC花环的这项研究证明了NCCIM在高通量和受控的微环境中作为细胞因子信号传导的灵敏多重检测器的发展，多功能性和实用性。NCCIM有望提供重要的新信息，以完善治疗中的细胞来源选择，并支持开发信息丰富的2D或3D体外模型，包括神经退行性变或神经可塑性区域。

Pubmed_ID: 32945164

Exploring Flow Cytometry-Based Micronucleus Scoring for Reliable Nanomaterial Genotoxicity Assessment

探索基于流式细胞仪的微核评分，以可靠地评估纳米材料的遗传毒性

DOI: 10.1021/acs.chemrestox.0c00071

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32945164/

Journal: Chemical research in toxicology {'ISSN': '0893-228x', 'Name': 'chemical research in toxicology', '2015': '3.025', '2016': '3.278', '2017': '3.432', '2018': '3.274', '2019': '3.184'}

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: The increased use of engineered nanomaterials (ENM) such as SiO2 and TiO2 in industrial products, especially in food, raises concerns with regard to their effect on human health. In particular, ENM-induced genotoxicity is crucial to investigate, since DNA damage can cause induction or promotion of carcinogenesis. However, current in vitro and in vivo nanogenotoxicological data are highly contradictory, which impedes interpretation and extrapolation. Hence, robust, reliable, and ideally scalable in vitro methods for nanogenotoxicity assessment are of great interest. This work aimed at evaluating the suitability of flow cytometry-based micronuclei scoring for reliable nanogenotoxicological assessment in human intestinal cells. Therefore, we have evaluated the genotoxicity of differently sized SiO2 and TiO2 from different sources (food-relevant, commercially available, and laboratory-synthesized) using the well-established alkaline single cell gel electrophoresis (Comet assay) and the micronucleus (MN) assay employing a flow cytometric readout. Our study demonstrates that physiologically relevant doses of several types of SiO2 and TiO2 did not cause genotoxicity, as assessed by the Comet assay, and the MN flow cytometry assay under the particular experimental conditions described. To improve data reliability, we identified ENM-induced interferences with flow cytometric scoring employing a set of interference controls, which is generally applicable for any nanomaterial and any cell line. In conclusion, flow cytometry-based MN scoring appears to be a promising methodology in nanogenotoxicity testing since data acquisition and analysis are significantly faster, highly scalable in terms of throughput, and less operator-dependent compared to the traditional microscopic evaluation. In particular, ENM-induced false-positive or false-negative results, which have not been addressed sufficiently in the literature, can be detected easily, thus enhancing data reliability.

摘要: 在工业产品中，尤其是在食品中，SiO2和TiO2等工程纳米材料（ENM）的使用增加，引起了人们对它们对人体健康的影响的担忧。尤其是，ENM诱导的遗传毒性对于研究至关重要，因为DNA损伤会导致诱导或促进癌变。然而，当前的体外和体内纳米遗传毒理学数据高度矛盾，这阻碍了解释和外推。因此，对于纳米遗传毒性评估的健壮，可靠和理想可扩展的体外方法引起了极大的兴趣。这项工作旨在评估基于流式细胞仪的微核评分在人肠细胞中进行可靠的纳米遗传毒理学评估的适用性。因此，我们已经使用成熟的碱性单细胞凝胶电泳（彗星分析）和微核（MN）分析方法评估了不同来源（食品相关，可商购和实验室合成）的不同尺寸的SiO2和TiO2的遗传毒性。采用流式细胞仪读数。我们的研究表明，通过彗星试验和MN流式细胞术在所描述的特定实验条件下评估，几种类型的SiO2和TiO2的生理相关剂量均不会引起遗传毒性。为了提高数据的可靠性，我们使用一组干扰控制方法确定了ENM诱导的流式细胞计数评分所产生的干扰，这通常适用于任何纳米材料和任何细胞系。总之，基于流式细胞仪的MN评分在纳米遗传毒性测试中似乎是一种有前途的方法，因为与传统的显微镜评估相比，数据获取和分析显着更快，在通量方面具有高度可扩展性并且对操作者的依赖性更低。尤其是，可以很容易地检测到ENM引起的假阳性或假阴性结果，这些结果在文献中尚未得到充分解决，从而提高了数据可靠性。

Pubmed_ID: 32944935

Single-cell RNA sequencing analysis of SARS-CoV-2 entry receptors in human organoids

人类器官中SARS-CoV-2进入受体的单细胞RNA测序分析

DOI: 10.1002/jcp.30054

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32944935/

Journal: Journal of cellular physiology {'ISSN': '0021-9541', 'Name': 'journal of cellular physiology', '2015': '4.155', '2016': '4.08', '2017': '3.923', '2018': '4.522', '2019': '5.546'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) is a global pandemic and caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), which has resulted in millions of deaths worldwide. Reports denote SARS-CoV-2 uses angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), transmembrane serine protease 2 (TMPRSS2) as its primary entry point into the host cell. However, understanding the biology behind this viral replication, disease mechanism and drug discovery efforts are limited due to the lack of a suitable experimental model. Here, we used single-cell RNA sequencing data of human organoids to analyze expressions of ACE2 and TMPRSS2, in addition to an array of RNA receptors to examine their role in SARS-CoV-2 pathogenesis. ACE2 is abundant in all organoids, except the prostate and brain, and TMPRSS2 is omnipresent. Innate immune pathways are upregulated in ACE2(+) cells of all organoids, except the lungs. Besides this, the expression of low-density lipoprotein receptor is highly enriched in ACE2(+) cells in intestinal, lung, and retinal organoids, with the highest expression in lung organoids. Collectively, this study demonstrates that the organoids can be used as an experimental platform to explore this novel virus disease mechanism and for drug development.

摘要: 2019年冠状病毒病（COVID-19）是全球大流行病，由严重的急性呼吸综合症冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）引起，已导致全球数百万人死亡。报告表明SARS-CoV-2使用血管紧张素转化酶2（ACE2），跨膜丝氨酸蛋白酶2（TMPRSS2）作为其进入宿主细胞的主要入口。然而，由于缺乏合适的实验模型，对这种病毒复制背后的生物学，疾病机制和药物发现工作的了解受到限制。在这里，我们使用人类类器官的单细胞RNA测序数据来分析ACE2和TMPRSS2的表达，以及一系列RNA受体来检查它们在SARS-CoV-2发病机理中的作用。ACE2在除前列腺和大脑之外的所有类器官中都丰富，而TMPRSS2则无所不在。先天性免疫途径在除肺以外的所有类器官的ACE2（+）细胞中上调。除此之外，低密度脂蛋白受体的表达在肠，肺和视网膜类器官中的ACE2（+）细胞中高度富集，在肺类器官中的表达最高。总的来说，这项研究表明类器官可以用作探索这种新型病毒疾病机制和药物开发的实验平台。

Pubmed_ID: 32944918

Bioinformatic Analysis of Single-Cell Hi-C Data from Early Mouse Embryo

早期小鼠胚胎中单细胞Hi-C数据的生物信息学分析

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0958-3_20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32944918/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: The adaptation of Hi-C protocols to enable the investigation of chromosome organization in single cells opens new avenues to study the dynamics of this process during embryogenesis. However, the analysis of single-cell Hi-C data is not yet standardized and raises novel bioinformatic challenges. Here we describe a complete workflow for the analysis of single-cell Hi-C data, with a main focus on allele-specific analysis based on data obtained from hybrid embryos.

摘要: Hi-C协议的适应性使得能够研究单个细胞中的染色体组织为研究胚胎发生过程中这一过程的动力学开辟了新途径。但是，单细胞Hi-C数据的分析尚未标准化，并提出了新的生物信息学挑战。在这里，我们描述了用于分析单细胞Hi-C数据的完整工作流程，主要集中在基于从杂交胚胎获得的数据的等位基因特异性分析。

Pubmed_ID: 32944917

Understanding Chromosome Structure During Early Mouse Development by a Single-Cell Hi-C Analysis

通过单细胞Hi-C分析了解小鼠早期发育过程中的染色体结构

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0958-3_19

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32944917/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: Over the past two decades, the development of chromosome conformation capture technologies has allowed to intensively probe the properties of genome folding in various cell types. High-throughput versions of these C-based assays (named Hi-C) have released the mapping of 3D chromosome folding for the entire genomes. Applied to mammalian preimplantation embryos, it has revealed a unique chromosome organization after fertilization when a new individual is being formed. However, the questions of whether specific structures could arise depending on their parental origins or of their transcriptional status remain open. Our method chapter is dedicated to the technical description on how applying scHi-C to mouse embryos at different stages of preimplantation development. This approach capitalized with the limited amount of material available at these developmental stages. It also provides new research avenues, such as the study of mutant embryos for further functional studies.

摘要: 在过去的二十年中，染色体构象捕获技术的发展已使人们能够深入研究各种细胞类型中基因组折叠的特性。这些基于C的检测的高通量版本（称为Hi-C）已经发布了整个基因组的3D染色体折叠图。应用于哺乳动物的植入前胚胎，当形成新个体时，它在受精后揭示了独特的染色体组织。但是，是否可以根据其亲本起源或转录状态产生特定结构的问题仍然悬而未决。我们的方法章节专门针对在胚胎植入前不同阶段如何将scHi-C应用于小鼠胚胎的技术描述。这种方法利用了在这些开发阶段可用的有限数量的材料。它还提供了新的研究途径，例如用于进一步功能研究的突变体胚胎的研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32944916

DamID to Map Genome-Protein Interactions in Preimplantation Mouse Embryos

DamID映射植入前小鼠胚胎中的基因组蛋白质相互作用。

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0958-3_18

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32944916/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: Investigating the chromatin landscape of the early mammalian embryo is essential to understand how epigenetic mechanisms may direct reprogramming and cell fate allocation. Genome-wide analyses of the epigenome in preimplantation mouse embryos have recently become available, thanks to the development of low-input protocols. DNA adenine methyltransferase identification (DamID) enables the investigation of genome-wide protein-DNA interactions without the requirement of specific antibodies. Most importantly, DamID can be robustly applied to single cells. Here we describe the protocol for performing DamID in single oocytes and mouse preimplantation embryos, as well as single blastomeres, using a Dam-LaminB1 fusion to generate high-resolution lamina-associated domain (LAD) maps. This low-input method can be adapted for other proteins of interest to faithfully profile their genomic interaction, allowing us to interrogate the chromatin dynamics and nuclear organization during the early mammalian development.

摘要: 调查早期哺乳动物胚胎的染色质景观对于了解表观遗传机制如何指导重编程和细胞命运分配至关重要。归功于低投入方案的发展，对植入前小鼠胚胎中表观基因组的全基因组分析最近已变得可用。DNA腺嘌呤甲基转移酶鉴定（DamID）使得无需特定抗体即可研究全基因组蛋白质-DNA相互作用。最重要的是，DamID可以可靠地应用于单个单元。在这里，我们描述了使用Dam-LaminB1融合生成高分辨率的椎板相关结构域（LAD）图，在单个卵母细胞和小鼠植入前胚胎以及单个卵裂球中执行DamID的协议。这种低输入量的方法可以适用于其他感兴趣的蛋白质，以忠实地描述其基因组相互作用，从而使我们能够在哺乳动物早期发育过程中研究染色质动力学和核组织。

Pubmed_ID: 32944913

Profiling DNA Methylation Genome-Wide in Single Cells

在单细胞中分析DNA甲基化全基因组

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0958-3_15

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32944913/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: Single-cell bisulfite sequencing (scBS-seq) enables profiling of DNA methylation at single-nucleotide resolution and across all genomic features. It can explore methylation differences between cells in mixed cell populations and profile methylation in very rare cell types, such as mammalian oocytes and cells from early embryos. Here, we outline the scBS-seq protocol in a 96-well plate format applicable to studies of moderate throughput.

摘要: 单细胞亚硫酸氢盐测序（scBS-seq）能够以单核苷酸分辨率和所有基因组特征对DNA甲基化进行分析。它可以探索混合细胞群体中细胞之间的甲基化差异，以及在非常罕见的细胞类型（如哺乳动物卵母细胞和早期胚胎中的细胞）中分析甲基化。在这里，我们以适用于中等通量研究的96孔板格式概述了scBS-seq协议。

Pubmed_ID: 32944911

Deciphering the Early Mouse Embryo Transcriptome by Low-Input RNA-Seq

低输入RNA-Seq破译早期小鼠胚胎转录组。

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0958-3_13

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32944911/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: Early preimplantation embryos are precious and scarce samples that contain limited numbers of cells, which can be problematic for quantitative gene expression analyses. Nonetheless, low-input genome-wide techniques coupled with cDNA amplification steps have become a gold standard for RNA profiling of as minimal as a single blastomere. Here, we describe a single-cell/single-embryo RNA sequencing (RNA-seq) method, from embryo collection to sample validation steps prior to DNA library preparation and sequencing. Key quality controls and external Spike-In normalization approaches are also detailed.

摘要: 早期的植入前胚胎是珍贵且稀有的样品，其细胞数量有限，这对于定量基因表达分析可能会造成问题。尽管如此，低输入全基因组技术与cDNA扩增步骤相结合已成为RNA分析的金标准，其最低限度是单个卵裂球。在这里，我们描述了单细胞/单胚RNA测序（RNA-seq）方法，从胚胎收集到样品验证步骤，再到DNA库制备和测序。还详细介绍了关键质量控制和外部Spike-In标准化方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32943704

Single-cell RNA-seq identifies unique transcriptional landscapes of human nucleus pulposus and annulus fibrosus cells

单细胞RNA-seq可识别人髓核和纤维环细胞的独特转录景观

DOI: 10.1038/s41598-020-72261-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32943704/

Journal: Scientific reports {'ISSN': '2045-2322', 'Name': 'scientific reports', '2015': '5.228', '2016': '4.259', '2017': '4.122', '2018': '4.011', '2019': '3.998'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Intervertebral disc (IVD) disease (IDD) is a complex, multifactorial disease. While various aspects of IDD progression have been reported, the underlying molecular pathways and transcriptional networks that govern the maintenance of healthy nucleus pulposus (NP) and annulus fibrosus (AF) have not been fully elucidated. We defined the transcriptome map of healthy human IVD by performing single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) in primary AF and NP cells isolated from non-degenerated lumbar disc. Our systematic and comprehensive analyses revealed distinct genetic architecture of human NP and AF compartments and identified 2,196 differentially expressed genes. Gene enrichment analysis showed that SFRP1, BIRC5, CYTL1, ESM1 and CCNB2 genes were highly expressed in the AF cells; whereas, COL2A1, DSC3, COL9A3, COL11A1, and ANGPTL7 were mostly expressed in the NP cells. Further, functional annotation clustering analysis revealed the enrichment of receptor signaling pathways genes in AF cells, while NP cells showed high expression of genes related to the protein synthesis machinery. Subsequent interaction network analysis revealed a structured network of extracellular matrix genes in NP compartments. Our regulatory network analysis identified FOXM1 and KDM4E as signature transcription factor of AF and NP respectively, which might be involved in the regulation of core genes of AF and NP transcriptome.

摘要: 椎间盘疾病（IDD）是一种复杂的多因素疾病。尽管已经报道了IDD进展的各个方面，但尚未完全阐明控制健康髓核（NP）和纤维环（AF）维持的潜在分子途径和转录网络。我们通过在从未变性腰椎间盘分离的原发性房颤和NP细胞中进行单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq），定义了健康人IVD的转录组图。我们的系统和全面分析揭示了人类NP和AF区室的独特遗传结构，并鉴定了2196个差异表达的基因。基因富集分析表明，SFRP1，BIRC5，CYTL1，ESM1和CCNB2基因在AF细胞中高表达。而COL2A1，DSC3，COL9A3，COL11A1和ANGPTL7主要在NP细胞中表达。此外，功能注释聚类分析揭示了AF细胞中受体信号通路基因的丰富，而NP细胞显示了与蛋白质合成机制有关的基因的高表达。随后的相互作用网络分析揭示了NP区室中细胞外基质基因的结构化网络。我们的调控网络分析确定FOXM1和KDM4E分别是AF和NP的标志转录因子，这可能与AF和NP转录组核心基因的调控有关。

Pubmed_ID: 32943655

Northstar enables automatic classification of known and novel cell types from tumor samples

Northstar可以对肿瘤样本中的已知和新型细胞类型进行自动分类

DOI: 10.1038/s41598-020-71805-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32943655/

Journal: Scientific reports {'ISSN': '2045-2322', 'Name': 'scientific reports', '2015': '5.228', '2016': '4.259', '2017': '4.122', '2018': '4.011', '2019': '3.998'}

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Single cell transcriptomics is revolutionising our understanding of tissue and disease heterogeneity, yet cell type identification remains a partially manual task. Published algorithms for automatic cell annotation are limited to known cell types and fail to capture novel populations, especially cancer cells. We developed northstar, a computational approach to classify thousands of cells based on published data within seconds while simultaneously identifying and highlighting new cell states such as malignancies. We tested northstar on data from glioblastoma, melanoma, and seven different healthy tissues and obtained high accuracy and robustness. We collected eleven pancreatic tumors and identified three shared and five private neoplastic cell populations, offering insight into the origins of neuroendocrine and exocrine tumors. Northstar is a useful tool to assign known and novel cell type and states in the age of cell atlases.

摘要: 单细胞转录组学正在彻底改变我们对组织和疾病异质性的理解，但是细胞类型识别仍然是部分手动任务。用于自动细胞注释的已发布算法仅限于已知细胞类型，并且无法捕获新的种群，尤其是癌细胞。我们开发了northstar，这是一种计算方法，可在几秒钟内根据已发布的数据对数千个细胞进行分类，同时识别并突出显示新的细胞状态（例如恶性肿瘤）。我们对来自胶质母细胞瘤，黑色素瘤和七个不同健康组织的数据进行了北极星测试，并获得了较高的准确性和鲁棒性。我们收集了11种胰腺肿瘤，确定了3个共有的和5个私人的肿瘤细胞群体，从而深入了解了神经内分泌和外分泌肿瘤的起源。Northstar是一个有用的工具，可用于分配已知和新颖的细胞类型以及细胞图谱年龄的状态。

Pubmed_ID: 32943499

Looking at neurodevelopment through a big data lens

通过大数据看待神经发育

DOI: 10.1126/science.aaz8627

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32943499/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/18/2020

Abstract: The formation of the human brain, which contains nearly 100 billion neurons making an average of 1000 connections each, represents an astonishing feat of self-organization. Despite impressive progress, our understanding of how neurons form the nervous system and enable function is very fragmentary, especially for the human brain. New technologies that produce large volumes of high-resolution measurements-big data-are now being brought to bear on this problem. Single-cell molecular profiling methods allow the exploration of neural diversity with increasing spatial and temporal resolution. Advances in human genetics are shedding light on the genetic architecture of neurodevelopmental disorders, and new approaches are revealing plausible neurobiological mechanisms underlying these conditions. Here, we review the opportunities and challenges of integrating large-scale genomics and genetics for the study of brain development.

摘要: 人脑的形成包含近1000亿个神经元，每个神经元平均有1000个连接，代表着惊人的自我组织壮举。尽管取得了令人瞩目的进步，但我们对神经元如何形成神经系统并启用功能的理解仍然是零碎的，尤其是对于人脑。现在正在产生产生大量高分辨率测量结果和大数据的新技术来解决这个问题。单细胞分子谱分析方法可以探索神经多样性，并具有更高的时空分辨率。人类遗传学的进展为神经发育障碍的遗传结构提供了新的亮点，而新的方法也揭示了潜在的神经生物学机制。在这里，我们回顾了将大规模基因组学和遗传学整合到大脑发育研究中的机遇和挑战。

Pubmed_ID: 32943451

Vascular transcription factors guide plant epidermal responses to limiting phosphate conditions

血管转录因子指导植物表皮对有限磷酸盐条件的反应

DOI: 10.1126/science.aay4970

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32943451/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/17/2020

Abstract: Optimal plant growth is hampered by deficiency of the essential macronutrient phosphate in most soils. Plant roots can, however, increase their root hair density to efficiently forage the soil for this immobile nutrient.
