摘要: 背景：Niemann-PickC型（NPC，MIM＃257220）是一种神经内脏疾病，主要由NPC1基因的致病变异引起。在这里，我们研究了具有NPC临床诊断但在分子分析方面尚无定论的患者。方法：我们使用了下一代测序（NGS）面板，然后进行了cDNA分析。后来，我们使用了大规模平行单细胞RNA-seq（MARS-Seq）来解决基因谱分析的变化，以及最终解决不同变体对蛋白质和细胞水平的影响。结果：我们鉴定了新的变异体，cDNA分析使我们能够建立沉默变异体的功能作用，该变异体先前曾报道为多态性。我们证明了这种变体诱导了外显子11的跳过，导致过早终止密码子，并在来自两个无关家庭的NPC患者中发现了该变体。MARS-Seq分析显示，在一名特定患者中，许多上调的基因与未折叠蛋白应答（UPR）和内质网（ER）应激有关。同样，对于所有分析的变体，NPC1蛋白部分保留在ER中。结论：我们显示NPC1沉默多态性（p.V562V）是NPC的致病变异，UPR在NPC患者中上调。

Pubmed_ID: 32931539

μCB-seq: microfluidic cell barcoding and sequencing for high-resolution imaging and sequencing of single cells

μCB-seq：用于单细胞的高分辨率成像和测序的微流控细胞条形码和测序

DOI: 10.1039/d0lc00169d

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32931539/

Journal: Lab on a chip {'ISSN': '1473-0197', 'Name': 'lab on a chip', '2015': '5.586', '2016': '6.045', '2017': '5.995', '2018': '6.914', '2019': '6.774'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) enables the investigation of complex biological processes in multicellular organisms with high resolution. However, many phenotypic features that are critical to understanding the functional role of cells in a heterogeneous tissue or organ are not directly encoded in the genome and therefore cannot be profiled with scRNA-seq. Quantitative optical microscopy has long been a powerful approach for characterizing diverse cellular phenotypes including cell morphology, protein localization, and chemical composition. Combining scRNA-seq with optical imaging has the potential to provide comprehensive single-cell analysis, allowing for functional integration of gene expression profiling and cell-state characterization. However, it is difficult to track single cells through both measurements; therefore, coupling current scRNA-seq protocols with optical measurements remains a challenge. Here, we report microfluidic cell barcoding and sequencing (μCB-seq), a microfluidic platform that combines high-resolution imaging and sequencing of single cells. μCB-seq is enabled by a novel fabrication method that preloads primers with known barcode sequences inside addressable reaction chambers of a microfluidic device. In addition to enabling multi-modal single-cell analysis, μCB-seq improves gene detection sensitivity, providing a scalable and accurate method for information-rich characterization of single cells.

摘要: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）可以高分辨率研究多细胞生物中的复杂生物过程。但是，许多对于理解异质组织或器官中细胞功能作用至关重要的表型特征并未直接在基因组中编码，因此无法通过scRNA-seq进行分析。长期以来，定量光学显微镜一直是表征多种细胞表型（包括细胞形态，蛋白质定位和化学组成）的有效方法。将scRNA-seq与光学成像相结合有潜力提供全面的单细胞分析，从而实现基因表达谱和细胞状态表征的功能整合。但是，很难通过两次测量来跟踪单个单元。因此，将当前的scRNA-seq方案与光学测量结合起来仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们报告微流控细胞条形码和测序（μCB-seq），一种结合了单个细胞的高分辨率成像和测序的微流控平台。μCB-seq通过一种新颖的制造方法得以实现，该方法可将带有已知条形码序列的引物预装在微流体设备的可寻址反应室内。除了支持多模式单细胞分析外，μCB-seq还提高了基因检测的灵敏度，为单细胞的信息丰富表征提供了可扩展且准确的方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32931516

MONET: Multi-omic module discovery by omic selection

MONET：通过组学选择发现多组学模块

DOI: 10.1371/journal.pcbi.1008182

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32931516/

Journal: PLoS computational biology {'ISSN': '1553-734x', 'Name': 'plos computational biology', '2015': '4.587', '2016': '4.542', '2017': '3.955', '2018': '4.428', '2019': '4.7'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Recent advances in experimental biology allow creation of datasets where several genome-wide data types (called omics) are measured per sample. Integrative analysis of multi-omic datasets in general, and clustering of samples in such datasets specifically, can improve our understanding of biological processes and discover different disease subtypes. In this work we present MONET (Multi Omic clustering by Non-Exhaustive Types), which presents a unique approach to multi-omic clustering. MONET discovers modules of similar samples, such that each module is allowed to have a clustering structure for only a subset of the omics. This approach differs from most existent multi-omic clustering algorithms, which assume a common structure across all omics, and from several recent algorithms that model distinct cluster structures. We tested MONET extensively on simulated data, on an image dataset, and on ten multi-omic cancer datasets from TCGA. Our analysis shows that MONET compares favorably with other multi-omic clustering methods. We demonstrate MONET's biological and clinical relevance by analyzing its results for Ovarian Serous Cystadenocarcinoma. We also show that MONET is robust to missing data, can cluster genes in multi-omic dataset, and reveal modules of cell types in single-cell multi-omic data. Our work shows that MONET is a valuable tool that can provide complementary results to those provided by existent algorithms for multi-omic analysis.

摘要: 实验生物学的最新进展允许创建数据集，其中每个样本可测量几种全基因组数据类型（称为组学）。通常，对多组学数据集进行综合分析，尤其是对此类数据集中的样本进行聚类，可以提高我们对生物学过程的了解并发现不同的疾病亚型。在这项工作中，我们介绍了MONET（非穷举类型的多Omic聚类），它提出了一种独特的方法来实现多Omic聚类。MONET会发现相似样本的模块，从而使每个模块仅具有一组组学即可。这种方法不同于大多数现有的多组学聚类算法，后者假定所有组学都具有相同的结构，并且不同于几种最近的对不同聚类结构建模的算法。我们在TCGA的模拟数据，图像数据集和十个多组癌症数据集上进行了广泛的MONET测试。我们的分析表明，MONET与其他多组学聚类方法相比具有优势。我们通过分析其对卵巢浆液性膀胱腺样腺癌的结果来证明MONET的生物学和临床意义。我们还表明，MONET对丢失的数据具有鲁棒性，可以在多组学数据集中对基因进行聚类，并在单细胞多组学数据中揭示细胞类型的模块。我们的工作表明，MONET是一种有价值的工具，可以为现有的多组学分析算法提供互补的结果。

Pubmed_ID: 32931264

Heterogenous Internalization of Nanoparticles at Ultra-Trace Concentration in Environmental Individual Unicellular Organisms Unveiled by Single-Cell Mass Cytometry

纳米微粒的异质内在化在单细胞质量细胞仪揭露的环境单个单细胞生物中的超痕迹浓度下。

DOI: 10.1021/acsnano.0c03587

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32931264/

Journal: ACS nano {'ISSN': '1936-0851', 'Name': 'acs nano', '2015': '13.334', '2016': '13.942', '2017': '13.709', '2018': '13.903', '2019': '14.588'}

Date: 10/02/2020

Abstract: The application and consumption of nanoparticles (NPs) inevitably result in the contamination of environmental water. The internalized NPs in unicellular organisms could travel to human bodies along food chains and raise health concerns. Current research failed to determine the characteristics of cellular uptake of NPs by unicellular organisms at extremely low concentration in the real environment. We here developed a label-free high-throughput mass cytometry method to investigate gold NP (AuNP) uptake in a unicellular organism (Tetrahymena thermophila) at the single-cell level. The limit of detection for Au is as low as to 6.67 × 10-18 g/cell, which equals ∼5.3 5 nm AuNPs. We demonstrated that active engulfment pathways were responsible for the cellular accumulation of AuNPs and T. thermophila could also eliminate the cellular AuNPs rapidly. The interaction between AuNPs and T. thermophila is highly dependent on the sizes of nanoparticles; i.e., the population of T. thermophila containing AuNPs decreased with the increment of the diameters of AuNPs when exposed to the same mass concentration. For each type of AuNP, distinct heterogeneous cellular uptake of AuNPs by T. thermophila was observed. Intriguingly, for 5 nm AuNP, even at 0.001 ng/mL, some T. thermophila cells could concentrate AuNPs, indicating a real environmental concern even when water was contaminated by only trace level of NPs. This method represents a promising tool for simultaneous determination of physiological status of cells together with the intracellular level of heavy metal or metallic NPs in study of biological effects.

摘要: 纳米颗粒（NPs）的使用和消耗不可避免地导致环境水的污染。单细胞生物中内在化的NP可能沿着食物链传播到人体，并引起健康问题。当前的研究未能确定单细胞生物在实际环境中以极低的浓度摄取NPs的特性。我们在这里开发了一种无标记的高通量细胞计数法，以研究单细胞水平的单细胞生物（嗜热四膜虫）中金纳米颗粒（AuNP）的吸收。Au的检出限低至6.67×10-18g/cell，等于〜5.35nmAuNPs。我们证明主动吞噬途径负责AuNPs和嗜热性衣原体的细胞积累也可以迅速消除细胞AuNPs。AuNPs和嗜热链球菌之间的相互作用高度依赖于纳米粒子的大小。即，当暴露于相同的质量浓度时，含有AuNP的嗜热链球菌的种群随着AuNP的直径的增加而减少。对于每种类型的AuNP，观察到嗜热毁丝球菌对AuNP的独特异质细胞摄取。有趣的是，对于5nm的AuNP，即使在0.001ng/mL的浓度下，某些嗜热性衣原体细胞也可能会浓缩AuNP，即使水仅被痕量的NP污染，也表明确实存在环境问题。该方法代表了一种有前途的工具，可用于同时测定细胞的生理状态以及细胞内重金属或金属NP的水平，以研究生物学效应。

Pubmed_ID: 32931153

Fine needle aspiration cytomorphology of papillary thyroid carcinoma with NTRK gene rearrangement from a case series with predominantly indeterminate cytology

NTRK基因重排的甲状腺乳头状癌的细针穿刺细胞学检查

DOI: 10.1002/cncy.22353

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32931153/

Journal: Cancer cytopathology {'ISSN': '1934-662x', 'Name': 'cancer cytopathology', '2015': '3.183', '2016': '3.818', '2017': '3.866', '2018': '4.425', '2019': '3.703'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Background: Neurotrophic tyrosine kinase receptor (NTRK) rearrangement has been reported in a subset of papillary thyroid carcinoma (PTC) cases. Little is known about the cytomorphologic features of NTRK-rearranged PTC. Methods: We report an institutional series of 13 fine needle aspiration (FNA) specimens of NTRK-rearranged PTC with a predominantly indeterminate cytology diagnosis. NTRK3 or NTRK1 rearrangements were detected on FNA or surgical specimens by next-generation sequencing. Results: The 13 patients had a median age of 18 years; 10 patients were female and 3 patients were male. In 10 (77%) cases, cytology was indeterminate, and histopathologic follow-up was predominantly the follicular variant of PTC (n = 8 [62%]), mostly infiltrative subtype. Of 12 FNA specimens available for review, a predominant loosely cohesive group pattern was the most commonly encountered architectural pattern (n = 5 [41%]), followed by single cell (n = 3 [25%]), thick cord (n = 2 [17%]), and microfollicular pattern (n = 2 [17%]). Background lymphocytic thyroiditis was observed in 9 cases. At the cellular level, the cytoplasm was moderate and granular, occasionally vacuolated. Classic PTC nuclear features (eg, nuclear enlargement, elongation, grooves, and nuclear membrane irregularity) were present but were often focal and subtle. Chromatin was often granular. Intranuclear pseudoinclusions were absent or rare. Conclusion: Our study demonstrates that most cases of NTRK rearrangement lack classic PTC cytomorphologic characteristics. Loosely cohesive groups and single cells with granular, sometimes vacuolated cytoplasm and subtle nuclear features are often seen on FNA specimens. Recognizing these characteristics may be helpful to preoperatively prompt molecular testing, including NTRK rearrangement analysis.

摘要: 背景：在部分乳头状甲状腺癌（PTC）病例中已报道了神经营养性酪氨酸激酶受体（NTRK）重排。关于NTRK重排PTC的细胞形态学特征知之甚少。方法：我们报告了一系列由NTRK重排PTC进行的13例细针穿刺（FNA）标本的组织学检查，主要为不确定的细胞学诊断。通过下一代测序在FNA或手术标本上检测到NTRK3或NTRK1重排。结果：13例患者的中位年龄为18岁。女性10例，男性3例。在10例（77％）病例中，细胞学检查不确定，组织病理学随访主要是PTC的卵泡变异（n=8[62％]），大部分为浸润性亚型。在可供审查的12个FNA标本中，最常见的建筑模式是松散粘聚的组模式（n=5[41％]），其次是单细胞（n=3[25％]），粗线（n=2[17％]）和微滤泡模式（n=2[17％]）。9例观察到背景性甲状腺甲状腺炎。在细胞水平上，细胞质中等且呈颗粒状，偶有空泡。存在经典的PTC核特征（例如，核增大，伸长，沟槽和核膜不规则），但通常具有局灶性和微妙性。染色质通常呈颗粒状。核内假包裹体不存在或很少。结论：我们的研究表明，大多数NTRK重排病例均缺乏经典的PTC细胞形态学特征。在FNA标本上经常看到松散的凝聚群和具有颗粒状，有时呈空泡状的细胞质以及微妙的核特征的单细胞。认识到这些特征可能有助于术前迅速进行分子检测，包括NTRK重排分析。

Pubmed_ID: 32930800

Developing a cell-bound detection system for the screening of oxidase activity using the fluorescent peroxide sensor roGFP2-Orp1

使用荧光过氧化物传感器roGFP2-Orp1开发一种用于检测氧化酶活性的细胞结合检测系统

DOI: 10.1093/protein/gzaa019

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32930800/

Journal: Protein engineering, design & selection : PEDS ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: Accurate yet efficient high-throughput screenings have emerged as essential technology for enzyme engineering via directed evolution. Modern high-throughput screening platforms for oxidoreductases are commonly assisted by technologies such as surface display and rely on emulsification techniques to facilitate single-cell analysis via fluorescence-activated cell sorting. Empowered by the dramatically increased throughput, the screening of significantly larger sequence spaces in acceptable time frames is achieved but usually comes at the cost of restricted applicability. In this work, we tackle this problem by utilizing roGFP2-Orp1 as a fluorescent one-component detection system for enzymatic H2O2 formation. We determined the kinetic parameters of the roGFP2-Orp1 reaction with H2O2 and established an efficient immobilization technique for the sensor on Saccharomyces cerevisiae cells employing the lectin Concanavalin A. This allowed to realize a peroxide-sensing shell on enzyme-displaying cells, a system that was successfully employed to screen for H2O2 formation of enzyme variants in a whole-cell setting.

摘要: 通过定向进化，准确而高效的高通量筛选已成为酶工程学的重要技术。用于氧化还原酶的现代高通量筛选平台通常由表面展示等技术辅助，并依靠乳化技术通过荧光激活的细胞分选促进单细胞分析。通过显着提高的通量，可以在可接受的时间范围内筛选出较大的序列空间，但通常以限制适用性为代价。在这项工作中，我们通过使用roGFP2-Orp1作为酶促H2O2形成的荧光单组分检测系统来解决此问题。我们确定了roGFP2-Orp1与H2O2反应的动力学参数，并使用凝集素伴刀豆球蛋白A建立了将传感器固定在酿酒酵母细胞上的有效固定技术。这可以在酶展示细胞上实现过氧化物传感壳，该系统被成功用于筛选全细胞环境中H2O2酶变体的形成。

Pubmed_ID: 32930441

Single-cell profiling of long noncoding RNAs and their cell lineage commitment roles via RNA-DNA-DNA triplex formation in mammary epithelium

长非编码RNA的单细胞分析及其在乳腺上皮中通过RNA-DNA-DNA三链体形成的细胞谱系定型作用

DOI: 10.1002/stem.3274

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32930441/

Journal: Stem cells (Dayton, Ohio) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Long noncoding RNAs (lncRNAs), which are crucial for organ development, exhibit cell-specific expression. Thus, transcriptomic analysis based on total tissue (bulk-seq) cannot accurately reflect the expression pattern of lncRNAs. Here, we used high-throughput single-cell RNA-seq data to investigate the role of lncRNAs using the hierarchical model of mammary epithelium. With our comprehensive annotation of the mammary epithelium, lncRNAs showed much greater cell-lineage specific expression than coding genes. The lineage-specific lncRNAs were functionally correlated with lineage commitment through the coding genes via the cis- and trans-effects of lncRNAs. For the working mechanism, lncRNAs formed a triplex structure with the DNA helix to regulate downstream lineage-specific marker genes. We used lncRNA-Carmn as an example to validate the above findings. Carmn, which is specifically expressed in mammary gland stem cells (MaSCs) and basal cells, positively regulated the Wnt signaling ligand Wnt10a through formation of a lncRNA-DNA-DNA triplex, and thus controlled the stemness of MaSCs. Our study suggests that lncRNAs play essential roles in cell-lineage commitment and provides an approach to decipher lncRNA functions based on single-cell RNA-seq data.

摘要: 对器官发育至关重要的长非编码RNA（lncRNA）表现出细胞特异性表达。因此，基于总组织的转录组分析（批量序列）无法准确反映lncRNA的表达模式。在这里，我们使用高通量单细胞RNA-seq数据，使用乳腺上皮的分层模型来研究lncRNA的作用。通过我们对乳腺上皮细胞的全面注释，lncRNAs显示出比编码基因更大的细胞谱系特异性表达。通过lncRNA的顺式和反式作用，通过编码基因使谱系特异性lncRNA在功能上与谱系承诺相关。对于工作机制，lncRNA与DNA螺旋形成三链体结构，以调节下游谱系特异性标记基因。我们以lncRNA-Carmn为例来验证上述发现。Carmn在乳腺干细胞（MaSCs）和基底细胞中特异性表达，通过形成lncRNA-DNA-DNA三链体正调控Wnt信号配体Wnt10a，从而控制了MaSCs的干性。我们的研究表明lncRNA在细胞谱系承诺中起着至关重要的作用，并提供了一种基于单细胞RNA序列数据破译lncRNA功能的方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32930334

Tumor-on-a-chip platform to interrogate the role of macrophages in tumor progression

片上肿瘤平台可询问巨噬细胞在肿瘤进展中的作用

DOI: 10.1093/intbio/zyaa017

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32930334/

Journal: Integrative biology : quantitative biosciences from nano to macro ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/30/2020

Abstract: Tumor-infiltrating leukocytes, in particular macrophages, play an important role in tumor behavior and clinical outcome. The spectrum of macrophage subtypes ranges from antitumor 'M1'-type to protumor 'M2'-type macrophages. Tumor-associated macrophages (TAMs) typically display phenotypic features of both M1 and M2, and the population distribution is thought to be dynamic and evolves as the tumor progresses. However, our understanding of how TAMs impact the tumor microenvironment remains limited by the lack of appropriate 3D in vitro models that can capture cell-cell dynamics at high spatial and temporal resolution. Using our recently developed microphysiological 'tumor-on-a-chip' (TOC) device, we present here our findings on the impact of defined macrophage subsets on tumor behavior. The TOC device design contains three adjacent and connected chambers in which both the upper and lower chambers are loaded with tumor cells, whereas the central chamber contains a dynamic, perfused, living microvascular network. Introduction of human pancreatic or colorectal cancer cells together with M1-polarized macrophages significantly inhibited tumor growth and tumor-induced angiogenesis. Protein analysis and antibody-based neutralization studies confirmed that these effects were mediated through production of C-X-C motif chemokines (CXCL9), CXCL10 and CXCL11. By contrast, M2-macrophages mediated increased tumor cell migration into the vascularized chamber and did not inhibit tumor growth or angiogenesis. In fact, single-cell RNA sequencing showed that M2 macrophages further segregated endothelial cells into two distinct subsets, corresponding to static cells in vessels versus active cells involved in angiogenesis. The impact of M2 macrophages was mediated mostly by production of matrix metalloproteinase 7 and angiopoietin 2. In summary, our data demonstrate the utility of the TOC device to mechanistically probe biological questions in a 3D in vitro microenvironment.

摘要: 肿瘤浸润白细胞，特别是巨噬细胞，在肿瘤行为和临床结果中起重要作用。巨噬细胞亚型的光谱范围从抗肿瘤的“M1”型到肿瘤的“M2”型巨噬细胞。肿瘤相关的巨噬细胞（TAM）通常显示M1和M2的表型特征，并且人口分布被认为是动态的，并且随着肿瘤的进展而发展。但是，我们对TAMs如何影响肿瘤微环境的理解仍然受到缺乏合适的3D体外模型的限制，该模型可以在高空间和时间分辨率下捕获细胞动态。使用我们最近开发的微生理“芯片上肿瘤”（TOC）设备，我们在这里介绍了我们对确定的巨噬细胞亚群对肿瘤行为的影响的发现。TOC装置的设计包含三个相邻且相连的腔室，上腔室和下腔室均装有肿瘤细胞，而中央腔室则包含动态的，灌注的活体微血管网络。人胰腺或结直肠癌细胞与M1极化的巨噬细胞一起引入显着抑制肿瘤生长和肿瘤诱导的血管生成。蛋白质分析和基于抗体的中和研究证实，这些作用是通过产生C-X-C基序趋化因子（CXCL9），CXCL10和CXCL11介导的。相比之下，M2-巨噬细胞介导的肿瘤细胞向血管化腔室的迁移增加，并且不抑制肿瘤的生长或血管生成。实际上，单细胞RNA测序显示M2巨噬细胞将内皮细胞进一步分为两个不同的亚群，分别对应于血管中的静态细胞与血管生成中涉及的活性细胞。M2巨噬细胞的影响主要由基质金属蛋白酶7和血管生成素2的产生介导。总而言之，我们的数据证明了TOC装置在3D体外微环境中机械探测生物学问题的实用性。

Pubmed_ID: 32929989

Single-Cell RNA-seq Unveils Unique Transcriptomic Signatures of Organ-Specific Endothelial Cells

单细胞RNA序列揭示了器官特异性内皮细胞的独特转录组特征。

DOI: 10.1161/CIRCULATIONAHA.119.041433

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929989/

Journal: Circulation {'ISSN': '0009-7322', 'Name': 'circulation', '2015': '17.047', '2016': '19.309', '2017': '18.88', '2018': '23.054', '2019': '23.603'}

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Background: Endothelial cells (ECs) display considerable functional heterogeneity depending on the vessel and tissue in which they are located. While these functional differences are presumably imprinted in the transcriptome, the pathways and networks which sustain EC heterogeneity have not been fully delineated. Methods: To investigate the transcriptomic basis of EC specificity, we analyzed single-cell RNA-sequencing (scRNA-seq) data from tissue-specific mouse ECs generated by the Tabula Muris consortium. We employed a number of bioinformatics tools to uncover markers and sources of EC heterogeneity from scRNA-seq data. Results: We found a strong correlation between tissue-specific EC transcriptomic measurements generated by either scRNA-seq or bulk RNA-seq, thus validating the approach. Using a graph-based clustering algorithm, we found that certain tissue-specific ECs cluster strongly by tissue (e.g. liver, brain) whereas others (i.e. adipose, heart) have considerable transcriptomic overlap with ECs from other tissues. We identified novel markers of tissue-specific ECs and signaling pathways that may be involved in maintaining their identity. Sex was a considerable source of heterogeneity in the endothelial transcriptome and we discovered Lars2 to be a gene that is highly enriched in ECs from male mice. In addition, we found that markers of heart and lung ECs in mice were conserved in human fetal heart and lung ECs. Finally, we identified potential angiocrine interactions between tissue-specific ECs and other cell types by analyzing ligand and receptor expression patterns. Conclusions: In summary, we use scRNA-seq data generated by the Tabula Muris consortium to uncover transcriptional networks that maintain tissue-specific EC identity and to identify novel angiocrine and functional relationships between tissue-specific ECs.

摘要: 背景：内皮细胞（EC）表现出相当大的功能异质性，具体取决于它们所处的血管和组织。虽然这些功能差异可能被印在转录组中，但维持EC异质性的途径和网络尚未完全描绘出来。方法：为了研究EC特异性的转录组基础，我们分析了由TabulaMuris联盟产生的组织特异性小鼠EC的单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）数据。我们使用了许多生物信息学工具从scRNA-seq数据中发现EC异质性的标志物和来源。结果：我们发现由scRNA-seq或大量RNA-seq产生的组织特异性EC转录组测量结果之间有很强的相关性，从而验证了该方法。使用基于图的聚类算法，我们发现某些组织特异性EC会被组织（例如肝，脑）强烈聚类，而其他组织（即脂肪，心脏）则与其他组织的EC具有相当的转录组重叠。我们确定了可能与维持其身份有关的组织特异性EC和信号通路的新型标记。性别是内皮转录组中异质性的重要来源，我们发现Lars2是在雄性小鼠EC中高度富集的基因。此外，我们发现小鼠心脏和肺EC的标记在人类胎儿心脏和肺EC中是保守的。最后，我们通过分析配体和受体表达模式，确定了组织特异性EC和其他细胞类型之间潜在的血管分泌相互作用。结论：总而言之，我们使用由TabulaMuris财团产生的scRNA-seq数据来揭示维持组织特异性EC身份并识别组织特异性EC之间新的血管分泌和功能关系的转录网络。

Pubmed_ID: 32929267

Multidimensional transcriptomic mapping of human endometrium at single-cell resolution

人子宫内膜在单细胞分辨率下的多维转录组作图

DOI: 10.1038/s41591-020-1075-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929267/

Journal: Nature medicine {'ISSN': '1078-8956', 'Name': 'nature medicine', '2015': '30.357', '2016': '29.886', '2017': '32.621', '2018': '30.641', '2019': '36.13'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32929266

Single-cell transcriptomic atlas of the human endometrium during the menstrual cycle

月经周期人子宫内膜单细胞转录组图谱

DOI: 10.1038/s41591-020-1040-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929266/

Journal: Nature medicine {'ISSN': '1078-8956', 'Name': 'nature medicine', '2015': '30.357', '2016': '29.886', '2017': '32.621', '2018': '30.641', '2019': '36.13'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: In a human menstrual cycle the endometrium undergoes remodeling, shedding and regeneration, all of which are driven by substantial gene expression changes in the underlying cellular hierarchy. Despite its importance in human fertility and regenerative biology, our understanding of this unique type of tissue homeostasis remains rudimentary. We characterized the transcriptomic transformation of human endometrium at single-cell resolution across the menstrual cycle, resolving cellular heterogeneity in multiple dimensions. We profiled the behavior of seven endometrial cell types, including a previously uncharacterized ciliated cell type, during four major phases of endometrial transformation, and found characteristic signatures for each cell type and phase. We discovered that the human window of implantation opens with an abrupt and discontinuous transcriptomic activation in the epithelia, accompanied with a widespread decidualization feature in the stromal fibroblasts. Our study provides a high-resolution molecular and cellular characterization of human endometrial transformation across the menstrual cycle, providing insights into this essential physiological process.

摘要: 在人类的月经周期中，子宫内膜会发生重塑，脱落和再生，所有这些都由潜在的细胞层次中大量的基因表达变化驱动。尽管它在人类生育力和再生生物学中具有重要意义，但我们对这种独特类型的组织稳态的理解仍然是基本的。我们在整个月经周期的单细胞分辨率下表征了人类子宫内膜的转录组转化，从而在多个维度上解决了细胞异质性。我们在子宫内膜转化的四个主要阶段分析了七种子宫内膜细胞类型（包括以前未鉴定的纤毛细胞类型）的行为，并发现了每种细胞类型和阶段的特征性特征。我们发现人类的植入窗口打开与上皮细胞的突然和不连续的转录组激活，并伴随在基质成纤维细胞中广泛的蜕膜化特征。我们的研究提供了跨月经周期的人类子宫内膜转化的高分辨率分子和细胞表征，为这一基本的生理过程提供了见识。

Pubmed_ID: 32929226

Single-cell transcriptomics in cancer: computational challenges and opportunities

癌症中的单细胞转录组学：计算上的挑战和机遇

DOI: 10.1038/s12276-020-0422-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929226/

Journal: Experimental & molecular medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Intratumor heterogeneity is a common characteristic across diverse cancer types and presents challenges to current standards of treatment. Advancements in high-throughput sequencing and imaging technologies provide opportunities to identify and characterize these aspects of heterogeneity. Notably, transcriptomic profiling at a single-cell resolution enables quantitative measurements of the molecular activity that underlies the phenotypic diversity of cells within a tumor. Such high-dimensional data require computational analysis to extract relevant biological insights about the cell types and states that drive cancer development, pathogenesis, and clinical outcomes. In this review, we highlight emerging themes in the computational analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data and their applications to cancer research. We focus on downstream analytical challenges relevant to cancer research, including how to computationally perform unified analysis across many patients and disease states, distinguish neoplastic from nonneoplastic cells, infer communication with the tumor microenvironment, and delineate tumoral and microenvironmental evolution with trajectory and RNA velocity analysis. We include discussions of challenges and opportunities for future computational methodological advancements necessary to realize the translational potential of single-cell transcriptomic profiling in cancer.

摘要: 肿瘤内异质性是多种癌症类型之间的共同特征，并且对当前的治疗标准提出了挑战。高通量测序和成像技术的进步为识别和表征异质性的这些方面提供了机会。值得注意的是，以单细胞分辨率进行转录组谱分析能够定量测量构成肿瘤内细胞表型多样性基础的分子活性。此类高维数据需要进行计算分析，以提取有关驱动癌症发展，发病机制和临床结果的细胞类型和状态的相关生物学见解。在这篇综述中，我们重点介绍了单细胞转录组学数据的计算分析中的新兴主题及其在癌症研究中的应用。我们专注于与癌症研究相关的下游分析挑战，包括如何对许多患者和疾病状态进行统一分析，如何将肿瘤细胞与非肿瘤细胞区分开来，推断与肿瘤微环境的交流以及通过轨迹和RNA速度分析来描绘肿瘤和微环境的演变。我们讨论了为实现单细胞转录组谱分析在癌症中的翻译潜力所必需的未来计算方法的发展所面临的挑战和机遇的讨论。

Pubmed_ID: 32929225

Single-cell multiomics: technologies and data analysis methods

单细胞多组学：技术和数据分析方法

DOI: 10.1038/s12276-020-0420-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929225/

Journal: Experimental & molecular medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Advances in single-cell isolation and barcoding technologies offer unprecedented opportunities to profile DNA, mRNA, and proteins at a single-cell resolution. Recently, bulk multiomics analyses, such as multidimensional genomic and proteogenomic analyses, have proven beneficial for obtaining a comprehensive understanding of cellular events. This benefit has facilitated the development of single-cell multiomics analysis, which enables cell type-specific gene regulation to be examined. The cardinal features of single-cell multiomics analysis include (1) technologies for single-cell isolation, barcoding, and sequencing to measure multiple types of molecules from individual cells and (2) the integrative analysis of molecules to characterize cell types and their functions regarding pathophysiological processes based on molecular signatures. Here, we summarize the technologies for single-cell multiomics analyses (mRNA-genome, mRNA-DNA methylation, mRNA-chromatin accessibility, and mRNA-protein) as well as the methods for the integrative analysis of single-cell multiomics data.

摘要: 单细胞分离和条形码技术的进步为以单细胞分辨率分析DNA，mRNA和蛋白质提供了前所未有的机会。最近，大量多维组学分析，例如多维基因组和蛋白质组学分析，已证明有利于获得对细胞事件的全面了解。这种益处促进了单细胞多组学分析的发展，该分析使得能够检查特定细胞类型的基因调控。单细胞多组学分析的基本特征包括：（1）用于单细胞分离，条形码和测序的技术，以测量来自单个细胞的多种类型的分子；（2）分子的综合分析，以表征与细胞类型有关的细胞类型及其功能基于分子标记的病理生理过程。在这里，我们总结了用于单细胞多组学分析的技术（mRNA基因组，mRNA-DNA甲基化，mRNA-染色质可及性和mRNA-蛋白质）以及用于单细胞多组学数据的综合分析的方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32929224

Human Cell Atlas and cell-type authentication for regenerative medicine

人类细胞图谱和再生医学的细胞类型认证

DOI: 10.1038/s12276-020-0421-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929224/

Journal: Experimental & molecular medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: In modern biology, the correct identification of cell types is required for the developmental study of tissues and organs and the production of functional cells for cell therapies and disease modeling. For decades, cell types have been defined on the basis of morphological and physiological markers and, more recently, immunological markers and molecular properties. Recent advances in single-cell RNA sequencing have opened new doors for the characterization of cells at the individual and spatiotemporal levels on the basis of their RNA profiles, vastly transforming our understanding of cell types. The objective of this review is to survey the current progress in the field of cell-type identification, starting with the Human Cell Atlas project, which aims to sequence every cell in the human body, to molecular marker databases for individual cell types and other sources that address cell-type identification for regenerative medicine based on cell data guidelines.

摘要: 在现代生物学中，对于组织和器官的发育研究以及用于细胞治疗和疾病建模的功能性细胞的生产，需要正确识别细胞类型。几十年来，已经根据形态学和生理学标志物以及最近的免疫学标志物和分子特性定义了细胞类型。单细胞RNA测序的最新进展为基于RNA概况在个体和时空水平上表征细胞打开了新的大门，极大地改变了我们对细胞类型的理解。这篇综述的目的是从“人类细胞图谱”项目开始，调查细胞类型识别领域的当前进展，该项目旨在对人体中的每个细胞进行测序，并进入针对单个细胞类型和其他来源的分子标记数据库根据细胞数据指南解决再生医学的细胞类型鉴定问题。

Pubmed_ID: 32929223

Single-cell genomics technology: perspectives

单细胞基因组学技术：前景

DOI: 10.1038/s12276-020-00495-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929223/

Journal: Experimental & molecular medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: No abstract

Pubmed_ID: 32929222

An era of single-cell genomics consortia

单细胞基因组学联盟的时代

DOI: 10.1038/s12276-020-0409-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929222/

Journal: Experimental & molecular medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: The human body consists of 37 trillion single cells represented by over 50 organs that are stitched together to make us who we are, yet we still have very little understanding about the basic units of our body: what cell types and states make up our organs both compositionally and spatially. Previous efforts to profile a wide range of human cell types have been attempted by the FANTOM and GTEx consortia. Now, with the advancement in genomic technologies, profiling the human body at single-cell resolution is possible and will generate an unprecedented wealth of data that will accelerate basic and clinical research with tangible applications to future medicine. To date, several major organs have been profiled, but the challenges lie in ways to integrate single-cell genomics data in a meaningful way. In recent years, several consortia have begun to introduce harmonization and equity in data collection and analysis. Herein, we introduce existing and nascent single-cell genomics consortia, and present benefits to necessitate single-cell genomic consortia in a regional environment to achieve the universal human cell reference dataset.

摘要: 人体由37万亿个单细胞组成，这些单细胞由50多个器官缝合在一起，使我们成为我们自己，但我们对人体的基本单位仍然知之甚少：什么类型的细胞和状态都构成我们的器官组成和空间上。FANTOM和GTEx联盟已经尝试过对广泛的人类细胞类型进行分析的努力。现在，随着基因组技术的发展，以单细胞分辨率对人体进行分析成为可能，并将产生前所未有的大量数据，这些数据将加速基础和临床研究，并将其切实地应用于未来医学。迄今为止，已经描述了几个主要器官，但是挑战在于以有意义的方式整合单细胞基因组学数据的方式。近年来，几个财团已开始在数据收集和分析中引入协调性和公平性。在这里，我们介绍了现有的和新生的单细胞基因组财团，并介绍了在区域环境中实现通用人类细胞参考数据集所必需的单细胞基因组财团的好处。

Pubmed_ID: 32929221

Single-cell sequencing techniques from individual to multiomics analyses

从个体分析到多组学分析的单细胞测序技术

DOI: 10.1038/s12276-020-00499-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929221/

Journal: Experimental & molecular medicine ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/15/2020

Abstract: Here, we review single-cell sequencing techniques for individual and multiomics profiling in single cells. We mainly describe single-cell genomic, epigenomic, and transcriptomic methods, and examples of their applications. For the integration of multilayered data sets, such as the transcriptome data derived from single-cell RNA sequencing and chromatin accessibility data derived from single-cell ATAC-seq, there are several computational integration methods. We also describe single-cell experimental methods for the simultaneous measurement of two or more omics layers. We can achieve a detailed understanding of the basic molecular profiles and those associated with disease in each cell by utilizing a large number of single-cell sequencing techniques and the accumulated data sets.

摘要: 在这里，我们回顾了单细胞测序技术，用于在单细胞中进行个体和多组学分析。我们主要介绍单细胞基因组学，表观基因组学和转录组学方法，及其应用实例。对于多层数据集的整合，例如从单细胞RNA测序获得的转录组数据和从单细胞ATAC-seq获得的染色质可及性数据，有几种计算整合方法。我们还描述了同时测量两个或多个组学层的单细胞实验方法。通过利用大量的单细胞测序技术和积累的数据集，我们可以对基本分子谱以及与每个细胞中的疾病相关的分子谱有详细的了解。

Pubmed_ID: 32929126

Evaluation of whole genome amplification and bioinformatic methods for the characterization of Leishmania genomes at a single cell level

评价单细胞水平上利什曼原虫基因组特征的全基因组扩增和生物信息学方法

DOI: 10.1038/s41598-020-71882-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32929126/

Journal: Scientific reports {'ISSN': '2045-2322', 'Name': 'scientific reports', '2015': '5.228', '2016': '4.259', '2017': '4.122', '2018': '4.011', '2019': '3.998'}

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: Here, we report a pilot study paving the way for further single cell genomics studies in Leishmania. First, the performances of two commercially available kits for Whole Genome Amplification (WGA), PicoPLEX and RepliG were compared on small amounts of Leishmania donovani DNA, testing their ability to preserve specific genetic variations, including aneuploidy levels and SNPs. We show here that the choice of WGA method should be determined by the planned downstream genetic analysis, PicoPLEX and RepliG performing better for aneuploidy and SNP calling, respectively. This comparison allowed us to evaluate and optimize corresponding bio-informatic methods. As PicoPLEX was shown to be the preferred method for studying single cell aneuploidy, this method was applied in a second step, on single cells of L. braziliensis, which were sorted by fluorescence activated cell sorting (FACS). Even sequencing depth was achieved in 28 single cells, allowing accurate somy estimation. A dominant karyotype with three aneuploid chromosomes was observed in 25 cells, while two different minor karyotypes were observed in the other cells. Our method thus allowed the detection of aneuploidy mosaicism, and provides a solid basis which can be further refined to concur with higher-throughput single cell genomic methods.

摘要: 在这里，我们报告了一项初步研究，为进一步在利什曼原虫中进行单细胞基因组学研究铺平了道路。首先，将两种市售的全基因组扩增（WGA）试剂盒，PicoPLEX和RepliG的性能在少量利什曼原虫donovaniDNA上进行了比较，测试了它们保留特定遗传变异（包括非整倍性水平和SNP）的能力。我们在这里表明，应该通过计划的下游遗传分析确定WGA方法的选择，PicoPLEX和RepliG分别在非整倍性和SNP调用方面表现更好。这种比较使我们能够评估和优化相应的生物信息学方法。由于PicoPLEX已被证明是研究单细胞非整倍性的首选方法，因此该方法在第二步中应用到了巴西乳杆菌的单细胞上，并通过荧光激活细胞分选（FACS）进行了分选。在28个单细胞中甚至可以达到测序深度，从而可以进行准确的大豆估计。在25个细胞中观察到具有三个非整倍体染色体的显性核型，而在其他细胞中观察到两个不同的次要核型。因此，我们的方法允许检测非整倍性镶嵌，并提供了坚实的基础，可以进一步完善以与更高通量的单细胞基因组方法相一致。

Pubmed_ID: 32928889

Drosophila voltage-gated sodium channels are only expressed in active neurons and are localized to distal axonal initial segment-like domains

果蝇电压门控性钠通道仅在活动神经元中表达，并位于远端轴突初始节段样结构域

DOI: 10.1523/JNEUROSCI.0142-20.2020

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32928889/

Journal: The Journal of neuroscience : the official journal of the Society for Neuroscience ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: In multipolar vertebrate neurons, action potentials (AP) initiate close to the soma, at the axonal initial segment (AIS). Invertebrate neurons are typically unipolar with dendrites integrating directly into the axon. Where APs are initiated in the axons of invertebrate neurons is unclear. Voltage-gated sodium (NaV) channels are a functional hallmark of the AIS in vertebrates. We used an intronic MiMIC to determine the endogenous gene expression and subcellular localization of the sole NaV channel in both male and female Drosophila, para. Despite being the only NaV channel in the fly, we show that only 23 ±1% of neurons in the embryonic and larval CNS express para, while in the adult CNS para is broadly expressed. We generated a single-cell transcriptomic atlas of the whole 3rd instar larval brain to identify para expressing neurons and show that it positively correlates with markers of differentiated, actively firing neurons. Therefore only 23 ±1% of larval neurons may be capable of firing NaV-dependent APs. We then show that Para is enriched in an axonal segment, distal to the site of dendritic integration into the axon, which we named the Distal Axonal Segment (DAS). The DAS is present in multiple neuron classes in both the 3rd instar larval and adult CNS. Whole cell patch clamp electrophysiological recordings of adult CNS fly neurons are consistent with the interpretation that Nav-dependent APs originate in the DAS. Identification of the distal NaV localization in fly neurons will enable more accurate interpretation of electrophysiological recordings in invertebrates.SIGNIFICANCE STATEMENTThe site of AP in invertebrates is unknown. We tagged the sole NaV channel in the fly, para, and identified that Para is enriched at a distal axonal segment (DAS). The DAS is located distal to where dendrites impinge on axons and is the likely site of AP initiation. Understanding where APs are initiated improves our ability to model neuronal activity and our interpretation of electrophysiological data. Additionally, para is only expressed in 23 ±1% of 3rd instar larval neurons but is broadly expressed in adults. Single-cell RNA sequencing of the 3rd instar larval brain shows that para expression correlates with the expression of active, differentiated neuronal markers. Therefore, only 23 ±1% of 3rd instar larval neurons may be able to actively fire NaV-dependent APs.

摘要: 在多极脊椎动物神经元中，动作电位（AP）在轴突初始节（AIS）处靠近人体。无脊椎动物神经元通常是单极的，树突直接整合到轴突中。在无脊椎动物神经元轴突中启动AP的位置尚不清楚。电压门控钠（NaV）通道是脊椎动物AIS的功能标志。我们使用了内含子MiMIC来确定果蝇雄性和雌性中唯一NaV通道的内源基因表达和亚细胞定位。尽管它是飞行中唯一的NaV通道，但我们显示，胚胎和幼虫CNS中只有23±1％的神经元表达对位，而成人CNS对位则广泛表达。我们生成了整个第3龄幼虫大脑的单细胞转录组图谱，以鉴定表达para的神经元，并显示它与分化的，主动激发的神经元的标记呈正相关。因此，只有23±1％的幼虫神经元可以激发依赖NaV的AP。然后，我们显示Para富含轴突节，远离树突整合到轴突的位置，我们将其命名为远端轴突节（DAS）。DAS存在于三龄幼虫和成年中枢神经系统的多个神经元类别中。成人中枢神经系统蝇神经元的全细胞膜片钳电生理记录与Nav依赖的AP起源于DAS的解释一致。识别飞行神经元中的远端NaV定位将能够更准确地解释无脊椎动物中的电生理记录。意义声明无脊椎动物AP的部位尚不清楚。我们在飞行中，对位标记了唯一的NaV通道，并确定对位在远端轴突节（DAS）处富集。DAS位于树突撞击轴突的远端，并且可能是AP引发的部位。了解AP起始位置可提高我们对神经元活动进行建模的能力以及对电生理数据的解释。另外，对位仅在23龄幼虫神经元的23％±1％中表达，但在成年人中广泛表达。第三龄幼虫大脑的单细胞RNA测序表明，para表达与活跃的分化神经元标志物的表达相关。因此，只有23±1％的三龄幼虫神经元能够主动激发NaV依赖的AP。

Pubmed_ID: 32928506

Cellular thermogenesis compensates environmental temperature fluctuations for maintaining intracellular temperature

细胞生热可补偿环境温度波动以维持细胞内温度

DOI: 10.1016/j.bbrc.2020.08.110

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32928506/

Journal: Biochemical and biophysical research communications {'ISSN': '0006-291x', 'Name': 'biochemical and biophysical research communications', '2015': '2.371', '2016': '2.466', '2017': '2.559', '2018': '2.705', '2019': '2.985'}

Date: 09/11/2020

Abstract: Temperature governs states and dynamics of all biological molecules, and several cellular processes are often heat sources and/or sinks. Technical achievement of intracellular thermometry enables us to measure intracellular temperature, and it can offer novel perspectives in biology and medicine. However, little is known that changes of intracellular temperature throughout the cell-cycle and the manner of which cells regulates their thermogenesis in response to fluctuation of the environmental temperature. Here, cell-cycle-dependent changes of intracellular temperature were reconstructed from the snapshots of cell population at single-cell resolution using ergodic analysis for asynchronously cultured HeLa cells expressing a genetically encoded thermometry. Intracellular temperature is highest at G1 phase, and it gradually decreases along cell-cycle progression and increases abruptly during mitosis. Cells easily heated up are harder to cool down and vice versa, especially at G1/S phases. Together, intracellular thermogenesis depends on cell-cycle phases and it maintains intracellular temperature through compensating environmental temperature fluctuations.

摘要: 温度控制着所有生物分子的状态和动力学，几种细胞过程通常是热源和/或吸收器。细胞内测温的技术成就使我们能够测量细胞内的温度，并且可以为生物学和医学提供新的观点。但是，几乎不知道整个细胞周期内细胞内温度的变化以及细胞响应环境温度的波动调节生热的方式。在这里，使用遍历分析法从单细胞分辨率的细胞群体快照中重建依赖细胞周期的细胞内温度变化，以遍历分析的方式表达基因编码测温法的异步培养的HeLa细胞。细胞内温度在G1期最高，并且随着细胞周期进程逐渐降低，在有丝分裂期间突然升高。容易加热的电池更难冷却，反之亦然，尤其是在G1/S阶段。总之，细胞内生热取决于细胞周期阶段，并且它通过补偿环境温度波动来维持细胞内温度。

Pubmed_ID: 32928100

RNA-seq analysis of galaninergic neurons from ventrolateral preoptic nucleus identifies expression changes between sleep and wake

腹侧前视神经核的加拉尼能神经元的RNA-seq分析确定了睡眠与唤醒之间的表达变化

DOI: 10.1186/s12864-020-07050-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32928100/

Journal: BMC genomics {'ISSN': '1471-2164', 'Name': 'bmc genomics', '2015': '3.867', '2016': '3.729', '2017': '3.73', '2018': '3.501', '2019': '3.594'}

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: Background: Previous studies show that galanin neurons in ventrolateral preoptic nucleus (VLPO-Gal) are essential for sleep regulation. Here, we explored the transcriptional regulation of the VLPO-Gal neurons in sleep by comparing their transcriptional responses between sleeping mice and those kept awake, sacrificed at the same diurnal time. Results: RNA-sequencing (RNA-seq) analysis was performed on eGFP(+) galanin neurons isolated using laser captured microdissection (LCM) from VLPO. Expression of Gal was assessed in our LCM eGFP(+) neurons via real time qPCR and showed marked enrichment when compared to LCM eGFP(-) cells and to bulk VLPO samples. Gene set enrichment analysis utilizing data from a recent single-cell RNA-seq study of the preoptic area demonstrated that our VLPO-Gal samples were highly enriched with galanin-expressing inhibitory neurons, but not galanin-expressing excitatory neurons. A total of 263 genes were differentially expressed between sleep and wake in VLPO-Gal neurons. When comparing differentially expressed genes in VLPO-Gal neurons to differentially expressed genes in a wake-active neuronal region (the medial prefrontal cortex), evidence indicates that both systemic and cell-specific mechanisms contribute to the transcriptional regulation in VLPO-Gal neurons. In both wake-active and sleep-active neurons, ER stress pathways are activated by wake and cold-inducible RNA-binding proteins are activated by sleep. In contrast, expression of DNA repair genes is increased in VLPO-Gal during wakefulness, but increased in wake-active cells during sleep. Conclusion: Our study identified transcriptomic responses of the galanin neurons in the ventrolateral preoptic nucleus during sleep and sleep deprivation. Data indicate that VLPO contains mainly sleep-active inhibitory galaninergic neurons. The VLPO galanin neurons show responses to sleep and wake similar to wake-active regions, indicating these responses, such as ER stress and cold-inducible RNA-binding proteins, are systemic affecting all neuronal populations. Region-specific differences in sleep/wake responses were also identified, in particular DNA repair. Our study expands knowledge about the transcriptional response of a distinct group of neurons essential for sleep.

摘要: 背景：以前的研究表明，腹侧视前核（VLPO-Gal）中的甘丙肽神经元对于睡眠调节至关重要。在这里，我们通过比较睡眠小鼠与保持清醒并在同一昼夜时间处死的小鼠之间的转录反应，探索了VLPO-Gal神经元在睡眠中的转录调控。结果：使用来自VLPO的激光捕获显微解剖（LCM）对分离的eGFP（+）甘丙肽神经元进行了RNA测序（RNA-seq）分析。通过实时qPCR在我们的LCMeGFP（+）神经元中评估了Gal的表达，与LCMeGFP（-）细胞和大量VLPO样品相比，Gal的表达显着丰富。基因集富集分析利用了来自最近的对视前区域的单细胞RNA-seq研究的数据，表明我们的VLPO-Gal样品富含表达甘丙肽的抑制性神经元，但没有表达甘丙肽的兴奋性神经元。VLPO-Gal神经元在睡眠和唤醒之间共有263个基因差异表达。当比较VLPO-Gal神经元中差异表达的基因与唤醒活跃神经元区域（内侧前额叶皮层）中差异表达的基因时，证据表明系统性和细胞特异性机制都有助于VLPO-Gal神经元的转录调控。在唤醒活跃和睡眠活跃神经元中，ER应激途径均由唤醒激活，而冷诱导性RNA结合蛋白则由睡眠激活。相反，DNA修复基因的表达在清醒期间在VLPO-Gal中增加，但在睡眠期间在唤醒活性细胞中增加。结论：我们的研究确定了睡眠和睡眠剥夺期间腹侧前视神经核中甘丙肽神经元的转录组反应。数据表明，VLPO主要包含睡眠活性抑制性加兰能神经元。VLPO甘丙肽神经元显示出与睡眠活动区域相似的睡眠和唤醒反应，表明这些反应（例如ER应激和冷诱导RNA结合蛋白）对所有神经元群体均具有系统性影响。还确定了睡眠/唤醒反应的区域特异性差异，特别是DNA修复。我们的研究扩展了关于睡眠必不可少的不同神经元的转录反应的知识。

Pubmed_ID: 32928064

Integral evaluation of production safety and genotoxicity of recycling residual sludge for drinking water treatment plants

饮用水处理厂回收剩余污泥的生产安全性和遗传毒性的综合评价

DOI: 10.1080/09593330.2020.1824021

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32928064/

Journal: Environmental technology {'ISSN': '0959-3330', 'Name': 'environmental technology', '2015': '1.76', '2016': '1.751', '2017': '1.666', '2018': '1.918', '2019': '2.213'}

Date: 10/02/2020

Abstract: Recycling residual sludge in drinking water treatment plants (DWTPs) may release excessive heavy metals and organic matter, which are substances of concern because of their toxic and carcinogenic potential. The aim of this study was to investigate potential genotoxic, cytotoxic, and mutagenic effects of recycled residual sludge in terms of quality of water in potable water works. Genotoxic effects of reusing residual sludge were evaluated using: the Ames test, sperm abnormality test in mice, micronucleus assay, comet assay, and single-cell gel electrophoresis assay. The results of the Ames assay show that the disinfected water sample displays bacteriostasis at a dose of 7 L/dish regardless of treatment styles, but mutagenicity ratio (MR) < 2 can still be judged as negative. The micronucleus rates of conventional treatment were slightly genotoxic but only at 4 and 40 L/kg·bw, whereas micronucleus rates of filtered water and disinfectant from the recycling process were negative in all of the dose groups. The levels of DNA damage that are caused by different treatment processes were equivalent. Reusing residual sludge for DWTPs did not contribute to the release of genotoxic or mutagenic compounds, but it did have a remarkable effect on saving the drug dose and increasing drinking water yield. Thus, reusing residual sludge for DWTPs should be widely recommended.

摘要: 在饮用水处理厂（DWTP）中回收残留污泥可能会释放出过量的重金属和有机物，这些物质由于其有毒和致癌性而备受关注。这项研究的目的是从饮用水厂的水质方面研究回收的剩余污泥的潜在遗传毒性，细胞毒性和诱变作用。重复利用残留污泥的遗传毒性作用通过以下方法进行评估：Ames试验，小鼠精子异常试验，微核试验，彗星试验和单细胞凝胶电泳试验。Ames测定的结果表明，无论处理方式如何，消毒水样品均以7L/皿的剂量显示出抑菌作用，但诱变比（MR）<2仍可判定为阴性。常规处理的微核率具有轻微的遗传毒性，但仅在4和40L/kg·bw时，而在所有剂量组中，来自循环过程的过滤水和消毒剂的微核率均为负。由不同处理过程引起的DNA损伤水平是相同的。将残留污泥再用于DWTP并不会释放遗传毒性或诱变化合物，但确实对节省药物剂量和增加饮​​用水产量具有显著作用。因此，应广泛建议将剩余污泥用于DWTP。

Pubmed_ID: 32927687

Using High-Content Screening to Generate Single-Cell Gene-Corrected Patient-Derived iPS Clones Reveals Excess Alpha-Synuclein with Familial Parkinson's Disease Point Mutation A30P

使用高内涵筛选生成单细胞基因校正的患者衍生的iPS克隆揭示了家族性帕金森氏病点突变A30P过量的α-突触核蛋白

DOI: 10.3390/cells9092065

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32927687/

Journal: Cells {'ISSN': '2073-4409', 'Name': 'cells', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '4.829', '2018': '5.656', '2019': '4.366'}

Date: 09/10/2020

Abstract: The generation of isogenic induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC) lines using CRISPR-Cas9 technology is a technically challenging, time-consuming process with variable efficiency. Here we use fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS) to sort biallelic CRISPR-Cas9 edited single-cell iPSC clones into high-throughput 96-well microtiter plates. We used high-content screening (HCS) technology and generated an in-house developed algorithm to select the correctly edited isogenic clones for continued expansion and validation. In our model we have gene-corrected the iPSCs of a Parkinson's disease (PD) patient carrying the autosomal dominantly inherited heterozygous c.88G>C mutation in the SNCA gene, which leads to the pathogenic p.A30P form of the alpha-synuclein protein. Undertaking a PCR restriction-digest mediated clonal selection strategy prior to sequencing, we were able to post-sort validate each isogenic clone using a quadruple screening strategy prior to generating footprint-free isogenic iPSC lines, retaining a normal molecular karyotype, pluripotency and three germ-layer differentiation potential. Directed differentiation into midbrain dopaminergic neurons revealed that SNCA expression is reduced in the gene-corrected clones, which was validated by a reduction at the alpha-synuclein protein level. The generation of single-cell isogenic clones facilitates new insights in the role of alpha-synuclein in PD and furthermore is applicable across patient-derived disease models.

摘要: 使用CRISPR-Cas9技术生成等基因诱导多能干细胞（iPSC）系是一项技术挑战性，耗时且效率可变的过程。在这里，我们使用荧光激活细胞分选（FACS）将双等位基因CRISPR-Cas9编辑的单细胞iPSC克隆分选到高通量96孔微量滴定板中。我们使用了高内涵筛选（HCS）技术，并生成了内部开发的算法，以选择正确编辑的等基因克隆，以继续进行扩展和验证。在我们的模型中，我们对帕金森氏病（PD）患者的iPSC进行了基因校正，该患者在SNCA基因中携带常染色体显性遗传的杂合c.88G>C突变，从而导致α-突触核蛋白蛋白的致病性p.A30P形式。在测序之前进行PCR限制性消化介导的克隆选择策略，我们能够使用四重筛选策略对每个同基因克隆进行后排序验证，然后生成无足迹的同基因iPSC系，并保留正常的分子核型，多能性和三个细菌层分化潜能。定向分化为中脑多巴胺能神经元表明，SNCA表达在基因校正的克隆中减少，这可以通过α-突触核蛋白水平的降低来验证。单细胞同基因克隆的产生促进了对α-突触核蛋白在PD中的作用的新见解，而且适用于患者衍生的疾病模型。

Pubmed_ID: 32927658

Applying Single-Cell Analysis to Gonadogenesis and DSDs (Disorders/Differences of Sex Development)

将单细胞分析应用于性腺发育和DSD（性发育障碍/差异）

DOI: 10.3390/ijms21186614

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32927658/

Journal: International journal of molecular sciences {'ISSN': '1422-0067', 'Name': 'international journal of molecular sciences', '2015': '3.257', '2016': '3.226', '2017': '3.687', '2018': '4.183', '2019': '4.556'}

Date: 09/10/2020

Abstract: The gonads are unique among the body's organs in having a developmental choice: testis or ovary formation. Gonadal sex differentiation involves common progenitor cells that form either Sertoli and Leydig cells in the testis or granulosa and thecal cells in the ovary. Single-cell analysis is now shedding new light on how these cell lineages are specified and how they interact with the germline. Such studies are also providing new information on gonadal maturation, ageing and the somatic-germ cell niche. Furthermore, they have the potential to improve our understanding and diagnosis of Disorders/Differences of Sex Development (DSDs). DSDs occur when chromosomal, gonadal or anatomical sex are atypical. Despite major advances in recent years, most cases of DSD still cannot be explained at the molecular level. This presents a major pediatric concern. The emergence of single-cell genomics and transcriptomics now presents a novel avenue for DSD analysis, for both diagnosis and for understanding the molecular genetic etiology. Such -omics datasets have the potential to enhance our understanding of the cellular origins and pathogenesis of DSDs, as well as infertility and gonadal diseases such as cancer.

摘要: 性腺在人体器官中具有独特的发育选择：睾丸或卵巢形成。性腺性别分化涉及常见的祖细胞，它们在睾丸或颗粒中形成Sertoli细胞和Leydig细胞，在卵巢中形成鞘细胞。现在，单细胞分析为如何指定这些细胞谱系以及它们如何与种系相互作用提供了新的思路。这些研究也提供了有关性腺成熟，衰老和体细胞生殖生态位的新信息。此外，它们有潜力改善我们对性发育障碍/差异的理解和诊断。当染色体，性腺或解剖性别不典型时，就会发生DSD。尽管近年来取得了重大进展，但大多数DSD病例仍无法从分子水平上进行解释。这引起了主要的儿科关注。现在，单细胞基因组学和转录组学的出现为DSD分析，诊断和了解分子遗传病因提供了一条新途径。这样的组学数据集有可能增强我们对DSD的细胞起源和发病机制以及不育和性腺疾病（例如癌症）的理解。

Pubmed_ID: 32926407

Peritoneal dialysate-range hypertonic glucose promotes T-cell IL-17 production that induces mesothelial inflammation

腹膜透析液范围的高渗葡萄糖促进T细胞IL-17产生，从而诱导间皮炎症

DOI: 10.1002/eji.202048733

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32926407/

Journal: European journal of immunology {'ISSN': '0014-2980', 'Name': 'european journal of immunology', '2015': '4.179', '2016': '4.227', '2017': '4.248', '2018': '4.695', '2019': '4.404'}

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: Peritoneal dialysis (PD) employs hypertonic glucose to remove excess water and uremic waste. Peritoneal membrane failure limits its long-term use. T-cell cytokines promote this decline. T-cell differentiation is critically determined by the microenvironment. We here study how PD-range hypertonic glucose regulates T-cell polarization and IL-17 production. In the human peritoneal cavity, CD3+ cell numbers increased in PD. Single cell RNA sequencing detected expression of T helper (Th) 17 signature genes RORC and IL23R. In vitro, PD-range glucose stimulated spontaneous and amplified cytokine-induced Th17 polarization. Osmotic controls l-glucose and d-mannose demonstrate that induction of IL-17A is a substance-independent, tonicity dose-dependent process. PD-range glucose upregulated glycolysis and increased the proportion of dysfunctional mitochondria. Blockade of reactive-oxygen species (ROS) prevented IL-17A induction in response to PD-range glucose. Peritoneal mesothelium cultured with IL-17A or IL17F produced pro-inflammatory cytokines IL-6, CCL2, and CX3CL1. In PD patients, peritoneal IL-17A positively correlated with CX3CL1 concentrations. PD-range glucose-stimulated, but neither identically treated Il17a-/- Il17f-/- nor T cells cultured with the ROS scavenger N-acetylcysteine enhanced mesothelial CX3CL1 expression. Our data delineate PD-range hypertonic glucose as a novel inducer of Th17 polarization in a mitochondrial-ROS-dependent manner. Modulation of tonicity-mediated effects of PD solutions may improve membrane survival.

摘要: 腹膜透析（PD）采用高渗葡萄糖去除多余的水和尿毒症废物。腹膜衰竭限制了其长期使用。T细胞细胞因子促进了这种下降。T细胞分化是由微环境决定的。我们在这里研究PD范围高渗葡萄糖如何调节T细胞极化和IL-17产生。在人类腹膜腔中，PD中的CD3+细胞数量增加。单细胞RNA测序检测到T辅助（Th）17签名基因RORC和IL23R的表达。在体外，PD范围的葡萄糖刺激自发和放大的细胞因子诱导的Th17极化。渗透控制物l-葡萄糖和d-甘露糖证明IL-17A的诱导是一种与物质无关的，张度的剂量依赖性过程。PD范围的葡萄糖上调糖酵解，增加线粒体功能障碍的比例。活性氧（ROS）的阻滞阻止了对PD范围葡萄糖的反应引起的IL-17A诱导。用IL-17A或IL17F培养的腹膜上皮产生促炎性细胞因子IL-6，CCL2和CX3CL1。在PD患者中，腹膜IL-17A与CX3CL1浓度呈正相关。PD范围的葡萄糖刺激，但没有同等处理的Il17a-/-Il17f-/-或用ROS清道夫N-乙酰半胱氨酸培养的T细胞都增强了间皮CX3CL1的表达。我们的数据描绘了PD范围高渗葡萄糖以线粒体ROS依赖的方式作为Th17极化的新型诱导剂。调节PD溶液的张度介导的作用可以提高膜的存活率。

Pubmed_ID: 32926367

Investigating Inter- and Intrasample Diversity of Single-Cell RNA Sequencing Datasets

调查单细胞RNA测序数据集的样品间和样品内多样性

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0849-4_10

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32926367/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: Tumor heterogeneity can arise from a variety of extrinsic and intrinsic sources and drives unfavorable outcomes. With recent technological advances, single-cell RNA sequencing has become a way for researchers to easily assay tumor heterogeneity at the transcriptomic level with high resolution. However, ongoing research focuses on different ways to analyze this big data and how to compare across multiple different samples. In this chapter, we provide a practical guide to calculate inter- and intrasample diversity metrics from single-cell RNA sequencing datasets. These measures of diversity are adapted from commonly used metrics in statistics and ecology to quantify and compare sample heterogeneity at single-cell resolution.

摘要: 肿瘤异质性可能来自多种外部和内在来源，并导致不良结果。随着最新技术的发展，单细胞RNA测序已成为研究人员轻松在转录组水平上高分辨率检测肿瘤异质性的一种方法。但是，正在进行的研究侧重于分析此大数据的不同方法以及如何在多个不同样本之间进行比较。在本章中，我们提供了从单细胞RNA测序数据集计算样本间和样本内多样性指标的实用指南。这些多样性的衡量标准是根据统计和生态学中常用的指标改编而成的，以量化和比较单细胞分辨率下的样本异质性。

Pubmed_ID: 32926366

Statistical and Bioinformatics Analysis of Data from Bulk and Single-Cell RNA Sequencing Experiments

批量和单细胞RNA测序实验数据的统计和生物信息学分析

DOI: 10.1007/978-1-0716-0849-4_9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32926366/

Journal: Methods in molecular biology (Clifton, N.J.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2021

Abstract: High-throughput sequencing (HTS) has revolutionized researchers' ability to study the human transcriptome, particularly as it relates to cancer. Recently, HTS technology has advanced to the point where now one is able to sequence individual cells (i.e., "single-cell sequencing"). Prior to single-cell sequencing technology, HTS would be completed on RNA extracted from a tissue sample consisting of multiple cell types (i.e., "bulk sequencing"). In this chapter, we review the various bioinformatics and statistical methods used in the processing, quality control, and analysis of bulk and single-cell RNA sequencing methods. Additionally, we discuss how these methods are also being used to study tumor heterogeneity.

摘要: 高通量测序（HTS）彻底改变了研究人员研究人类转录组的能力，尤其是与癌症有关的能力。最近，HTS技术已经发展到可以对单个细胞进行测序的程度（即“单细胞测序”）。在单细胞测序技术之前，HTS将在从由多种细胞类型组成的组织样品中提取的RNA上完成（即“批量测序”）。在本章中，我们回顾了用于批量，单细胞RNA测序方法的处理，质量控制和分析的各种生物信息学和统计方法。此外，我们讨论了如何将这些方法也用于研究肿瘤异质性。

Pubmed_ID: 32925177

Duodenal chemosensory system: enterocytes, enteroendocrine cells, and tuft cells

十二指肠化学感应系统：肠上皮细胞，肠内分泌细胞和簇状细胞

DOI: 10.1097/MOG.0000000000000685

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32925177/

Journal: Current opinion in gastroenterology {'ISSN': '0267-1379', 'Name': 'current opinion in gastroenterology', '2015': '3.618', '2016': '3.247', '2017': '3.414', '2018': '2.741', '2019': '3.225'}

Date: 2020 Nov

Abstract: Purpose of review: The gut barrier serves as the primary interface between the environment and host in terms of surface area and complexity. Luminal chemosensing is a term used to describe how small molecules in the gut lumen interact with the host through surface receptors or via transport into the subepithelial space. In this review, we have summarized recent advances in the understanding of the luminal chemosensory system in the gastroduodenal epithelium consisting of enterocytes, enteroendocrine, and tuft cells, with particular emphasis on how chemosensing affects mucosal protective responses and the metabolic syndrome. Recent findings: Recent single-cell RNA sequencing provides detailed cell type-specific expression of chemosensory receptors and other bioactive molecules as well as cell lineages; some are similar to lingual taste cells whereas some are gut specific. Gut luminal chemosensing is not only important for the local or remote regulation of gut function, but also contributes to the systemic regulation of metabolism, energy balance, and food intake. We will discuss the chemosensory mechanisms of the proximal intestine, in particular to gastric acid, with a focus on the cell types and receptors involved in chemosensing, with emphasis on the rare chemosensory cells termed tuft cells. We will also discuss the chemosensory functions of intestinal ectoenzymes and bacterial components (e.g., lipopolysaccharide) as well as how they affect mucosal function through altering the gut-hormonal-neural axis. Summary: Recent updates in luminal chemosensing by different chemosensory cells have provided new possibilities for identifying novel molecular targets for the treatment of mucosal injury, metabolic disorders, and abnormal visceral sensation.

摘要: 审查目的：肠道屏障是表面积和复杂性方面环境与宿主之间的主要界面。发光化学传感是一个术语，用于描述肠道内腔中的小分子如何通过表面受体或通过转运进入上皮下空间与宿主相互作用。在这篇综述中，我们总结了对由肠上皮细胞，肠内分泌和簇绒细胞组成的十二指肠上皮中腔内化学感觉系统的理解的最新进展，特别强调了化学传感如何影响粘膜保护反应和代谢综合征。最新发现：最近的单细胞RNA测序提供了化学感应受体和其他生物活性分子以及细胞谱系的详细细胞类型特异性表达；有些类似于舌味细胞，而有些则是肠特异性的。肠腔内化学传感不仅对肠道功能的局部或远程调节很重要，而且还有助于新陈代谢，能量平衡和食物摄入的系统调节。我们将讨论近端小肠的化学感觉机制，特别是对胃酸的化学感觉机制，重点讨论参与化学传感的细胞类型和受体，重点是称为簇绒细胞的稀有化学感觉细胞。我们还将讨论肠道外切酶和细菌成分（例如脂多糖）的化学感应功能，以及它们如何通过改变肠-激素-神经轴来影响粘膜功能。摘要：不同化学感觉细胞在腔内化学传感方面的最新进展为鉴定治疗粘膜损伤，代谢异常和内脏异常感觉的新型分子靶标提供了新的可能性。

Pubmed_ID: 32925021

Spheroid formation of human keratinocyte: Balancing between cell-substrate and cell-cell interaction

人角质形成细胞的球体形成：细胞-底物与细胞-细胞相互作用之间的平衡

DOI: 10.3233/CH-209217

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32925021/

Journal: Clinical hemorheology and microcirculation {'ISSN': '1386-0291', 'Name': 'clinical hemorheology and microcirculation', '2015': '1.815', '2016': '1.679', '2017': '1.914', '2018': '1.642', '2019': '1.741'}

Date: 09/08/2020

Abstract: Background: The formation of spheroids is tightly regulated by intrinsic cell-cell and cell-substrate interactions. Objective: The chitosan (CS)-coating was applied to investigate the driven force directed the spheroid formation. Methods: The effects of CS on cell functions were studied. Atomic force microscopy was employed to measure the cell- biomaterial interplay at single cell level. Results: HaCaT cells shifted from their flattened sheet to a compact 3D spheroidal morphology when increasing CS coating concentration. The proliferative capacity of HaCaT was preserved in the spheroid. The expression and activation of integrin β1 (ITGB1) were enhanced on CS modified surfaces, while the active to total ratio of ITGB1 was decreased. The adhesive force of a single HaCaT cell to the tissue culture plate (TCP) was 4.84±0.72 nN. It decreased on CS-coated surfaces as CS concentration increased, from 2.16±0.26 nN to 0.96±0.17 nN. The adhesive force between the single HaCaT cell to its neighbor cell increased as CS concentration increased, from 1.15±0.09 nN to 2.60±0.51 nN. Conclusions: Conclusively, the decreased cell- substrate adhesion was the main driven force in the spheroid formation. This finding might serve as a design criterion for biomaterials facilitating the formation of epithelial spheroids.

摘要: 背景：椭球的形成受到固有的细胞-细胞和细胞-基质相互作用的严格控制。目的：应用壳聚糖（CS）涂层研究驱动力指导球体的形成。方法：研究CS对细胞功能的影响。原子力显微镜用于测量单细胞水平上细胞与生物材料的相互作用。结果：当增加CS涂层浓度时，HaCaT细胞从扁平化的片状转变为紧凑的3D球状形态。HaCaT的增殖能力保留在球体中。在CS修饰的表面上整合素β1（ITGB1）的表达和激活增强，而ITGB1的活性与总比例降低。单个HaCaT细胞对组织培养板（TCP）的粘附力为4.84±0.72nN。随着CS浓度的增加，它从CS涂层表面下降，从2.16±0.26nN到0.96±0.17nN。随着CS浓度的增加，单个HaCaT细胞与其相邻细胞之间的粘附力从1.15±0.09nN增加到2.60±0.51nN。结论：结论是，细胞-基底粘附的降低是球体形成的主要驱动力。该发现可以作为促进上皮球体形成的生物材料的设计标准。

Pubmed_ID: 32924426

Methanol Tolerant Pt-C Core-Shell Cathode Catalyst for Direct Methanol Fuel Cells

直接甲醇燃料电池的耐甲醇Pt-C核壳型阴极催化剂

DOI: 10.1021/acsami.0c07812

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32924426/

Journal: ACS applied materials & interfaces {'ISSN': '1944-8244', 'Name': 'acs applied materials & interfaces', '2015': '7.145', '2016': '7.504', '2017': '8.097', '2018': '8.456', '2019': '8.758'}

Date: 10/07/2020

Abstract: Methanol crossover is one of the largest problems in direct methanol fuel cells (DMFCs). Methanol passing from the anode to the cathode through the membrane is oxidized at the cathode, degrading the DMFC performance, and the intermediates of the methanol oxidation reaction (MOR) cause cathode catalyst poisoning. Therefore, it is essential to develop a cathode catalyst capable of inhibiting MOR while promoting the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR), which is a typical cathode reaction in DMFCs. In this study, a carbon-encapsulated Pt cathode catalyst was synthesized for this purpose. The catalyst was simply synthesized by heat treatment of Pt-aniline complex-coated carbon nanofibers. The carbon shell of the catalyst was effective in inhibiting methanol from accessing the Pt core, and this effect became more prominent as the graphitization degree of the carbon shell increased. Meanwhile, the carbon shell allowed O2 to permeate regardless of the graphitization degree, enabling the Pt core to participate in ORR. The synthesized catalyst showed higher performance and stability in single-cell tests under various conditions compared to commercial Pt/C.

摘要: 甲醇交换是直接甲醇燃料电池（DMFC）中最大的问题之一。通过膜从阳极到阴极的甲醇在阴极被氧化，从而降低DMFC的性能，甲醇氧化反应（MOR）的中间体会导致阴极催化剂中毒。因此，必须开发能够抑制MOR同时促进氧还原反应（ORR）的阴极催化剂，这是DMFC中典型的阴极反应。在这项研究中，为此目的合成了碳包封的Pt阴极催化剂。催化剂是通过对Pt-苯胺复合物包覆的碳纳米纤维进行热处理而简单合成的。催化剂的碳壳可有效抑制甲醇进入Pt核，并且随着碳壳的石墨化程度的提高，这种作用变得更加明显。同时，碳壳使O2渗透，而与石墨化程度无关，从而使Pt核参与ORR。与市售Pt/C相比，合成的催化剂在各种条件下的单电池测试中显示出更高的性能和稳定性。

Pubmed_ID: 32924209

Acute activation of bronchopulmonary vagal nociceptors by type I interferons

I型干扰素可急性激活支气管迷走神经伤害感受器

DOI: 10.1113/JP280276

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32924209/

Journal: The Journal of physiology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: Type I interferon receptors are expressed by the majority of vagal C-fibre neurons innervating the respiratory tract Interferon alpha and beta acutely and directly activate vagal C-fibers in the airways. The interferon-induced activation of C-fibers occurs secondary to stimulation of type 1 interferon receptors Type 1 interferons may contribute to the symptoms as well as the spread of respiratory viral infections by causing coughing and other defensive reflexes associated with vagal C-fibre activation ABSTRACT: We evaluated the ability of type I interferons to acutely activate airway vagal afferent nerve terminals in mouse lungs. Using single cell RT-PCR of lung-specific vagal neurons we found that IFNAR1 and IFNAR2 were expressed in 70% of the TRPV1-positive neurons (a marker for vagal C-fibre neurons) and 44% of TRPV1-negative neurons. We employed an ex vivo vagal innervated mouse trachea-lung preparation to evaluate the effect of interferons in directly activating airway nerves. Utilizing 2-photon microscopy of the nodose ganglion neurons from Pirt-Cre;R26-GCaMP6s mice we found that applying IFNα or IFNβ to the lungs acutely activated the majority of vagal afferent nerve terminals. When the type 1 interferon receptor, IFNAR1, was blocked with a blocking antibody the response to IFNβ was largely inhibited. The type 2 interferon, IFNγ, also activated airway nerves and this was not inhibited by the IFNAR1 blocking antibody. The Janus kinase inhibitor GLPG0634 (1 μm) virtually abolished the nerve activation caused by IFNβ. Consistent with the activation of vagal afferent C-fibers, infusing IFNβ into the mouse trachea led to defensive breathing reflexes including apneas and gasping. These reflexes were prevented by pretreatment with an IFN type-1 receptor blocking antibody. Finally, using whole cell patch-clamp electrophysiology of lung-specific neurons we found that IFNβ (1000 U ml-1 ) directly depolarized the membrane potential of isolated nodose neurons, in some cases beyond to action potential threshold. This acute non-genomic activation of vagal sensory nerve terminals by interferons may contribute to the incessant coughing that is a hallmark of respiratory viral infections.

摘要: I型干扰素受体由急性支配呼吸道干扰素α和β的大部分迷走神经C纤维神经元表达，并直接激活气道中的迷走神经C纤维。干扰素诱导的C纤维激活是继刺激1型干扰素受体之后发生的。1型干扰素可能通过引起与迷走性C纤维激活相关的咳嗽和其他防御反射而导致症状以及呼吸道病毒感染的传播。：我们评估了I型干扰素急性激活小鼠肺气道迷走神经传入神经末梢的能力。使用肺特异性迷走神经元的单细胞RT-PCR，我们发现IFNAR1和IFNAR2在70％的TRPV1阳性神经元（迷走神经C纤维神经元的标记物）和44％的TRPV1阴性神经元中表达。我们采用离体迷走神经支配的小鼠气管肺制剂来评估干扰素在直接激活气道神经中的作用。利用来自Pirt-Cre;R26-GCaMP6s小鼠的结节神经节神经元的2光子显微镜，我们发现将IFNα或IFNβ应用于肺部可急性激活大部分迷走神经传入神经末梢。当使用阻断抗体阻断1型干扰素受体IFNAR1时，对IFNβ的反应将大大受到抑制。2型干扰素IFNγ也激活了气道神经，并且不受IFNAR1阻断抗体的抑制。Janus激酶抑制剂GLPG0634（1μm）实际上消除了由IFNβ引起的神经激活。与迷走神经传入C纤维的激活一致，将IFNβ注入小鼠气管可导致包括呼吸暂停和喘气在内的防御性呼吸反射。通过用IFN-1型受体阻断抗体进行预处理可以防止这些反射。最后，使用肺特异性神经元的全细胞膜片钳电生理学，我们发现IFNβ（1000Uml-1）直接使分离的结节神经元的膜电位去极化，在某些情况下超出动作电位阈值。干扰素对迷走感觉神经末梢的这种急性非基因组激活可能导致持续咳嗽，这是呼吸道病毒感染的标志。

Pubmed_ID: 32924045

Selective detection of phospholipids in human blood plasma and single cells for cancer differentiation using dispersed solid-phase microextraction combined with extractive electrospray ionization mass spectrometry

分散固相微萃取结合萃取电喷雾电离质谱法选择性检测人血浆和单细胞中的磷脂以区分癌症

DOI: 10.1039/d0an01204a

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32924045/

Journal: The Analyst ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/14/2020

Abstract: Phospholipids in microvolume biofluid samples (≤0.5 μL), including human plasma and single cells, were selectively captured by dispersed magnetic Fe3O4@TiO2 nanocomposite particles (40 μg). A suspension containing Fe3O4@TiO2 nanoparticles was loaded into a glass capillary (i.d. 0.75 mm) by capillary force. The supernatant solution was discarded, while the Fe3O4@TiO2 particles were retained inside the capillary by using an external magnetic field (ca. 1.3 T). The phospholipids on the surface of Fe3O4@TiO2 nanoparticles were directly analyzed using internal extractive electrospray ionization mass spectrometry (iEESI-MS) by pumping ≤1 μL of extraction solution of methanol containing 1.5% ammonia (w/w) through the capillary tube toward the ESI tip. A single sample analysis was accomplished within 4 min. Phospholipids in blood plasma samples from 59 patients with ovarian cancer and 43 healthy controls, and 28 patients with pancreatic cancer and 23 healthy controls were studied. Based on the orthogonal partial least squares discriminant analysis (OPLS-DA), the cancer patients were confidently discriminated from the healthy controls. Phospholipids in single human cells (MV4-11 and NB4) were determined, showing the sensitivity for single cell analysis. Therefore the results demonstrated that rapid cancer differentiation is achieved using this approach through the detection of trace phospholipids in microvolume blood and cell samples with high sensitivity, high specificity, low sample consumption, and high throughput.

摘要: 通过分散的磁性Fe3O4@TiO2纳米复合颗粒（40μg）选择性捕获微体积生物流体样品（≤0.5μL）中的磷脂，包括人血浆和单个细胞。通过毛细管力将含有Fe3O4@TiO2纳米颗粒的悬浮液加载到玻璃毛细管（即0.75mm）中。丢弃上清液，而通过使用外部磁场（约1.3T）将Fe3O4@TiO2颗粒保留在毛细管内。Fe3O4@TiO2纳米颗粒表面的磷脂通过内部萃取电喷雾电离质谱（iEESI-MS）直接通过毛细管中的≤1μL含1.5％氨（w/w）的甲醇萃取溶液泵入毛细管而直接分析。ESI提示。4分钟内完成一次样品分析。研究了59名卵巢癌患者和43名健康对照者，28名胰腺癌患者和23名健康对照者血浆样品中的磷脂。根据正交偏最小二乘判别分析（OPLS-DA），可以肯定地将癌症患者与健康对照区分开来。测定了单个人细胞（MV4-11和NB4）中的磷脂，显示了对单细胞分析的敏感性。因此，结果表明，通过这种方法，可以以高灵敏度，高特异性，低样品消耗和高通量检测微量血液和细胞样品中的微量磷脂，从而实现癌症的快速分化。

Pubmed_ID: 32921525

Bone Marrow Transplantation Dynamics: When Progenitor Expansion Prevails

骨髓移植动力学：当祖细胞膨胀盛行时

DOI: 10.1016/j.tcb.2020.08.006

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32921525/

Journal: Trends in cell biology {'ISSN': '0962-8924', 'Name': 'trends in cell biology', '2015': '11.532', '2016': '15.333', '2017': '18.564', '2018': '16.588', '2019': '16.041'}

Date: 09/10/2020

Abstract: The transplantation of healthy hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) contained in the bone marrow is a frontline treatment option for hematopoietic diseases. Detailed analysis of post-transplant HSC kinetics is crucial as the initial engraftment of HSCs influences prognosis. Dong et al. have explored the dynamic change in HSC cell fate upon bone marrow transplantation through the utilization of single-cell transcriptomic analysis.

摘要: 骨髓中包含的健康造血干细胞（HSC）的移植是造血疾病的一线治疗选择。移植后HSC动力学的详细分析至关重要，因为HSC的初始植入会影响预后。董等。通过利用单细胞转录组学分析，探索了骨髓移植后HSC细胞命运的动态变化。

Pubmed_ID: 32920913

A drift-barrier model drives the genomic landscape of a structured bacterial population

漂移屏障模型驱动结构化细菌种群的基因组格局

DOI: 10.1111/mec.15628

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32920913/

Journal: Molecular ecology {'ISSN': '0962-1083', 'Name': 'molecular ecology', '2015': '5.947', '2016': '6.086', '2017': '6.131', '2018': '5.855', '2019': '5.163'}

Date: 09/13/2020

Abstract: Bacterial populations differentiate over time and space to form distinct genetic units. The mechanisms governing this diversification are presumed to result from the ecological context of living units to adapt to specific niches. Recently, a model assuming the acquisition of advantageous genes among populations rather than whole genome sweeps has emerged to explain population differentiation. However, the characteristics of these exchanged, or flexible, genes and whether their evolution is driven by adaptive or neutral processes remain controversial. By analysing the flexible genome of single-amplified genomes of co-occurring populations of the marine Prochlorococcus HLII ecotype, we highlight that genomic compartments - rather than population units - are characterized by different evolutionary trajectories. The dynamics of gene fluxes vary across genomic compartments and therefore the effectiveness of selection depends on the fluctuation of the effective population size along the genome. Taken together, these results support the drift-barrier model of bacterial evolution.

摘要: 细菌种群随时间和空间分化，形成独特的遗传单位。据推测，控制这种多样化的机制是由于居住单位适应特定生态位的生态环境所致。最近，出现了一个模型，该模型假设在种群之间而不是整个基因组扫描中获得了有利的基因，以解释种群分化。然而，这些交换的或灵活的基因的特征以及它们的进化是由适应性过程还是中性过程驱动仍然是有争议的。通过分析海洋ProchlorococcusHLII生态型共生种群的单扩增基因组的灵活基因组，我们强调了基因组区室而不是种群单位具有不同的进化轨迹。基因通量的动态在整个基因组区室中变化，因此选择的有效性取决于有效基因组大小沿基因组的波动。两者合计，这些结果支持细菌进化的漂移屏障模型。

Pubmed_ID: 32919307

Functional roles of microbial cell-to-cell heterogeneity and emerging technologies for analysis and control

微生物细胞间异质性的功能作用以及用于分析和控制的新兴技术

DOI: 10.1016/j.mib.2020.08.002

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32919307/

Journal: Current opinion in microbiology {'ISSN': '1369-5274', 'Name': 'current opinion in microbiology', '2015': '6.234', '2016': '6.635', '2017': '6.71', '2018': '6.916', '2019': '8.134'}

Date: 09/09/2020

Abstract: Clonal cell populations often display significant cell-to-cell phenotypic heterogeneity, even when maintained under constant external conditions. This variability can result from the inherently stochastic nature of transcription and translation processes, which leads to varying numbers of transcripts and proteins per cell. Here, we showcase studies that reveal links between stochastic cellular events and biological functions in isogenic microbial populations. Then, we highlight emerging tools from engineering, computation, and synthetic and molecular biology that enable precise measurement, control, and analysis of gene expression noise in microorganisms. The capabilities offered by this sophisticated toolbox will shape future directions in the field and generate insight into the behavior of living systems at the single-cell level.

摘要: 克隆细胞群即使在恒定的外部条件下维持，也经常表现出明显的细胞间表型异质性。这种可变性可能是由于转录和翻译过程的固有随机性导致的，从而导致每个细胞的转录本和蛋白质数量不同。在这里，我们展示了揭示同基因微生物种群中随机细胞事件与生物学功能之间联系的研究。然后，我们重点介绍了来自工程，计算以及合成和分子生物学的新兴工具，这些工具可以精确地测量，控制和分析微生物中的基因表达噪声。这种先进的工具箱提供的功能将塑造该领域的未来发展方向，并深入了解单细胞级生命系统的行为。

Pubmed_ID: 32919230

L 2,1-Extreme Learning Machine: An Efficient Robust Classifier for Tumor Classification

L 2,1-Extreme Learning Machine：用于肿瘤分类的高效鲁棒分类器

DOI: 10.1016/j.compbiolchem.2020.107368

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32919230/

Journal: Computational biology and chemistry {'ISSN': '1476-9271', 'Name': 'computational biology and chemistry', '2015': '1.014', '2016': '1.331', '2017': '1.412', '2018': '1.581', '2019': '1.85'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: With the development of cancer research, various gene expression datasets containing cancer information show an explosive growth trend. In addition, due to the continuous maturity of single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) technology, the protein information and pedigree information of a single cell are also continuously mined. It is a technical problem of how to classify these high-dimensional data correctly. In recent years, Extreme Learning Machine (ELM) has been widely used in the field of supervised learning and unsupervised learning. However, the traditional ELM does not consider the robustness of the method. To improve the robustness of ELM, in this paper, a novel ELM method based on L2,1-norm named L2,1-Extreme Learning Machine (L2,1 -ELM) has been proposed. The method introduces L2,1-norm on loss function to improve the robustness, and minimizes the influence of noise and outliers. Firstly, we evaluate the new method on five UCI datasets. The experiment results prove that our method can achieve competitive results. Next, the novel method is applied to the problem of classification of cancer samples and single-cell RNA sequencing datasets. The experimental results on The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) datasets and scRNA-seq datasets prove that ELM and its variants has great potential in the classification of cancer samples.

摘要: 随着癌症研究的发展，包含癌症信息的各种基因表达数据集显示出爆炸性的增长趋势。另外，由于单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）技术的持续成熟，单个细胞的蛋白质信息和谱系信息也得到了持续挖掘。如何正确地对这些高维数据进行分类是一个技术问题。近年来，极限学习机（ExtremeLearningMachine，ELM）已广泛应用于监督学习和非监督学习领域。但是，传统的ELM并未考虑该方法的鲁棒性。为了提高ELM的鲁棒性，本文提出了一种基于L2,1-范数的ELM方法，称为L2,1-极限学习机（L2,1-ELM）。该方法在损失函数上引入了L2,1-范数以提高鲁棒性，并最大程度地减少噪声和离群值的影响。首先，我们在五个UCI数据集上评估了该新方法。实验结果证明我们的方法可以达到竞争效果。接下来，将新方法应用于癌症样品和单细胞RNA测序数据集的分类问题。在癌症基因组图谱（TCGA）数据集和scRNA-seq数据集上的实验结果证明，ELM及其变体在癌症样品的分类中具有巨大的潜力。

Pubmed_ID: 32918998

New hints towards a precision medicine strategy for IDH wild-type glioblastoma

IDH野生型胶质母细胞瘤精准治疗策略的新提示

DOI: 10.1016/j.annonc.2020.08.2336

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32918998/

Journal: Annals of oncology : official journal of the European Society for Medical Oncology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/09/2020

Abstract: Glioblastoma represents the most common primary malignancy of the central nervous system in adults and remains a largely incurable disease. The elucidation of disease subtypes based on mutational profiling, gene expression and DNA methylation has so far failed to translate into improved clinical outcomes. However, new knowledge emerging from the subtyping effort in the IDH-wild-type setting may provide directions for future precision therapies. Here, we review recent learnings in the field, and further consider how tumour microenvironment differences across subtypes may reveal novel contexts of vulnerability. We discuss recent treatment approaches and ongoing trials in the IDH-wild-type glioblastoma setting, and propose an integrated discovery stratagem incorporating multi-omics, single-cell technologies and computational approaches.

摘要: 胶质母细胞瘤是成年人中枢神经系统最常见的原发性恶性肿瘤，仍然是一种无法治愈的疾病。迄今为止，基于突变谱，基因表达和DNA甲基化的疾病亚型的阐明未能转化为改善的临床结果。但是，IDH野生型环境中的分型工作所产生的新知识可能会为未来的精确治疗提供指导。在这里，我们回顾了该领域的最新研究，并进一步考虑了亚型之间的肿瘤微环境差异如何揭示脆弱性的新情况。我们讨论了IDH野生型胶质母细胞瘤环境中的最新治疗方法和正在进行的试验，并提出了一种整合了多基因组学，单细胞技术和计算方法的综合发现策略。

Pubmed_ID: 32918942

Human kidney organoids produce functional renin

人肾类器官产生功能性肾素

DOI: 10.1016/j.kint.2020.08.008

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32918942/

Journal: Kidney international {'ISSN': '0085-2538', 'Name': 'kidney international', '2015': '7.683', '2016': '8.395', '2017': '8.429', '2018': '8.306', '2019': '8.945'}

Date: 09/09/2020

Abstract: Renin production by the kidney is of vital importance for salt, volume, and blood pressure homeostasis. The lack of human models hampers investigation into the regulation of renin and its relevance for kidney physiology. To develop such a model, we used human induced pluripotent stem cell derived kidney organoids to study the role of renin and the renin-angiotensin system in the kidney. Extensive characterization of the kidney organoids revealed kidney-specific cell populations consisting of podocytes, proximal and distal tubular cells, stromal cells and endothelial cells. We examined the presence of various components of the renin-angiotensin system such as angiotensin II receptors, angiotensinogen and angiotensin converting enzyme 1 and 2. We identified by single cell sequencing, immunohistochemistry and functional assays that cyclic AMP stimulation induces a subset of pericytes to increase the synthesis and secretion of enzymatically active renin. Renin production by the organoids was responsive to regulation by parathyroid hormone. Subcutaneously implanted kidney organoids in immunodeficient IL2Ry-/-RAG2-/- mice were successfully vascularized, maintained tubular and glomerular structures and retained capacity to produce renin two months after implantation. Thus, our results demonstrate that kidney organoids express renin and provide insights into the endocrine potential of human kidney organoids, which is important for regenerative medicine in the context of the endocrine system.

摘要: 肾脏产生的肾素对盐分，体积和血压的体内平衡至关重要。人类模型的缺乏阻碍了对肾素调节及其与肾脏生理学相关性的研究。为了建立这样的模型，我们使用人类诱导的多能干细胞衍生的肾脏类器官来研究肾素和肾素-血管紧张素系统在肾脏中的作用。肾脏类器官的广泛表征揭示了肾脏特异性细胞群，其中包括足细胞，近端和远端肾小管细胞，基质细胞和内皮细胞。我们检查了肾素-血管紧张素系统的各种成分的存在，例如血管紧张素II受体，血管紧张素原和血管紧张素转化酶1和2。我们通过单细胞测序，免疫组织化学和功能分析确定了循环AMP刺激诱导周细胞亚群增加酶活性肾素的合成和分泌。类器官产生的肾素对甲状旁腺激素的调节有反应。在免疫缺陷的IL2Ry-/-RAG2-/-小鼠中皮下植入的肾脏类器官被成功血管化，保持了肾小管和肾小球结构，并在植入后两个月保持了产生肾素的能力。因此，我们的结果表明，肾脏类器官可表达肾素，并能深入了解人肾脏类器官的内分泌潜能，这对于内分泌系统中的再生医学非常重要。

Pubmed_ID: 32918862

Gene-Specific Linear Trends Constrain Transcriptional Variability of the Toll-like Receptor Signaling

基因特定的线性趋势约束Toll样受体信号转导的转录变异性。

DOI: 10.1016/j.cels.2020.08.007

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32918862/

Journal: Cell systems {'ISSN': '2405-4712', 'Name': 'cell systems', '2015': '0', '2016': '8.406', '2017': '8.982', '2018': '8.64', '2019': '8.673'}

Date: 09/23/2020

Abstract: Single-cell gene expression is inherently variable, but how this variability is controlled in response to stimulation remains unclear. Here, we use single-cell RNA-seq and single-molecule mRNA counting (smFISH) to study inducible gene expression in the immune toll-like receptor system. We show that mRNA counts of tumor necrosis factor α conform to a standard stochastic switch model, while transcription of interleukin-1β involves an additional regulatory step resulting in increased heterogeneity. Despite different modes of regulation, systematic analysis of single-cell data for a range of genes demonstrates that the variability in transcript count is linearly constrained by the mean response over a range of conditions. Mathematical modeling of smFISH counts and experimental perturbation of chromatin state demonstrates that linear constraints emerge through modulation of transcriptional bursting along with gene-specific relationships. Overall, our analyses demonstrate that the variability of the inducible single-cell mRNA response is constrained by transcriptional bursting.

摘要: 单细胞基因表达固有地是可变的，但是尚不清楚如何响应刺激来控制这种可变性。在这里，我们使用单细胞RNA-seq和单分子mRNA计数（smFISH）研究免疫收费样受体系统中的诱导型基因表达。我们显示肿瘤坏死因子α的mRNA计数符合标准的随机转换模型，而白介素1β的转录涉及一个额外的调节步骤，导致异质性增加。尽管有不同的调节方式，但是对一系列基因的单细胞数据进行系统分析表明，转录物计数的可变性受一系列条件下的平均应答线性限制。smFISH计数的数学建模和染色质状态的实验扰动表明，线性约束通过转录突发的调控以及基因特异性关系而出现。总体而言，我们的分析表明，可诱导的单细胞mRNA反应的变异性受转录爆发的限制。

Pubmed_ID: 32918613

Minimizing shrinkage of acute brain slices using metal spacers during histological embedding

在组织学嵌入过程中使用金属垫片使急性脑切片的收缩最小化

DOI: 10.1007/s00429-020-02141-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32918613/

Journal: Brain structure & function {'ISSN': '1863-2653', 'Name': 'brain structure & function', '2015': '5.811', '2016': '4.698', '2017': '4.231', '2018': '3.622', '2019': '3.298'}

Date: 2020 Nov

Abstract: The morphological structure of neurons provides the basis for their functions and is a major focus of contemporary neuroscience studies. Intracellular staining of single cells in acute slices is a well-established approach, offering high-resolution information on neuronal morphology, complementing their physiology. Despite major technical advances, however, a common histological artifact often precludes precise morphological analysis: shrinkage of the sampled tissue after embedding for microscopy. Here, we describe a new approach using a metal spacer, sandwiched between two coverslips to reduce shrinkage of whole-mount slice preparations during embedding with aqueous mounting medium under a coverslip.
