Pubmed_ID: 32470594

Purple phototrophic bacteria for resource recovery: Challenges and opportunities

紫色光养细菌用于资源回收：挑战与机遇

DOI: 10.1016/j.biotechadv.2020.107567

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32470594/

Journal: Biotechnology advances {'ISSN': '0734-9750', 'Name': 'biotechnology advances', '2015': '9.848', '2016': '10.597', '2017': '11.452', '2018': '12.831', '2019': '10.744'}

Date: 11/01/2020

Abstract: Sustainable development is driving a rapid focus shift in the wastewater and organic waste treatment sectors, from a "removal and disposal" approach towards the recovery and reuse of water, energy and materials (e.g. carbon or nutrients). Purple phototrophic bacteria (PPB) are receiving increasing attention due to their capability of growing photoheterotrophically under anaerobic conditions. Using light as energy source, PPB can simultaneously assimilate carbon and nutrients at high efficiencies (with biomass yields close to unity (1 g CODbiomass·g CODremoved-1)), facilitating the maximum recovery of these resources as different value-added products. The effective use of infrared light enables selective PPB enrichment in non-sterile conditions, without competition with other phototrophs such as microalgae if ultraviolet-visible wavelengths are filtered. This review reunites results systematically gathered from over 177 scientific articles, aiming at producing generalized conclusions. The most critical aspects of PPB-based production and valorisation processes are addressed, including: (i) the identification of the main challenges and potentials of different growth strategies, (ii) a critical analysis of the production of value-added compounds, (iii) a comparison of the different value-added products, (iv) insights into the general challenges and opportunities and (v) recommendations for future research and development towards practical implementation. To date, most of the work has not been executed under real-life conditions, relevant for full-scale application. With the savings in wastewater discharge due to removal of organics, nitrogen and phosphorus as an important economic driver, priorities must go to using PPB-enriched cultures and real waste matrices. The costs associated with artificial illumination, followed by centrifugal harvesting/dewatering and drying, are estimated to be 1.9, 0.3-2.2 and 0.1-0.3 $·kgdry biomass-1. At present, these costs are likely to exceed revenues. Future research efforts must be carried out outdoors, using sunlight as energy source. The growth of bulk biomass on relatively clean wastewater streams (e.g. from food processing) and its utilization as a protein-rich feed (e.g. to replace fishmeal, 1.5-2.0 $·kg-1) appears as a promising valorisation route.

摘要: 可持续发展正推动废水和有机废物处理领域的重点迅速转移，从“清除和处置”方式向水，能源和材料（例如碳或养分）的回收和再利用。紫色光养细菌（PPB）由于其在厌氧条件下光异养生长的能力而受到越来越多的关注。使用光作为能源，PPB可以同时高效吸收碳和养分（生物量产量接近于单位（1gCOD生物质·gCOD去除量-1）），有助于最大程度地回收这些资源，作为不同的增值产品。红外光的有效利用能够在非无菌条件下选择性富集PPB，如果过滤了紫外线可见波长，则不会与其他光养剂如微藻竞争。这篇综述重新整合了从177余篇科学文章中系统收集的结果，旨在得出广义的结论。解决了基于PPB的生产和增值过程的最关键方面，包括：（i）确定不同增长策略的主要挑战和潜力，（ii）对增值化合物的生产进行关键分析，（iii）比较不同的增值产品，（iv）对一般挑战和机遇的见解，以及（v）对未来研发进行实际实施的建议。迄今为止，大多数工作尚未在现实​​条件下执行，这与大规模应用有关。由于去除有机物，氮和磷是重要的经济驱动因素，从而节省了废水排放，因此必须优先使用富含PPB的培养物和真实的废物基质。人工照明，离心收获/脱水和干燥的相关成本估计分别为1.9、0.3-2.2和0.1-0.3美元·千克干生物量-1。目前，这些成本可能超过收入。未来的研究工作必须在户外使用阳光作为能源进行。相对清洁的废水流（例如，来自食品加工的过程）中散装生物质的生长及其作为富含蛋白质的饲料（例如，代替鱼粉1.5-2.0$·kg-1）的利用看来是一种很有前景的增值途径。

Pubmed_ID: 32468735

Cell and nucleus refractive-index mapping by interferometric phase microscopy and rapid confocal fluorescence microscopy

通过干涉相显微镜和快速共聚焦荧光显微镜对细胞和细胞核的折射率作图

DOI: 10.1002/jbio.202000117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32468735/

Journal: Journal of biophotonics {'ISSN': '1864-063x', 'Name': 'journal of biophotonics', '2015': '3.818', '2016': '4.328', '2017': '3.768', '2018': '3.763', '2019': '3.032'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: We present a multimodal technique for measuring the integral refractive index and the thickness of biological cells and their organelles by integrating interferometric phase microscopy (IPM) and rapid confocal fluorescence microscopy. First, the actual thickness maps of the cellular compartments are reconstructed using the confocal fluorescent sections, and then the optical path difference (OPD) map of the same cell is reconstructed using IPM. Based on the co-registered data, the integral refractive index maps of the cell and its organelles are calculated. This technique enables rapidly measuring refractive index of live, dynamic cells, where IPM provides quantitative imaging capabilities and confocal fluorescence microscopy provides molecular specificity of the cell organelles. We acquire human colorectal adenocarcinoma cells and show that the integral refractive index values are similar for the whole cell, the cytoplasm and the nucleus on the population level, but significantly different on the single cell level.

摘要: 我们提出了一种通过整合干涉相显微镜（IPM）和快速共聚焦荧光显微镜来测量生物细胞及其细胞器的整体折射率和厚度的多峰技术。首先，使用共聚焦荧光部分重建细胞室的实际厚度图，然后使用IPM重建同一细胞的光程差（OPD）图。基于共同注册的数据，计算细胞及其细胞器的积分折射率图。该技术能够快速测量活的动态细胞的折射率，其中IPM提供定量成像功能，而共聚焦荧光显微镜则提供细胞器的分子特异性。我们获得了人类结直肠腺癌细胞，并表明在整个种群水平上，整个细胞，细胞质和细胞核的总折光率值相似，但在单个细胞水平上却明显不同。

Pubmed_ID: 32468570

Distinct immune evasion in APOBEC-enriched, HPV-negative HNSCC

富含APOBEC的HPV阴性HNSCC的明显免疫逃逸

DOI: 10.1002/ijc.33123

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32468570/

Journal: International journal of cancer {'ISSN': '0020-7136', 'Name': 'international journal of cancer', '2015': '5.531', '2016': '6.513', '2017': '7.36', '2018': '4.982', '2019': '5.145'}

Date: 10/15/2020

Abstract: Immune checkpoint inhibition leads to response in some patients with head and neck squamous cell carcinoma (HNSCC). Robust biomarkers are lacking to date. We analyzed viral status, gene expression signatures, mutational load and mutational signatures in whole exome and RNA-sequencing data of the HNSCC TCGA dataset (n = 496) and a validation set (DKTK MASTER cohort, n = 10). Public single-cell gene expression data from 17 HPV-negative HNSCC were separately reanalyzed. APOBEC3-associated TCW motif mutations but not total single nucleotide variant burden were significantly associated with inflammation. This association was restricted to HPV-negative HNSCC samples. An APOBEC-enriched, HPV-negative subgroup was identified, that showed higher T-cell inflammation and immune checkpoint expression, as well as expression of APOBEC3 genes. Mutations in immune-evasion pathways were also enriched in these tumors. Analysis of single-cell sequencing data identified expression of APOBEC3B and 3C genes in malignant cells. We identified an APOBEC-enriched subgroup of HPV-negative HNSCC with a distinct immunogenic phenotype, potentially mediating response to immunotherapy.

摘要: 免疫检查点抑制可导致某些头颈部鳞状细胞癌（HNSCC）患者的反应。迄今缺乏健壮的生物标志物。我们分析了HNSCCTCGA数据集（n=496）和验证集（DKTKMASTER队列，n=10）的整个外显子组和RNA测序数据中的病毒状态，基因表达特征，突变负荷和突变特征。分别重新分析了来自17例HPV阴性HNSCC的公共单细胞基因表达数据。与APOBEC3相关的TCW基序突变但与总的单核苷酸变异负担无关，与炎症显着相关。这种关联仅限于HPV阴性HNSCC样本。确定了富含APOBEC的HPV阴性亚组，该亚组显示出更高的T细胞炎症和免疫检查点表达以及APOBEC3基因的表达。在这些肿瘤中免疫逃避途径的突变也很丰富。对单细胞测序数据的分析确定了APOBEC3B和3C基因在恶性细胞中的表达。我们确定了APOBEC富集的HPV阴性HNSCC亚型，具有独特的免疫原性表型，可能介导了对免疫疗法的反应。

Pubmed_ID: 32467064

Does Gene Expression Noise Play a Functional Role in Plants?

基因表达噪声是否在植物中起作用？

DOI: 10.1016/j.tplants.2020.04.017

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32467064/

Journal: Trends in plant science {'ISSN': '1360-1385', 'Name': 'trends in plant science', '2015': '10.899', '2016': '11.911', '2017': '12.149', '2018': '14.006', '2019': '14.416'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Gene expression in individual cells can be surprisingly noisy. In unicellular organisms this noise can be functional; for example, by allowing a subfraction of the population to prepare for environmental stress. The role of gene expression noise in multicellular organisms has, however, remained unclear. In this review, we discuss how new techniques are revealing an unexpected level of variability in gene expression between and within genetically identical plants. We describe recent progress as well as speculate on the function of transcriptional noise as a mechanism for generating functional phenotypic diversity in plants.

摘要: 单个细胞中的基因表达可能令人吃惊。在单细胞生物中，这种噪声可能起作用。例如，通过允许一部分人口为环境压力做准备。然而，基因表达噪声在多细胞生物中的作用尚不清楚。在这篇综述中，我们讨论了新技术如何揭示出基因相同植物之间和之内的基因表达的意外水平的变化。我们描述了最新的进展，并推测了转录噪声的功能，作为在植物中产生功能性表型多样性的机制。

Pubmed_ID: 32466969

Multiplex Spatial Bioimaging for Combination Therapy Design

用于组合疗​​法设计的多重空间生物成像

DOI: 10.1016/j.trecan.2020.05.003

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32466969/

Journal: Trends in cancer {'ISSN': '2405-8025', 'Name': 'trends in cancer', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '8.884', '2019': '11.093'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Multiplex spatial analyses dissect the heterogeneous cellular abundances and interactions in tumors. Single-cell bioimaging profiles many disease-associated protein biomarkers in patient biopsies to inform the design of cancer therapies. Guided by the mechanistic insights from spatial cellular maps, combination therapy can efficiently eliminate cancers with reduced off-targets, resistance, and relapse.

摘要: 多重空间分析剖析了肿瘤中异质性细胞的丰度和相互作用。单细胞生物成像分析了患者活检组织中许多与疾病相关的蛋白质生物标志物，以指导癌症治疗的设计。在空间细胞图的机制洞察力的指导下，联合疗法可以有效地消除靶标减少，抵抗力和复发率降低的癌症。

Pubmed_ID: 32464645

Studying human reproductive biology through single-cell analysis and in vitro differentiation of stem cells into germ cell-like cells

通过单细胞分析和干细胞体外分化为生殖细胞样细胞研究人类生殖生物学

DOI: 10.1093/humupd/dmaa021

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32464645/

Journal: Human reproduction update {'ISSN': '1355-4786', 'Name': 'human reproduction update', '2015': '11.194', '2016': '11.748', '2017': '11.852', '2018': '12.878', '2019': '12.684'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Understanding the molecular and cellular mechanisms of human reproductive development has been limited by the scarcity of human samples and ethical constraints. Recently, in vitro differentiation of human pluripotent stem cells into germ cells and single-cell analyses have opened new avenues to directly study human germ cells and identify unique mechanisms in human reproductive development. Objective and rationale: The goal of this review is to collate novel findings and insightful discoveries with these new methodologies, aiming at introducing researchers and clinicians to the use of these tools to study human reproductive biology and develop treatments for infertility. Search methods: PubMed was used to search articles and reviews with the following main keywords: in vitro differentiation, human stem cells, single-cell analysis, spermatogenesis, oogenesis, germ cells and other key terms related to these subjects. The search period included all publications from 2000 until now. Outcomes: Single-cell analyses of human gonads have identified many important gene markers at different developmental stages and in subpopulations of cells. To validate the functional roles of these gene markers, researchers have used the in vitro differentiation of human pluripotent cells into germ cells and confirmed that some genetic requirements are unique in human germ cells and are not conserved in mouse models. Moreover, transcriptional regulatory networks and the interaction of germ and somatic cells in gonads were elucidated in these studies. Wider implications: Single-cell analyses allow researchers to identify gene markers and potential regulatory networks using limited clinical samples. On the other hand, in vitro differentiation methods provide clinical researchers with tools to examine these newly identify gene markers and study the causative effects of mutations previously associated with infertility. Combining these two methodologies, researchers can identify gene markers and networks which are essential and unique in human reproductive development, thereby producing more accurate diagnostic tools for assessing reproductive disorders and developing treatments for infertility.

摘要: 背景：由于人类样品的稀缺和道德约束，对人类生殖发育的分子和细胞机制的了解受到限制。近年来，人类多能干细胞体外分化为生殖细胞和单细胞分析开辟了直接研究人类生殖细胞并确定人类生殖发育独特机制的新途径。目的和理由：这篇综述的目的是将这些新方法与新发现和有见地的发现进行比较，旨在向研究人员和临床医生介绍这些工具的用途，以研究人类生殖生物学并开发不育症治疗方法。搜索方法：PubMed用于搜索具有以下主要关键字的文章和评论：体外分化，人类干细胞，单细胞分析，精子发生，卵子发生，生殖细胞和与这些主题相关的其他关键术语。搜索期包括从2000年到现在的所有出版物。结果：对人性腺的单细胞分析已鉴定出处于不同发育阶段和细胞亚群的许多重要基因标记。为了验证这些基因标记的功能作用，研究人员已经使用了人类多能细胞体外分化为生殖细胞的方法，并证实了某些遗传学要求在人类生殖细胞中是独特的，而在小鼠模型中却不守恒。此外，在这些研究中阐明了性腺中的转录调控网络以及生殖细胞和体细胞的相互作用。广泛的意义：单细胞分析使研究人员可以使用有限的临床样本来鉴定基因标记和潜在的调控网络。另一方面，体外分化方法为临床研究人员提供了检查这些新发现的基因标记并研究先前与不育相关的突变的致病作用的工具。结合这两种方法，研究人员可以识别在人类生殖发育中必不可少的独特基因标记和网络，从而提供更准确的诊断工具来评估生殖疾病和开发不育症治疗方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32459864

Fetal-derived macrophages persist and sequentially maturate in ovaries after birth in mice

胎儿来源的巨噬细胞在小鼠出生后的卵巢中持续存在并依次成熟

DOI: 10.1002/eji.202048531

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32459864/

Journal: European journal of immunology {'ISSN': '0014-2980', 'Name': 'european journal of immunology', '2015': '4.179', '2016': '4.227', '2017': '4.248', '2018': '4.695', '2019': '4.404'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Macrophages, which are highly diverse in different tissues, play a complex and vital role in tissue development, homeostasis, and inflammation. The origin and heterogeneity of tissue-resident monocytes and macrophages in ovaries remains unknown. Here we identify three tissue-resident monocyte populations and five macrophage populations in the adult ovaries using high-dimensional single cell mass cytometry. Ontogenic analyses using cell fate mapping models and cell depletion experiments revealed the infiltration of ovaries by both yolk sac and fetal liver-derived macrophages already during the embryonic development. Moreover, we found that both embryonic and bone marrow-derived macrophages contribute to the distinct ovarian macrophage subpopulations in the adults. These assays also showed that fetal-derived MHC II-negative macrophages differentiate postnatally in the maturing ovary to MHC II-positive cells. Our analyses further unraveled that the developmentally distinct macrophage types share overlapping distribution and scavenging function in the ovaries under homeostatic conditions. In conclusion, we report here the first comprehensive analyses of ovarian monocytes and macrophages. In addition, we show that the mechanisms controlling monocyte immigration, the phenotype of different pools of interstitial macrophages, and the interconversion capacity of fetal-derived macrophages in ovaries are remarkably different from those seen in other tissue niches.

摘要: 在不同组织中高度多样化的巨噬细胞在组织发育，体内稳态和炎症中起着复杂而至关重要的作用。卵巢中组织驻留单核细胞和巨噬细胞的起源和异质性仍然未知。在这里，我们使用高维单细胞大规模细胞仪鉴定成年卵巢中的三个组织驻留单核细胞种群和五个巨噬细胞种群。使用细胞命运定位模型和细胞耗竭实验进行的致癌性分析显示，卵黄囊和胎儿肝来源的巨噬细胞已经在胚胎发育过程中浸润了卵巢。此外，我们发现胚胎和骨髓来源的巨噬细胞均对成年人中独特的卵巢巨噬细胞亚群有贡献。这些测定还表明，胎儿来源的MHCII阴性巨噬细胞在出生后的卵巢中向MHCII阳性细胞分化。我们的分析进一步揭示，在稳态条件下，卵巢中发育不同的巨噬细胞类型在卵巢中具有重叠的分布和清除功能。总之，我们在这里报告了卵巢单核细胞和巨噬细胞的首次综合分析。此外，我们发现控制单核细胞迁移的机制，间质巨噬细胞不同库的表型以及卵巢中胎儿衍生的巨噬细胞的相互转化能力与其他组织小生境明显不同。

Pubmed_ID: 32457396

The Msi1-mTOR pathway drives the pathogenesis of mammary and extramammary Paget's disease

Msi1-mTOR途径驱动乳腺和乳腺Paget病的发病机理

DOI: 10.1038/s41422-020-0334-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32457396/

Journal: Cell research {'ISSN': '1001-0602', 'Name': 'cell research', '2015': '14.812', '2016': '15.606', '2017': '15.393', '2018': '17.848', '2019': '20.507'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Mammary and extramammary Paget's Diseases (PD) are a malignant skin cancer characterized by the appearance of Paget cells. Although easily diagnosed, its pathogenesis remains unknown. Here, single-cell RNA-sequencing identified distinct cellular states, novel biomarkers, and signaling pathways - including mTOR, associated with extramammary PD. Interestingly, we identified MSI1 ectopic overexpression in basal epithelial cells of human PD skin, and show that Msi1 overexpression in the epidermal basal layer of mice phenocopies human PD at histopathological, single-cell and molecular levels. Using this mouse model, we identified novel biomarkers of Paget-like cells that translated to human Paget cells. Furthermore, single-cell trajectory, RNA velocity and lineage-tracing analyses revealed a putative keratinocyte-to-Paget-like cell conversion, supporting the in situ transformation theory of disease pathogenesis. Mechanistically, the Msi1-mTOR pathway drives keratinocyte-Paget-like cell conversion, and suppression of mTOR signaling with Rapamycin significantly rescued the Paget-like phenotype in Msi1-overexpressing transgenic mice. Topical Rapamycin treatment improved extramammary PD-associated symptoms in humans, suggesting mTOR inhibition as a novel therapeutic treatment in PD.

摘要: 乳腺和乳腺外Paget病（PD）是一种以Paget细胞的出现为特征的恶性皮肤癌。尽管易于诊断，但其发病机理仍然未知。在这里，单细胞RNA测序鉴定出与乳腺外PD相关的不同细胞状态，新型生物标志物和信号通路-包括mTOR。有趣的是，我们在人PD皮肤的基底上皮细胞中发现了MSI1异位过表达，并显示了在组织病理学，单细胞和分子水平上对人PD进行表型复制的小鼠表皮基底层中的Msi1过表达。使用此小鼠模型，我们鉴定了翻译成人类Paget细胞的Paget样细胞的新型生物标记。此外，单细胞轨迹，RNA速度和沿袭追踪分析揭示了假定的角质形成细胞到Paget样的细胞转化，支持疾病发病机理的原位转化理论。从机制上讲，Msi1-mTOR途径驱动角质形成细胞-Paget样细胞转化，雷帕霉素对mTOR信号的抑制作用显着拯救了Msi1过表达转基因小鼠的Paget样表型。雷帕霉素局部治疗可改善人乳腺PD相关症状，提示mTOR抑制是PD中的一种新型治疗方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32453711

Donor monocyte-derived macrophages promote human acute graft-versus-host disease

供体单核细胞衍生的巨噬细胞促进人急性移植物抗宿主病

DOI: 10.1172/JCI133909

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32453711/

Journal: The Journal of clinical investigation ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Myelopoiesis is invariably present and contributes to pathology in animal models of graft-versus-host disease (GVHD). In humans, a rich inflammatory infiltrate bearing macrophage markers has also been described in histological studies. In order to determine the origin, functional properties, and role in pathogenesis of these cells, we isolated single-cell suspensions from acute cutaneous GVHD and subjected them to genotype, transcriptome, and in vitro functional analysis. A donor-derived population of CD11c+CD14+ cells was the dominant population of all leukocytes in GVHD. Surface phenotype and NanoString gene expression profiling indicated the closest steady-state counterpart of these cells to be monocyte-derived macrophages. In GVHD, however, there was upregulation of monocyte antigens SIRPα and S100A8/9 transcripts associated with leukocyte trafficking, pattern recognition, antigen presentation, and costimulation. Isolated GVHD macrophages stimulated greater proliferation and activation of allogeneic T cells and secreted higher levels of inflammatory cytokines than their steady-state counterparts. In HLA-matched mixed leukocyte reactions, we also observed differentiation of activated macrophages with a similar phenotype. These exhibited cytopathicity to a keratinocyte cell line and mediated pathological damage to skin explants independently of T cells. Together, these results define the origin, functional properties, and potential pathogenic roles of human GVHD macrophages.

摘要: 骨髓生成总是存在，并且有助于移植物抗宿主病（GVHD）动物模型的病理学。在人类中，组织学研究中还描述了带有巨噬细胞标志物的炎性浸润丰富。为了确定这些细胞的起源，功能特性和在发病机理中的作用，我们从急性皮肤GVHD中分离了单细胞悬液，并对其进行了基因型，转录组和体外功能分析。CD11c+CD14+细胞的供体来源群体是GVHD中所有白细胞的主要群体。表面表型和NanoString基因表达谱表明这些细胞最接近的稳态对应物是单核细胞衍生的巨噬细胞。然而，在GVHD中，与白细胞运输，模式识别，抗原呈递和共刺激有关的单核细胞抗原SIRPα和S100A8/9转录本上调。分离的GVHD巨噬细胞比同种异体T细胞刺激更大的增殖和活化同种异体T细胞，并分泌更高水平的炎性细胞因子。在HLA匹配的混合白细胞反应中，我们还观察到了具有相似表型的活化巨噬细胞的分化。这些表现出对角质形成细胞系的细胞病变性，并介导了对皮肤外植体的病理性损伤，而与T细胞无关。这些结果共同定义了人GVHD巨噬细胞的起源，功能特性和潜在的致病作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32451472

Prokaryotic single-cell RNA sequencing by in situ combinatorial indexing

通过原位组合索引进行原核单细胞RNA测序

DOI: 10.1038/s41564-020-0729-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32451472/

Journal: Nature microbiology {'ISSN': '2058-5276', 'Name': 'nature microbiology', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '14.174', '2018': '14.3', '2019': '15.54'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Despite longstanding appreciation of gene expression heterogeneity in isogenic bacterial populations, affordable and scalable technologies for studying single bacterial cells have been limited. Although single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) has revolutionized studies of transcriptional heterogeneity in diverse eukaryotic systems1-13, the application of scRNA-seq to prokaryotes has been hindered by their extremely low mRNA abundance14-16, lack of mRNA polyadenylation and thick cell walls17. Here, we present prokaryotic expression profiling by tagging RNA in situ and sequencing (PETRI-seq)-a low-cost, high-throughput prokaryotic scRNA-seq pipeline that overcomes these technical obstacles. PETRI-seq uses in situ combinatorial indexing11,12,18 to barcode transcripts from tens of thousands of cells in a single experiment. PETRI-seq captures single-cell transcriptomes of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria with high purity and low bias, with median capture rates of more than 200 mRNAs per cell for exponentially growing Escherichia coli. These characteristics enable robust discrimination of cell states corresponding to different phases of growth. When applied to wild-type Staphylococcus aureus, PETRI-seq revealed a rare subpopulation of cells undergoing prophage induction. We anticipate that PETRI-seq will have broad utility in defining single-cell states and their dynamics in complex microbial communities.

摘要: 尽管长期以来对同基因细菌种群中基因表达异质性的赞赏，但是用于研究单个细菌细胞的可负担且可扩展的技术受到了限制。尽管单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）彻底改变了各种真核系统中转录异质性的研究1-13，但是由于其极低的mRNA丰度14-16，缺少mRNA聚腺苷酸和厚实的多核苷酸，阻碍了将scRNA-seq应用于原核生物。细胞壁17。在这里，我们介绍了通过原位标记RNA和测序（PETRI-seq）（一种克服了这些技术障碍的低成本，高通量的原核生物scRNA-seq管线）进行原核表达的分析。PETRI-seq在一个实验中使用原位组合索引11、12、18对数万个细胞的转录本进行条形码编码。PETRI-seq捕获革兰氏阴性和革兰氏阳性细菌的单细胞转录组，具有高纯度和低偏差，对于呈指数增长的大肠杆菌，每个细胞的中值捕获率超过200个mRNA。这些特征使得能够可靠地区分对应于不同生长阶段的细胞状态。当将其用于野生型金黄色葡萄球菌时，PETRI-seq揭示了受到前噬菌体诱导的细胞的罕见亚群。我们预计PETRI-seq在定义单个细胞状态及其在复杂微生物群落中的动力学方面将具有广泛的用途。

Pubmed_ID: 32449994

Microglia influence host defense, disease, and repair following murine coronavirus infection of the central nervous system

小胶质细胞影响鼠冠状病毒感染中枢神经系统后的宿主防御，疾病和修复

DOI: 10.1002/glia.23844

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32449994/

Journal: Glia {'ISSN': '0894-1491', 'Name': 'glia', '2015': '5.997', '2016': '6.2', '2017': '5.846', '2018': '5.829', '2019': '5.984'}

Date: 2020 Nov

Abstract: The present study examines functional contributions of microglia in host defense, demyelination, and remyelination following infection of susceptible mice with a neurotropic coronavirus. Treatment with PLX5622, an inhibitor of colony stimulating factor 1 receptor (CSF1R) that efficiently depletes microglia, prior to infection of the central nervous system (CNS) with the neurotropic JHM strain of mouse hepatitis virus (JHMV) resulted in increased mortality compared with control mice that correlated with impaired control of viral replication. Single cell RNA sequencing (scRNASeq) of CD45+ cells isolated from the CNS revealed that PLX5622 treatment resulted in muted CD4+ T cell activation profile that was associated with decreased expression of transcripts encoding MHC class II and CD86 in macrophages but not dendritic cells. Evaluation of spinal cord demyelination revealed a marked increase in white matter damage in PLX5622-treated mice that corresponded with elevated expression of transcripts encoding disease-associated proteins Osteopontin (Spp1), Apolipoprotein E (Apoe), and Triggering receptor expressed on myeloid cells 2 (Trem2) that were enriched within macrophages. In addition, PLX5622 treatment dampened expression of Cystatin F (Cst7), Insulin growth factor 1 (Igf1), and lipoprotein lipase (Lpl) within macrophage populations which have been implicated in promoting repair of damaged nerve tissue and this was associated with impaired remyelination. Collectively, these findings argue that microglia tailor the CNS microenvironment to enhance control of coronavirus replication as well as dampen the severity of demyelination and influence repair.

摘要: 本研究检查了小胶质细胞在易感小鼠感染了嗜神经性冠状病毒后对宿主防御，脱髓鞘和再髓鞘的功能性贡献。用PLX5622（一种有效抑制小胶质细胞的集落刺激因子1受体（CSF1R）抑制剂）进行治疗，然后用小鼠肝炎病毒（JHMV）的神经性JHM株感染中枢神经系统（CNS），与对照组相比，死亡率增加。与病毒复制控制受损相关的小鼠。从中枢神经系统分离的CD45+细胞的单细胞RNA测序（scRNASeq）显示，PLX5622处理导致静音的CD4+T细胞活化特性，这与巨噬细胞而非树突状细胞中编码MHCII类和CD86的转录物表达降低有关。脊髓脱髓鞘的评估显示，经PLX5622处理的小鼠中白质损伤显着增加，这与编码疾病相关蛋白骨桥蛋白（Spp1），载脂蛋白E（Apoe）和触发性受体的转录物在髓样细胞2上表达的升高有关（Trem2）在巨噬细胞中富集。此外，PLX5622处理可抑制巨噬细胞群中胱抑素F（Cst7），胰岛素生长因子1（Igf1）和脂蛋白脂肪酶（Lpl）的表达，这与促进受损神经组织的修复有关，这与髓鞘再生受损有关。总的来说，这些发现表明，小胶质细胞适合中枢神经系统微环境，以增强对冠状病毒复制的控制，并抑制脱髓鞘的严重程度并影响修复。

Pubmed_ID: 32446910

Cardiac fibroblast diversity in health and disease

心脏成纤维细胞在健康和疾病中的多样性

DOI: 10.1016/j.matbio.2020.05.003

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32446910/

Journal: Matrix biology : journal of the International Society for Matrix Biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: The cardiac stroma plays essential roles in health and following cardiac damage. The major player of the stroma with respect to extracellular matrix deposition, maintenance and remodeling is the poorly defined fibroblast. It has long been recognized that there is considerable variability to the fibroblast phenotype. With the advent of new, high throughput analytical methods our understanding and appreciation of this heterogeneity has grown dramatically. This review aims to explore the diversity of cardiac fibroblasts and highlights new insights into the diverse nature of these cells and their progenitors as revealed by single cell sequencing and fate mapping studies. We propose that at least in part the observed heterogeneity is related to the existence of a differentiation cascade within stromal cells. Beyond in-organ heterogeneity, we also discuss how the stromal response to damage differs between non-regenerating organs such as the heart and regenerating organs such as skeletal muscle. In exploring possible causes for these differences, we outline that although fibrogenic cells from different organs overlap in many properties, they still possess organ-specific transcriptional signatures and differentiation biases that make them functionally distinct.

摘要: 心脏基质在健康和心脏损害中起着至关重要的作用。在细胞外基质沉积，维持和重塑方面，基质的主要参与者是定义不明确的成纤维细胞。长期以来，人们认识到成纤维细胞表型的变异性很大。随着新的高通量分析方法的问世，我们对这种异质性的理解和赞赏已大大增加。这篇综述旨在探讨心脏成纤维细胞的多样性，并强调通过单细胞测序和命运图谱研究揭示的关于这些细胞及其祖细胞多样性的新见解。我们建议至少部分观察到的异质性与基质细胞内分化级联的存在有关。除了器官异质性之外，我们还讨论了对损伤的基质反应在心脏等非再生器官和骨骼肌等再生器官之间如何不同。在探讨造成这些差异的可能原因时，我们概述了尽管来自不同器官的成纤维细胞在许多特性上都有重叠，但它们仍然具有器官特异性的转录特征和分化倾向，从而使它们在功能上有所不同。

Pubmed_ID: 32446151

Ultrathin glass fiber microprobe for electroporation of arbitrary selected cell groups

超薄玻璃纤维微探针，用于电穿孔任意选定的细胞组

DOI: 10.1016/j.bioelechem.2020.107545

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32446151/

Journal: Bioelectrochemistry (Amsterdam, Netherlands) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: A new type of ultrathin fiber microprobe for selective electroporation is reported. The microprobe is 10 cm long and has a diameter of 350 µm. This microprobe is a low cost tool, which allows electroporation of an arbitrary selected single cell or groups of cells among population with use of a standard microscope and cell culture plates. The microprobe in its basic form contains two metal microelectrodes made of a silver-copper alloy, running along the fiber, each with a diameter of 23 µm. The probe was tested in vitro on a population of normal and cancer cells. Successful targeted electroporation was observed by means of accumulation of trypan blue (TB) dye marker in the cell. The electroporation phenomenon was also verified with propidium iodide and AnnexinV in fluorescent microscopy.

摘要: 报道了一种用于选择性电穿孔的新型超细纤维微探针。微型探针长10厘米，直径350µm。该微探针是一种低成本的工具，它允许使用标准显微镜和细胞培养板对人群中任意选择的单个细胞或细胞组进行电穿孔。基本形状的微探针包含两个由银铜合金制成的金属微电极，沿着金属纤维分布，每个电极的直径为23µm。该探针在正常细胞和癌细胞群体上进行了体外测试。通过台盼蓝（TB）染料标记在细胞中的积累，观察到成功的靶向电穿孔。还用碘化丙锭和AnnexinV在荧光显微镜下证实了电穿孔现象。

Pubmed_ID: 32442602

The elephant in the lung: Integrating lineage-tracing, molecular markers, and single cell sequencing data to identify distinct fibroblast populations during lung development and regeneration

肺中的大象：整合血统追踪，分子标记和单细胞测序数据，以识别肺发育和再生期间不同的成纤维细胞群

DOI: 10.1016/j.matbio.2020.05.002

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32442602/

Journal: Matrix biology : journal of the International Society for Matrix Biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: During lung development, the mesenchyme and epithelium are dependent on each other for instructive morphogenic cues that direct proliferation, cellular differentiation and organogenesis. Specification of epithelial and mesenchymal cell lineages occurs in parallel, forming cellular subtypes that guide the formation of both transitional developmental structures and the permanent architecture of the adult lung. While epithelial cell types and lineages have been relatively well-defined in recent years, the definition of mesenchymal cell types and lineage relationships has been more challenging. Transgenic mouse lines with permanent and inducible lineage tracers have been instrumental in identifying lineage relationships among epithelial progenitor cells and their differentiation into distinct airway and alveolar epithelial cells. Lineage tracing experiments with reporter mice used to identify fibroblast progenitors and their lineage trajectories have been limited by the number of cell specific genes and the developmental timepoint when the lineage trace was activated. In this review, we discuss major developmental mesenchymal lineages, focusing on time of origin, major cell type, and other lineage derivatives, as well as the transgenic tools used to find and define them. We describe lung fibroblasts using function, location, and molecular markers in order to compare and contrast cells with similar functions. The temporal and cell-type specific expression of fourteen "fibroblast lineage" genes were identified in single-cell RNA-sequencing data from LungMAP in the LGEA database. Using these lineage signature genes as guides, we clustered murine lung fibroblast populations from embryonic day 16.5 to postnatal day 28 (E16.5-PN28) and generated heatmaps to illustrate expression of transcription factors, signaling receptors and ligands in a temporal and population specific manner.

摘要: 在肺发育过程中，间充质和上皮细胞相互依赖，以指导生长，细胞分化和器官发生。上皮和间充质细胞谱系的规范平行发生，形成指导亚型过渡发育结构和成年肺永久结构形成的细胞亚型。近年来，尽管上皮细胞类型和谱系的定义相对较好，但间充质细胞类型和谱系关系的定义却更具挑战性。具有永久性和可诱导性谱系示踪剂的转基因小鼠品系在鉴定上皮祖细胞之间的谱系关系及其分化为不同的气道和肺泡上皮细胞中发挥了作用。用于鉴定成纤维细胞祖细胞和其谱系轨迹的报告基因小鼠的谱系跟踪实验受到细胞特异性基因数量和谱系激活时的发育时间的限制。在这篇综述中，我们讨论了主要的发育间质谱系，重点是起源时间，主要细胞类型和其他谱系衍生物，以及用于查找和定义它们的转基因工具。我们描述使用功能，位置和分子标记的肺成纤维细胞，以便比较和对比具有相似功能的细胞。从LGEA数据库中LungMAP的单细胞RNA测序数据中鉴定了14种“成纤维细胞谱系”基因的时间和细胞类型特异性表达。使用这些谱系特征基因作为指导，我们将从胚胎第16.5天到出生后第28天（E16.5-PN28）的鼠肺成纤维细胞群体聚类，并生成了热图，以时间和群体特异性方式说明转录因子，信号受体和配体的表达。

Pubmed_ID: 32442601

Fibroblast heterogeneity and its impact on extracellular matrix and immune landscape remodeling in cancer

成纤维细胞异质性及其对细胞外基质和免疫景观重构的影响

DOI: 10.1016/j.matbio.2020.05.001

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32442601/

Journal: Matrix biology : journal of the International Society for Matrix Biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Tumor progression is marked by dense collagenous matrix accumulations that dynamically reorganize to accommodate a growing and invasive tumor mass. Cancer-associated fibroblasts (CAFs) play an essential role in matrix remodeling and influence other processes in the tumor microenvironment, including angiogenesis, immunosuppression, and invasion. These findings have spawned efforts to elucidate CAF functionality at the single-cell level. Here, we will discuss how those efforts have impacted our understanding of the ways in which CAFs govern matrix remodeling and the influence of matrix remodeling on the development of an immunosuppressive tumor microenvironment.

摘要: 肿瘤的发展过程以致密的胶原蛋白基质积累为特征，这些基质可以动态重组以适应不断增长的侵袭性肿瘤块。癌症相关的成纤维细胞（CAF）在基质重塑中起着至关重要的作用，并影响肿瘤微环境中的其他过程，包括血管生成，免疫抑制和侵袭。这些发现催生了在单细胞水平阐明CAF功能的努力。在这里，我们将讨论这些努力如何影响我们对CAF控制基质重塑的方式以及基质重塑对免疫抑制肿瘤微环境发展的影响的理解。

Pubmed_ID: 32440964

Heterogeneity and chimerism of endothelial cells revealed by single-cell transcriptome in orthotopic liver tumors

单细胞转录组揭示原位肝肿瘤中内皮细胞的异质性和嵌合性

DOI: 10.1007/s10456-020-09727-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32440964/

Journal: Angiogenesis {'ISSN': '0969-6970', 'Name': 'angiogenesis', '2015': '4.301', '2016': '5.253', '2017': '4.351', '2018': '5.759', '2019': '9.78'}

Date: 2020 Nov

Abstract: The liver is a common host organ for cancer, either through lesions that arise in liver epithelial cells [e.g., hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC)] or as a site of metastasis by tumors arising in other organs (e.g., colorectal cancer). However, the changes that occur in liver stromal cells in response to cancer have not been fully characterized, nor has it been determined whether the different sources of liver cancer induce distinct stromal changes. Here, we performed single-cell profiling of liver stromal cells from mouse models of induced spontaneous liver cancer or implanted colorectal liver metastases, with a focus on tumor endothelial cells (ECs). While ECs in liver tissue adjacent to cancerous lesions (so-called adjacent normal) corresponded to liver zonation phenotypes, their transcriptomes were also clearly altered by the presence of a tumor. In comparison, tumor EC transcriptomes show stronger similarities to venous than sinusoidal ECs. Further, tumor ECs, independent of tumor origin, formed distinct clusters displaying conserved "tip-like" or "stalk-like" characteristics, similar to ECs from subcutaneous tumors. However, they also carried liver-specific signatures found in normal liver ECs, suggesting an influence of the host organ on tumor ECs. Our results document gene expression signatures in ECs in liver cancer and show that the host organ, and not the site of tumor origin (liver versus colorectal), is a primary determinant of EC phenotype. In addition, primarily in tumors, we further defined a cluster of chimeric cells that expressed both myeloid and endothelial cell markers and might play a role in tumor angiogenesis.

摘要: 肝脏是癌症的常见宿主器官，通过在肝上皮细胞中发生的损伤（例如，肝细胞癌（HCC））或在其他器官中发生的肿瘤（例如，结直肠癌）转移。然而，尚未完全表征肝基质细胞响应癌症而发生的变化，也未确定肝癌的不同来源是否引起明显的基质变化。在这里，我们从诱导的自发性肝癌或植入的结直肠肝转移的小鼠模型中进行了肝基质细胞的单细胞分析，重点研究了肿瘤内皮细胞（EC）。虽然与癌性病变相邻的肝组织中的EC（所谓的相邻正常组织）对应于肝区带表型，但它们的转录组也因存在肿瘤而明显改变。相比之下，肿瘤EC转录组与静脉EC的相似性更高。此外，与来自皮下肿瘤的EC相似，独立于肿瘤起源的肿瘤EC形成了表现出保守的“尖端样”或“茎样”特征的独特簇。但是，它们还带有在正常肝EC中发现的肝特异性信号，提示宿主器官对肿瘤EC具有影响。我们的结果记录了肝癌ECs中的基因表达特征，并表明宿主器官而不是肿瘤起源部位（肝与结直肠）是EC表型的主要决定因素。此外，主要在肿瘤中，我们进一步定义了一组嵌合细胞，它们表达髓样和内皮细胞标志物，并且可能在肿瘤血管生成中起作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32434947

Single-Cell Analysis Reveals Fibroblast Clusters Linked to Immunotherapy Resistance in Cancer

单细胞分析揭示了成纤维细胞簇与癌症的免疫治疗抗性有关

DOI: 10.1158/2159-8290.CD-19-1384

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32434947/

Journal: Cancer discovery {'ISSN': '2159-8274', 'Name': 'cancer discovery', '2015': '19.783', '2016': '20.011', '2017': '24.373', '2018': '26.37', '2019': '29.497'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: A subset of cancer-associated fibroblasts (FAP+/CAF-S1) mediates immunosuppression in breast cancers, but its heterogeneity and its impact on immunotherapy response remain unknown. Here, we identify 8 CAF-S1 clusters by analyzing more than 19,000 single CAF-S1 fibroblasts from breast cancer. We validate the five most abundant clusters by flow cytometry and in silico analyses in other cancer types, highlighting their relevance. Myofibroblasts from clusters 0 and 3, characterized by extracellular matrix proteins and TGFβ signaling, respectively, are indicative of primary resistance to immunotherapies. Cluster 0/ecm-myCAF upregulates PD-1 and CTLA4 protein levels in regulatory T lymphocytes (Tregs), which, in turn, increases CAF-S1 cluster 3/TGFβ-myCAF cellular content. Thus, our study highlights a positive feedback loop between specific CAF-S1 clusters and Tregs and uncovers their role in immunotherapy resistance. SIGNIFICANCE: Our work provides a significant advance in characterizing and understanding FAP+ CAF in cancer. We reached a high resolution at single-cell level, which enabled us to identify specific clusters associated with immunosuppression and immunotherapy resistance. Identification of cluster-specific signatures paves the way for therapeutic options in combination with immunotherapies.This article is highlighted in the In This Issue feature, p. 1241.

摘要: 癌症相关的成纤维细胞（FAP+/CAF-S1）的一个子集在乳腺癌中介导免疫抑制，但其异质性及其对免疫治疗反应的影响仍然未知。在这里，我们通过分析来自乳腺癌的19,000多个单一CAF-S1成纤维细胞，确定了8个CAF-S1簇。我们通过流式细胞仪和计算机分析对其他癌症类型中的五个最丰富的簇进行了验证，突出了它们的相关性。来自簇0和3的成肌纤维细胞分别以细胞外基质蛋白和TGFβ信号转导为特征，指示对免疫疗法的主要抗性。簇0/ecm-myCAF上调调节性T淋巴细胞（Tregs）中的PD-1和CTLA4蛋白水平，从而增加CAF-S1簇3/TGFβ-myCAF细胞的含量。因此，我们的研究突出了特定CAF-S1簇与Treg之间的正反馈回路，并揭示了它们在免疫治疗耐药性中的作用。意义：我们的工作在表征和理解癌症中的FAP+CAF方面取得了重大进展。我们在单细胞水平上达到了高分辨率，这使我们能够鉴定与免疫抑制和免疫疗法抗性相关的特定簇。识别簇特有的特征为与免疫疗法相结合的治疗选择铺平了道路。1241。

Pubmed_ID: 32434423

Dendritic cells in tumor microenvironment promoted the neuropathic pain via paracrine inflammatory and growth factors

肿瘤微环境中的树突状细胞通过旁分泌炎症和生长因子促进神经性疼痛

DOI: 10.1080/21655979.2020.1771068

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32434423/

Journal: Bioengineered {'ISSN': '2165-5979', 'Name': 'bioengineered', '2015': '1.87', '2016': '1.691', '2017': '1.639', '2018': '1.544', '2019': '2.205'}

Date: 2020 Dec

Abstract: Neuropathic pain associated with cancers was caused by tumor itself or tumor therapy, which was aggravated by sensitizing nociceptor sensory neurons. The tumor microenvironment contributed to tumorigenesis, tumor progress, tumor metastasis, tumor immune resistance, tumor chemotherapy, and tumor immunotherapy. In the current study, we explored the contributions of the infiltrated dendritic cells insulted by Wnt1 in tumor microenvironment to neuropathic pain associated with cancers. The different transcriptome of infiltrated dendritic cells from lung adenocarcinoma and from juxtatumor indicated that thousands of genes were up-regulated by the tumor microenvironment, some of which were enriched in pain pathway. The paracrine factors such as TNF, WNT10A, PDGFA, and NRG1 were also elevated in tumor-infiltrating dendritic cells. The receptors of paracrine factors were highly expressed on dorsal root ganglia (DRG), and not altered in pain conditions. Single-cell RNA-seq data unveiled that TNFSF1 was expressed in neurons, microglial cells, and endothelial cells. PDGFRA was only expressed in microglial cells. ERBB3 was only expressed in neurons. FZD1 and 3 were extensively expressed in various cells. The components composed of signaling pathways associated with the above paracrine factors participated in pain networks. The transcription factors activated by paracrine factor signaling regulated the expression of genes associated with pain. TNF, WNT10A, and PDGFA were extensively expressed in multiple cancers, but their expression in patients did not distribute normally. These data indicated that infiltrated dendritic cells in tumor microenvironment promoted neuropathic pain by sensitizing nociceptor sensory neurons via paracrine factors. Blockage of paracrine factor signaling might alleviate cancer pain.

摘要: 与癌症相关的神经性疼痛是由肿瘤本身或肿瘤治疗引起的，其通过使伤害感受器感觉神经元致敏而加剧。肿瘤微环境促进了肿瘤发生，肿瘤进展，肿瘤转移，肿瘤免疫抵抗，肿瘤化学疗法和肿瘤免疫疗法。在当前的研究中，我们探讨了在肿瘤微环境中Wnt1侵袭的树突状细胞浸润对与癌症相关的神经性疼痛的作用。肺腺癌和邻近癌浸润的树突状细胞的转录组不同，这表明肿瘤微环境上调了数千个基因，其中一些基因在疼痛途径中富集。在肿瘤浸润的树突状细胞中，旁分泌因子如TNF，WNT10A，PDGFA和NRG1也升高。旁分泌因子的受体在背根神经节（DRG）上高表达，并且在疼痛情况下没有改变。单细胞RNA-seq数据揭示了TNFSF1在神经元，小神经胶质细胞和内皮细胞中表达。PDGFRA仅在小胶质细胞中表达。ERBB3仅在神经元中表达。FZD1和3在各种细胞中广泛表达。由与上述旁分泌因子相关的信号传导途径组成的成分参与了疼痛网络。由旁分泌因子信号激活的转录因子调节与疼痛有关的基因的表达。TNF，WNT10A和PDGFA在多种癌症中广泛表达，但在患者中的表达却没有正常分布。这些数据表明，通过旁分泌因子使伤害感受器感觉神经元敏感，肿瘤微环境中浸润的树突状细胞促进了神经性疼痛。旁分泌因子信号传导的阻滞可能减轻癌症疼痛。

Pubmed_ID: 32428547

Radiation-Enhanced Expression of CCL22 in Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma is Associated With CCR4 + CD8 T Cell Recruitment

鼻咽癌中CCL22的辐射增强表达与CCR4 + CD8 T细胞募集有关。

DOI: 10.1016/j.ijrobp.2020.05.001

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32428547/

Journal: International journal of radiation oncology, biology, physics None

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Purpose: Radiation therapy elicits profound alterations in gene expression in tumor cells. This study aims to determine the dynamic changes in the expression of immunity-associated genes in nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC) cells upon radiation therapy. Methods and materials: The study was performed using NPC patient-derived tumor xenograft tumors, cell lines, CCR4+ CD8 T cells sorted from peripheral blood mononuclear cells of healthy volunteers, and TCGA-derived bulk RNA-seq or single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data sets. Patient-derived tumor xenograft tumors or cell lines were irradiated and collected for bulk RNA sequencing or for CCL22 expression and release detection. Malignant phenotypes and radiosensitivity were assessed in cells with or without overexpression of CCL22 or recombinant CCL22 treatment in the presence or absence of irradiation. TCGA data sets were used for uncovering CCR4 status in subtypes of T cells. CCL22 in supernatants, cell lysates, or serum samples was measured with enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay. Results: CCL22 was significantly increased in the irradiated patient-derived tumor xenograft tumors, the supernatants and cell lysates collected from irradiated NPC cell lines, and the serum of patients who received radiation therapy. No alterations of malignant phenotypes were found in tumor cells with CCL22 overexpression or recombinant CCL22 treatment. Kaplan-Meier analysis revealed that CCL22 or its receptor CCR4 positively correlated with cytotoxic T lymphocyte signatures, and high expression of CCL22 or CCR4 was associated with better prognosis for patients with NPC. scRNA-seq data set-based analysis demonstrated that CCR4 was expressed in multiple subtypes of T cells, including effector CD8 T cells. Chemotaxis assay indicated that CCR4+ CD8 T cells could be recruited by CCL22 treatment. Conclusion: The radiation-enhanced release of CCL22 from NPC cells promotes migration of CCR4 + effector CD8 T cells, which might partially be associated with radiation therapy-mediated antitumor immunity.

摘要: 目的：放射治疗引起肿瘤细胞基因表达的深刻改变。这项研究旨在确定放射治疗后鼻咽癌（NPC）细胞中免疫相关基因表达的动态变化。方法和材料：使用来自NPC患者的异种移植肿瘤，细胞系，从健康志愿者的外周血单核细胞中分选出的CCR4+CD8T细胞以及TCGA衍生的大体积RNA-seq或单细胞RNA-seq（scRNA-seq）数据集。辐照患者来源的肿瘤异种移植肿瘤或细胞系，并进行批量RNA测序或CCL22表达和释放检测。在存在或不存在辐射的情况下，在有或没有CCL22过表达或重组CCL22处理的细胞中评估恶性表型和放射敏感性。TCGA数据集用于揭示T细胞亚型中的CCR4状态。用酶联免疫吸附测定法测量上清液，细胞裂解液或血清样品中的CCL22。结果：在接受放射治疗的患者源性异种移植肿瘤，从接受放射治疗的NPC细胞系收集的上清液和细胞裂解液以及接受放射治疗的患者的血清中，CCL22显着增加。在用CCL22过表达或重组CCL22处理的肿瘤细胞中未发现恶性表型改变。Kaplan-Meier分析显示，CCL22或其受体CCR4与细胞毒性T淋巴细胞信号呈正相关，而CCL22或CCR4的高表达与NPC患者的预后更好相关。基于scRNA-seq数据集的分析表明CCR4在T细胞的多种亚型中表达，包括效应CD8T细胞。趋化分析表明，通过CCL22处理可以募集CCR4+CD8T细胞。结论：放射增强的CCL22从NPC细胞的释放促进了CCR4+效应CD8T细胞的迁移，这可能部分与放射治疗介导的抗肿瘤免疫有关。

Pubmed_ID: 32424795

Nanoelectrochemistry in the study of single-cell signaling

纳米电化学在单细胞信号研究中的应用

DOI: 10.1007/s00216-020-02655-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32424795/

Journal: Analytical and bioanalytical chemistry {'ISSN': '1618-2642', 'Name': 'analytical and bioanalytical chemistry', '2015': '3.125', '2016': '3.431', '2017': '3.307', '2018': '3.286', '2019': '3.637'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Label-free biosensing has been the dream of scientists and biotechnologists as reported by Vollmer and Arnold (Nat Methods 5:591-596, 2008). The ability of examining living cells is crucial to cell biology as noted by Fang (Int J Electrochem 2011:460850, 2011). Chemical measurement with electrodes is label-free and has demonstrated capability of studying living cells. In recent years, nanoelectrodes of different functionality have been developed. These nanometer-sized electrodes, coupled with scanning electrochemical microscopy (SECM), have further enabled nanometer spatial resolution study in aqueous environments. Developments in the field of nanoelectrochemistry have allowed measurement of signaling species at single cells, contributing to better understanding of cell biology. Leading studies using nanoelectrochemistry of a variety of cellular signaling molecules, including redox-active neurotransmitter (e.g., dopamine), non-redox-active neurotransmitter (e.g., acetylcholine), reactive oxygen species (ROS), and reactive nitrogen species (RNS), are reviewed here.

摘要: Vollmer和Arnold报告（NatMethods5：591-596，2008），无标签生物传感一直是科学家和生物技术人员的梦想。正如Fang（IntJElectrochem2011：460850，2011）所述，检查活细胞的能力对于细胞生物学至关重要。用电极进行化学测量是没有标签的，并且已经证明可以研究活细胞。近年来，已经开发了具有不同功能的纳米电极。这些纳米尺寸的电极与扫描电化学显微镜（SECM）结合，进一步实现了在水性环境中进行纳米空间分辨率研究。纳米电化学领域的发展已允许测量单个细胞的信号种类，有助于更好地了解细胞生物学。利用纳米电化学技术对包括氧化还原活性神经递质（例如多巴胺），非氧化还原活性神经递质（例如乙酰胆碱），活性氧（ROS）和活性氮（RNS）在内的各种细胞信号分子进行纳米研究，在这里评论。

Pubmed_ID: 32417217

Role of cyclins and cyclin-dependent kinases in pluripotent stem cells and their potential as a therapeutic target

细胞周期蛋白和细胞周期蛋白依赖性激酶在多能干细胞中的作用及其作为治疗靶标的潜力

DOI: 10.1016/j.semcdb.2020.05.001

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32417217/

Journal: Seminars in cell & developmental biology {'ISSN': '1084-9521', 'Name': 'seminars in cell & developmental biology', '2015': '5.181', '2016': '6.614', '2017': '6.138', '2018': '5.46', '2019': '6.691'}

Date: 2020 Nov

Abstract: Over the last 15 years connections between cell cycle control, maintenance of pluripotency, and control of cell fate decisions have been firmly established. With the emergence of powerful tools, such as highly-specific small molecule inhibitors for cyclin-dependent protein kinase (CDK) activity and single-cell imaging technologies, the mechanistic links between cyclins, CDKs and regulation in PSCs in mechanistic detail has been made possible. In this review, we discuss new developments that mechanistically link the CDK regulatory network to control of cell fate decisions, including maintenance of the pluripotent state. Overall, these findings have potential to impact the translational applications of stem cells in regenerative medicine, drug discovery and cancer treatment.

摘要: 在过去的15年中，已经牢固地建立了细胞周期控制，多能性维持和细胞命运决定控制之间的联系。随着功能强大的工具的出现，例如针对细胞周期蛋白依赖性蛋白激酶（CDK）活性的高特异性小分子抑制剂和单细胞成像技术，细胞周期蛋白，CDK和PSC中调控机制之间的机械联系已成为可能。。在这篇综述中，我们讨论了将CDK调控网络与细胞命运决定（包括维持多能状态的维持）机械地联系起来的新进展。总体而言，这些发现可能会影响干细胞在再生医学，药物发现和癌症治疗中的翻译应用。

Pubmed_ID: 32412772

Clinical significance of perioperative EMT-CTC in rectal cancer patients receiving open/laparoscopic surgery

开腹/腹腔镜手术直肠癌患者围手术期EMT-CTC的临床意义

DOI: 10.4149/neo_2020_190709N611

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32412772/

Journal: Neoplasma {'ISSN': '0028-2685', 'Name': 'neoplasma', '2015': '1.961', '2016': '1.871', '2017': '1.696', '2018': '1.771', '2019': '1.721'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: The objective of this study was to explore the clinical significance of perioperative CTCs (circulating tumor cells) counts and EMT-CTCs (epithelial-mesenchymal transition-CTCs) in rectal cancer patients. A total of 30 patients with rectal cancer who underwent radical resection of rectal cancer at the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region People's hospital were enrolled. Five ml peripheral blood was withdrawn from 30 patients with rectal cancer before the operation and seven days after the operation and at the corresponding time also from 20 healthy volunteers. CanPatrol™ CTC detection technique was used to enrich and identify CTCs and IER3 expression simultaneously. We found out that the preoperative total CTCs were correlated with lymph node metastasis (p=0.008) and tumor size, and mixed CTCs were closely correlated with lymph node metastasis (p=0.009). The number of IER3-positive total CTCs and mesenchymal CTCs were statistically associated with tumor size, p=0.034 and 0.043, respectively. The number of CTCs varied significantly before and after the operation in all patients (p=0.049). There were significant differences in CTCs variations between the open operation group and the laparoscopic operation group. In the laparoscopic operation group, the average number of single-cell CTCs was 6.9 before operation and 3.5 after the operation (p=0.013). In the open operation group, the average number of single-cell CTCs was 5.9 before operation and 4.2 after the operation. To conclude, surgery is associated with a decrease of CTCs in rectal cancer patients, especially in patients receiving laparoscopic surgery. The number of CTCs before the operation in rectal cancer patients is related to the size of tumors and regional lymph node metastasis. CTCs detection and characterization may be useful for clinical staging and lymph node dissection during operation.

摘要: 这项研究的目的是探讨直肠癌患者围手术期CTC（循环肿瘤细胞）计数和EMT-CTC（上皮-间质转化CTC）的临床意义。入选广西壮族自治区人民医院行直肠癌根治性切除术的30例直肠癌患者。在手术前和手术后7天从30例直肠癌患者中抽取了5ml外周血，同时在20例健康志愿者中抽取了5ml外周血。CanPatrol™CTC检测技术用于同时富集和鉴定CTC和IER3表达。我们发现，术前总CTC与淋巴结转移（p=0.008）和肿瘤大小相关，混合CTC与淋巴结转移密切相关（p=0.009）。IER3阳性总CTC和间充质CTC的数量与肿瘤的大小有统计学意义，分别为p=0.034和0.043。在所有患者中，术前和术后CTC的数量差异显着（p=0.049）。开放手术组和腹腔镜手术组之间的CTC变化存在显着差异。在腹腔镜手术组中，术前平均单细胞CTC数为6.9，术后平均为3.5（p=0.013）。在开放式手术组中，手术前单细胞CTC的平均数量为5.9，手术后为4.2。总而言之，在直肠癌患者中，尤其是在接受腹腔镜手术的患者中，手术与CTC减少有关。直肠癌患者术前CTC的数量与肿瘤的大小和局部淋巴结转移有关。CTC的检测和表征可能对手术中的临床分期和淋巴结清扫有用。

Pubmed_ID: 32399771

Attenuated regulatory function of the small-conductance Ca 2+-activated K + channel in detrusor smooth muscle cells excitability in an obese rat model

肥胖大鼠模型中小传导Ca 2+激活的K +通道对逼尿肌平滑肌细胞兴奋性的减弱调节功能

DOI: 10.1007/s11255-020-02487-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32399771/

Journal: International urology and nephrology {'ISSN': '0301-1623', 'Name': 'international urology and nephrology', '2015': '1.292', '2016': '1.564', '2017': '1.692', '2018': '1.596', '2019': '1.843'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Purpose: Overactive bladder (OAB) is related to detrusor overactivity (DO), which is caused by the increased detrusor smooth muscle (DSM) cells excitability. Small-conductance Ca2+-activated K+ (SK) channels is a fundamental regulator of excitability and contractility in DSM cells. Obesity-related OAB is associated with the decreased expression and regulatory function of SK channels in DSM layer. However, the regulation role of SK channels in obesity-related OAB DSM cell excitability is still unknown. Here, we tested the hypothesis that obesity-related OAB is associated with reduced expression and activity of SK channels in DSM cells. Methods: Female Sprague-Dawley rats were fed a normal diet (ND) or a high-fat diet (HFD) and weighed after 12 weeks. We performed urodynamic study, single-cell quantitative reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction (qRT-PCR), and patch-clamp electrophysiology. Results: Increased average body weights and urodynamically demonstrated OAB were observed in HFD rats. Single-cell qRT-PCR experiments discovered the decreased mRNA expression level of SK channel in DSM cell from HFD rats. Patch-clamp studies revealed that NS309, a SK channel activator, had an attenuated effect on membrane potential hyperpolarization in HFD DSM cells. In addition, the reduced whole cell SK channel currents were recorded in HFD DSM cells. Conclusions: Attenuated SK channels expression and function, which results in the increased DSM cells excitability and contributes to DO, is discovered in obesity-related OAB DSM cells, suggesting that SK channels might be potential therapeutic targets to control OAB.

摘要: 目的：膀胱过度活动症（OAB）与逼尿肌过度活动症（DO）有关，这是由逼尿肌平滑肌（DSM）细胞兴奋性增加引起的。小电导Ca2+激活的K+（SK）通道是DSM细胞中兴奋性和收缩性的基本调节剂。肥胖相关的OAB与DSM层中SK通道的表达减少和调节功能有关。然而，SK通道在肥胖相关的OABDSM细胞兴奋性中的调节作用仍是未知的。在这里，我们测试了与肥胖相关的OAB与DSM细胞中SK通道表达减少和活性相关的假设。方法：给雌性Sprague-Dawley大鼠喂食正常饮食（ND）或高脂饮食（HFD），并在12周后称重。我们进行了尿动力学研究，单细胞定量逆转录聚合酶链反应（qRT-PCR）和膜片钳电生理学。结果：在HFD大鼠中观察到平均体重增加和尿动力学证实的OAB。单细胞qRT-PCR实验发现HFD大鼠DSM细胞中SK通道的mRNA表达水平降低。膜片钳研究表明，SK通道激活剂NS309对HFDDSM细胞的膜电位超极化具有减弱的作用。此外，在HFDDSM电池中记录了减少的全电池SK通道电流。结论：在肥胖相关的OABDSM细胞中发现了减弱的SK通道表达和功能，导致DSM细胞兴奋性增加，并促进了DO。这表明SK通道可能是控制OAB的潜在治疗靶点。

Pubmed_ID: 32394959

Using single cell transcriptomics to study the complexity of human retina

使用单细胞转录组学研究人类视网膜的复杂性

DOI: 10.4103/1673-5374.282253

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32394959/

Journal: Neural regeneration research {'ISSN': '1673-5374', 'Name': 'neural regeneration research', '2015': '0.968', '2016': '1.769', '2017': '2.234', '2018': '2.472', '2019': '3.171'}

Date: 2020 Nov

Pubmed_ID: 32382110

Adipogenesis of skeletal muscle fibro/adipogenic progenitors is affected by the WNT5a/GSK3/β-catenin axis

WNT5a / GSK3 /β-catenin轴影响骨骼肌纤维/成脂祖细胞的成脂

DOI: 10.1038/s41418-020-0551-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32382110/

Journal: Cell death and differentiation {'ISSN': '1350-9047', 'Name': 'cell death and differentiation', '2015': '8.218', '2016': '8.339', '2017': '8', '2018': '8.086', '2019': '10.717'}

Date: 2020 Oct

Abstract: Fibro/Adipogenic Progenitors (FAPs) are muscle-interstitial progenitors mediating pro-myogenic signals that are critical for muscle homeostasis and regeneration. In myopathies, the autocrine/paracrine constraints controlling FAP adipogenesis are released causing fat infiltrates. Here, by combining pharmacological screening, high-dimensional mass cytometry and in silico network modeling with the integration of single-cell/bulk RNA sequencing data, we highlighted the canonical WNT/GSK/β-catenin signaling as a crucial pathway modulating FAP adipogenesis triggered by insulin signaling. Consistently, pharmacological blockade of GSK3, by the LY2090314 inhibitor, stabilizes β-catenin and represses PPARγ expression abrogating FAP adipogenesis ex vivo while limiting fatty degeneration in vivo. Furthermore, GSK3 inhibition improves the FAP pro-myogenic role by efficiently stimulating, via follistatin secretion, muscle satellite cell (MuSC) differentiation into mature myotubes. Combining, publicly available single-cell RNAseq datasets, we characterize FAPs as the main source of WNT ligands inferring their potential in mediating autocrine/paracrine responses in the muscle niche. Lastly, we identify WNT5a, whose expression is impaired in dystrophic FAPs, as a crucial WNT ligand able to restrain the detrimental adipogenic differentiation drift of these cells through the positive modulation of the β-catenin signaling.

摘要: 纤维/成脂祖细胞（FAP）是介导肌原性信号的肌肉间质祖细胞，这对肌肉稳态和再生至关重要。在肌病中，控制FAP脂肪形成的自分泌/旁分泌限制被释放，引起脂肪浸润。在这里，通过结合药理学筛选，高维流式细胞术和计算机网络模型与单细胞/大量RNA测序数据的整合，我们强调了经典的WNT/GSK/β-catenin信号传导是调节FAP脂肪形成触发的关键途径通过胰岛素信号传导。一致地，LY2090314抑制剂对GSK3的药理作用可稳定β-catenin并抑制PPARγ的表达，从而消除FAP的体内脂肪生成，同时限制体内脂肪变性。此外，GSK3抑制通过卵泡抑素分泌有效刺激肌肉卫星细胞（MuSC）分化为成熟的肌管，从而改善FAP促肌原作用。结合可公开获得的单细胞RNAseq数据集，我们将FAP表征为WNT配体的主要来源，从而推断出它们在介导肌肉生态位中自分泌/旁分泌反应中的潜力。最后，我们将营养不良性FAP中表达受损的WNT5a鉴定为一种关键的WNT配体，该配体能够通过β-catenin信号的正调控来抑制这些细胞有害的成脂分化。

Pubmed_ID: 32381371

Corrigendum to "Bulk and single cell transcriptomic data indicate that a dichotomy between inflammatory pathways in peripheral blood and arthritic joints complicates biomarker discovery" [Cytokine 127 (2020) 154960]

更正“大容量和单细胞转录组数据表明，外周血和关节炎症的炎症途径之间的二分法使生物标志物的发现变得复杂” [Cytokine 127（2020）154960]

DOI: 10.1016/j.cyto.2020.155087

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32381371/

Journal: Cytokine {'ISSN': '1043-4666', 'Name': 'cytokine', '2015': '2.94', '2016': '3.488', '2017': '3.514', '2018': '3.078', '2019': '2.952'}

Date: 2020 Sep
